Wvú to gɛn bô ntum fô ŋgon kpwoon mvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maalia, ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ wan wvu tfu. Wvú to nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase lɛ wvú nu ke enu kpwɛɛ Yosɛw wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe le.
Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvudvu gɛn yɛn Maalia le gay wvú le lɛ, “Me ŋgayte wo le. Nyo' nu ɛ buw wase wo ɛ no nu ben ɛ wvú.”
Ɛ Maalia yuw ɛ fí ghaw wvú baay, ɛ wvú no maa laa kfuu wvun ŋgayma sɛ nu wvù nɛɛ lɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Maalia fo wo efanè kɛ. Nyo' nu ɛ buw wase wo.
Taa eyɛn, wo nu ke eleem bô fue, eboo wan diemsɛn, ecu diee lɛ Jisos.
Wvú nu ke enu wee wvu baay, ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe wvú lɛ Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e. Tata wvù Nyo' nu ke eshike wvú yî kawla Nfon Dawe wvù icee kfuu dibole.
Wvú nu ke esaake kfuu di Yakow e sekecii, ɛ kɛ bvunfon bwew nu ke ekɛŋke kemɛse kɛ.”
Ɛ Maalia bife ɛ̂ nceendaa Nyo' lɛ, “Fifin nu ke eghan nɛɛ le, ɛ me mbɛɛ wan wvu tfu.”
Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule nu ke eto yî yo le, ɛ́ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e eyiŋsɛn yî yo le. Nonɛn, wan wvù wo nu ke eboo nu ke enu wvù yuule, ɛ́ bó emum eteŋe wvú lɛ Waa Nyo'.
Taa eyɛn, wayco wvù Ɛlisabɛn wvù nu ɛ wvú ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ lun ɛ bó se teŋe wvú lɛ kase, nu keseen bô fue kee soocaan, ɛ wvú nu ke eboo wan diemsɛn.
Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì nulo eghaw Nyo' kɛ.”
Ɛ Maalia mum gay lɛ, “Me wvun fɛn wvù waa lemme Nyo'. Wvú ege ɛ́ fí ekooy bô me no wo gay.” No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' mum nɛ.
Kɛ ɛdiuw yodvu le, ɛ Maalia seyse nɛ no yaŋsene gɛne ntɛw mvu wvù woŋ kum wvu Judea le,
gɛn buy jó, ley yew dvu Sakalia gay bwee yew we wvù Ɛlisabɛn e.
No Ɛlisabɛn to yuwɛɛ ŋgayma wvu Maalia, ɛ wan sɛsɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛshem baay. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî ye le.
Ɛ wvú mum wvule foweɛwe, gay lɛ, “Kembonɛn ke Nyo' le nu yî yo le fele bokɛnɛ bocii, ɛ kembonɛn kew nu yî wan wvù wo nu ke eboo le.
Fin fiɛɛ fi baay nɛn ghan nɛɛ le, lɛ bwee Tata wɛm nu ɛ laa ghane ɛ̂ me le?
Taa eyɛn, seke me mbe n'yuw ŋgayma wo, wan ɛ sɛsɛ ɛ̂ me ɛshem bô nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay.
Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô wo le, njefo wo nu ɛ bee lɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wo dvú nu ke eto ekocɛn.”
Ɛ Maalia gay lɛ, “Fitele fiem bensee Tata Nyo',
ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ nje Nyo' wvù nu Mboyse wɛm.
Wvú nu ɛ kume me, ɛ me nu kɛ lo waa we lemme wvu ncɛw. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, ɛŋgokɛ kecii nu ke egayte lɛ, Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî yɛm e,
njefo Nyo' Mvuŋgay Mvunciim nu ɛ ge wase mwɛɛm mvu baay baay nteen fô me le. Kɛ diee diew kɛŋke kenfewsɛn kɛ.
Wvú camte shen fô bonyii bò wvumte wvú le. Ɛ shen yin nu yî ɛŋgokɛ kecii le.
Wvú nu ɛ duŋcɛ mvuŋgay mvu ɛbo kew e, ɛ tawse bonyii bò saale ye, bontaŋ bobole ɛ bvuŋ.
Wvú nu ɛ shwaw wase bonfon bo baay baay yî bokawla le, ɛ bense ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ncɛw.
Wvú nu ɛ nyaŋe wase bonyii bò jeŋ yuu bó, bó ɛ ffuu bô mwɛɛm mvù jee, ɛ kuŋ bo kpwaw e cancan.
Wvú nu ɛ ficɛ wee we lemme wvù Islael, ɛ kume keecam shen fô Abla'am bô kfuu diew e, egɛn emɛse kɛ no wvú to kawɛɛ ɛ̂ bo'icee cee bosɛse.”
<range>
No Maalia jeme nonɛn, ce bô Ɛlisabɛn kee tɛ mum kase tu jim fô yew e.
Ɛ kefew kè Ɛlisabɛn ke eboo ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú boo wan diemsɛn.
Ɛ kfuu diew noo bonyii bò to cee keleŋ kedvu le yuw lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ shen fô wvú le naa baay, ɛ bó mum no laŋlaŋe.
Ɛ ɛdiuw ke to buy nyaŋ, ɛ bó to keetfuse wan yew, mum no gomte keecu diee lɛ Sakalia kɛ diɛwɛ di ice le,
geenɛn ɛ bwee ma lo, gay lɛ bó eteŋè wvú lɛ Jon.
Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wee nu dvú ɛ̂ kfuu dinɛn e bô diee din kɛ.”
Ɛ bó mum nɛ no feeke bô can ɛ̂ cee wan, keekiɛɛ laa wvú be gomte lɛ bó ecu diee di wan e lɛ yɛɛ lɛ.
Ɛ wvú mum few tɛn lɛ bó eto bô fiɛɛ ɛ́ wen esaŋ yî dvú le. Ɛ bó to dvú ɛ wvú mum saŋ lɛ, “Diee diew nu Jon.” Ɛ bó yɛn nonɛn ɛ dew yum bó.
Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ diuw Sakalia mum yene ye, ɛ leme diew yaatɛn, ɛ wvú bvuu kase no jemyi. Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
Ɛ bonyii bo ntɛw wvudvu le kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw baay. Ɛ saaka mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim saaŋkɛn gɛn woŋ kum wvu Judea wvudvu le tfuu.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yuwɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw mum no biite laa wvun wan nu ke enu wvù nɛɛ lɛ, njefo fí to looci duŋci lɛ kembonɛn ke Nyo' le nu yî ye le.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ yiŋsɛn yî Sakalia wvù icee Jon e, ɛ wvú mum nɛ no jemyi kɛ diɛwɛ wee ntum Nyo' le, gayte lɛ,
“Beene ebenseè Tata wvù nu Nyo' bonyii bo Islael. Wvú nu ɛ to wase keesum bonyii bew yî ŋgɛw e.
Wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ wase ntɛmemvuŋgay wvù nu ke eboyse beene, ɛ wvú buy ɛ̂ kfuu di wee we lemme wvù Nfon Dawe le.
Fifin nu no wvú to kawɛɛ diuw bonyii bew bo ntum e bò yuule ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e bò wvú to gɛkɛɛ,
lɛ wen nu ke eboyse beene can bonyii bò gomte keefiwsɛ beene le, noo bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo bvuban e.
Wvú to nu ɛ kaw lɛ wen nu ke ecam shen fô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene le mum no shee kumyi kelew kew kè wvú wvù Nyo' to dieɛ.
Wvú to nu ɛ kaw ɛ̂ icee bo'icee bosɛɛbeene wvù Abla'am lew lɛ,
wen nu ke ebvuse beene can bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo bvuban e, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene elemte wvú le sɛ nfan,
eceè nce wvù yuule bô wvu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ɛdiuw ɛcii yî nshii wesebeene le.
Ɛ wo waa wɛm nu ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe wo lɛ wee ntum Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, njefo wo nu ke esa fwe dvu Tata keeseyse je ye.
Wo nu ke efewci ɛ̂ bonyii bew je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekɛŋkɛ mboyma jó, wvù ɛ̀ nu nlɛɛshɛ wvù Nyo' nu ke elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole,
nje shen yi baay yì wvú koole fô bonyii le. Wvú nu ke eciinse Mboyse ɛ́ wvú eshiile too we kɛ diɛwɛ diuu fò dí ɛ san e.
Wvú nu ke enya n'yuu ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu yî ɛjiwɛ le noo bò nu diuw kpwe le, emum eleke beene ɛ̂ je kembonɛn e.”
Ɛ waa Sakalia wvudvu mum no kuu yî nyam ye le, kuu tɛn ɛ̂ keyoy e. Ke mum nɛ gɛn no cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwaante, gɛn buy diuu dì wvú to buyɛɛ keeduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ sa' buy lɛ bó etaŋ bonyii bocii bò nu yî bitum bi woŋ wvù Lum e. Yí to buy ɛ̂ Kaysa Augustus wvù to nu Nfon wvu baay wvu jó.
Kentaŋ kin to nu ke fwe seke Kpwilinus to nu wee sa' wvu Lum saake keba ke woŋ e kè Silia.
Nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii mum no tuu jim bontɛw bobole, lɛ bó esaŋ ɛdiee ɛbo ebvuu etaŋ bó.
Ɛ Yosɛw tɛn nɛ Nasalɛt ntɛw mvu wvu Galilee le, ben gɛn Bɛtelɛ'ɛm ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ wvù Judea le jò bó to bokɛɛ Nfon Dawe. Wvú to gɛn jó njefo wvú to nu wee kfuu di Nfon Dawe le.
Yosɛw to gɛne bô Maalia wvù wvú to leyte lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kpwɛse, ɛ wvú nu bô fue.
No bó to gɛnɛɛ buy jó, ɛ kefew kè wvú eboo ke to kocɛn.
Ɛ wvú boo waa we bvucile ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan diemsɛn, kule ɛ̂ ndvu le, jike ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e, njefo bó to nu ɛ tan fô nce yew bonyii bo ghane le.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ boncɛy njée bomew nu mbew ntɛw wvudvu le, cɛyte njée yibo ɛntaŋ.
Ɛ nceendaa Tata nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛjise, ɛ n'yuu Nyo' ba fô bó to nu, ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ nfan baay.
Geenɛn, ɛ nceendaa Tata wvudvu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben eyuw, me ntoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô saaka wvù jee fô ben e, ɛ wvú nu ke enya njoŋ wvu baay ɛ̂ bonyii bocii.
Yî diuu di ɛbɛn e nu ɛ bó ɛ boo Mboyse ɛ̂ ntɛw Nfon Dawe le wvù ɛ̀ nu Klistu wvù Tata.
Fin nu ke enu nciise keeduŋcɛ wan wvudvu ɛ̂ ben. Ben nu ke egɛn eyɛn wvú le ɛ bó ɛ kule ɛ̂ ndvu le ɛ jike ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e.”
Kɛ nonɛn, ɛ bó nɛ sɛsɛ yɛn nceendaa Nyo' wɛ le bô ŋgoo bomew e nteen ɛ bó tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ,
“Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù nu fowe le ɛ́ kembonɛn enu fokuse fɛn fô bonyii bò Nyo' yuuke njoŋ bô bó le.”
Seke bonceendaa bo Nyo' le ba to cin'yɛɛ bó le kase ben we, ɛ boncɛy njée bodvu jeme ɛ̂ bikuu bibole lɛ, “Beene egɛn keseen wvun Bɛtelɛ'ɛm, egɛn eyɛn fiɛɛ fin fì kooy le fì Nyo' nu ɛ ge beene ɛ kiɛɛ.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum nɛ yaŋsɛn gɛn, gɛn yɛn Yosɛw bô Maalia le noo wan e, ɛ wvú jiime ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e.
No bó yɛn nonɛn, mum kɛw no fɛle mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nceendaa Nyo' be seŋe ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ wan wvudvu.
Ɛ dew yum bonyii bocii bò yuwɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù boncɛy njée ba jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
Geenɛn, ɛ Maalia yuw fiew gɛɛ fô fitele le no kpwawci sekecii.
Ɛ boncɛy njée ba kase no tuu jim bensee Nyo' tumte moŋkum mew njefo bó to nu ɛ gɛn yɛn mwɛɛm mvunciim e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no nceendaa Nyo' to seŋɛɛ.
Ɛ wan wvudvu ke buy ɛdiuw nyaŋ, ɛ bó tfuse wvú yew, mum cu diee lɛ Jisos, ɛ diee din nu kɛ dí dì nceendaa Nyo' to seŋɛɛ ɛ̂ bwee ɛ wvú sɛ ke leem bô fue.
Ɛ kefew ke to kocɛn kè bó ege ncese keekfum bikuu bibole no nci Muses to gomte. Ɛ bó mum jo wan ben dvú Jɛlusalɛm keenya ɛ̂ Nyo'.
Fifin nu no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee boke waa bvucile ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan diemsɛn, ɛ́ wvú nya ɛ ɛ̀ no nu wvu Nyo'.”
Bó to gɛn tɛn keege ncese wvun bô bibembɛ bifɛɛ, kɛnɛɛ bô boom bo nyiŋ e bofɛɛ bii no fí to nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ cee la mvu nu Jɛlusalɛm ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Semeon. Wvú to nu wee wvu teytey gee no Nyo' gomte, ɛ wvú to cɛyte wee wvù ke eto elɛɛse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo Islael e. Keyoy ke Yuule to nu yî ye le,
ɛ kí to ge wase ɛ wvú kiɛɛ lɛ kɛ kpwe nu ke ejo wvú sɛ wvú ɛ yɛn Mboyse wvù wvu Tata wvù wvú to kawɛɛ le kɛ.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ke nɛ ge ɛ Semeon gɛn yew ncese le. Ɛ Yosɛw bô Maalia ke dioo to bô wan yew ncese le keege no nci gomte,
ɛ Semeon fi wan koycɛ mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le, gayte lɛ,
“Tata, no wo nu ɛ ge wase ŋkawma wo ɛ to ɛ kocɛn, joo lɛ wee wo lemme yî nyɛkeey e.
Ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm nu ɛ yɛn wase Mboyse
wvù wo ciinse le, ɛ bonyii bocii nu ke eyɛn wvú le.
Wvú nu ke enu ken'yeese fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael e, wvu lɛ bó tɛn ekee wo, ege ɛ́ bó ecake diee di bonyii buw bo Islael e we.”
Ɛ cee wan bô bwee wan yuw mwɛɛm mvù Semeon jemyi ɛ̂ wan wvun we, ɛ dew yum bó.
Ɛ wvú mum laŋ kembonɛn yî bó le, gay ɛ̂ Maalia wvù bwee lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase waa wo wvun, ɛ nto we nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael nteen egbwekɛn, ɛ́ bomew enɛŋkɛn lo we. Wvú nu nciise fiɛɛ ɛ bonyii nu ke ejemyi mwɛɛm yî ye le.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ fifin emum eduŋci mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nyile ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvubole. Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu ke ege ɛ́ fitele fiuw enu kɛ diɛwɛ bó bon bô finyo.”
Ɛ̀ to nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Anna, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo'. Wvú to nu waa Fanuwɛl wvù wee kfuu di Ashɛl e. Kpwoon wvudvu to nu ɛ lun wase baay. Wvú to nu bô dweese kɛ bilum bisooshwiy mɛy, ɛ dweese mum kpwe.
Ɛ wvú mum no nu kɛ wase fiew kpwɛɛ ŋkfu, shee yew ncese le bensee Nyo' ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ, bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, bunlee. Bilum biew to nu wase mbaŋ nyaŋ ncow binɛw (84).
Kɛ kefew kedvu kè bó to toɛ bô wan yew ncese le, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu to yɛn bó le, mum nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', jeme ɛkumɛ wan wvun ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bò to cɛyte kefew kè Nyo' ke esum bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm can ŋgɛw e.
Seke Yosɛw bô Maalia to mɛsɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim no nci Nyo' to gomte, mum kase tu jim ntɛw wvubo wvù Nasalɛt e ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le.
Ɛ wan mum no nu kuu kɛŋke mvuŋgay, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô bvufee bvu baay, ɛ bonyii yɛne kembonɛn ke Nyo' le yî ye le.
Icee Jisos bô bwee to ké no bene Jɛlusalɛm bilum bicii fô Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e.
Ɛ Jisos ke buy bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ, ɛ bó bvuu ben fô Ŋkaw wvudvu le kɛ no bó to ké no bene.
No bó to dieɛ wase Ŋkaw mɛse, dioo tuu jim, ɛ wan wvù Jisos shɛɛ ɛjim Jɛlusalɛm, geenɛn ɛ ice bô bwee faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ bó ke lɛn diuu dicile, kpwaake kɛ lɛ wvú nu ɛnte jo ŋgoo bonyii bò bô bó to lɛne le. Ɛ bó ke mum kɛw no gomte wvú ɛnte jo kfuu dibole bô nsán,
ke gom ŋkuuŋ, mum kase tu jim Jɛlusalɛm keegom wvú jó.
Ɛ ɛ̀ dioo nu ɛjim jo ɛdiuw ɛta no bó to kɛwɛɛ keegomte, ɛ bó yɛn wvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô yew ncese le, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fó bô bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le, yeke bon'yɛɛyi, biwci bombife.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yeke no kɛŋke ŋghaw baay njefo wvú to kee mwɛɛm baay bvuu tfuuse bombife lɛŋ.
No bwee bô ice yɛnɛɛ wvú le, ɛ dew loocɛ yum bó. Ɛ bwee bɛn wvú gay lɛ, “Wan wo njiŋsene la bô bese nɛn? Taa eyɛn, bee ico nu ɛ gom wase wo ɛ no wɛwte lo.”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben be gomte me nje la? Kɛ ben be kee lɛ me ŋkɛŋke keenu yew dvu Icɛm fɛn e?”
Geenɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme kɛ.
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ ɛ bô bó no booke Nasalɛt. Ɛ wvú gɛn no yuuke bó le ntay. No mwɛɛm mvun to kooyi nɛn, ɛ bwee gɛɛ fô fitele fiew e no kpwawci sekecii.
Ɛ Jisos mum no kuu, kɛŋke bvufee bvu baay, ɛ Nyo' kooŋke wvú, ɛ bonyii tɛn kooŋke wvú.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè Jon wvù waa Sakalia to nu ŋkpwaante, ɛ Nyo' tum wvú. Kelum kekiɛ to nu ɛ Tibɛlius ɛ saw wase diɛwɛ Nfon wvu baay wvu Lum e bilum yuufe ncow bitin. Ɛ Bontus Baylɛt saake keba ke woŋ e kè Judea, ɛ 'Ɛlod saake Galilee. Filew wvù waa bwee 'Ɛlod to saake keba kè Itulea bô kè Tɛlakoniti, ɛ Lisania saake Abilɛn. Ɛ̀ to nu tɛn kefew kè Annas bô Kayfas to nu bikuu bi bocee ncese le.
<range>
No Jon yuw ntum Nyo', mum nɛ gɛn biba bi woŋ e bicii bì mbew Joo Joodan e, no fewci ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ wen elese bó ɛ̂ joo wvu lɛ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
Fifin nu no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le lɛ, “Diɛw wee fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ, bó eseyse je Tata, enɛle ɛ́ yí enù teytey,
ekɛɛshɛ lɛ dikum di baay baay bô di caan caan dicii, eyiŋsɛn biloŋɛ bicii, enɛle jé yì ŋgooŋgoo ɛ́ yí enu teytey, eyiŋsɛn bintuke ɛ́ je enu nɛn fɛmm,
ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum eyɛn no Nyo' boyse bonyii.”
No Jon fewci nonɛn, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le mum no too lɛ wvú elese bó ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ bo lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ ke yó le, ɛ̀ tefe yɛɛ ben lɛ ben elewtè shém Nyo' yì ffuuke yì wvú nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ sɛ no too nɛn?
Ben egeè mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ ben nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvunɛn. Fo ben emum ekɛw eduù kɛ lo ɛ̂ bikuu binɛn lɛ Abla'am nu icee wene kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ebaŋke ɛta ɛyan ɛ́ yó etu boom bo Abla'am e.
Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ɛ gɛɛ wase teme ɛ̂ binyi bi bite le. Kete kecii kè baa yumte mvuntam mvù jee, nu ɛ bó nu egbwo naa eley yî gɛŋ e, eton lo.”
Ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le biɛ yuw, bife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ, “Bese nu ege nɛɛ keseen?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee wvù kɛŋke bikum bifɛɛ enya kemew ɛ̂ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ, ɛ́ wvù kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien egaw bô wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to fii shile to fô wvú le lɛ wvú elese bó ɛ̂ joo, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese ege nɛɛ fisɛse?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efiì shile fesene no nci gomte kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le to fô wvú le bife lɛ, “Fisɛse nu ɛ bese nu ege nɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo ben ebɛmseè bonyii lole bigew noo keegowtè mwɛɛm yî bonyii le ɛcici kɛ. Ben eyuukè njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì bó laake ben dvú.”
No bonyii to nu kɛ wase cɛyte Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ bó mum no ghayte mwɛɛm mvu Jon e, bvuu no kpwaake lɛ sekemew ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Mboyse wvudvu.
Ɛ Jon mum kiɛɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nleese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ joo le maaŋ, geenɛn wee wvù kuuke fele me bɛɛ too ɛjim, ɛ me mbaa ncim ŋkpwɛntɛn keeŋgvuwcɛ nfay bolaba bew kɛ. Wvú nu ke elese fiew ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le noo ŋguy e.
Wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ fiew ɛbo fì wvú nu efɛɛtɛn ɛgiŋ dvú, eyɛse fò wvú fɛɛtene, ebaancɛ ɛgiŋ egɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwaw e, emum ekuu nyiim eton ɛ̂ ŋguy wvù fiee sɛ njimɛ le.”
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no Jon to fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii nɛn bvuu nyaa bó bô bontefe jé le nteen.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú no jemyi ɛkumɛ 'Ɛlod wvù wee sa' kaci lo, njefo 'Ɛlod to nu ɛ jo 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwɛɛ waa bwee kpwɛse le, bvuu no jemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe nteen mvù 'Ɛlod to buwyɛɛ.
Ɛ 'Ɛlod ke mum mɛse foose lo gee diew gay lɛ bó ekoo Jon efen yew ncaw e.
Seke Jon to bɛɛ leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, ke lese diuu dimew mɛse ɛ Jisos tɛn to ɛ wvú lese wvú ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ Jisos dioo bunlee, ɛ ɛbulɛ yene ye,
ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule shii to yî ye le fieesene ɛbembɛ. Ɛ diɛw jeme fowe lɛ, “Wo nu Waa wɛm, nu fitele fiem, ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wo baay.”
Jisos to nu diɛwɛ bilum mbaanshɛ le seke wvú to kɛwɛɛ lemme diew. Bonyii to kpwaake lɛ wvú nu waa Yosɛw wvù waa Ɛli.
Ɛli to nu waa Mata't, wvù waa Lɛwe, wvù to nu waa Nɛlki wvù waa Jannay, wvù to nu waa Yosɛw.
Yosɛw wvun to nu waa Matatia, wvù waa Amos, wvù to nu waa Na'um, wvù waa Ɛsli, wvù to nu waa Nagay.
Nagay to nu waa Maat wvù waa Matatia, wvù to nu waa Semein, wvù waa Yosek, wvù to nu waa Joda.
Joda to nu waa Joanan, wvù waa Lesa, wvù to nu waa Sɛlubabɛl, wvù waa Shiltia, wvù to nu waa Nɛli.
Nɛli to nu waa Nɛlki wvù waa Adi, wvù to nu waa Kosam, wvù waa Ɛlmadam, wvù to nu waa Ɛl.
Ɛl to nu waa Yoshua wvù waa Ɛliesa, wvù to nu waa Yolem wvù waa Mata't wvù to nu waa Lɛwe.
Lɛwe to nu waa Semeon wvù waa Juda, wvù to nu waa Yosɛw, wvù waa Yonam, wvù to nu waa Ɛliakim.
Ɛliakim to nu waa Mɛlia wvù waa Mena, wvù to nu waa Matata wvù waa Natan, wvù to nu waa Dawe.
Dawe to nu waa Jɛɛse, wvù waa Obɛd, wvù to nu waa Boas, wvù waa Sala wvù to nu waa Na'shon.
Na'shon to nu waa Aminada, wvù waa Admin, wvù to nu waa Alni, wvù waa Ɛslon, wvù to nu waa Bɛlɛs wvù waa Judas.
Juda to nu waa Yakow wvù waa Aysik, wvù to nu waa Abla'am, wvù waa Tɛla, wvù to nu waa Na'ol.
Na'ol to nu waa Sɛlug wvù waa Leu, wvù to nu waa Bɛlɛg wvù waa Ɛbɛ, wvù to nu waa Shɛla.
Shɛla to nu waa Kaynan wvù waa Alfasad, wvù to nu waa Shɛm wvù waa Noa', wvù to nu waa Lamek.
Lamek to nu waa Metusɛla wvù waa Ɛnok, wvù to nu waa Jalɛd wvù waa Ma'alalɛl, wvù to nu waa Kaynan.
Kaynan wvun to nu waa Ɛnosh wvù waa Sɛt wvù to nu waa Adam, ɛ Adam nu wvù Nyo' to bomɛɛ.
Jisos to nu ɛ nɛ fô Joo Joodan e, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule. Ɛ kí ge ɛ wvú nɛ gɛn no cee ŋkpwaante.
Ɛ wvú no nu jó yî ɛdiuw mbaanyɛ ɛ dɛwle momte wvú. Wvú to nu jó nonɛn yaa diekene kɛ. Ɛ ɛdiuw yodvu ke fey, ɛ jeŋ no yuu wvú.
Ɛ dɛwle mum to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo gay ɛ tɛ din tu bvulɛm.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Kɛ wee cee kɛ nje bvulɛm maaŋ kɛ.’”
Ɛ dɛwle jo wvú ben dvú bvudvuu bvumew e, duŋcɛ bitum bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le bicii ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ Jisos yɛn nɛn mwaŋŋ.
Ɛ dɛwle mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ nya wase ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kin ɛ̂ me kecii, ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me nya ɛ̂ naa yɛɛ wvù me ŋkooŋke. Me nu nya ɛ́ wo esaake, kɛŋke bvukukɛ bô mvuŋgay mvudvu mvunciim.
Fí nu kɛ lɛ wo egbwe ɛ̂ me ɛjise ewvum me, ɛ́ me emum enya fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ wo.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ wvumtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo, elemtè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le maaŋ.’”
Ɛ dɛwle mum jo wvú gɛn dvú ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm e, leke fô kegoy ke yew ncese le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo sele ɛkuse,
njefo fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke egay ɛ́ bonceendaa bew ecɛycɛy wo.’
Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke eka wo fo wo ekfun ɛkalɛ yî tɛ le.’”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte tɛn lɛ, ‘Fo wo emomtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo kɛ.’”
Seke dɛwle to mɛsɛɛ wase jé yicii yì wvú to nulo emom Jisos jó, mum nɛ gɛn no cɛyte diuu dimew.
Jisos to nu ɛ nɛ tu jim Galilee, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le. Ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ wvú saaŋkɛn gɛn biba bi woŋ e bì jó le bicii.
Wvú to nu ɛ no yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle le, ɛ bonyii bocii bɛnsee wvú.
Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ gɛn ntɛw wvù Nasalɛt e jò wvú to kuɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dibole di mbam e, ɛ wvú gɛn yew bunle le kɛ no wvú to ké no gɛne. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ leem we keetaŋ Ŋwa' Nyo'.
Ɛ bó nya ŋwa' wvù Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú fay taa bvudvuu bvumew bvù bó saŋɛɛ jó lɛ,
“Keyoy ke Tata Nyo' le nu yî yɛm e, njefo wvú nu ɛ yefe wase me lɛ me ento enfewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le. Wvú nu ɛ tum me lɛ me ento entefe ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu yî ncaw e lɛ bó nu ke ebvuse bó, embvuu entefe ɛ̂ binfefe lɛ bó nu ke eyene ɛjisɛ ɛbo. Wvú tum tɛn me lɛ me nto embvuse bonyii bò bó nyɛwle bô bó yî ncaw e,
embvuu enfewcɛ lɛ kelum kin, nu kè Tata Nyo' nu ke ebuw bonyii.”
No Jisos taŋ nɛn, kase kɛwe ŋwa' wvudvu nya ɛ̂ wee wvù to ké no gɛɛle mum shii fokuse. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew bunle yidvu le luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le.
Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no nyɛyte ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fin fì ben yuw ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le nu ɛ fí to wase ɛ kocɛn ɛbɛn.”
Ɛ bonyii yekɛ ɛ fí joŋ bó le baay, ɛ bó kɛŋke ŋghaw yî njeme wvù jee wvù buyte diuw we le. Geenɛn, kaa nɛ no ghayte, biite lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ waa Yosɛw nɛn e?”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kemaŋɛn lɛ ben nu ema ŋgan ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Wee wvù fɛle bonyii, fɛlɛ ɛkolɛ kuw.’ Ben nu egay lɛ me eŋge tɛn mwɛɛm fɛn mvù ben se yuuke lɛ me ŋgee Kafana'um.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ewvum wee ntum Nyo' woŋ we le kɛ.
Yî kecɛɛy e, ɛ́ me nsee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Ɛlayja le, jaŋ to nu ɛ mɛy we yî bilum e bitɛte bô kee soocaan, ɛ jeŋ koo woŋ tfuu. Bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le to nu woŋ wvù Islael e kefew kedvu le nteen.
Geenɛn, Nyo' to baa tum Ɛlayja fô mvu bó le kɛ, tum fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù to nu Salafat, woŋ wvù Sidon e.
Ben ekumyì tɛn lɛ, ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Ɛlisha le, ɛ bonyii nu Islael nteen kɛŋke ntun wvu baay, kɛ mvu bó le to nu ɛ bonɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ Naaman wvú ɛmbeŋ wvu woŋ wvù Silia le wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew bunle le yuw, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó.
Ɛ bó ja we, domtɛn wvú, buy dvú ɛlaante jodvu, ben buy yî diuw ŋkoŋ yì to nu yî kum ntɛw wvubole, njefo bó to gomte keedomse wvú ɛ́ wvú egbwe jó.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú fey ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ no gɛne fiew.
Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ bow Kafana'um, ntɛw mvu wvu Galilee jodvu le. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ wvú gɛn no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle le.
Ɛ bonyii bodvu bocii no yuuke kɛŋke lo ŋghaw yî n'yɛɛyi we le, njefo n'yɛɛyi we to kɛŋke mvuŋgay.
Wee mvu to nu yew bunle yidvu le, ɛ keyoy kè yiile nu yî ye le. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no wamte lɛ,
“Abaay Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, wo fii la ɛ̂ bese? Wo to keelɛse lo bese le? Me ŋkee naa wo. Ɛ̀ nu wo wvudvu wvù yuule wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
Ɛ Jisos wam keyoy kè yiile kedvu, gay lɛ, “Baŋ lo, ebuy yî wee wvun e.” Ɛ kí mum shiŋɛn, bense wee wvudvu tum fokuse ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, mum buy yî ye le, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa lɛmse wvú kɛ.
Ɛ bonyii taa, ɛ diuw yum bó. Ɛ bó no ghayte, biite lɛ, “Wvun njeme nu wvù nɛɛ wvù wee wvun kɛŋke? Wvú kɛŋke mvuŋgay kane biyoy bì yiile e ɛ bí buyte yî bonyii le.”
Ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos lɛn bontɛw bocii bo ɛ̂ keba ke jó le.
Ɛ Jisos buy yew bunle yidvu le, gɛn ley yew dvu Semon. Ɛ mwɛse Semon cɛmte bô ken'ya'. Ɛ bó lɛkɛ lɛ Jisos efi wvú.
Ɛ wvú gɛn fô wvú to jiime, leem ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ we, kan ken'ya' kedvu. Ɛ kí mum cinɛ wvú le ɛ wvú bonɛn. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum ja we taa fiɛɛ ɛ bó die.
Ɛ diuu ke dioo seeyi, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke bonyii bò cɛmkene bô bincɛm jɛɛy jɛɛy mum no joo too dvú fô Jisos e. Ɛ wvú mum no kumte bó le bocii, ɛ bó bonene.
Bonceendaa bo dɛwle le tɛn to buyte yî bonyii bomew e nteen wamte lɛ, “Wo nu Waa Nyo'.” Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos kan lɛ fo bó ejemyi kɛ, njefo bó to kee Jisos lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ Jisos buy gɛn bvudvuu bvumew e wvú ɛmbeŋ. Ɛ bonyii ke shɛɛ kɛw no gomte wvú. Ke dioo to yɛn wvú le, ɛ wvú gomte wase lɛ wen enɛ ntɛw wvudvu le. Ɛ bó mum no momte jé lɛ wvú emɛy bô bó.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú tun gay lɛ, “Me ŋkɛŋke keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bontɛw bomew e tɛn, njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' tum me lɛ me ento eŋge.”
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gɛn no ghane fewci saaka wvudvu yéw bunle le, woŋ wvudvu le tfuu.
Ɛ̀ to nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no leeme mbew Mamase yì Gɛnɛsalɛt e, ɛ bonyii ɛ gem wvú ɛ facɛ ɛ no yuuke diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ wvú nɛ yɛn bikoŋ e bifɛɛ ŋgem joo le, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke ɛ bucɛ wase jó ɛ no cuke binsaŋ bibole bi byé le.
Ɛ wvú gɛn ley ɛ̂ kemew e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke Semon e, gay lɛ wvú edomse ɛ́ kí eley egɛn ɛ̂ joo caan. Ɛ wvú domse, ɛ Jisos mum shii jó ɛ bonyii no nu ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante ɛ wvú yɛɛyi bó.
Ɛ wvú ke yɛɛyi mɛse, mum gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Keyɛ kekoŋ eley egɛn ɛ̂ joo fô shiiyine, ɛ́ ben etfume binsaŋ binɛn ekoo byé.”
Ɛ Semon tfuse lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese se ce lo we tfumyi binsaŋ bvú ɛ yuu, ɛ faŋɛ yaa koo lo fiɛɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, no ɛ̀ gay wo, me nu entfume kɛ lo.”
Ɛ bó gɛn tfume, koo byé jó nteen, dioo bvuuse, ɛ binsaŋ no gomte keesemkɛn.
Nonɛn, ɛ bó lawcɛ bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le ɛ̂ kekoŋ kemew e lɛ bó eto eficɛ bó. Ɛ bó to bvuse byé yidvu ɛ yí yiŋsɛn bikoŋ bibole, ɛ bí mum no gomte keeshiile ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ Semon Bita yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, mum gɛn tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise gay lɛ, “Kee wo Tata, nɛnɛ fiuw fɛn ecinɛ me le, me nu fiem wee wvù befe.”
Wvú to jeme nonɛn, njefo bô bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu ɛ yɛn byé yì bó to koolɛɛ, ɛ ye bɛm bó.
Ɛ yí bɛm tɛn Jɛm bô Jon boom bo Sɛbɛdee le bò to nu tɛn ŋgoo Semon e. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, wo nu ke ekoole wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii.”
No bó yuw nonɛn, mum bvuse bikoŋ bibole ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante, cinɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim e mum no bii Jisos e.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ Jisos nu ɛ̂ kelaante kemew e, ɛ wee mvu nu jó ɛ ntun wvu baay ɛ die wase lo wvú. Ɛ wee wvudvu yɛn Jisos e, to gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, lɛkɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Tata, wo nulo efɛ me ɛ́ me en'yuule, ɛ́ wo fɛn kooŋke lo.”
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛke kebo kum wvú le gay lɛ, “Me ŋkooŋke lo, bonɛn lɛ eyuule.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ ntun wvu baay wvudvu mum cinɛ wvú le.
Ɛ Jisos ciise lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè fo wo esee ɛ̂ wee. Geenɛn, gɛnɛ eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ cee ncese, emum enya nnya yì Muses to gayɛɛ lɛ wee kɛŋke keenya keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase yî ntun wvun e ɛ no yuule.”
No Jisos ciisɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos kaa bvuu saaŋkɛn fey lo, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no baanci too keeyuuke n'yɛɛyi we, bô lɛ wvú efɛlè bincɛm bibole.
Geenɛn, ɛ́ Jisos ké ja cinɛ bó le gɛn no bunlee ŋkpwaante.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ Jisos yɛɛyi bonyii, ɛ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le nu yî ye le, ɛ wvú fɛle bincɛm. Ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ɛ shii fó, ɛ bó to buy bontɛw bocii bo Galilee le noo biba bi Judea bô Jɛlusalɛm e.
Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bomew to nu ɛ nɛ no too ɛ bó ɛ shfumɛ wee ɛ̂ fikɛɛy e, ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase keba kemwaaŋ. Bó to too keeley dvú yew ejike fwe dvu Jisos.
Geenɛn, faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ je kɛ, njefo bonyii to faci baay. Ɛ bó mum ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ yew we, too keyɛy, shike wee wvudvu fwe dvu Jisos ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì wvú to jiime jó le.
No Jisos to yɛnɛɛ lɛ bonyii bodvu nu ɛ lese mvuntelem mvubole yî ye le, ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wɛ lɛ, “Nsaa yɛm, me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bô bo ŋgoo Bofalasii le ba, mum kɛw no wvukene gayte lɛ, “Wvun sɛ nu yɛɛ wvù joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le? Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nulo elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ ɛfey Nyo' maaŋ?”
Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó wvukene, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben sɛ kɛŋke kfuu ban boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e nɛn nje la?
Fi cekey nu fì la, keegay lɛ me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ bi wee wvun e, nuu lɛ wvú eja we elɛne lɛ?
Geenɛn, me nu enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke mvuŋgay fokuse fɛn keelɛɛshɛ bibefɛ.” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to kpweɛ wase keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ jemyi me ɛ̂ wo, ja we, ejo fikɛɛy fiuw egɛnè fô yew e.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ wvú mum ja we leem ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, mum jo fiɛɛ fì wvú to jiime yî dvú le no gɛne fô yew e fo wvú, tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
Ɛ bonyii yɛn nonɛn, ɛ dew yum bó ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw, no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛbɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buy fó no ghane. Ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, yɛn wee mvu wvù to fii shile le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Lɛwe, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fô bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
Ɛ Lɛwe nɛ we, cinɛ fiɛɛ ficii le mum no bii Jisos e.
Nonɛn, ɛ Lɛwe ke mum ge ŋkaw wvu baay yew dvu wvú keekieekiee Jisos. Ɛ bonyii bò to fii shile ŋɛyte lo fó noo bonyii bomew ɛ bô bó diekene.
Ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no wvukene, bife ɛ̂ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben diekene, wukene ben ɛ bonyii bò fii shile noo bò befe bomew.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò tɛmyi ké no gomte wee ɛfuwɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gomte bonyii bò cɛmkene.
Kɛ me nto keetee bonyii bò nu teytey kɛ. Me nto keentee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.”
Ɛ bó ke nɛ ghay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e ké jaa no bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bvuu bunlee ɛfonɛfon, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo Bofalasii le ké no gee, geenɛn ɛ buw nu kɛ fibole diekene lo wukene.”
Ɛ Jisos maw diɛw ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebe bonyii bô bvujen ɛ́ bó egɛn, ɛ́ wee ebvuu ege ɛ́ bó ebamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ cee bvujen nu bô bó?
Geenɛn, kefew nu ke eto kè bó nu ke eloo cee bvujen wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó emum ekɛw embamte mwɛɛm mvudien kefew kedvu le.”
Ɛ wvú bvuu ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo esaa ndvu yi fiɛ etumcɛ yi yvum dvú kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, tu wvú ɛ befe wase bô ndvu yi fiɛ yidvu. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ cim nulo ɛ́ fincake fi fifɛ fidvu egɛn lɛŋlɛŋ bô ndvu yi yvum yidvu kɛ.
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ejo mbvuum mo monfɛm, egɛɛ ɛ̂ gham mbvuum e, ɛ wvù ɛ yvumɛn wase kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ́ mbvuum mo monfɛm modvu ke ekoo, esawyɛ gham wvu yvum wvudvu, ɛ́ mbvuum bô gham ela ɛcici.
Fi lɛŋ nu lɛ, bó kɛŋke keegɛɛ mbvuum mo monfɛm kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ gham wvu fwɛ le.
Ben kee tɛn lɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ké no wuu mbvuum mò nu ɛ koo wase wvù nulo ebvuu ekooŋke mo monfɛm kɛ. Wvú ké no bɛnsee kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu mo koo wa ma.”
Ɛ̀ to nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le no lɛne fele wɛɛ ɛgiŋ wvumew e. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ kɛw no sumyi bicɛɛ diee.
Ɛ Bofalasii yɛn, bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben gee fiɛɛ fì nci baa bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e?”
Ɛ Jisos bife tɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ ben ke baa taŋ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le no jeŋ to yuu Nfon Dawe bô ŋgoo ye ɛ wvú ge?
Wvú to nu ɛ ley yew Nyo' le jo blɛɛd wvù bó to geɛ ncese dvú fô Nyo' le, die bvuu nya tɛn ŋgoo ye dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu nci fo wee edie blɛɛd wvudvu ɛfey bocee ncese.”
Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu Cee Ɛkolɛ wvu mbam.”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke bvuu no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos gɛn ley yew bunle mi le no yɛɛyi bonyii. Ɛ wee mvu nu dvú ɛ kebo kew ke ɛcɛɛy ɛ kpwe wase.
Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo Bofalasii mum no gomte fiɛɛ fì bó etey yî Jisos e. Ɛ bó mum bon ɛjisɛ yî ye le no taale laa wvú nu efɛ wee diuu di mbam e lɛ.
Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó fiɛwsene bô fí, gay ɛ̂ wee wvù kebo to nu ɛ kpwe wɛ lɛ, “Ja we, eto eleem fɛn.” Ɛ wvú mum ja we leem.
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me mbiite ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben, fiɛɛ fì nci nu ɛ bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e nu fì la? Keege fiɛɛ fì jee, nuu fì befe lɛ? Keeboyse wee, nuu keeyu lo lɛ?”
Ɛ wvú taa bó ɛjise ɛjise kɛnɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ wee wɛ lɛ “Nɛke kebo kuw.” Ɛ wvú nɛke, ɛ kí mum bonɛn.
Geenɛn, ɛ fí kaa loocɛ ton'yɛ lo bonyii ba, ɛ bó mum kɛw no joo nsey no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege bô Jisos.
Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ ɛdiuw yodvu le, ɛ Jisos nɛ ben yî kum e keegɛn bunle, ke ce bunlee Nyo' ɛntaŋ jocii.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú tee bonyii bò to bii wvú le, ɛ bó to. Ɛ wvú cawcɛ bomew yuufe ncow bofɛɛ tee bó lɛ boom bew bo ntum e.
Ɛdiee ɛ bonyii bodvu to nu: Semon, wvù wvú to nyaɛ diee diew dimew lɛ Bita, bô Andulu wvù waa bwee Semon wvudvu. Ɛ bomew nu Jɛm, Jon, Filew, Batolomu,
Matio, Toma noo Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Semon wvù to nu wee ŋgoo Bosɛlot,
Judas wvù waa Jɛm noo Judas Iskaliot wvù to ghanɛɛ gese Jisos.
No wvú cawɛɛ bó nonɛn, ɛ bô bó bocii mum nɛ no booke. Ke bow, ɛ wvú leem yî bale le, ɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu wase fó nteen noo kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ kí ta lo ye fó kè nɛn'yɛɛ Judea bô Jɛlusalɛm. Bomew bonyii to nɛn'yi mondvuum mo mbew joo yi baay e kɛ diewɛ Taya bô Sidon e.
Bó to to keeyuw n'yɛɛyi wvu Jisos, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu efɛ bincɛm bibole. Bonyii bò biyoy bì yiile to jewsee bó to too tɛn ɛ wvú bvuuse biyoy bidvu.
Ɛ bonyii bocii mum no momte keekum wvú le, njefo mvuŋgay mvù to buyte yî ye le to fɛle bonyii bocii bò to kumte wvú le.
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ taa bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le, gay lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò fuute, njefo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu fô ben e.
Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò beele jeŋ keseen, njefo Nyo' nu ke ege ɛ́ ben effuu. Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò beele keseen, njefo ben nu ke ekpwaake dikie.
Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, seke ben bii wee wvù diee nu Waawee le, ɛ bonyii bane ben, kuuŋke ben, nan'yi ben bvuu nyaa ben ɛdiee yò befe.
Fí ke dioo kooyi nonɛn, ɛ ben no laŋlaŋè, binè, yuukè njoŋ, njefo mmawcɛ wene wvù kuuke nu woŋ wvu we le. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo'icee cee bonyii boba to nyɛwle bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bo fwele.
Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bonyii bo bvukukɛ le, njefo kensamɛn kenɛn ka kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛn.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bò ɛtew nu ɛ yiŋsɛn keseen, njefo ben nu ke ebeele jeŋ. Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bò kieele keseen, njefo ben nu ke ebeele soo bikuu.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, seke bonyii bocii bɛnsee ben. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo'icee cee bonyii boba to bɛnsee bonyii bo mbiay e bò to mbiayte lɛ bó nu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben ban bò yuuke fiɛɛ fì me njemyi le, lɛ ben ekooŋkè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e, egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bò bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim e.
Ben elɛkè lɛ Nyo' elaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembonɛn yî bonyii bò bunlee lɛ lon eto fô ben e, ebvuu ebunleè fô bonyii bò nvuwse ben e.
Ɛ́ wee suŋ wo yî kediɛw e, ɛ́ wo baŋke kemew ɛ wvú mɛse suŋ. Wee ɛ́ baa kekum kuw ke ɛkfuŋ, ɛ́ wo cinɛ ɛ wvú jo ke ɛnte fó.
Ɛ́ wee lɛke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo nya. Wee ɛ́ cim ɛ jo lo mwɛɛm mvuw, fo wo ebvuu eshe ebiite kɛ.
Naa la fì ben shieele lɛ bonyii egeè fô ben e, enù fí fì ben egeè tɛn fô bó le.
Ɛ́ ben kooŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kooŋke ben, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe gee kɛ nonɛn e? Bó kooŋke kɛ tɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kooŋke bó.
Ɛ́ ben gee mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fô bonyii bò gee tɛn fô ben e, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe gee kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ e?
Ɛ́ ben foose bonyii bô mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ bò ben taale lɛ bó nulo ekase etfuse, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe ké no foose kɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ nsáa yibo njefo bó kee lɛ bó nu ke ekase etfuse fiɛɛ ficii le?
Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ ben ekooŋkè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e, egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bó le, efoosè bonyii bô mwɛɛm yaa taale lɛ bó ke ekase etfuse kɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ́ ben ke emum ekɛŋkɛ nlawma wvù kuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, ebvuu enu boom bew, njefo ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no Nyo' gee mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bocii bò yɛɛle ɛjisɛ noo bò mvuntelem yiile le.
Ben ecamtè shen fô bonyii le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Icee wene camte.
Fo ben elomtè gee di bonyii bomew e, nonɛn Nyo' saa ke elom tɛn dinɛn kɛ. Fo ben ebonè bikaa ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjim lɛ bó eley ŋgɛw e, nonɛn Nyo' saa ke ebon tɛn ɛ̂ ben ɛjim kɛ. Ben elɛɛshì bibefɛ bi bonyii bomew e, ɛ́ Nyo' ke elɛɛshɛ tɛn binɛn.
Ben enyaà nnya ɛ̂ bonyii ɛ́ Nyo' ke enya tɛn ɛ̂ ben. Wvú nu ke edioo enyaa eloocɛ efew ntay, eshiwsɛ, ecincɛ ɛ́ fí eyiŋsɛn efuci fokuse. Fiɛɛ fì wee feeke fiɛɛ jó sɛ nyaa ɛ̂ wee, ɛ̀ nu kɛ fí fì Nyo' nu ke efew jó sɛ nya ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ kenfefe nulo eduŋci je ɛ̂ kemew kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú mom lo, bó saa gbwekɛn ɛ̂ kentuke le bocii le?
Ben ekee lɛ kɛ waa ŋwa' ké no fele wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú kɛ, geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke wvú ɛ yɛɛyi wase ɛ mɛse, ɛ́ wvú ekee kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú le.
Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wo ké no taale ɛ ɛ̀ nu sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ waa bwoo jise, geenɛn yaa yɛne kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le kɛ?
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo eghan nɛɛ sɛ no gayte ɛ̂ waa bwoo lɛ, ‘Waa bwɛɛm, kɛ leem ɛ́ me embvuse sheshe ɛ̂ wo jise,’ geenɛn yaa yɛne kɛ kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le? Wo nu wee kenduŋcɛ ye! Yawɛ ebvuse kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le sɛ loocɛ eyɛn sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ jise di waa bwoo le, emum ebvuse.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ kete kè jee eyum mvuntam mvù befe kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ kete kè befe eyum mvuntam mvù jee kɛ.
Bó ké kiɛɛ kete ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuntam mvù yumte yî dvú le. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekoy fimbi yî bisafe le kɛ, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ekoy yoŋ yî ɛwantɛ le kɛ.
Wee dioo nu wee wvù kɛŋke ntfu mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ fitele fiew e, ɛ wvú mum no bvuuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee. Ɛ́ dioo nu wee wvù we ntfu nu mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛ̂ fitele fiew e, ɛ́ wvú no bvuuse kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù befe. Fí nu nonɛn njefo fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ yiŋsɛn fô fitele fi wee le nu kɛ fí fì ké no buyte diuw we le.”
Ɛ Jisos mum bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben teŋe me lɛ, ‘Tata, Tata’, yaa gee fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte kɛ?
Wee wvù too, eyuw n'yɛɛyi mum gɛn no gee no wvú gayte, nu ɛ me nu enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen no wvuwɛ wee nu.
Wvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù to nu keebom yew, yaw cim shii, gɛn kum kembaan e sɛ lese kenffuy, mum bom. Ɛ joo ke yiŋsɛn, buy to kfun yew yidvu, ɛ yí faŋɛ yaa shiw kɛ, njefo wvú to nu ɛ loocɛ bom ntay.
Geenɛn, wee wvù too, yuw n'yɛɛyi dioo gɛn faŋɛ yaa egee no wvú gayte, nu kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù to nu keebom yew, taashɛ lo bvudvuu mum bom sɛ kenffuy. Ɛ joo ke buy to kfun yew yidvu, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ yí shii nɛn wuuu, tawse lo.”
No Jisos to mɛsɛɛ wase yɛɛyi bonyii bô mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, mum nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um e.
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum nu jó kɛŋke nfwa we mvu, kooŋke wvú baay. Ɛ nfwa wvudvu cɛmte nu wase diuw kpwe le.
Ɛ ɛkolɛ kedvu dioo yuw ɛkumɛ Jisos, mum cooŋkɛn bonyii bò saake woŋ Bojuu tum lɛ bó egɛn elɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú eto efɛ nfwa wen.
Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Jisos e ku can ɛ̂ wvú gay lɛ, “Kee wo gɛnɛ kɛ efi wee wese wvun, ɛ̀ nu wee wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo efi wvú.
Wvú kooŋke woŋ wesebeene baay, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to bomɛɛ yew yese bunle.”
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ bó ke dioo feŋene wase yew cee ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le, ɛ wvú tum nsáa ye yimew lɛ yí egɛn eci Jisos. Ɛ yí gɛn, ɛ bô bó tasɛn, ɛ yí tefe ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le gayte lɛ fo wo eshe yɛnè ŋgɛw too kɛ. Lɛ wen baa kocɛn wee wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo eley ɛ̂ wvú yew e kɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì be ge tɛn lɛ fo wen eto bô bikaa biwene eyɛn wo le. Geenɛn, lɛ wo ebvuse kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw diuw wo le ɛ́ nfwa wen emum ebonɛn.
Lɛ wen tɛn nu wee ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu wee mvu le ɛkuse, ɛ bonyii bo nci le nu tɛn ɛ̂ wen ɛkuse. Ɛ́ wen ké egay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛnè,’ ɛ́ wvú no gɛne lo, ké egay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘To,’ ɛ́ wvú no too lo. Ɛ́ wen ké egay tɛn ɛ̂ nfwa wen lɛ, ‘Geɛ nɛn,’ ɛ́ wvú no gee lo.”
Ɛ Jisos yuw ntum wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum lo wvú, ɛ wvú baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to bii wvú le lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ me mbaa n'yɛn wase wee le kɛ naa Islael ɛ wvú ɛ lese kfuu fin fitele yî yɛm e nɛn kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii ba bò cee ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le to tumɛɛ dioo kase tu yew, yɛn ɛ nfwa wvudvu ɛ bonɛn wase.
Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ no gɛne ntɛw mvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Nayin, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le shfumte ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
No bó to gɛne, dioo buy diuw ketaaŋ wvù to leyte ntɛw wvudvu le, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ tuu gvune di wee le ɛ no buyte dvú. Wee wvudvu to ka kɛ wvú can bwee le. Ɛ bwee to nu kpwɛɛ ŋkfu. Ɛ bó to buyte dvú nonɛn, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii bo ntɛw wvudvu le shfumte bii bwee wan e.
Ɛ Tata dioo yɛn kpwoon wvudvu le, ɛ shen koo wvú, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo ebvuu bee kɛ.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum fey gɛn kum fikɛɛy fì bó to tulɛɛ gvune didvu jó. Ɛ bonyii bò to tulɛɛ mum leem. Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Cuwee, me njemyi ɛ̂ wo, nɛnɛ we!”
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ we shii, kɛw no jemyi. Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wvú le mum nya ɛ̂ bwee.
Ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó. Ɛ bó no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Wee ntum Nyo' wvu baay nu ɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ beene ɛntelɛŋ. Nyo' nu ɛ to wase keefi bonyii bew.”
Ɛ saaka wvun wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos saaŋkɛn gɛn woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu noo bitum bi mbew jó le.
Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e yuw tɛn mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, gɛn see ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú tee bomew bofɛɛ,
tum fô Jisos e lɛ bó egɛn ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to nu keeke eto, nuu bó ecɛytè wee mvu lɛ.
Ɛ bó gɛn yɛn Jisos e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Jon Nleseɛjoo nu ɛ tum bese keebife ɛ̂ wo lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wo wvù to nu keeke eto, nuu bó ecɛytè wee mvu lɛ?”
Bó to biite nonɛn, ɛ Jisos nu sekedvu fɛle bincɛm bô bontun, bvuu bvuuse biyoy bì befe yî bonyii le, yen'yi ɛjisɛ ɛ binfefe nteen.
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ekase egɛn esee ɛ̂ Jon mwɛɛm mvù ben yɛn noo mvù ben yuw e. Binfefe yɛne wase mwɛɛm e, ɛ bontɛŋɛ lɛne teytey, ɛ bonyii bò cɛmkene bô ntun wvu baay bonene. Bincife yuuke wase mwɛɛm, ɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn kaase tuu dvú, ɛ bó bvuu fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le.
Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù baa maŋene me kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bò Jon to tumɛɛ ba ke nɛ, ɛ Jisos mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛkumɛ Jon biite lɛ, “Ben se shee buyte gɛne ŋkpwaante keegɛn eyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Gayi dì fwefwe fele shiike?
No ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, tu ben se buyte gɛne yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Wee ɛ wvú ɛ sufe ye bô ndvú yì bonene? Ben eyekɛ eyuw, bonyii bò suute ye bô ndvú yì lumte bvuu diee bikuu bibole ké no nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bontow e.
Ben ɛ se ɛ no gɛne nonɛn keeyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Wee ntum Nyo' nuu? 'Ɛɛ, tu ben se nu ɛ yɛn. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, wvú fele wee ntum Nyo'.
Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse wee wɛm ntum ɛ́ wvú esa fwe dvu wo, wvù nu egɛn eseyse je yo ɛ́ wo sɛ no too.’
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛnte jo bonyii bò nu ɛ no nu wase yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kuuke fele Jon kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù nu naa wee wvu caan ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ wvú kuuke fele wvú.”
Ɛ bonyii bocii naa noo bonyii bò to fii shile yuw no Jisos jemyi lɛ Jon to nu wee ntum Nyo' bɛnse lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu bvu teytey, njefo bó tɛn to nu ɛ bee ɛ Jon lese bó ɛ̂ joo.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le tun fibole ntaŋ wvù Nyo' to too dvú njefo bó to nu ɛ faŋ fo Jon lese bó tɛn ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ Jisos nɛ ghay lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me nfewsɛn ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii bo keseen e dvú nu la? Bó nu kɛ diɛwɛ la?
Me nu nsee ɛ̂ ben fiɛɛ fì bó nu diɛwɛ fí. Bó nu kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo caan caan bò nu ɛ shiiyɛn mondvuum mo way e, ɛ bomew teŋe bomew biite lɛ, ‘Bese tooŋke ndoŋ sɛ ben bine lo le? Nyaa ŋkiee kpwe sɛ ben beŋe lo le?’
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no Jon Nleseɛjoo se toɛ, shee jeŋ yaa wuu kɛ tɛn mbvuum, ben lɛ wvú kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle yî ye le.
Wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ dioo to, diekene bvuu wukene, ben lɛ bó etaa eyɛn, wvú ghane wuwte mwɛɛm mvudien wuwte mbvuum, bvuu nu nsaa bonyii bò fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew.
Geenɛn, bonyii bocii bò bɛnse bvufee bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le duŋci lɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu lɛŋ.”
Ɛ wee Falasii mvu ke nɛ tee Jisos lɛ wvú eto ediekɛn ɛ̂ wen yew. Ɛ Jisos bee gɛn ɛ bó no diekene.
Ɛ kpwoon nsake mvu to nu ntɛw wvudvu le. Ɛ wvú yuw lɛ Jisos diekene ɛ̂ wee Falasii wvudvu yew, mum jo fikaa fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le, gɛn dvú fó.
Ɛ wvú gɛn ley leem mbew Jisos e, nɛ kɛw no beele, ɛ misɛm cemceme yî bikaa bi Jisos e. Ɛ wvú mum ŋgvuwcɛ, ŋgvuse ɛkolɛ kew no shole bikaa bi Jisos e bô yvuw ɛkolɛ, ŋoci mum yeefe bô nfiey wɛ.
Ɛ wee Falasii wɛ wvù to teŋɛɛ Jisos lɛ wvú eto ediekɛn yɛn nonɛn, kpwawcɛ fô fitele fiew e lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvun fɛn be nu wee ntum Nyo', tu wvú be ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu kpwoon wvun wvù kumte wvú le, lɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwoon nsake.”
Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay ɛ̂ wee Falasii wvudvu lɛ, “Semon, me ŋkɛŋke fiɛɛ keenjeme ɛ̂ wo.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, jeme.”
Ɛ Jisos mum kɛw lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ foose bonyii bofɛɛ bô bigew, foose wee mvu bô bodanali gee tin, foose mvu bodanali mbaanshen.
Ɛ fí ke ghaw bó bocii keekase elaw, ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bigew bidvu le ɛ̂ bó. Keseen, wo yɛne lɛ ɛnte jo bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban, wee wvù nulo ekooŋke wvú baay nu wvù la?”
Ɛ Semon tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo enu wee wvù bó to cin'yɛɛ fioo ye le ɛ yí duule.” Ɛ Jisos bee lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ jeme lɛŋ.”
No wvú beŋe nonɛn, baŋke ye taa kpwoon wɛ, mum gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ yɛn kpwoon wvun e? No me mbe nto ɛ̂ wo yew, wo be baa cim nya me joo ncukɛ bikaa kɛ. Geenɛn, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ cukɛ wase bikaa biem ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô misɛm, ɛ sho bô yvuw ye ɛkolɛ.
Wo be baa gay me le ŋocɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw no me mbe nto fɛn, nu kɛ no kpwoon wvun ŋoci bikaa biem.
Ɛ wo be baa cim yefe ɛkolɛ kem kɛ naa bô mɛɛm kɛ. Geenɛn, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ yefe wase bikaa biem ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nfiey wvù shfuuŋkene.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo lɛ, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn ke baay njefo bó nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biew bì duule baay. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù bó lɛɛshi bibefɛ biew ɛ bí nu caan duŋci keŋkoŋɛn ke caan.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ kpwoon wɛ lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
Ɛ bonyii bò bô bó to diekene mum kɛw no diomene gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu yɛɛ wvun wvù mum lɛɛshi lo bibefɛ bi bonyii le?”
Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse gay ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè fiuw ntay, fitele fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ boy.”
Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos nɛ no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw e fewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ to bii wvú le,
noo bokɛnɛ bomew bò wvú to fɛlɛɛ bontun bobole bô bomew bò wvú to bvusɛɛ biyoy bì befe yî bó le. Bokɛnɛ ban to nu Maalia wvù bó to teŋe tɛn lɛ Magdalen, wvù wvú to bvusɛɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî ye le bosooshwiy.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Joana wvù dweese to nu Cusa lemte 'Ɛlod e, noo Susana bô bokɛnɛ bomew nteen. Bó to ghane nonɛn, bvuuse mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bikele bibole, fici Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le dvú.
Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ bontɛw e bontɛw e no too fô Jisos e. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke yiŋsɛn fó, ɛ wvú ma ŋgan ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Wee to nu ɛ laa keegɛn etfume ŋgow. Ɛ wvú ke dioo etfumyi, ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ̂ je, ɛ bonyii lɛɛncɛ bô bikaa, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we to tacɛ die.
Ɛ yimi gbwe fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le, ke buy mum yowlɛn njefo bvudvuu bvudvu to nu bvuyeem.
Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ̂ bisafe le, ke buy dioo kuu bô bisafe bidvu, ɛ bí mum baŋ ŋgow yidvu fo yí eku.
Ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshɛ yì jee le, ke buy, ku, ɛ bó ke gbwele ɛ yí buy bokaŋ gbwee fey no bó to tfumyɛɛ.” No Jisos ma nɛn, mum fuŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem, ɛ wvú yuw.”
Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ŋgan wvudvu duŋci lɛ la lɛ?
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ben ban bò Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvu bvunfon bwew e mvù nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le. Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew yuuke fibole kɛ lɛ me maa ɛ ɛ̀ nu boŋgan, wvu lɛ fí enù no fí to nu wase lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke etaale kɛ lo mwɛɛm yaa yɛne kɛ, ke eyeke kɛ lo yaa yuuke fiɛɛ kɛ.’
Ben eyuw lɛ fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wvudvu duŋci. Ŋgow yidvu nu diɛw Nyo'.
Ŋgow yì gbweɛ ɛ̂ je, nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' ɛ dɛwle mum to bvuse saaka wvudvu fô mvuntelem mvubole, wvu lɛ fo bó ebee ke eboy.
Ɛ ŋgow yì gbweɛ fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', mum fiisɛn bô njoŋ, geenɛn ɛ yí baa cime gɛŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ, ɛ bó beŋe kɛ fomvu fomvu. Ɛ́ mmom ke dioo ɛ to, ɛ bó mum tfuw bikaa.
Ŋgow yì gbweɛ ɛ̂ bisafe le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', dioo gɛne, ɛ ken'yaŋyaŋ bô bvukukɛ noo njoŋ mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le to yikɛ diɛw yidvu ɛ yí laayɛ lo saa ku kɛ.
Ŋgow yì gbweɛ yî nshɛ yì jee le, ɛ mum ɛ no nu bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù jee, bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', loocɛ lese mvuntelem yî dvú le, mum kuu shém, no gee no yí gomte gɛne lo fwe fwe.
Kɛ wee ké tfuuke ken'yeese bvuu jo ŋkaa kfukɛ dvú kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú elese tɛn ɛgaaku kɛ. Wvú ké tfuuke, tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le, lɛ bonyii dioo leyte yew eyɛne n'yuu le.
Fiɛɛ ficii fì nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le nu ke eyenɛ, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvu ɛjim ɛjim ebuy ɛmwa.
Nonɛn, ben dioo yeke diɛw Nyo' no yeke ntay, ekeè lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise. Ɛ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kpwaake lɛ wen kɛŋke lo nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.”
No Jisos to yɛɛyi bonyii nonɛn, ɛ bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e nɛ to lɛ bó eyɛn wvú le. Ɛ fí ghaw keeley njefo bonyii to duule dvú baay.
Ɛ wee gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ “Bwoo bô boom bo bwoo le leeme ɛkfuŋ gomte keeyɛn wo le.”
Ɛ wvú tfuse fiew lɛ, “Bwɛɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' gee no yí gomte.”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene elente mamase egɛn kewvu keki.” Ɛ bó mum ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e no leenci.
No bó to leenci, ɛ Jisos nɛ no leete. Ɛ nffum nɛ sɛsɛ, shii no bvuyte joo bô mvuŋgay ɛ yí leyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gomte keeyiŋsɛn, ɛ bó nu wa lo diuw kpwe le.
Ɛ bó gɛn no kamsee Jisos gayte lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, Cee ɛkolɛ, beene nu ekpwekɛn.” Ɛ Jisos kamse wam nffum bô joo yì to bvuyte yidvu. Ɛ nffum wvudvu lu, ɛ joo mum cife nɛn ndvumm.
Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben sɛ lese fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî yɛɛ le?” Ɛ ye bɛm bó, ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ nfan no ghayte lɛ, “Wvun wee sɛ nu wee wvù nɛɛ wvù wamte naa nffum bô joo ɛ mvú yuuke wvú le?”
Ɛ bó lente mamase yidvu buy wvuke ɛ̂ keba ke Gɛlasen e, ɛ bó ɛ cinɛ wase keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le.
Ɛ Jisos dioo buyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, kɛ lɛ wen efɛɛse ɛŋkpwaante, ɛ bô wee mvu wvu ɛ̂ kelaante ke jó le tasɛn ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le njiŋsene bô wvú. Ɛ bó ɛ ce wase yî ye le baay ɛ wvú ghane kenyi kencimte, cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ditfum e jò bó to dweyte bonyii. Kɛ wvú to bvuu cee fô yew e kɛ.
No wvú yɛnɛɛ Jisos e, mum san ɛtalɛ, gɛn gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, wam bô mvuŋgay lɛ, “Jisos, Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, wo fii la ɛ̂ me? Kee wo fo wo enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ me kɛ.”
Wvú to jemyi nonɛn njefo Jisos to nu ɛ wam wase keyoy kè yiile kedvu lɛ kí ebuy yî wee wvudvu le. Kí to ké no cuute wvú bokaŋ e bokaŋ e ɛ bó koole lo, ké koo kay can noo bikaa bô ncaw sɛ no cɛyte. Ɛ́ bó ké ekay nonɛn, ɛ wvú sumyɛ kɛ lo, ɛ keyoy kedvu mum cufe wvú ɛ wvú no lewte gɛne ŋkpwaante.
Ɛ Jisos mum bife ɛ̂ wee wvudvu lɛ, “Diee diuw nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Diee diem nu kebombom.” Wvú to tfuse nonɛn njefo bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to nu ɛ cin lo yî ye le.
Ɛ bonceendaa bodvu lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ fo wvú eciinse bowen ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kentuke kè shiile nɛn ŋooŋŋ e kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ŋgoo boŋkunyam diekene yî mbɛke le fó, ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le bodvu mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ bowen egɛn eley ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî boŋkunyam bodvu le. Ɛ wvú bee.
Ɛ bó mum buy yî wee wvudvu le, daŋsɛn gɛn ley yî boŋkunyam bodvu le. Ɛ bó sɛn, bow ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ e, shii ɛ̂ mamase yidvu le, lɛ jó.
Ɛ bonyii bò to cɛyte boŋkunyam bodvu yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, ja fó, fɛɛ lo, gɛn see saaka wvudvu ɛlaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw bo jó le.
Ɛ bonyii no yuuke, buci gɛne keeyɛn tɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le. Ɛ bó to fô Jisos to nu, yɛn wee wɛ le, ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ba ɛ cinɛ wase wvú le, ɛ wvú ɛ shii mbew Jisos e, ɛ jise ndvú, ɛ bvufee bwew ɛ kase wase ɛ tu fó. Ɛ bó fan baay.
Ɛ bonyii bò to yɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le no seŋe ɛ̂ bó no fí to ghanɛɛ ɛ́ wee wɛ wvù to kɛŋke bonceendaa bo dɛwle le sɛ bonɛn.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ biba bì Gɛlasen e kɛŋkɛ nfan, mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú enɛ egɛne. Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ fiew, ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e lɛ wen egɛne,
ɛ wee wɛ wvù bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to buyɛɛ yî ye le mum no lɛke Jisos lɛ bô wvú egɛne. Ɛ Jisos tun, tfuse wvú jim gay lɛ,
“Ɛ̀ gɛnè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô yew e, egɛn esee keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè Nyo' nu ɛ ge fô wo le.” Nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu mum tu jim gɛn no ghane ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le kecii, seŋe keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè Jisos ge fô wvú le.
Ɛ Jisos lente mamase kase tu jim keba keki. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè be she cɛyte wase wvú fó fiisɛn wvú.
Ɛ cee la mvu to fó ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Jaylus, ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yi jó. No wvú to, fey gɛn tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise, kuu can lɛ wvú eto kɛ lɛ ɛ̂ wen yew,
lɛ waa wen kpwee lo. Wvú to kɛŋke wan ɛ ɛ̀ ka kɛ wvú, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan kpwoon ɛ wvú nu bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ. Ɛ bô Jisos nɛ no gɛne ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le faci Jisos.
Ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛnte jodvu ɛ wvú ɛ cɛm wase bô kencɛm ke bokɛnɛ le bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ. Ɛ wvú ɛ jewse wase fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú to kɛŋke can bonyii bo bifuu le, kí ɛ ghaw bó keefɛ.
Ɛ wvú bencɛ to ɛjim jo Jisos, kum ŋgem ndvu Jisos e. Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ kencɛm kew mum semɛ.
Ɛ Jisos bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kum yɛɛ me le?” Ɛ bonyii bocii maŋɛn lo. Ɛ Bita nɛ bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, kɛ wo yɛne lɛ kebombom ke bonyii le faci wo le?”
Ɛ Jisos no duu kɛ lɛ, “Wee nu ɛ kum me le. Me nu ɛ n'yuw no mvuŋgay nu ɛ buy yî yɛm e.”
Ɛ kpwoon wɛ yɛn lɛ kɛ je nu dvú yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen enyiim kɛ, mum ciŋciŋ gɛn gbwe ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise mum see ɛ̂ bonyii bocii yuw fiɛɛ fì be ge wvú ɛ sɛ kum Jisos e, bvuu see no wvú be kum nonɛn kencɛm kew ɛ semɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ.
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wɛm, fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn. Ɛ̀ gɛnè ntay.”
Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu fɛse fó nɛn'yi fô yew e fo Jaylus wvù cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle wɛ, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wo nu ɛ mɛse wase. Fo wo ebvuu eshe enyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wee n'yɛɛyi kɛ.”
Ɛ wvú dioo jeme nonɛn, ɛ Jisos yuw, gay ɛ̂ Jaylus lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ, lese kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî yɛm e maaŋ, ɛ́ waa wo eluŋ.”
Ɛ bó mum nɛ no gɛne fô yew e fo Jaylus, ke gɛn fɛse fó, ɛ Jisos tun fo wee eley yew. Ɛ wvú jo kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon noo cee wan bô bwee wan ɛ bô bó ley.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bonyii toŋene, ɛ kpwe ghamte lo fó. Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Ben elu bô kpwe, wan baa kpwe kɛ, wvú leete lo.”
Ɛ bonyii nɛ no kieele lo wvú fó, njefo bó to kee ntay lɛ wan wvudvu nu ɛ kpwe wase.
Ɛ wvú gɛn fô wan wvudvu to jiime, jicɛ yî kebo le tee lɛ, “Wan kpwoon, ja we!”
Ɛ wvú mum kase tu dvú, ja we kaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ bó etaa fiɛɛ ɛ́ wvú edie.
Ɛ bwee bô ice yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, ɛ dew yum bó. Ɛ Jisos lew lo lɛ fo bó esee ɛ̂ wee fiɛɛ fì kooy kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, ɛ bó baancɛ to. Ɛ wvú nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó mvù bó ebvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le bvuu fɛle bincɛm dvú,
mum tum bó lɛ bó egɛn efewcì ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e.
Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben dioo gɛne, fo wee ejo fiɛɛ kɛ. Fo wee ejo kembaŋ, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fidien, kɛnɛɛ bigew kɛ. Fo wee ejo bikum bifɛɛ kɛ.
Ben dioo gɛn ɛ ley ntɛw e, yew yì bó ɛ gɛɛ ben dvú, ɛ ben no ceè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú gɛn buy seke ben ke nɛnɛ ntɛw wvudvu le.
Ɛ́ ntɛw mvu tun keefiisɛn ben, ɛ́ ben nɛnɛ jó, dioo nɛn'yi kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa binɛn e, ɛ́ ke enu nciise fiɛɛ fì bó mom e.”
Ɛ bó mum nɛ no gɛne, gɛn no ghane bontɛw e bontɛw e, fewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e bocii.
Ɛ 'Ɛlod wvù to saake keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee yuw mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù to kooyi, ɛ mvú ffumse wvú njefo bonyii bomew to nɛn'yi duu lɛ Jisos wvun nu Jon Nleseɛjoo ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy.
Ɛ bomew duu lɛ ɛ̀ nu Ɛlayja ɛ wvú kase ɛ to. Ɛ bomew duu fibole lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo' wvu fwele mvu ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.
Ɛ 'Ɛlod mum ghay lɛ, “Jon nu ɛ me se nu ɛ mbvuse wase ɛkolɛ kew. Wvun wee ɛ bvuu ɛ no nu yɛɛ keseen wvù me n'yuuke kfuu mvun mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ wvú?” Ɛ wvú mum no gomte lɛ wen bee keeyɛn Jisos wvudvu le.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ke ghan kase tu jim, see mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó geɛ ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ jo bó ɛ bô bó lɛwse ye, buy gɛn je ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛsayda le.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii kiɛɛ kɛ lo kuŋɛn bi wvú le, ɛ wvú fiisɛn bó mum kɛw no fewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e.
Ɛ diuu ke dioo gɛn lɛ dí eseeyi, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ bencɛ to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gayɛ ɛ̂ bonyii ban lɛ bó egɛn bontɛw bô ɛla yo nceencee le, egom mwɛɛm mvubole mvudien bô fò bó nu ece, njefo fɛn nu ŋkpwaante.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu enya ben fiɛɛ ɛ́ bó edie.” Ɛ bó gay lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì bese kɛŋke mɛy kɛ bontuw bo blɛɛd e botin bô byé yifiɛɛ. Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eguy mwɛɛm mvudien to enya ɛ̂ bonyii ban bocii le?”
Bó to gayte nonɛn njefo bonyii to nu fó nteen, ɛ bolemsɛ maaŋ nu bontfuke botin. Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben egay ɛ́ bonyii eshiiyɛn fokuse mondvuum e mondvuum e, mbaanshen mbaanshen.”
Ɛ bó gay, ɛ bó shiiyɛn.
Ɛ Jisos jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin ba bô byé yi yifiɛɛ yɛ, taa we, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó egawcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
Ɛ bó gawcɛ, ɛ bonyii bocii die ffuu, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le baancɛ bimbɛke bi shɛɛtɛɛ, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no bunlee wvú ɛmbeŋ, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nu mbew ye le. Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii duu lɛ me nu yɛɛ?”
Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bonyii bomew duu lɛ wo nu Jon Nleseɛjoo, bomew lɛ Ɛlayja, ɛ bomew duu lɛ wo nu wee ntum Nyo' wvu fwele mvu ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.”
Ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben duu finɛn lɛ me nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos mum loocɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke emom lo esee fifin ɛ̂ wee kɛ.
Ɛ wvú mum no jemyi ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen, ɛ́ bonyii bò saake woŋ bô bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ema lo wvú. Bó nu ke emum eyu wvú, ɛ́ ɛdiuw ke ebuy ɛta, ɛ́ Nyo' ekase ebvuse wvú yî kpwe le.”
Ɛ Jisos mum no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee gomte keenu wee wɛm, tu wvú kɛŋke keetun ɛkolɛ kew, etuulè kentam kew ɛdiuw ɛcii bii me le.
Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù bawci nshii we fo wvú elase, nu ke elase kɛ lo. Geenɛn, wee wvù lase nshii we nje me, nu ɛ wvú ɛ bawcɛ lo nshii wvudvu.
Ɛ́ bó baanci naa woŋ wvun tfuu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee, wvú ɛ die, ɛ ke ɛ lase kɛnɛɛ ɛ jim nshii we, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la?
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee wuumene keebii me le noo diɛw yɛm e, ɛ́ wvú no kee lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ewuumɛn tɛn mwɛtɛn seke wvú ɛ kase ɛ to ɛnte jo bvukukɛ bwew bvuu nu tɛn bvu Nyo' Ice bô bonceendaa bew bò yuule le.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, bonyii bomew leeme fɛn ɛ bó yaa nu ke eyuw wvuŋ kpwe sɛ bó ɛ yɛn no Nyo' saake bvunfon bwew kɛ.”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛdiuw nyaŋ e, no Jisos jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ wvú jo Bita bô Jon noo Jɛm ɛ bô bó ben yî kum wvumew e lɛ wen egɛn ebunle.
Ɛ wvú gɛn dioo bunlee, ɛ nfieesɛn ye nɛ kumɛn, ɛ ndvú ye tɛn kumɛn no baa lawkene nɛn mwawmwawmwaw.
Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bofɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Muses bô Ɛlayja to nu ɛ nɛ buynɛn fó no jemyi bô bo Jisos.
Ɛ n'yuu Nyo' baa yî bó le. Ɛ bô bó jemyi ɛkumɛ kpwe yì Jisos to kɛŋke keegɛn ekpwe Jɛlusalɛm keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Nyo' gɛkɛɛ.
Bó to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Bita bô Jon noo Jɛm nu ɛ nyii gooke lo bó. Ɛ bó dioo kamse, yɛn no n'yuu Nyo' baa yî Jisos e, bvuu yɛn bonyii bo bofɛɛ ba le ɛ bó leeme bô wvú.
Ɛ bonyii bo bofɛɛ bodvu dioo baase ɛkalɛ, ɛ Bita nɛ bvumtɛn gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Cee Ɛkolɛ, fí jee no beene nu fɛn. Cinɛ ɛ́ bese eyoo cún shɛ, ɛ́ yimi enu yo, yimi yi Muses, ɛ yimi nu yi Ɛlayja.” Wvú to jemyi nonɛn, yaa cim kee fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi kɛ.
Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, ɛ kembɛw nɛ to ɛ̂ bó we baŋyɛ bó. Ɛ bó no kɛŋke nfan no bó nu ɛ̂ kembɛw e.
Ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ kembɛw kedvu le lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm wvù me nu ɛ ncaw. Ben eyuukè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le.”
No diɛw yidvu jeme nonɛn ɛ mɛse, ɛ bó nɛ yɛn ɛ Jisos leeme fó wvú ɛmbeŋ. Ɛ bó ke faŋɛ yaa see lo ɛ̂ wee kefew kedvu le fiɛɛ fì bó yɛnɛɛ yî kum wvudvu le kɛ.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bô bo Jisos nɛ yî kum e no booke. Ɛ bó dioo bow, tasɛn bô kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay.
Ɛ wee mvu mum nɛ no wamte ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, kee wo taa kɛ fô waa wɛm e. Ɛ ka kɛ waa wɛm nonɛn.
Keyoy kemew jaa cufe wvú tufe, ɛ wvú nu taake, dvûmte, ɛ diffuw buyte ɛmvu. Kí gɛne lo bô wvú, yaa beŋe lo lɛ wvú eyoy kɛ.
Me mbe ɛ nlɛkɛ wase lɛ boom buw bo ŋgoo le ebvuse keyoy kedvu bó ɛ mom ŋkuuŋ.”
Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay lɛ, “O oo! Ɛŋgokɛ ke ɛcici kè baa lese fitele yî Nyo' le kin. Me nu ŋke enu beene eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ, eŋkuu shém bô ben eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ cee wan wvudvu lɛ, “To bô waa wo fɛn.”
Ɛ wvú jo dioo too dvú, ɛ nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu bvuu cufe wan wvudvu tufe fokuse, ɛ wvú no taake. Ɛ Jisos kan keyoy kè yiile kedvu ɛ kí buy yî wan wvudvu le, ɛ wvú mum bonɛn. Ɛ Jisos mum nya wvú ɛ̂ ice.
Ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn mvuŋgay mvu ɛ̀ nu mvu Nyo' le, ɛ diuw yum bó. No bó to bɛɛ kɛŋke ŋghaw yî mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Jisos to gee le, ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ,
“Ben eloocɛ enya bitem binɛn yî fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme ɛ̂ ben e. Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ɛ bó nu ke elese wvú can bonyii le.”
Ɛ wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fimew to nu ɛ baŋyɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ, geenɛn ɛ bó no fane keebife ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ njeme wvudvu.
Ɛ bó ke nɛ kɛw mbew ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa bó sɛ nu nɛn ɛ wee wvu baay ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó kpwawci fô mvuntelem mvubole, mum jo wan wvu caan leke mbew ye le,
gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee fiisene wan diɛwɛ wvun e ɛ̂ diee diem e, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ fiisɛn me, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me. Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee wvù joo ɛkolɛ kew caan ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu wvú wvù nu wee wvu baay.”
Ɛ Jon mum nɛ tee Jisos, be wvú lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese be ɛ yɛn wee mvu le ɛ wvú teŋe diee diuw sɛ bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le, bese ɛ kan, njefo kɛ wvú yaa nu mvu ŋgoo yesebeene le kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fo ben ecilè kfuu wvuwɛ wee kɛ, njefo ɛ́ wee baa ekicine ben, tu wvú tomte ben.”
Ɛ kefew kè Nyo' to nu ke ejo Jisos ɛ́ wvú eben we ke no too wase keekocɛn, ɛ Jisos lese lo keegɛn Jɛlusalɛm, mum nɛ no gɛne.
Ɛ wvú dioo nɛ, tum bonyii bomew fwe. Ɛ bó gɛn ley ntɛw mvu wvu Samalia le lɛ bó eseyse bvudvuu jó ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ bonyii bo jó ku wvú bô bvudvuu faŋɛ yaa fiisɛn wvú kɛ, njefo bó to kee lo lɛ wvú fele gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ Jɛm bô Jon bò nu boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ke yuw fiɛɛ fidvu, bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Bese etee ŋguy we ɛ́ wvú eshii elɛse bonyii bodvu?”
Ɛ Jisos kaa baŋke ye wam lo bó,
mum nɛ ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum no gɛne wase je ntɛw mvu le jɛɛy.
Ɛ bô bó dioo gɛne, ɛ wee mvu to gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Me nu embii wo le naa fɛɛ fô wo gɛne.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyám yi ŋkpwaante kɛŋke bibuw bibole, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we kɛŋke yéw yibo, geenɛn kɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke naa lo fô wvú ejike ɛkolɛ kew kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay ɛ̂ wee mvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.” Ɛ wee wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Tata, yawɛ ecinɛ ɛ́ me eŋgɛn endwey icɛm nsɛ no mbii.”
Geenɛn ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Cinɛ ɛ́ bonyii bò nu lɛ bó nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase edweyte bonyii bò kpwekene, ɛ́ wo egɛn fiuw efewcì ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
Ɛ wee mvu bvuu gay lɛ, “Tata, me nu mbii wo le, geenɛn yawɛ ecinɛ ɛ́ me eŋgɛn eŋgay kfuu diem e nsɛ no mbii.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvuwɛ wee lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee ŋgvuume bô jiw keelem lemme, ɛ bvuu ɛ no lemte taale ɛjim, tu mwɛtɛn baa kpwɛntɛn keenu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.”
Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Tata baayɛ bonyii bomew mbaŋsooshwiy ncow bofɛɛ tum fwe, bofɛɛ bofɛɛ lɛ bó egɛn bontɛw e, egɛn eghan mondvuum mò wen nu ke efey mó le monciim.
Ɛ wvú dioo tumte bó gay lɛ, “Ŋgbwele duule baay, ɛ bonyii bo ŋgbwele le nu caan. Nonɛn, ben ebunleè lɛ Tata wvù Cee wɛɛ eciinse bonyii bo ŋgbwele le wɛne dvu wvú.
Ben egɛnè lɛ. Ben dioo gɛne no kee lɛ me ntumte ben ɛ ben nu egɛn enu diɛwɛ boom bo njée le ɛnte jo bokuula.
Ben dioo gɛne, fo wee ejo bigew, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, kɛnɛɛ bolaba bomew kɛ. Ben dioo ɛ buy ɛ̂ je, fo ben eleemenè gayte bonyii le kɛ.
Ben dioo ɛ gɛn ɛ ley yew yì ben ley dvú le, yaw gay yew e lɛ, ‘Kembonɛn enù yew fɛn.’
Ɛ́ wee wvù kooŋke kembonɛn nu dvú, ɛ́ kembonɛn emɛy yî ye le. Ɛ́ wvú fɛn baa nu, ɛ́ kembonɛn kedvu ekase etu jim ɛ̂ ben.
Seke ben ɛ ley yew, mum no ceè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú. Fo ben ekumenè yéw kɛ. Fiɛɛ fidien ficii fì bó nya ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben die, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwuun, ɛ ben wu, njefo ɛ́ wee lemte lemme, tu wvú kɛŋke keekɛŋke nlawma we.
Ɛ́ ben ley ntɛw e, bó ɛ fiisɛn ben, ɛ nya naa la lɛ ben edie, ɛ́ ben no diee lo.
Ben dioo nu jó, no fɛlè bonyii bo bincɛm e, ebvuu efewcì ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee fô bó le.
Geenɛn, ben ɛ́ ley ntɛw e, bó ɛ́ faŋ keefiisɛn ben, ɛ́ ben buy gɛn bifiaŋ bi jé le jaŋ lɛ,
‘Kebvu ke ntɛw wene le kè bese jo yî bikaa bisɛse le kin fɛn no bese kuci, ɛ fiɛɛ ficii kaase tuu yî bikuu binɛn e. Geenɛn, ben ekeè lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee.’
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô kelaante kè Sodom efele kelaante kekiɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay lɛ, “Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bo Kolasen, ɛ ŋgɛw wvu baay nu tɛn wene ben bonyii bo Bɛsayda. Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ me nto ndioo ŋge biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì me nto ŋgeɛ jo ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu Taya bô Sidon, tu bó to nu ɛ jise wase bimbamkpwe, kfum taan ye le ncekɛ keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvubole.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô bonyii bo Taya noo bo Sidon e fele ben.
Noo ben bonyii bo Kafana'um, ben kpwaake lɛ bó nu ke ebense ben ɛ́ ben eben we? 'Aay. Bó nu ke eshike lo ben ɛ́ ben eshii egɛn woŋ boŋkfu le.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò wvú to tumɛɛ ba lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee yuw ben e, tu mwɛtɛn yuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu me le. Wee ɛ́ ma ben, tu wvú ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ ma me, tu mwɛtɛn ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me.”
Ɛ bonyii bo mbaŋsooshwiy ncow bofɛɛ ba ke ghan tu jim yuuke njoŋ, mum gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, bese se teŋe diee diuw, ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa bonceendaa bo dɛwle le, ɛ bó yuw kɛ bese le.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nse nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Satan ɛ gbwe kɛ diɛwɛ jaŋ fò yí ɛ law we ɛ ley fokuse.
Me nu ɛ nya wase mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elɛɛnci yó bô boŋgam dvú. Ɛ mbvuu ɛ nya mvuŋgay mvù ben eso mvuŋgay mvu Satan wvù wee bvuban e dvú mvunciim. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshiw ben kɛ.
Geenɛn, fo ben eyuukè njoŋ lɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yuuke ben e kɛ. Ben eyuukè njoŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ɛdiee ɛyene nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ saŋ wase ɛ̂ ŋwa' we le fowe.”
Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ njoŋ no yuu lo Jisos. Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo Icɛm Nfon ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ nyilɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bogoyfee noo boŋkiɛɛfiɛɛ, ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvunlɛy mvu boom e. Ɛ̀ nu no fí nu Icɛm, njefo ɛ̀ nu no wo to shieele lɛ fí enù.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Icɛm nu ɛ nya wase mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ me. Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee Wan wvù me kɛ, ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ Icɛm wvù kee. Ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù kee Icɛm kɛ, ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ me wvù Wan noo bonyii bò Wan nu ɛ caw keeduŋcɛ Ice ɛ̂ bó.”
Ɛ wvú nɛ baŋke ye jeme wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene lɛ ɛjisɛ ɛyene yɛne mwɛɛm mvun e.
Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le nteen bô bonfon to shee beele keeyɛn mwɛɛm mvù ben yɛne le, ke faŋɛ yaa eyɛn kɛ. No beele tɛn keeyuw mwɛɛm mvù ben yuuke, ke faŋɛ yaa eyuw kɛ.”
Ɛ wee mvu wvù to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le, ke nɛ to keemom Jisos, mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ wee egeè nɛɛ? Wo taaŋke yuuke lɛ la?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Bó saŋ lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè Tata wvù Nyo' wo bô fitele fiuw ficii, enya ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ wvú kecii, elemtè fô wvú le bô mvuŋgay mwuw mvunciim, egɛɛ bvufee bwuw bvucii yî ye le, ebvuu ekooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.’”
Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ tfuse lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ geè nonɛn ke emum ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
Ɛ wee wvudvu mum nɛ wowlɛn bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Waa bwɛɛm nu yɛɛ?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ nɛ Jɛlusalɛm no booke Jɛliku, dioo gɛne ley can bocooŋ e. Ɛ bó suŋ wvú, ɛ wvú citɛn, ɛ bó baayɛ ndvú ye jo bô mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim, mum laŋ wvú fó lewtɛ.
Ɛ fí ke nɛ kooy lɛ wee mvu to booke ɛ̂ je yidvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ncese, yɛn wee wvudvu le, wɛm lo fey.
Ɛ wee mvu tɛn ke nɛ no too, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le, ke to buy fó, yɛn wvú le, wɛm lo tɛn fey.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvumvu wee ke no lɛne tɛn too, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Samalia. Ɛ wvú ke to buy fó, yɛn wvú le ɛ shen koo wvú.
Ɛ wvú gɛn mbew ye le, gɛɛ mbvuum bô mɛɛm yî bilɛmte biew e, kuu bilɛmte bidvu bô ndvu, mum tuu wvú yî nyam yì wvú to lɛne yî dvú le, gɛn dvú yew bonyii bo ghane le no taale fô wvú le.
Ɛ bô wvú ce, ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ wvú bvuse bodanali bofɛɛ nya ɛ̂ wee yew yidvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Shɛɛ etaalè fô wee wvun e. Ɛ́ wo shɛke lo ɛ jewse bigew bí ɛ fesɛn, ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkase entfuse.’”
No Jisos ma nonɛn, mum bife ɛ̂ wee wɛ wvù to looci kee nci lɛ, “Ɛnte jo bonyii bo botɛte ban, wo yɛn fiuw lɛ wee wvù to duŋcɛɛ lɛ wen nu waa bwee wee wvù bocooŋ to suŋɛɛ nu wvù la?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to koolɛɛ shen fô wee wvudvu le.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè, egɛn egeè tɛn nonɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ no gɛne, gɛn ley ntɛw mvu le ɛ kpwoon mvu nu jó ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maata. Ɛ wvú fiisɛn Jisos ɛ̂ wvú yew.
Wvú to kɛŋke waa bwee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maalia. No Jisos to gɛnɛɛ ley dvú, ɛ Maalia mum gɛn shii mbew ye le no yeke fiɛɛ fì wvú yɛɛyi.
Ɛ Maata nu fiew buuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ntɛ̂w. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ to bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo yɛne lɛ waa bwɛɛm nu ɛ cinɛ me le me ɛ no ntawtene me ɛmbeŋ sɛ wo ghayte lo le? Gayɛ kɛ ɛ́ wvú eto eficɛ me.”
Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Maata, Maata, wo buuke, baysee ɛkolɛ kuw yî mwɛɛm e nteen,
ɛ fiɛɛ fì nu shiee le baay nu kɛ fimwaaŋ. Maalia nu ɛ caw wase fifiɛ, ɛ kɛ wee yaa nu ke efi ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.”
Ɛ̀ to nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no bunlee bvudvuu bvumew e, ke bunle mɛse, ɛ wee we ŋgoo mvu to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, yɛɛyi bese no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese ebunlee, lɛŋlɛŋ no Jon to yɛɛyɛɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le no bó ebunlee.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben dioo bunlee no gaytè lɛ, ‘Icee wese, geɛ ɛ́ bonyii ewvumtè diee diuw, ege ɛ́ bvunfon bwuw eto.
Ɛ̀ nyaà bese mwɛɛm mvudien ɛdiuw ɛcii,
Lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛse, no bese lɛɛshi bibefɛ bì bonyii bomew gee fô bese le. Fo wo ecinɛ ɛ́ bese eley mmom yì eghaw bese le kɛ.’”
No wvú gay nonɛn mum fewsɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo lɛ wee mvu ben e be nɛ ɛ gɛn ɛ kumcɛ yew nsaa ye ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, nɛnɛ kɛ we efoose me bô bontuw bo bvulɛm e botɛte.
Nsaa yɛm yimi nu ɛ nɛ ɛ buynɛn gbwen ghane le, ɛ me n'yaa ŋkɛŋke fiɛɛ fì me nu entɛ̂w wvú dvú kɛ.’
Bó ejo lɛ nsaa yo yì wo be kumci yɛ ɛ kaa ɛ tfuse fiew yew lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejewseè me kɛ. Bee boom bem nu ɛ bó ɛ jiim wase ɛ fen kembuŋ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embvuu enɛ we lɛ me eŋgom fiɛɛ enya ɛ̂ wo kɛ.’”
No Jisos fewsene nonɛn, bvuu gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ́ wvú fɛn baa enɛ we enya bvulɛm bvù wo biite njefo wvú nu nsaa yo, tu wvú nu ke eghan kɛ enɛ we enya fiɛɛ ficii fì wo shieele seke wo ɛ mɛy kɛ fó ɛ no kumci.
Me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ebiitè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke enya ɛ̂ ben. Ben egomtè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke ege ɛ́ ben eyɛn. Ben ekumcì kembuŋ, ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyene ɛ̂ ben.
Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù biite, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ, ɛ wee tfuu wvù gomte, nu ke eyɛn, ɛ wvù kumci kembuŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eyene ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ̀ nu cee wan wvù la ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù waa we bife bye, ɛ́ wvú enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu yo ɛ̂ wvú?
Nuu lɛ ɛ́ wan be bife gee, ɛ́ wo enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgam ɛ̂ wvú lɛ?
Ɛ́ ben fɛn bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe kee keenya mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ boom bonɛn, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Icee wene wvù nu fowe enya tɛn Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ bonyii bò biite ɛ̂ wvú efey naa lo nonɛn e?”
Ɛ Jisos ke no bvuuse nceendaa dɛwle yî wee mvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu kencife. No nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu to buyɛɛ, ɛ wee wvudvu mum kɛw no jemyi. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw.
Ɛ bonyii bomew no duu lɛ, “Wvú bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu wvù nfon bonceendaa bo dɛwle le.”
Ɛ bomew bonyii no teeyi keekoo wvú gayte lɛ wvú ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe.
Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ boŋkpwawcɛ bobole mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ ketum nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛkinɛkin, kí saa ke eleem kɛ. Kfuu ɛ́ nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛdinɛdin, tu dí ɛ bvuŋ wase.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Satan bô ŋgoo ye nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛbonɛbon, bvunfon bwew saa ke eleem tɛn kɛ. Me ŋgayte nonɛn njefo ben duu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu le.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu le, tu bonɛn boom bvuuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvu yɛɛ le? Fiɛɛ fì boom bonɛn bodvu gee nu eduŋcɛ lɛ ben nu ɛ gbwe wase nsaw.
Geenɛn ɛ́ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bodvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kebo ke Nyo' le, tu bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ to wase fô ben e.
Ben kee lɛ ɛ́ ntɛmemvuŋgay seyse mwɛɛm mwew mvu jem e ɛ shii ɛ no cɛyte la diew dvú, wee saa ke eshiw fiɛɛ fiew kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ́ ntɛmemvuŋgay mvu wvù fele wvú nɛ ɛ to ɛ diu ɛ so wvú, emum eloo mwɛɛm mwew mvu jem e mvù wvú se gɛɛle ɛkolɛ yî dvú le, ebvuu ekuu mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim egɛn dvú ɛ́ bô nsáa ye egaw.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee kicine me, tu mwɛtɛn bone ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim. Wee wvù baa efici me keebaanci lo, tu wvú tawse lo.
Keyoy kè yiile ké buyte yî wee le mum gɛn ŋkpwaante no gomte fô kí ecee. Geenɛn ké dioo ɛ gom ŋkuuŋ, mum jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋkase entu ɛ̂ me yew fô me nse mbuyɛɛ.’
Seke kí ɛ kase ɛ to ɛ yɛn ɛ yew nu ɛ bó ɛ yɛse ɛ seyse yí ɛ no yuule,
nonɛn ɛ kí mum kase gɛn, to bô biyoy bimew bisooshwiy bì befe fele kí, ɛ bô bí mum to ley no cee dvú. Ɛ mwɛɛm mum mɛse fo yî mwɛtɛn e sekedvu fey no mvú se shee nu.”
No Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ kpwoon mvu nɛ sɛsɛ ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛnte jeme lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvù kpwoon wvù to bokɛɛ wo, bvuu yamse le.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' gee no yí gomte.”
No bibombom bi bonyii le to taashi too mbew ye le, ɛ wvú nɛ gay lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu kè befe. Kí gomte keeyɛn keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè duŋci mvuŋgay mwem, ɛ bó yaa nu eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ kí kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le baa fey ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Jona le kɛ.
No fiɛɛ fì Jona to geɛ to nu keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le fô bonyii bo Ninivɛ le, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ fì wee wvù diee nu Waawee gee nu ke enu keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le fô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin e.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ Yaa wvù to saake ketum kè Shɛba eleem bô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ege ɛ́ bó elese kí ŋgɛw e, njefo wvú to nu ɛ nɛ ketum kew e ɛ̂ kendvuse ke woŋ e keeto eyuw bvufee bvu Nfon Saamun e. Geenɛn ben eyekɛ eyuw, wee mvu nu fɛn bô fiɛɛ ɛ fí kuuke fele fi Saamun e.
Ɛ bonyii bo Ninivɛ nu ke elomte tɛn ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛbvubwɛ lɛ kí to nu ɛ jay baay, njefo bó to nu ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì Jona to fewcɛɛ, kumɛn mvuntelem mvubole. Wee mvu wvun fɛn bô fiɛɛ fì fele fi Jona le, ɛ ben yaa kumene mvuntelem mvunɛn kɛ.
Kɛ wee ké tfuuke ken'yeese lese ɛgaaku kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo tɛn ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ejo ŋkaa ekfukɛ dvú kɛ. Wvú ké tfuuke, tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le, lɛ bonyii dioo leyte yew eyɛne n'yuu le.
Jise diuw nu ken'yeese ke ye yo le. Ɛ́ jise diuw yuule lo, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô n'yuu. Geenɛn, ɛ́ jise diuw baa yuule, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn lo bô ɛjiwɛ.
Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, wee etaalè lɛ laa wen lɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛnte jo n'yuu nuu ɛnte jo ɛjiwɛ lɛ.
Ɛ́ wo lɛne ɛnte jo n'yuu ɛ keba kemew yaa nu ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le kɛ, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvunciim emum eyuule kɛ diɛwɛ no ken'yeese ké baa no nyaa n'yuu yî yo le.”
Ɛ Jisos ke mɛse njeme we, ɛ wee Falasii mvu tee wvú lɛ wvú eto ɛ́ bô wen egɛn ediekɛn. Ɛ Jisos mum gɛn, ley, shii ɛ bó no diekene,
ɛ wvú baa yaw ecukɛ can kɛ. Ɛ wee Falasii wɛ taa ɛ fí ghaw wvú.
Ɛ Tata kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú kpwawci mum jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben Bofalasii cuke mvuŋkom bô shúw ye le, geenɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe bô ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ɛ cin lo fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e.
Biyuŋ bin! Kɛ Nyo' wvù to bomɛɛ ɛkfuŋ nu wvù to bomɛɛ ɛnte tɛn e?
Fì ben bee keegeè nu lɛ, ben enyaà mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mwɛ le ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvunciim emum eyuule fô ben e.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene Bofalasii. Ben nyaa keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛnte jo biba yuufe bi mbáse yì ben keeke naa noo mwɛɛm mvù ben keeke gɛɛle ɛ̂ mbáse le lɛ yí eshumte, geenɛn kaa cin'yi keegee mwɛɛm mvu lɛŋ fô bonyii le bô keekooŋke Nyo'. Ben be kɛŋke keegeè mwɛɛm mvudvu mvunciim yaa cin'yi fimew e kɛ.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene Bofalasii. Ben ké no kooŋke kɛ keeshiile ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe yéw bunle le, bvuu kooŋke lɛ bó egayte ben e ɛ̂ way bô n'wvum.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, njefo ben nu kɛ diɛwɛ jém yì yaa yen'yi kɛ, ɛ bonyii lɛne yî dvú le yaa kee kɛ.”
No Jisos to jemyi nɛn, ɛ wee mvu wvù to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo kee kɛ lɛ fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi nu ɛ kum bese le tɛn e.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu tɛn wene ben bonyii bò looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le. Ben nɛn'yi yikɛ bonyii bô bvujitɛ ɛ bvú fele mvuŋgay mvubole sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elaw kɛ naa lo kpwan ɛbo keeficɛ bó dvú ŋkuuŋ.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene. Ben bomte jém bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò bo'icee cee bonɛn to yuwyɛɛ.
Fifin duŋci lɛ ben tomte gee di bo'icee cee bonɛn e. Bó to nu ɛ yuwyɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, ben ɛ mum ɛ shɛɛ ɛ no seysee bomte jém yibo.
Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' bô bvufee bwew sɛ jeme lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke enciinse bonyii bem bo ntum e fô bó le, ɛ́ bó ke eyuwyɛ bomew ebvuu ekuŋ bomew.’
Nonɛn, Nyo' nu ke ebife ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛkumɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke bonyii bew bo ntum e bocii bò bó to yuwyɛɛ ɛ kɛw no woŋ to kɛwɛɛ.
Wvú nu ke bife ɛ kɛw yî ɛlɛmɛ ke Abɛl e egɛn ebuy yî ke Sakalia wvù bó to yuɛ ɛntelɛŋ jo ketaŋ ke ncese bô yew ncese le. Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ Nyo' nu ke ebife ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛkumɛ kpwe bonyii bodvu ba bocii.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le. Ben nu ɛ nyilɛ ken'yene ke diuw fwese wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee eley dvú sɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ e. Ben nu ɛ tun keeley, ɛ bvuu ɛ no baaŋke bonyii bò gomte keeley fo bó eley.”
Ɛ Jisos ke ja lɛ wen egɛne, ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no leeshi wvú bô díɛw biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú nteen nteen,
ɛ bó to gee nonɛn teeyi lo wvú keeyuw fiɛɛ diuw we le emum ekoo wvú.
No Jisos to jemyi, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no taashi fó bontfuke le bontfuke le faanene. Ɛ bomew lɛɛnci bikaa bi bomew e. Ɛ Jisos nɛ kɛw no jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gayte lɛ, “Ben ejoò kefew yî fintuŋlɛɛn fi Bofalasii le fì ɛ̀ nu gee dibole dì bó jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy e.
Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bó baŋyi fì nu ke enu sɛ fí ɛ buy ɛmwa kɛ. Ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú tɛn fì bó nyile fì nu ke enu sɛ bó ɛ kiɛɛ kɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì ben jemyi ɛntaŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eyuŋɛn ɛmvunsheeŋ. Ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì ben ké faale yew sɛ no tfumtfume nu ɛ bó nu ke ejaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ ke yew e.
Nsáa yɛm, me ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben efanè bonyii bò nulo eyu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam ye maaŋ sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege fiɛɛ fimew kɛ.
Ben eyekɛ eyuw wee wvù ben efanè. Ben efanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' njefo ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay keeyu wee, ebvuu elese mwɛtɛn ŋguy wvu baay e. Me mbvuu ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben efanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú.
Kɛ ben kee lɛ bó ké no geese mvunsha mvuntin kɛ yî mvunyinyi le mvunfɛɛm maaŋ? Geenɛn, kɛ finsha fimew nu dvú fimwaaŋ fì Nyo' ké daayɛ ɛ̂ fí le kɛ.
Finɛn nu ɛ Nyo' kee naa yvúw yicii yì nu ɛ̂ ben ɛfa. Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben fele lo mvunsha fó nteen.
Ɛ́ me embvuu ensee ɛ̂ ben tɛn lɛ, ɛ́ wee beŋe ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise lɛ wen kee me, tu wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ebee tɛn mwɛtɛn ɛ̂ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le fwe.
Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee ma lo me ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, tu me nu ŋke ema tɛn mwɛtɛn ɛ̂ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le ɛjise.
Fí ɛ bvuu ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, Nyo' nu ke elɛɛshɛ díɛw yì befe yì wee jemyi ɛkumɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee, geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyuu elɛɛshɛ díɛw yì befe yì wee jemyi ɛkumɛ Keyoy ke Yuule kɛ.
Seke bó ɛ koo ben ɛ gɛn dvú yéw bunle le, kɛnɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ kɛnɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le, lɛ bó egɛn esaw ben, fo ɛkolɛ ekfumtè ben lɛ laa ben nu ke egɛn etaŋe diuw egay lɛ la lɛ, kɛnɛɛ ejeme nɛɛ lɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kedvu le ɛ́ Keyoy ke Yuule esee fiɛɛ fì ben ejeme.”
No Jisos to teete boom bew bo ŋgoo le nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu nɛ jeme ɛnte jo kebombom ke bonyii le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, gayɛ ɛ̂ waa bwɛɛm lɛ wvú egaw bvushɛw bvusɛɛbeewvu enya bwem.”
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Diemsɛn, ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ me lɛ me ensumtenè bonsaw bonɛn, mbvuu ŋgaakè bvushɛw bvunɛn?”
No wvú bife nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ wee tfuu lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo ben eyɛɛlè ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, njefo kɛ nshii wee yaa nu nje mwɛɛm mvù wvú kɛŋke kɛ, wee ejo naa ɛ mwɛtɛn kɛŋke nɛɛ.”
No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum ma ŋgan lɛ, “Cee kpwaw mvu to kɛŋke wɛɛ we, ɛ mwɛɛm ke joŋ dvú baay.
Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no kpwawci lɛ laa wen nu ke ege nɛɛ lɛ? Wen nu ke egɛɛ ŋgu wen fɛɛ lɛ?
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ cu ntaŋ lɛ, ‘Fiɛɛ fì me nu eŋge nu fin. Me nu ensaw bigonɛ biem, eŋkase eŋkuwse, emum eŋgɛɛ ŋgu bô mwɛɛm mwem dvú mvunciim.
Ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋge nonɛn, emum eŋgay ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kem lɛ me nu wee keshi. Me ŋkɛŋke mwɛɛm mvù me nu ŋke endie embuy bilum e nteen. Kɛ me mbɛɛ ebvuu embuuke kɛ. Me nu endiekene kɛ wase lo, mbvuu ŋ'wukene n'yuuke njoŋ.’
No wvú seyse nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' mum tee wvú lɛ, ‘Keyuŋ kin! Ɛntaŋ ɛbɛn nu ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkase enjo keyoy kuw. Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù wo seyse ɛ gɛɛ nu ke enu mvu yɛɛ le?’”
No Jisos jeme nɛn mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ke enu fô wee wvù baanci bvukukɛ fô ɛkolɛ kew e yaa kɛŋke bvukukɛ ɛ̂ keba ke Nyo' le kɛ.”
Ɛ wvú bvuu nɛ no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Fo ben eyaŋyaŋè ɛkumɛ nshii wene lɛ laa ben nu ke edie la lɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ ye yene laa ben nu ke ejise la lɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ keyoy ke wee le fele mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ ye wee fele ndvú.
Ben etaa eyɛn biŋaaŋa, kɛ bí ké no jewyi bvuu gbweci ŋgu kɛ. Kɛ bí yaa kɛŋke bigonɛ kɛ. Ɛ Nyo' nyaŋyi kɛ bí bicii. Kɛ ben kee lɛ ben fele mvunyiim e?
Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù yaŋyaŋe, wvù nulo ebise kɛ naa kefew caan yî nshii we le?
No ɛ̀ nu sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege naa fi caan fin ŋkuuŋ, ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben soo bikuu ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvumew?
Ben etaa yɛn no fow ké no kuu nu. Kɛ fow ké no lemte kɛnɛɛ shile ndvú kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ naa Nfon Saamun bô bvukukɛ bvucii bvù wvú to kɛŋke to ké suute ye no nu ɛ wvú ɛ buy fô fow mvu le kɛ.
Ɛ́ Nyo' suute ɛgay yo ŋkpwaante nɛn, ɛgay yò kuu ɛbɛn, buy ntfuu ɛ bó ɛ fwɛɛ wase fotaŋ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú esufe ben efey lo nonɛn e? O oo bonyii bo mbee wvù doose le!
Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ fo ben eyaŋyaŋè, bvuu kpwaake lɛ laa ben nu ke ediee la bvuu wuu la lɛ,
njefo mvumvun mwɛɛm ké no kpwawci kɛ bonyii bo yî nshɛ le bò yaa kee Nyo' kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ Icee wene kee lo lɛ ben shieele mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim.
Ben elese bvufee bvunɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, ɛ́ wvú emum enyaa tɛn mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben.
Ŋgoo yɛm, no ben nu caan nɛn, fo ben efanè kɛ, njefo Nyo' wvù Icee wene nu ɛ caw keenya bvunfon ɛ̂ ben.
Ben egese mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke, egaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, egomtè bobuuncuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò yaa nulo esɛɛkɛn kɛ. Ben egɛɛlè kpwaw wene ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ Nyo' le, fô ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú eka kɛ, ɛ cooŋ yaa nulo efey fó kɛ, ɛ shéw yaa nulo ekan kɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ fò wee gɛke kpwaw we nu kɛ fó fò fitele fiew nu enu.
Ben ekay bicaw binɛn, etfuw bin'yeese ecɛytè lemme,
kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo lemme le bò cɛyte cee ɛkolɛ wvubo ɛ wvú nu gbwen bvujen e. Ɛ wvú nu ke edioo ekaase ekumcɛ kembuŋ ɛ́ bó eyene lo ɛ́ wvú eley.
Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu boom bo lemme le bò cee ɛkolɛ wvubo nu ke edioo efɛɛse eyɛn ɛ bó nu we cɛyte. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ wvú nu ke eseŋ ndvu ye ɛ́ bó shiiyɛn fokuse ɛ́ wvú eto bô mwɛɛm mvudien egawcɛ ɛ̂ bó.
