Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu boom bo lemme le bò wvú nu ke edioo efɛɛse eyɛn ɛ bó nu cɛyte. Kɛnɛɛ wvú nu ke eto ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ, kɛnɛɛ seke nyimshie ɛ toŋ.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ cee yew kee kefew kè cooŋ nu ke eto, ɛ́ wvú ecɛytè. Wvú saa ke ecinɛ ɛ́ bó eŋgoy yew ye kɛ.
Ben tɛn kɛŋke keecɛytè, njefo wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ekase eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kefew kè ben yaa kee kɛ le.”
Ɛ Bita mum nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, wo ma ŋgan wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bese, nuu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ?”
Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Waa lemme wvù nu wvu kecɛɛy bvuu kɛŋke bvufee nu wvù la? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ɛ gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú etaalè fô yew ye le, ɛ́ kefew ke dioo ɛ kocɛn ɛ wvú nya mwɛɛm mvudien mvu boom bo lemme le ɛ̂ bó le?
Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu waa lemme wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke edioo etoo eyɛn ɛ wvú gee lemme lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú bee keegee.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke ebense wvú ɛ́ wvú etaale fô mwɛɛm mwew e mvunciim.
Geenɛn, ɛ́ waa lemme wvudvu nɛ ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Kɛ cee ɛkolɛ wɛm nu ke eyaŋsɛn ekase eto kɛ’, ɛ mum ɛ kɛw ɛ no suuŋke boom bo lemme le bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ, diekene bvuu wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole wvú,
tu cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke enɛ esɛsɛ ebuynɛn diuu dimew dì wvú yaa be kpwaake le kɛ noo ɛ̂ kefew kè wvú yaa be kee le kɛ. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ buynɛn nonɛn, emum enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ waa lemme wvudvu, eciinse wvú ɛ́ wvú egɛn enu bô bonyii bò yaa jemyi kecɛɛy kɛ.
Waa lemme wvù kee fiɛɛ fì cee ɛkolɛ we gomte lɛ wvú egeè, ɛ faŋɛ yaa eseyse egee, nu ɛ bó nu ke etam wvú boŋgbwan nteen.
Ɛ waa lemme wvù yaa kee kɛ fiɛɛ fì cee ɛkolɛ we gomte lɛ wvú egeè, ge fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó etam wvú boŋgbwan nteen, nu ɛ bó nu ke ewewcɛ kɛ lo wvuwɛ caan. Wee wvù bó nu ɛ nya mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú nteen nu ɛ bó nu ke eshieele nteen ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wee wvù bó nu ɛ gɛɛ mwɛɛm can ye le nteen nu ɛ bó nu ke ebife ɛ̂ wvú nteen.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Me nto keenfwɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋguy yî nshɛ le. Wee ejo ɛ wvú be bɛɛnci wase.
Me ŋkɛŋke kfuu ŋgɛw wvu baay keenley wvú le, ɛ fitele fiem nu ke elɛɛtɛn kɛ seke me ɛ nley wase wvú le.
Ben kpwaake lɛ me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nyɛkeey yî nshɛ le fɛn e? Naa lo. Ben ekeè lɛ me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô keŋgawsɛn.
Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, yew yì nu bonyii botin nu ke egawsɛn. Bonyii bo botɛte nu ke egawsɛn bô bo bofɛɛ, ɛ́ bo bofɛɛ egawsɛn bô bo botɛte.
Cee wan nu ke egawsɛn bô waa we wvù diemsɛn, ɛ́ wan wvù diemsɛn egawsɛn bô ice. Bwee wan nu ke egawsɛn bô waa we wvù kpwoon, ɛ́ wan wvù kpwoon egawsɛn bô bwee. Bwee diemsɛn nu ke egawsɛn bô kpwɛɛ waa we, ɛ́ kpwɛɛ wan egawsɛn bô bwee dweese.”
Ɛ Jisos gay wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le lɛ, “Ben ké yɛne seke kembɛw bene je ɛkuɛku, ɛ ben mum no duu lɛ, ‘Jaŋ nu ke egbwe.’ Ɛ yí ke mum gbwe.
Ɛ́ ben ké yɛn tɛn ɛ fwefwe ɛ baŋke wase ye ɛ no booke lo je ɛweɛwe, ɛ́ ben mum no duu lɛ, ‘Keŋkfum ke baay nu ke enu.’ Ɛ kí mum ke no nu.
Ben bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy ban, no ben taale ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ mum kiɛɛ no ɛkfuŋ nu ke enu, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' duŋci yî kefew kin e nje la?
Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ekpwawcɛ fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè le?
Ɛ́ wee jo wo ɛ no gɛne dvú yew nsaw e, ɛ́ wo mom ɛ ben ɛ wvú seyse ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛ̂ je, fo wvú ke egufe wo egɛn efese can wee wvù saake bonsaw e, ɛ́ wvú efese wo can nci le ɛ́ bó efen wo yew ncaw e.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo lɛ kɛ wo nu ke ebuy dvú sɛ wo ɛ mɛse ɛ law finyinyi ficii fì bó shieele kɛ.”
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ be Jisos kumte bonyii bo Galilee bomew bò to gɛnɛɛ keege ncese fô Nyo' le, ɛ Baylɛt tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn gbwocɛ bó, ɛ bilɛɛm bibole taashɛ bô bi nyám yì bó to gee ncese dvú.
Ɛ Jisos yekɛ nɛn, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ bonyii bodvu to kpwe kfuu yiyɛ kpwe nonɛn njefo bibefɛ bibole to fele bi bonyii bo Galilee bomew e nuu?
Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ ben baa ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, ɛ́ ben bocii ke ekpwekɛn kɛ nonɛn.
Ben kumyi bonyii bo yuufe ncow nyaŋ bò yew yì defe ɛ̂ we to kesɛɛ Siloam yuwyɛ bó? Ben kpwaake lɛ bonyii bodvu to kpwekene nonɛn njefo bibefɛ bibole to fele bi bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bomew e nuu?
Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ ben baa ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, ɛ́ ben bocii ke ekpwekɛn kɛ nonɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos mum ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu yee kete kemew ɛ̂ wvú wɛne. Ɛ kefew ke kocɛn, ɛ wvú to keekoy, faŋɛ yaa yɛn ɛ mvuntam ɛ yum yî dvú le kɛ.
Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to taale fô wɛɛ we le lɛ, ‘Taa eyɛn, ɛ̀ nu wase bilum bitɛte keseen no me ntoo keeŋkoy mvuntam yî kete kin e, n'yaa yɛne fiɛɛ le yî dvú le kɛ. Gbwolɛ lo. Kí baŋyi bvudvuu ɛcici.’
Ɛ wee we lemme wvudvu tfuse lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, kɛ bvuu cinɛ kɛ dvú kelum kin, ɛ́ me encɛwcɛ kenyi kedvu eŋgɛɛ binfo fó.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ ke edioo enu kelum kè too le kí ɛ yum, ɛ́ fí ejoŋ, kí ɛ faŋ keeyum ee, ɛ́ me emum egbwo.’”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle mi le.
Ɛ kpwoon mvu nu dvú ɛ keyoy kemew nu yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ké ge ɛ wee tu wee gon. Kí to nu ɛ ge wase wvú ɛ cɛm bilum yuufe ncow nyaŋ jim ɛ ŋgvuse, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eleem we teytey kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos yɛn kpwoon wvudvu le, tee wvú ɛ wvú to. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bwɛɛm, wo nu ɛ boy wase ɛbo jo ntun wo wvun.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛke kebo kum wvú le. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ jim ye kase nɛle ye, ɛ wvú leem we teytey, mum no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yidvu yɛn no Jisos fɛ kpwoon wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ to nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ton'yɛ wvú baay. Ɛ wvú mum no saake bonyii gayte lɛ, “Ɛdiuw ɛ lemme nu ɛsoocaan. Ben etoò ɛ bó fɛle bincɛm binɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛdiuw yoya le. Fo wee ebvuu emom eto diuu di mbam e kɛ.”
Ɛ Tata tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy ban. Ɛ̀ ké dioo nu diuu di mbam e, wee saa ejo na' we kɛnɛɛ kembɛɛbey kew egɛn enya joo dvú?
Kpwoon wvun ɛ no nu waa Abla'am, ɛ Satan ɛ lese wase yî ncaw e bilum yuufe ncow nyaŋ, tu kɛ fí baa jee lɛ bó ebvuse wvú yî ŋgɛw e diuu di mbam e?”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bew bo bvuban e wuumɛn, ɛ bonyii nteen no laŋlaŋe lo fibole nje biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bicii bì Jisos to gee.
Ɛ Jisos nɛ ghay lɛ “Bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu kɛ diɛwɛ la? Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfewsɛn dvú nu la?
Bvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ ŋgow fintam fimew fì wee to tfumyɛɛ wɛne dvu wvú, ɛ yí ke buy, ku yiŋ tu kete ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we no yoote yî dvú le.”
Ɛ wvú bvuu nɛ ghay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embvuu enfewsɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bô la?
Bvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ fintuŋlɛɛn fì kpwoon to fewɛɛ mvuum ɛ̂ bintee bi baay baay e bitɛte jo fiysɛn dvú, tow gɛɛ, ɛ fí mum ge ɛ mvuum modvu ben.”
Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ no gɛne Jɛlusalɛm. No wvú to gɛne no fele ɛ̂ bilaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw e yɛɛyi bonyii.
Ɛ wee mvu nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu kɛ bonyii caan bò nu ke eboy e?” Ɛ Jisos mum tfuse wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ,
“Ben elumtè ntay keeley ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw fwese wɛ wvù nu fiasaa le. Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nteen nu ke egomte keeley yaa kɛŋke je kɛ.
Kefew nu ke ekocɛn, ɛ́ cee yew eja we efaa kembuŋ. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ faa, ɛ́ ben emɛy ɛkfuŋ ekumci kembuŋ lɛke lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, yene kɛ yew ɛ́ bese eley.’ Ɛ́ wvú emum etfuse ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ‘Kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee jò ben nɛ kɛ.’
Ɛ́ ben emum ekɛw etaŋyi lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bese bò beene se shee diekene bvuu wukene. Ɛ wo se ghane yɛɛyi bonyii bontɛw bosɛse le.’
Ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ekase etfuse kɛ lɛ, ‘Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee ben kɛ. Ben enɛnɛ lo ɛ̂ me ɛfwese ben bò ghane buwyi mwɛɛm ban.’
Ben nu ke eyɛn Abla'am bô Aysik noo Yakow noo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, ɛ ben nu ɛ bó ɛ baŋ ɛkfuŋ, ɛ́ ben emum ebeele ŋgeci bigew.
Bonyii nu ke enɛ biba bicii ɛ kɛw jò diuu sane ɛ gɛn ɛ buy jò dí seeyi noo ɛweɛwe bô ɛkuɛku jo woŋ, eto eshii ediekene ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bomew bò nu ɛjim keseen nu ke enu bo fwe, ɛ bomew bò nu fwe keseen nu ke enu bo ɛjim.”
Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ Bofalasii to gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Buy fiuw jan egɛn keba kemew e njefo Nfon 'Ɛlod gomte keeyu wo.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn egay ɛ̂ dikfuu didvu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le ɛbɛn, mbvuu nfɛle bincɛm, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no me nu embuy eŋgee ntfuu, ɛ́ ke edioo enu foɛshentfuu, ɛ́ me emum emɛse lemme diem.
Geenɛn, ɛ me nu eŋkɛw lɛne diem di Jɛlusalɛm ɛbɛn, embuy enlɛn ntfuu eŋgɛn embuy foɛshentfuu. Kɛ fí baa kocɛn lɛ bó eyu wee ntum Nyo' bvudvuu bvumew e sɛ ɛ̀ nu Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.”
No Jisos jeme nɛn, mum bɛm lɛ, “Ɛbɛɛy Jɛlusalɛm! Ɛbɛɛy Jɛlusalɛm! Wo wvù yuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, bvuu tumyi bonyii bò Nyo' tumte fô wo le bô ɛta. Ɛ̀ nu wase bokaŋ bomɛɛ no me mom keembaancɛ boom buw kɛ diɛwɛ no bweeshie ké baancɛ boom bew kfukɛ, wo ɛ faŋ?
Taa eyɛn, yew yo nu ke etu binffuy. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ ben nu ke ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, egɛn ebuy kefew kè ben ke egay lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le.’”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos gɛn keediekɛn yew dvu wee wvu baay mvu. Ɛ wee wvudvu to nu wee Falasii. Ɛ bonyii bò to nu fó no gbwetene Jisos keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ege.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee mvu leeme fó ɛ Jisos ɛjise cɛmte bô ntun ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase can bô bikaa ɛ mvuwkɛn.
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le, bò to nu fó lɛ, “Nci wesebeene nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efɛ wee diuu di mbam e?”
Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wee wvudvu le, fɛ wvú, mum gay lɛ wvú egɛne.
Ɛ Jisos mum kase bife ɛ̂ bonyii ba lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee mvu ben e kɛŋke wan kɛnɛɛ na', wvú ɛ gbwe ɛ̂ fwɛŋ diuu di mbam e, mwɛtɛn saa ebvuse lo kaŋ mwaaŋ e?”
Ɛ bó ma fiɛɛ fì bó etfuse.
Ɛ Jisos ke taa yɛn no bonyii too cawci ɛ ɛ̀ nu mondvuum mo fwe sɛ shiiyine fó, ɛ wvú maw díɛw ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Seke bó ɛ see wee bô ŋkaw bvujen, wvú ɛ gɛn, fo wvú eshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bvudvuu bvu fwe le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ bó ɛ see tɛn wee mvu wvu baay wvù fele wvú dvú.
Ɛ́ cee bvujen wvù se seŋɛɛ bó dvú bocii ke enɛ eto emum egay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ we enya bvudvuu bvun ɛ̂ wee wvu baay wvun.’ Ɛ́ wvú emum enɛ bô keŋ'wuumɛn egɛn shii wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim.
Seke bó ɛ see wee bô ŋkaw bvujen, wvú ɛ gɛn, shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim, wvu lɛ cee bvujen ke enɛ eto egay lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, nɛnɛ we fɛn egɛn shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe.’ Nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú emum ekɛŋke n'wvum fwe dvu bonyii bocii fó.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee tfuu wvù bensee ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke eshike lo wvú. Ɛ wee wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke ebense lo wvú.”
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ kase gay ɛ̂ cee yew wvù to teŋɛɛ wvú yew dvu wvú lɛ, “Seke wo gomte keetee bonyii lɛ bó eto ediekɛn, fo wo etee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsáa yo bô boom bo bwoo le noo kfuu diuw kɛnɛɛ bonyii bo kpwaw e bo ntɛw wo le kɛ. Ɛ́ wo teŋe boba bonyii, ɛ́ bó ke ekase tɛn etee wo yéw yibole, ɛ́ fí emum enu lɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse wase kebo kuw.
Seke wo gee ŋkaw, tee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo kefufe le, boŋkɛwlɛ bô bontɛŋɛ noo binfefe.
Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ wo emum ekɛŋke kembonɛn, njefo kɛ boba bonyii kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekase etfuse ɛ̂ wo kɛ. Ɛ́ ke enu Nyo' wvù nu ke elaw wo diuu dì bonyii bew nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu wvù bô bó to diekene mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvù wee wvù nu ke ediekɛn ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
Ɛ Jisos mum fɛ ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu seyse ŋkaw wvu baay, be bonyii nteen.
Ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum waa we lemme lɛ wvú eghan esee ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bò wvú to beɛ lɛ bó etoò, lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase.
Ɛ waa lemme wvudvu mum gɛn yɛn bó le, ɛ bó kɛw no camte ye mwaaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ wee wvu fwe wvù wvú to yɛnɛɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋguy wɛɛ wɛm wvu fwɛ, ɛ me ŋkɛŋke keeŋgɛn etaa. Kee wo, fo ben ecɛytè me kɛ.’
Ɛ wvú bvuu yɛn wvumvu le, ɛ mwɛtɛn gay lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋguy bona' bem bo lemme le yuufe, ɛ me ŋgɛne keseen keemom bó. Kee wo, fo ben ecɛytè me kɛ.’
Ɛ wvú yɛn wee mvu le, ɛ wvú gay fiew lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋkooy bwee yew, ɛ kɛ kefew yaa nu dvú kè ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ento kɛ.’
No bó tfuse nonɛn, ɛ waa lemme wɛ mum tu jim gɛn see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ cee ɛkolɛ we. Ɛ cee ŋkaw wvudvu yuw, ɛ fitele bɛnte lo wvú. Ɛ wvú mum kase tum waa we lemme wɛ gay lɛ, ‘Buy cekey, egɛn ɛlaante eghan ntasɛn jé bô mvujetɛlɛ mvunciim e, ekum bonyii bo kefufe le, bontɛŋɛ, bô binfefe noo boŋkɛwlɛ eto dvú.’
Ɛ wvú gɛn kase to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, me nu ɛ ŋge wase no wo be gay, geenɛn, yew baa yiŋsɛn kɛ.’
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Buyɛ keseen egɛn ghan jé le bô mvujetɛlɛ le mvunciim, ekan wa lo bonyii ɛ́ bó eto, ɛ́ yew yɛm eyiŋsɛn.
Ɛ̀ keè lɛ kɛ wee mwaaŋ ɛnte jo bonyii ba bò me nse n'yawɛɛ mbe nu ke emom lo fiɛɛ fiem fidien ɛ̂ wvú ɛmvu kɛ.’”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu nɛ no gɛne, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le shfumte bii wvú le. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enu wee wɛm ŋgoo sɛ wvú kooŋke me fele bwee bô ice, bvuu kooŋke me fele kpwɛse bô boom noo boom bo bwee le bô jɛ́me ye kɛ. Ɛ wvú kɛŋke naa tɛn keekooŋke me fele no wvú kooŋke ɛkolɛ kew.
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee enu wee wɛm ŋgoo sɛ wvú nu ɛ tuu kew kentam ɛ no bii me le kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù gomte keebom yew yì defe ɛ̂ we, wvú saa eyaw eshii ekpwawcɛ lɛ laa wen kɛŋke bigew ɛ bí ɛ kocɛn bì wen nu ke ebom dvú emɛse lɛ?
Ɛ́ wvú baa eyaw ege nonɛn ŋkuuŋ ɛ́ wvù ke enɛ elese kenffuy ɛ́ yew eghaw wvú keebom. Ɛ́ bonyii edioo efele emum ebuu wvú gayte lɛ,
‘Kenɛnɛ kin se nu ɛ kɛw yew yí ɛ ghaw wvú keemɛse.’
Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn, ɛ̀ nu nfon wvù la wvù gomte keetum jem bô nfon mvu, wvú saa eyaw eshii fokuse ekpwawcɛ lɛ laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen bô bonyii bowene bo jem e bo bontfuke yuufe etum jem bô nfon wvumvu wɛ bô bew bonyii bo jem e bò nu bontfuke mbaanfiɛɛ lɛ?
Wvú ɛ kpwawcɛ ɛ yɛn lɛ fí nu ke eghaw, ɛ́ wvú emum etum bonyii bew bomew ɛ́ bó egɛn eyɛn nfon wvumvu wɛ le ɛ wvú bɛɛ ncejole, elɛkɛ wvú lɛ nyɛkeey enù ɛ̂ bô wen ɛntelɛŋ.
Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee baa ecinɛ mwɛɛm mwew e mvunciim, wvú saa enu wee wɛm ŋgoo kɛ.
Ŋkauw nu fiɛɛ fì jee. Geenɛn, ɛ́ yí nɛlo ɛ cife, ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege nɛɛ dvú ɛ́ yí sɛ ebvuu ekase eyeke?
Kɛ tu yí ɛ la wase ɛcici. Ɛ kɛ shiee yaa bvuu nu dvú wvù bó elese wɛne, kɛnɛɛ yî binfo le kɛ. Yí nu kɛ wase lɛ bó elaŋ lo. Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem keeyuw ɛ wvú yuw.”
Bonyii bò to fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew to too fô Jisos e keeyekɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú to yɛɛyi.
Ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no wvukene, gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun fiisene bonyii bò befe bvuu diekene bô bó.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Jisos ma ŋgan wvun ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù kɛŋke njée gbwee, yimiaaŋ ɛ la, ɛ́ wvú ke elaame? Wvú saa eyaw ecinɛ yi mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ le ŋkpwaante egɛn egomte yimiaaŋ yidvu egɛn ebuy seke wvú ke eyɛn yí le?
Wvú ɛ́ gom ɛ yɛn yí le, emum eyuuke njoŋ, etuu fô gbwew,
ekfuuyi dvú fô yew e. Ɛ́ wvú dioo ɛ kfulɛ dvú, emum ekum nsáa ye bô bonyii bò cee mbew ye le gay lɛ, ‘Ben eto ɛ́ beene elaŋlaŋ njee yɛm ɛ yí be ɛ la, me ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn yí le.’
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay nu ke enu woŋ wvu we le, nje wee wvù befe mwaaŋ wvù nu ɛ kumɛn fitele fiew. Bó nu ke elaŋlaŋe wvuwɛ wee fele bonyii bo mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ bò nu teytey yaa shieele ŋkumɛn kɛ.
Nuu lɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwoon wvù la wvù kɛŋke bigew yuufe, jise ɛ la fó ɛ́ wvú ke elaame? Wvú saa etfuw ŋguy eyeese, eyɛse yew, eloocɛ etasse egɛn ebuy seke wvú ke eyɛn e?
Wvú ɛ́ tasse ɛ yɛn, emum ekum nsáa ye bô bonyii bò cee mbew ye le egay lɛ, ‘Ben eto ɛ́ beene elaŋlaŋ jise diem di bigew e, ɛ dí be ɛ la, me ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn.’
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonceendaa bo Nyo' le laŋlaŋe nje wee wvù befe mwaaŋ wvù nu ɛ kumɛn fitele fiew.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Wee mvu to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ.
Ɛ wvu ɛjim ke mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Icɛm, gawɛ bwem bvushɛw enya ɛ̂ me keseen.’ Nonɛn, ɛ ice mum gaw bvushɛw bvudvu ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ wan wvu ɛjim wvudvu fi bwew bvushɛw, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛjim jo ɛdiuw caan, ɛ wvú baancɛ bvucii gese mum laa bala woŋ wvumew e ncejole, mum gɛn no gbwayte bvuuke bigew bidvu yî nce wvu ɛcici le.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo bvuw ɛ bi ka, ɛ jeŋ yì tɛmyi nɛ koo woŋ wvudvu le, ɛ wvú no tane fiɛɛ fidien.
Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum gɛn gom lemme fô wee mvu wvu woŋ wvudvu le keelemte wvú le. Ɛ wee wvudvu mum ciinse wvú lɛ wvú egɛn ecɛyte boŋkunyam bew.
Ɛ wvú mum gɛn no cɛyte, ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù enya wvú bô fiɛɛ fì wvú edie kɛ. Ɛ wvú mum no kɛŋke shiee lɛ wen bee ediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvù boŋkunyam ké no diee.
Ɛ wvú ke nɛ kɛw no kpwawci mwɛɛm, tee bvufee bwew jim, mum gay lɛ, ‘Bonyii bo lemme le bo icɛm e kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien nteen ɛ mvú ghaake bó, ɛ me nu fɛn ŋkpwee jeŋ.
Me nu enɛ we, eŋgɛn fô icɛm e, eŋgay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Icɛm, me nu ɛ ŋge kebefɛ fô Nyo' le noo fô wo le.
Me mbaa mbvuu ŋkocɛn lɛ bó eteŋe me lɛ waa wo kɛ. Joo kɛ wase me diɛwɛ wee wo lemme le.”’
Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum nɛ no tuu jim fô ice le. Ɛ wvú ke dioo too buyte wase mbew la le, ɛ ice laŋ jise yɛn wvú le. Ɛ shen koo wvú bô wan, ɛ wvú ja we, lewtɛ gɛn, bam wvú, bvuu ŋocɛ.
Ɛ wan wvudvu mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Icɛm, me nu ɛ ŋge kebefɛ fô Nyo' le noo fô wo le. Me mbaa mbvuu ŋkocɛn lɛ bó eteŋe me lɛ waa wo kɛ.’
Geenɛn, ɛ ice kaa tee lo bonyii bew bo lemme le gay lɛ, ‘Ben egɛn cekey, egom kekum naa kè jee ntay, eto etfume yî ye le, ebvuu elese fincaw yî ɛbo kew e noo bolaba yî bikaa biew e.
Ben egɛn ekoo waa na' wvù faŋ, sɛɛ ɛ́ beene ediee laŋlaŋe,
njefo waa wɛm wvun se nu ɛ kpwe wase ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú. Wvú se nu ɛ la, ɛ kase ɛ yenɛ.’ Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum kɛw no laŋlaŋe.
Fiɛɛ fin to kooyi, ɛ wan wvu ŋgaywee nu ŋkpwaante. Ɛ wvú ke dioo kfuuyi, ke to buy mbew yew e, yuw no bine gbwee.
Ɛ wvú tee wee lemme mvu bife laa bó sɛ bine ɛ ɛ̀ nu la lɛ.
Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Waa bwoo nu ɛ tu jim ɛbɛn. Nonɛn, icen ɛ sɛɛ waa na' wvù faŋ, njefo wvú be ɛ yɛn waa bwoo le ɛ wvú nu dvú bvuu tɛmyi.’
Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn ɛ shém kaa ton'yɛ lo wvú, ɛ wvú mum faŋ keeley yew. Ɛ ice buy gɛn no booyi wvú lɛ wvú eley kɛ yew.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ ice lɛ, ‘Taa eyɛn, me nse nlemte fô wo le diɛwɛ nfwa le yî bilum bin e bicii, ɛ me ŋke mbaa nfaŋ wase keeŋge fiɛɛ fiuw fimew kɛ. Wo ke baa nya wase me kɛ naa bô waa bie lɛ me enlaŋlaŋ dvú bee nsáa yɛm kɛ.
Waa wo wvun wvù se gɛnɛɛ bvuw bvushɛw bô bokɛnɛ bo nsake le ɛ dioo to, wo mum ɛ koo lo waa na' wvù faŋ ɛ sɛɛ nje ye.’
Ɛ ice tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Waa wɛm, bee wo se nu fɛn sekecii, ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke nu kɛ fiuw.
Geenɛn, fí be jee keelaŋlaŋe njefo waa bwoo wvun se nu ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú, wvú se nu ɛ la, ɛ kase ɛ yenɛ.’”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Wee kpwaw mvu to kɛŋke waa we lemme wvù wvú to gɛkɛɛ lɛ wvú etaale fô kpwaw we le. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ yuw lɛ waa we lemme wɛ bvuuke lo bigew biew.
Ɛ wvú mum tee waa we lemme wvudvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Fin fì me n'yuuke ɛkumɛ wo nu la? Baancɛ boŋwa' bocii bò wo saaŋke kpwaw wɛm jó eto etfuse ɛ̂ me. Kɛ wo yaa bɛɛ ebvuu elemte me le kɛ.’
Ɛ waa lemme wɛ gɛn shii kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘No cee ɛkolɛ wɛm kuuŋke wase me fô lemme le, me nu eŋge nɛɛ? No me nu sɛ me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keenlem bô jiw, ɛ me mbvuu ŋ'wuumene keenlɛke ɛlɛkɛɛ.’
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ ŋkiɛɛ wase fiɛɛ fì me nu eŋge, wvu lɛ seke bó ɛ kuŋ me fô lemme le, ɛ́ me eŋkɛŋke nsán yì nulo efiisene me yéw yibole.’
Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum tee bonyii bò to kɛŋke fioo cee ɛkolɛ we mwaaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ wvu fwe to ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo laake cee ɛkolɛ wɛm nɛɛ?’
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bokolo bo mɛɛm e bo baay baay gbwee.’ Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ko ŋwa' wo fioo wvun eshii fokuse cekey, ekumɛn esaŋ lɛ mbaanshen.’
Ɛ wvú kase bife ɛ̂ wvumvu lɛ, ‘Wo laake yo nɛɛ?’ Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bikele bi ɛgiŋ e gbwee.’ Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ko ŋwa' wo fioo wvun ekumɛn saŋ lɛ bikele mbaŋnyaŋ.’
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ waa lemme wvun ke yɛn no wvú fiwse wvú nonɛn, kaa bɛnse lo wvú lɛ wvú nu ɛ feefɛn baay.” Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse lɛ, “Bonyii bo fokuse fɛn feefene yî mwɛɛm mvù bó gee le fele no bonyii bo n'yuu le feefene yî mvubole mvu n'yuu le.
Nonɛn, me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ejoò kpwaw wene wvu fokuse fɛn koole nsán dvú, wvu lɛ seke wvú ɛ ka, ɛ́ Nyo' efiisɛn ben ɛ̂ wvú yew fô ben nu ke enu sekecii.
Wee wvù nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e ntay, nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa tɛn fô fì kuuke le. Ɛ wee wvù fiike kenfiw yî fiɛɛ fi caan e, nulo efiw tɛn yî fì kuuke le.
Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô kpwaw wvu fokuse fɛn e, ɛ́ ke enya yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben kpwaw wvù kpwaw?
Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi wee mvu le ntay, ɛ́ ke enya yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben finɛn?
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ waa lemme elemte bocee ɛkolɛ le bofɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú lemte nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ebane wvumvu, kooŋke wvumvu, kɛnɛɛ eyuuke wvumvu le ntay, joo wvumvu ɛkuse. Kɛ ben nulo elemte Nyo' le bvuu lemte bigew e kɛ.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bofalasii yuw nɛ no buu lo wvú, njefo bó to kooŋke bigew baay.
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ben ban bò duŋci ye lɛ ben nu bonyii bò jee fwe dvu bonyii, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' kee mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e. Ben ekeè lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bɛnsee lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm, nu mvù Nyo' taale ɛ mvú bɛmte lo fô wvú le.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ bó fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonci bo Muses e bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saaŋke. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw no Jon to toɛ, nu ɛ bó fewci wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Wee tfuu ɛ mum ɛ no taaŋke keeley ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvudvu le.
Fí nu cekey fô ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ le keeka, ɛfey fo fijise fi ŋwa' le ela ɛcici ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le.
Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee kuŋ kpwɛse, ɛ jo wvumvu, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ kɛ diɛwɛ keejaŋ kpwoon mvu. Wee ɛ́ jo kpwoon wvù buy wase ɛ̂ wee yew, tu mwɛtɛn nu ɛ jo kpwɛɛ wee.”
Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu nɛ gay lɛ, “Wee kpwaw mvu to nu dvú, suute ye bô ndvú yì jee, diee ɛkolɛ kew ɛdiuw ɛcii.
Ɛ wee kefufe mvu nu tɛn dvú, ɛ diee nu Laasalus. Ɛ biŋkokɛn ɛ kooyɛ wvú ye yicii. Ɛ bó to gɛɛ ɛ wvú no shee jiime diuw fwese wee kpwaw wɛ le,
cɛyte lɛ laa wvú nu ke edioo ediekene ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshɛɛte ɛ wen boŋci diee lɛ. No wvú to jiime fó nonɛn, ɛ bwé bvuu mɛɛse too laci biŋkokɛn biew.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee kefufe wvudvu kpwe, ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le to tuu wvú gɛn gɛɛ bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e mbew Abla'am e. Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ ke kpwe tɛn ɛ bó dwey wvú.
Ɛ wvú gɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ boŋkfu le no nu fó yî ŋgɛw wvu baay e. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ laŋ jise, yɛn Abla'am e ncejole bô Laasalus mbew ye le.
Ɛ wvú tee lɛ, ‘Icɛm Abla'am, koo shen fô me le eciinse Laasalus ɛ́ wvú elese kpwan ɛbo kew ɛ̂ joo le eto lɛɛse leme diem dvú. Me nu lo yî monlum mo baay e ŋguy wvun e.’
Ɛ Abla'am tfuse fiew lɛ, ‘Waa wɛm, kume seke wo to bɛɛ cee yî nshɛ le. Wo to kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvù jee mvunciim sekekiɛ, ɛ Laasalus yɛne fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgɛw. Keseen nu ɛ Laasalus nu yî njoŋ e ɛ wo nu yî monlum e.
Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifin kɛ. Ɛ̀ keè tɛn lɛ kensɛɛn ke baay nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wvu lɛ fo ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enɛ fɛn edaŋsɛn eto fò wo nu kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee enɛ fò wo nu edaŋsɛn eto fɛn kɛ.’
Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ bvuu lɛkɛ lɛ, ‘Kee wo icɛm, ciinse kɛ Laasalus fô yew e fosɛse.
Me ŋkɛŋke boom bo bwɛɛm e botin, ɛ́ wvú egɛn etefe bó lɛ bó eyɛnè fo bó ke eto tɛn fô bvudvuu bvu ŋgɛw e bvun e kɛ.’
Ɛ Abla'am tfuse fiew lɛ, ‘Boom bo bwoo le bodvu kɛŋke boŋwa' bò Muses bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ, bó eyuukè mwɛɛm mvù bó gayte.’
Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ tun gay lɛ, ‘'Aay icɛm Abla'am, ɛ́ ɛ̀ be buy wee mvu yî kpwe le ɛ gɛn ɛ fewcɛ ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó sɛ yuw ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.’
Ɛ Abla'am tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ bó tun keeyuw fiɛɛ fì Muses bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le gayte, bó saa ke eyuw naa lo tɛn fì ɛ̀ gayte wee wvù buy yî kpwe le kɛ.’”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Kɛ mwɛɛm mvù teeyi bonyii ɛ bó gee bibefɛ nu ke eyuu enu sɛ mvú nu lo kɛ. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw nu dvú fô wee wvù teeyi bonyii lɛ bó egeè bibefɛ le.
Fí nu ke ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le lɛ bó eshɛŋke kebwee ke diene le ɛ̂ kendoŋ kew e, edomse wvú ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛfey fo wvú egeè ɛ boom ban gee bibefɛ.
Ben edioo nu no yɛnè. Ɛ́ waa bwoo ge fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ wo jeme ɛ̂ wvú. Wvú ɛ́ kumɛn, ɛ́ wo lɛɛshɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ́ wvú cim ge mwɛɛm mvù befe fô wo le bokaŋ bosooshwiy yî diuu le, ké ge kase kɛ to ku can lɛ wen nu ɛ jay, tu wo kɛŋke kɛ keefoose wvú.”
Ɛ boom bo Tata le bo ntum e ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Geɛ ɛ́ mbee wese etɛmyi ntay.”
Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben be kɛŋke mbee ɛ wvú nu kɛ naa diɛwɛ shem nsusu le, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egay ɛ̂ kete ke baay kin lɛ kí emvuw ye fɛn egɛn eleem ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛ́ kí emum eyuw lo ben e.
Ben ejo lɛ wee ŋgoo yene le kɛŋke waa we lemme, wvú ɛ she lemte wɛne, kɛnɛɛ wvú be taale ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô njée le, ɛ́ wvú ke dioo ɛ kfulɛ, ɛ́ wvú emum egay lɛ waa we lemme wvudvu egɛn lo ejo mwɛɛm mvudien mwew eshii ediee le?
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì wvú nulo egay nu kɛ lɛ wvú egɛn ekumɛn ndvú, eseyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvuwene eto dvú, emum ecɛyte, ɛ́ wen dioo ɛ diekɛn, ɛ wukɛn, ɛ́ wvú ebaancɛ mwɛɛm sɛ gɛn ediekɛn.
Waa lemme wvudvu ɛ́ ge mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, ɛ́ wvú ke eshe enyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wvú?
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no finɛn nu. Ben ke dioo ɛ ge lemme dì bó nya ɛ̂ ben dí ɛ ka, ɛ́ ben egay kɛ lɛ, ‘Bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse boom bo lemme le, ɛ bese ge kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme disɛse.’”
No Jisos to gɛne Jɛlusalɛm, no fele ɛ̂ kedwee ke woŋ wvù Samalia bô wvù Galilee le.
Ɛ wvú ke gɛn dioo eleyte ntɛw mvu le, ɛ bolemsɛ bomew yuufe bò to cɛmte bô ntun wvu baay yɛn wvú le ncejole,
mum tee bô diɛw yì tɛmyi lɛ, “Jisos cee bonyii, camɛ kɛ shen fô bese le.”
No Jisos yɛn bó le, gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn eduŋcɛ bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ bocee ncese.” No bó nɛ ɛ no gɛne mum bonɛn no yuule bɛɛ ɛ̂ je.
Ɛ wee mvu ɛnte jo bó yɛn lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase, mum kase no tuu jim fô Jisos e bensee Nyo' foweɛwe.
No wvú to, mum gbwe ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise bɛɛle wvú. Ɛ wee wvudvu to nu wee wvu Samalia.
Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Bonyii bee yuufe bò me mbe nfɛ bó ɛ no yuule, bo bvuukɛ ɛ fɛɛ?
Fí nu lɛ wee baa nu dvú wvù eyɛn lɛ wen ekase etu jim enya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛfey kɛ tolo wvun e?”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ja we egɛnè fiuw. Fitele fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn.”
Ɛ Bofalasii ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ laa bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ke ekɛw seke la lɛ. Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ nciise yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ seke Nyo' nu ke ekɛw esaake bvunfon bwew kɛ.
Kɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eduu lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Nyo' wvun ɛ wvú saake fɛn’, kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wvuwe ɛ wvú saake fofe’ kɛ. Ben eyekɛ eyuw, bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le.”
Ɛ wvú mum kase jeme wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Kefew too lo kè ben nu ke egomte keeyɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee le kɛ naa diuu dimwaaŋ, saa eyɛn kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le ɛ́ bonyii bomew eduu lɛ, ‘Ben etaa yɛn, wvuwe fofe’, kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Ben etaa yɛn, wvuwvun fɛn.’ Bó dioo jemyi nonɛn fo ben egɛnè keetaa kɛ.
Ben kee no jaŋ ké lawte we nɛn mwaww, ɛ ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna ɛcii yuu nɛn mwaŋŋ, ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii bocii nu ke eyɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee le diuu dì wvú kaase too.
Geenɛn, no wvú ke egɛn, sɛ kase eto, nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke keeyaw yɛn boŋgɛw nteen ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ema lo wvú.
Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to nu kefew ke Noa' le nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu kefew ke Wee wvù diee nu Waawee le.
Bonyii to nu diekene, wukene, ɛ bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ taashi bvujen, ɛ bonyii nyaa boom ɛ bolemsɛ taashi bvujen bô bó, gɛn buy diuu dì Noa' to leyɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e ɛ joo ke buy to lɛse bó bocii.
Fí nu ke enu tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to nu kefew ke Lot e. Bonyii to diekene, wukene, kamene way, lemte ŋɛɛ, bvuu bomte yéw.
Ɛ Lot ke dioo buy Sodom, ɛ Nyo' mum shike ŋguy we ɛ wvú no shiile bɛɛnci kɛ diɛwɛ mvuŋkaŋ e, shii mum lɛse bonyii bo Sodom bocii.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu diuu dì wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke esɛsɛ ebuynɛn e.
Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛbvubwɛ, fo wee wvù nu ɛ̂ yew we ɛ mwɛɛm mwew nu yew, ebvuu eshii eley yew lɛ wen ejo sɛ no lewte kɛ. Lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn, fo wee wvù nu wɛne ebvuu ekfuuyi lɛ wen egɛn ejo fiɛɛ kɛ.
Ben ekume fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ bô kpwɛɛ Lot.
Wee wvù gomte keebawci nshii we fo wvú elase nu ke elase kɛ lo. Ɛ wee wvù lase nshii we nu ɛ wvú bawcɛ lo nshii wvudvu.
Ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke enu ɛntaŋ jodvu, bonyii nu ke ejiime fontaw bofɛɛ, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.
Bokɛnɛ bofɛɛ nu ke egooke bvulɛm fodien, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.
[Bolemsɛ bofɛɛ nu ke enu wɛne, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.]”
Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, fiɛɛ fidvu nu ke ekooy ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e lɛ, “Fô keŋkpwe ke fiɛɛ le nu, nu kɛ fó fò boŋguluŋ nu etaashi.”
Ɛ Jisos mum ma ŋgan mvu keeyɛɛyi boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó kɛŋke keebunlee sekecii yaa doose kɛ.
Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Wee wvù saake bonsaw mvu to nu ɛ̂ kelaante kemew e, ɛ wvú yaa fane Nyo', yaa yɛne tɛn jise di wee le kɛ.
Ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu mvu nu tɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ́ wvú ké no gɛne sekecii kule can ɛ̂ wee wvù saake bonsaw wɛ lɛ wvú efi kɛ wen esumtɛn nsaw wen bô wee wen bvuban.
Ɛ wee wvudvu yaa leese gvune ɛntuŋtuŋ kɛ, ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wɛ mɛy kɛ no cine fó. Ɛ fí ke ghaw, ɛ wee wvudvu gay lɛ, ‘No me nu sɛ me nfane Nyo', sɛ me ncim n'yɛne jise di wee le,
geenɛn no kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvun too kɛ jewsee me nɛn, me nu en'yɛn lɛ me nu ɛ nsumtɛn nsaw we no wvú gomte, ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ke emɛy kɛ etoo jewsee me nɛn, ɛ́ wee ke enɛ ekpwe lo ɛ̂ wvú ɛbo.’”
No Tata ma nonɛn, mum gay lɛ, “Ben eyuw fiɛɛ fì wee keŋge ke ɛcici wvù saake bonsaw wvun to jemyɛɛ.
No wvú to ficɛɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wɛ nɛn, tu kɛ Nyo' nulo efi tɛn bew bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ caw bò beele fô wvú le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ e? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eguute lo ye?
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Nyo' nu ke esumtɛn nsaw wvubo naa cekey. Geenɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke edioo kaase too eyɛn ɛ bonyii nu dvú bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le fokuse fɛn nonɛn e?”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu nɛ ma wvumvu ŋgan ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò to yɛne bikuu bibole lɛ bowen nu bonyii bo teytey, mum nyɛnsee lo bomew bonyii.
Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Bonyii bomew bofɛɛ to nu ɛ ben gɛn yew ncese le keebunle. Wvumvu to nu wee Falasii, ɛ wvumvu nu wee wvù fii shile.
Ɛ bó gɛn ley, ɛ wee Falasii wɛ gɛn leem fiew wvú ɛmbeŋ bunle lɛ, ‘Nyo', me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo njefo kɛ me nu diɛwɛ bonyii bomew e kɛ. Kɛ me n'yɛɛle ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e kɛ. Kɛ me nfiike kenfiw kɛ. Kɛ me njaaŋke bokɛnɛ bo bonyii le kɛ, ɛ kɛ me nu naa kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù fii shile we le kɛ.
Me ŋké no mbamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛdiuw ɛfaa yî kemaa le. Me ŋké no nyaa keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ wo ɛnte jo biba yuufe bi mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù me ŋkɛŋke le.’
Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù to fii shile wɛ leem fiew ncejole, faŋɛ yaa cim taa we kɛ, so' ɛkolɛ, laŋ wɛm mum bunle lɛ, ‘O Nyo', me nu fiem wee wvù befe, camɛ kɛ shen fô me le.’”
No Jisos fɛ nɛn, mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee wvù to fii shile wɛ to buy no booke ɛ̂ wvú yew nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛfey wee Falasii wɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee tfuu wvù bensee ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke eshike lo wvú, ɛ wee tfuu wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebense lo wvú.”
Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ no too bô boom bo caan caan fô Jisos e lɛ wvú ekum bó le. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le yɛn nonɛn, no saake lo bó.
Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos tee boom bodvu lɛ bó etoò, mum jeme ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ boom bo caan caan etoo fô me le. Fo ben ejewsè bó kɛ, njefo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii diɛwɛ boban e.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee baa efiisɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ diɛwɛ wan wvu caan e, wvú saa ke eyuu eley bvunfon bvudvu le kɛ.”
Ɛ wee wvu baay mvu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo wvù wee wvù jee, fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo teŋe me lɛ wee wvù jee nje la? Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù jee kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Nyo' maaŋ wvù jee.
Geenɛn, keetu jim yî fiɛɛ fì wo be bife le, wo kee kɛ bonci bò duu lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo eben jim nsaw mbiay’, bô wvù lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ wvumtè ico bô bwoo’ le?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Bonci ban bocii nu ɛ me nto ŋkɛw wase no ŋgɛɛle naa ɛ me mbɛɛ cuwee.”
Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu fiɛɛ nu ɛ shɛɛ fimwaaŋ fì wo bɛɛ ege. Gɛnɛ egese mwɛɛm mwuw mvunciim, egaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute, ɛ́ wo ke emum ekɛŋke bvukukɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ Nyo' le. Ɛ́ wo dioo ɛ ge nonɛn, emum eto ebii me le.”
Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn, ɛ ye keeshɛ lo wvú, njefo wvú to kɛŋke kpwaw baay.
Ɛ Jisos taa wvú nɛn, gay lɛ, “Fí tɛmyi baay fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
Ɛ fí tɛmyi naa baay fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le fele no fí tɛmyi fô nyambala le keeley ɛ̂ jise di tase le.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to nu fó yuw nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ke eyuu eboy yɛɛ?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ fiɛɛ fì ghaake bonyii keege nulo eghaw Nyo' keege kɛ.”
Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bese nu ɛ cinɛ wase mwɛɛm mvusɛse le, ɛ no bii wo le.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ɛ cinɛ la diew e, kɛnɛɛ kpwese bô boom e, kɛnɛɛ boom bo bwee le, kɛnɛɛ ice bô bwee le nje bvunfon bvu Nyo' le,
wvù nu ke enu sɛ wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ bonyii bô mwɛɛm nteen yî nshii wvun e mvù fele mvù wvú cine le kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu kefew ke nshii wvù too le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ jo boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ɛ bô bó base ye. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyekɛ eyuw, beene bene wase Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ beene nu eben ebuy jó ɛ́ fiɛɛ ficii fì bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee eto ekocɛn.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ bó nu ke enya wvú can bitum e, ɛ́ bó ebuu wvú, nan'yi wvú, cuyte ncɛŋ yî ye le.
Bó nu ke etam wvú bô boŋgbwan, eyu wvú, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.”
Ɛ Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa cim kiɛɛ laa wvú jeme lɛ la lɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fimew to nu ɛ ge lɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos ke dioo feŋene kelaante kè Jɛliku, ɛ kenfefe kemew ɛ shii diuw je le lɛke mwɛɛm.
Ɛ wvú yuw no kebombom ke bonyii le kfune fele, mum bife lɛ laa ɛ̀ sɛ nu la lɛ.
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt ɛ wvú fele.
Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no wamte lɛ, “Jisos, Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ kɛ shen fô me le.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to saa fwe wam lɛ wvú ebaŋ lo. Geenɛn ɛ wvú bvuu mɛse wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô me le.”
Ɛ Jisos yuw, leem gay lɛ bó eto bô wvú. Ɛ bó to bô wvú, ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
“Wo gomte lɛ me eŋge la fô wo le?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Tata, geɛ ɛ́ me en'yɛne mwɛɛm e.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè lɛ mwɛɛm e. Fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase ɛjisɛ ɛyo ɛ yene.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum kase kɛw no yɛne mwɛɛm e. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no bii Jisos e tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu fó yɛn, nya mbense ɛ̂ Nyo'.
Ɛ Jisos gɛn ley ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛliku le, no fele.
Ɛ wee mvu to nu jó ɛ diee nu lɛ Sakio, ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bò to fii shile, nu tɛn cee kpwaw.
Ɛ wvú no gomte keeyɛn Jisos e no wvú to fele. Geenɛn, ɛ fí ghaw njefo wvú to kfufene lo, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le baŋyi wvú.
Ɛ wvú mum lewtɛ gɛn fwe, gɛn ben yî kete kemew e lɛ Jisos ke edioo efele ɛ́ wen eyɛn wvú le.
Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn buy fó, laŋ jise yɛn wvú le fowe, tee lɛ, “Sakio, shiilɛ cekey eto, njefo me ŋkɛŋke keence ɛ̂ wo yew ɛbɛn.”
Ɛ wvú mum son shii yî kete kiɛ le, fiisɛn Jisos bô nlaŋlaŋ.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yɛnɛɛ no Jisos to gɛne bô wvú mum kɛw no wvukene gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun gɛne wase keegɛn ce bô wee wvù befe.”
Ɛ bó gɛn dioo nu, ɛ Sakio ke nɛ leem we gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, taa eyɛn, me nu eŋgaw mwɛɛm mwem ɛntelɛŋ enya ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋke nu ɛ nfiw wase wee, ɛ́ me eŋkase entfuse bokaŋ bonɛw ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu ɛ bonyii bo yew fɛn ɛ boy wase, no cee la wvun nu tɛn waa Abla'am.
Wee wvù diee nu Waawee to to keegom bonyii bò nu ɛ lakɛn wase, eboyse bó.”
No bonyii to yeke no Jisos jemyi mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ wvú ke nɛ ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó, njefo ɛ̀ to shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ wvú eley Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii kpwaake lɛ sekemew lɛ ɛ̀ shɛke wase caan ɛ́ Nyo' ekɛw esaake bvunfon bwew.
Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ waa nfon mvu nɛ woŋ wvubole no gɛne woŋ wvumew e ncejole lɛ bó egɛn eghaa wvú nfon e, ɛ́ wvú sɛ kase eto esaake bvunfon bwew.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo nɛn'yi, tee boom bew bo lemme le yuufe, gaw bigew ɛ̂ bó ɛkɛlɛ ɛkɛlɛ, gay lɛ, ‘Ben eko eshɛɛ egeè way dvú fô me ntoo.’
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ, ɛ bonyii bo woŋ we le to bane wvú baay. Ɛ bó mum shɛɛ tum bonyii ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim lɛ bó egɛn egay lɛ kɛ bowen kooŋke wee wvudvu lɛ wvú enu nfon bowen kɛ.
Ɛ bó ke gɛn kɛ ghaa wvú. Ɛ wvú ke tu jim, tee boom bew bo lemme le ba bò wvú to gawɛɛ bigew ɛ̂ bó lɛ wen eyɛn laa bó se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ ge way ɛ die sɛw ɛ.
Ɛ wvu fwe to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kè wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nu ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ndie sɛw jó bikele yuufe.’
Ɛ wvú yuw njoŋ, bɛɛle wvú gay lɛ, ‘Wo nu waa lemme wvù jee. No wo se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ kiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e ntay, me nu eŋgɛɛ wo ɛ́ wo esaakè bontɛw yuufe.’
Ɛ wvumvu tɛn to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kè wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nu ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ndie sɛw jó bikele bitin.’
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋgɛɛ wo ɛ́ wo esaakè bontɛw botin.’
Ɛ wvumvu waa lemme to gay fiew lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kin fɛn ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ŋkule ɛ̂ njaw ndvu le ɛ ŋgɛɛ.
Me nse ŋgɛke njefo wo tɛmyi ɛjim, ɛ me nfane wo. Wo ké nu sɛ wo nu ɛ gɛɛ ŋkuuŋ, mum to no joo lo. Ɛ́ ké dioo nu sɛ wo nu ɛ jewe fiɛɛ, mum to no gbweci lo.’
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo nu wan wvù befe. Njeme wvù buy diuw wo le nu wvù me nu enjo ensaw wo dvú. Wo se kee lɛ me ntɛmyi ɛjim, ɛ́ me ndioo nu sɛ me ɛ ŋgɛɛ fiɛɛ ŋkuuŋ, mum nto no joo lo, ŋké ndioo nu sɛ me nu ɛ njewe fiɛɛ mum nto no ŋgbweci lo.
Wo se kee nonɛn, ɛ se ɛ ge la fo wo ejo bigew biem egɛn egɛɛ ntfu, wvu lɛ seke me ɛ ŋkase enfi bô sɛw?’
Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leeme mbew ye le lɛ, ‘Ben efi ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kedvu ɛ̂ wvú, enya ɛ̂ wvù kɛŋke bikele bi bigew e yuufe.’
Ɛ bó kacɛ lo, gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, wvú kɛŋke wase bikele bi bigew e yuufe.’
Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù baa kɛŋke, nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.
Yî keseen e, bonyii ba bò se bane me, tune lɛ fo me enu nfon wvubo kɛ, ben egɛn eto bô bó eyuwyɛ ɛ̂ me ɛjise.’”
Ɛjim jodvu no Jisos to jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun, mum nɛ no saa fwe bene gɛne Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo feŋene ntɛw wvù Bɛtfaj bô wvù Bɛtani bò nu mbew Kum Bite bi Olif e, mum baa boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew bofɛɛ tum,
gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn ntɛw wvu fwe we le. Ben nu ke edioo eleyte jó, eyɛn waa kembɛɛbey e ɛ bó ɛ suu ɛ wee ke baa ben wase yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ́ ben efay eto dvú fɛn.
Ɛ́ ben gɛn ɛ no fayte, wee ɛ no biite lɛ laa ben fayte nje la lɛ, ɛ́ ben tfuse lɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shiee wvudvu.”
Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le ba gɛn yɛn fiɛɛ ficii le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to jemyɛɛ.
Ɛ bó ke dioo fayte waa kembɛɛbey wvudvu, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke bife lɛ, “Ben fayte waa kembɛɛbey wɛ nje la?”
Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shee wvudvu.”
Ɛ bó mum jo to dvú fô Jisos e, yɛy bikum bibole yî kembɛɛbey kedvu le, mum bense Jisos yî dvú le.
Ɛ wvú no gɛne, ɛ bonyii yɛyte bikum bibole ɛ̂ je, ɛ wvú fele yî dvú le.
Ɛ wvú ke gɛn lɛ wen efeŋene fò je booke yî Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le sɛsɛ no wvuuyi bensee Nyo' foweɛwe nje biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bicii bì bó to yɛnɛɛ.
Ɛ bó no wvuuyi gayte lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî Nfon wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le. Nyɛkeey nu fowe, ɛ bvukukɛ nu bvu Nyo' wvu fowe le.”
Ɛ Bofalasii bomew bò to nu ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, kanɛ bonyii buw bo ŋgoo le ban lɛ bó ebaŋ lo.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ bó ecim ebaŋ lo, naa ɛ́ ɛta ɛyan ewvuuyi.”
Ɛ Jisos ke dioo buy mbew Jɛlusalɛm e, taa jo nɛn, kɛse bô kpwe,
no taaŋke lɛ, “O Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ́ ben ban be kee kɛ naa fiɛɛ fì nulo eto bô nyɛkeey fô ben e yî diuu di ɛbɛn e. Geenɛn keseen sɛ ben kee lo ŋkuuŋ.
Nonɛn, ben ekeè lɛ kefew too lo kè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e nu ke eto ebom ketaaŋ egem ben dvú ekɛɛkɛɛ, ebaŋ ben ɛnte.
Bó nu ke eley efiwsɛ lo ben naa noo boom bonɛn, ebvuw yéw yene, ɛ́ tɛ saa eshɛɛ yî dimew e kɛ. Ɛ fí nu ke ekooy nonɛn njefo ben to baa kiɛɛ kefew kè Nyo' to toɛ ɛ̂ ben e kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn fô yew ncese le, no kuuŋke bonyii bò to geese mwɛɛm fó
gayte ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bo ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yew yɛm nu ke enu yew bunle.’ Geenɛn ben ɛ baŋke ɛ tu ‘Tfum bocooŋ.’”
Ɛ Jisos no shee yɛɛyi bonyii fô yew ncese le ɛdiuw ɛcii. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo bonyii bo baay baay bo jó no wɛɛntene keeyu wvú.
Geenɛn faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ je kɛ, njefo bonyii bocii to shee kɛ lo mbew Jisos e yaa gomte keesoy lo fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ fô mwɛɛm mvù wvú to yɛɛyi le kɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ Jisos no yɛɛyi bonyii, bvuu fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bó fô yew ncese le. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo bonyii bò saake woŋ to,
bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese wee wvù nya mvuŋgay lɛ wo egee mwɛɛm mvun? Ɛ̀ nya yɛɛ mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Me tɛn nu embife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben. Ben esee ɛ̂ me keseen.
Mvuŋgay mvù Jon to leese bonyii dvú ɛ̂ joo to nya Nyo' nuu wee wvu wum ɛ?”
Ɛ bó mum koo ntfum ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya Nyo', ɛ́ wvú ebife ɛ̂ beene lɛ laa ɛ ɛ̀ ge la fo beene ebee Jon e lɛ?
Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya wee wvu wum, ɛ́ bonyii etumyɛ beene bô ɛta, njefo bó nu ɛ bee cɛɛy cɛɛy lɛ Jon to nu wee ntum Nyo'.”
Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ bese kee wee wvù to nyaɛ kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Tu kɛ me nu ensee tɛn ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgee mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ kɛw no maa ŋgan ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ lem wɛɛ mvuntam mvù bó keenci mbvuum dvú. Ke tɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bonyii, mum nɛ gɛn ketum kemew e, gɛn ce jó baay.
Ɛ kefew kè bó ké no kooyte ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum waa we lemme lɛ wvú egɛn efi mvuwene mvuntam. Ɛ wvú gɛn, ɛ bonyii bò wvú to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó, kaa suŋ lo wvú kuŋ ɛ wvú tu jim cancan.
Ɛ wee wvudvu bvuu tum wvumvu waa lemme, ɛ bó bvuu suŋ wvuwɛ, shoose wvú, kuŋ ɛ wvú tu jim cancan.
Ɛ wvú bvuu tum wvumvu lɛ botɛte, ɛ bó lɛmse wvú, tfume ɛkfuŋ.
Ɛ wee wvudvu kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋge nɛɛ? Me nu ntum wase keseen ɛ ɛ̀ nu waa wɛm wvù nu fitele fiem. Sekemew ɛ́ bó egɛn ewvum wvú.’
Ɛ wan wɛ gɛn ley wɛne, ɛ bonyii ba bò bó to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó yɛn wvú le, tfumtfum ɛbonɛbon lɛ, ‘Wvun nu ndiela wee wɛɛ wvun. Beene eyu wvú emum eyow wɛɛ wvun.’
Ɛ bó mum koo wvú, bvuse wɛne, yu.” No Jisos fɛ nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ wee wɛɛ wvudvu nu ke eto ege nɛɛ bô bonyii ba?
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wvú nu ke eto elɛse lo bonyii bodvu, etɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ bonyii bomew.” No bonyii yuw nonɛn, kacɛ lo lɛ, “Nyo' elɛwsè.”
Ɛ Jisos taa bó nɛn, bife lɛ, “Tu fiɛɛ fin fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le jemyi lɛ la, fì nu lɛ, ‘Tɛ didvu diɛ dì bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ, to nu ɛ kase nɛ tu tɛ di buu di yew e?’
Ɛ tɛ didvu din nu, ɛ́ wee gbwe yî dvú le ecaafiɛ lo, ɛ́ dí gbwe yî wee le, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn efooncɛ lo.”
No Jisos ma ŋgan wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bô bocee ncese bo baay baay mum no gomte lɛ bó ekoo wvú kɛ fó. Bó to gomte keekoo wvú njefo bó to nu ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ wvú ma ŋgan wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bó, geenɛn fan bonyii.
Ɛ bó mum no bii bikaa biew e, kew bonyii, tum ɛ bó gɛn no keele wvú buwse lɛ bó nu bonyii bò jee. Ɛ bó to gee nonɛn keeyuw fiɛɛ diuw we le emum ekoo wvú enya can wee wvu Lum wvù saake keba kekiɛ le.
Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese kee lɛ mwɛɛm mvù wo jemyi noo mvù wo yɛɛyi nu mvu lɛŋ, ɛ kɛ wo taale jise di wee le kɛ. Wo ké no yɛɛyi kecɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte lɛ bonyii egeè.
Bese ɛ mum ɛ no biite lɛ laa nci nu ɛ bee lɛ beene elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa Nfon wvu Lum ɛ?”
Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó wɛɛntene bô fí gay lɛ,
“Ben kɛ eto bô danali mwaaŋ ɛ́ me en'yɛn.” Ɛ bó to dvú ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Ɛkolɛ kin kè nu yî dvú le nu ke yɛɛ le, ɛ diee din nu di yɛɛ le?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ke Kaysa le, ɛ diee nu kɛ tɛn diew.”
Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ, “Ben emum enyaà lɛ ɛ̂ Kaysa fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Kaysa le, enyaà ɛ̂ Nyo' fì ɛ̀ nu fi Nyo' le.”
Ɛ bonyii ba yuw ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó mɛy diuw tfu faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ekoo wvú yî dvú le ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvù wvú to jemyi le kɛ.
Ɛ bonyii bomew ŋgoo Bosadusii le ke nɛ to keebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Jisos. Bosadusii ban to nu bonyii bò to duu lɛ kɛ bonyii nu ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
Ɛ bó to bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, Muses to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ nci wesebeene le lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke kpwoon ɛ ke ɛ kpwe sɛ bô wvú nu ɛ boo wan, tu waa bwee kɛŋke keegɛɛ kpwoon wvudvu ɛ́ bô wvú eboo boom ɛ̂ diee di ŋkfu waa bwee le.’
Keseen, boom bo wee mvu le to nu bosooshwiy, ɛ wvu ŋgaywee ke kɛŋkɛ kpwoon, ke kpwe sɛ bô wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ wan.
Ɛ ɛjimɛ kew gɛɛ kpwoon wvudvu, ke kpwe tɛn sɛ wan.
Ɛ ɛjimɛ ke wvuwɛ le bvuu gɛɛ tɛn kpwoon wvudvu, ke kpwe tɛn sɛ wan. Ɛ fí ke kooy kɛ nonɛn bô boom bo bosooshwiy bodvu bocii, ɛ mvu bó le faŋɛ yaa boo wan bô kpwoon wvudvu kɛ.
Ɛjim jodvu ɛ kpwoon wvudvu kpwe tɛn.
No bonyii bo bosooshwiy bodvu to nu ɛ jo kpwoon wvudvu bocii, ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bonyii kaase buyte yî kpwe le, ɛ́ wvú enu kpwɛɛ yɛɛ?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Yî woŋ wvu keseen e nu ɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ taashi bvujen.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kocɛn keeke ekɛŋke bvudvuu yî woŋ wvù too le seke bó ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le yaa nu ke etaashi bvujen kɛ, ɛ bonyii yaa bɛɛ ke enyaa boom ɛ bó taashi bvujen kɛ.
Kɛ bó bɛɛ ke ebvuu ekpwekɛn kɛ, njefo bó nu ke enu wase kɛ diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le. Bó nu ke enu wase boom bo Nyo' le, njefo bó nu ɛ kase wase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.
Kecɛɛy kedvu nu lɛ Muses kebɛɛ to nu ɛ yuuse lɛ bonyii nu ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le no wvú to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ kete kè wvú to yɛnɛɛ ɛ kí bɛɛnci. Wvú teŋe Tata ɛ̂ bvudvuu bvu ŋwa' le bvudvu lɛ wvú nu Nyo' Abla'am, nu Nyo' Aysik bvuu nu Nyo' Yakow.
Ɛ́ wvú teŋe nonɛn, tu boŋkfu ban nu bonyii ɛ bó nu dvú, kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' boŋkfu kɛ, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' bonyii bò nu dvú, njefo fô Nyo' le nu ɛ bonyii bocii nu boyuum.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bɛnse wvú gay lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ tfuse lɛŋ.”
Kɛ nonɛn, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa ebvuu emom lo ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ bife fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gayte lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu waa Nfon Dawe?
Kɛ ben kee lɛ Dawe kebɛɛ to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ Ŋwa' Mbense le lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ wvú eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e,
egɛn ebuy seke wen ke ejike bonyii bew bo bvuban e ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa biew yî bó le diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biew e.’
Ɛ́ Dawe teŋe wvú lɛ Tata wen, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu waa we?”
Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ bonyii bocii yuuke. Wvú to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Ben eyɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Bó kooŋke keetfumyi bikum bì dewkene kale dvú, kooŋke lɛ bó egayte bó le ɛ̂ way bô n'wvum. Ɛ bó bvuu kooŋke keeshiile yî bintaw bi fwe le yéw bunle le. Ɛ́ bó ké egɛn fô ŋkaw e, no kooŋke kɛ keeshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe.
Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ bó bò shiwse bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le, lɛɛle bó fii mwɛɛm mvubole, mum gee dibunle dì dewkene keeduŋci ye. Bonyii bodvu ban nu ɛ wvubo ŋgɛw nu ke efo lo.”
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ laŋ jise, yɛn no bonyii bo kpwaw e gɛɛle nnya yibo ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fi nnya le fô yew ncese le.
Ɛ wvú yɛn tɛn kpwɛɛ ŋkfu mvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee kefufe, ɛ wvú ɛ to ɛ gɛɛ mvunyinyi mvunfɛɛm ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fidvu le.
Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvun wvù nu naa wee kefufe nɛn, nu ɛ nya ɛ fey bonyii bocii bò be nyaa.
Bonyii bocii bò be nyaa, be too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô tfúw kpwaw wvubo wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn wase ɛ no fuci kuse. Geenɛn ɛ kpwoon wvun no wvú nu kefufe kefufe nɛn nu ɛ wvú ɛ nya naa fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú bee keecee yî dvú le.”
Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bomew ke nɛ no kumte ɛtalɛ ɛkumɛ yew ncese, bɛnsee ɛta yò jee yò bó to bomɛɛ dvú bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii to nyaa ɛ bó seyse dvú. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Ben yɛne mwɛɛm mvun e? Diuu too lo dì kɛ tɛ dimwaaŋ nu ke eshɛɛ yî dimew e sɛ bó ɛ base fokuse kɛ.”
Ɛ bó bife lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, fifin fiɛɛ nu ke ekooy seke la? Ɛ nciise wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ lɛ fí nu wase keekooy nu la?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke elɛɛ ben ɛ́ ben ejay je. Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nu ke etoo nteen, joo diee diem tɛɛke fojise, ɛ wee duu lɛ, ɛ̀ nu wen wvù Mboyse, ɛ kefew too wase ncee. Bó dioo duu nonɛn, fo ben eyekè kɛ.
Seke ben ɛ yuw ɛ bó tumte jem mondvuum e mondvuum e, ɛ boŋgɛw nu woŋ e, fo ben efanè kɛ. Mwɛɛm mvun kɛŋke kɛ keeyaw ekooy. Geenɛn, ɛ mvú yaa mum duŋci lɛ woŋ nu eka sekedvu kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ketum nu ke etumte jem bô kemew, ɛ nfon mvu tumte jem bô wvumvu.
Biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e nu ke ekooyi mondvuum e mondvuum e. Nshɛ nu ke eshiike bô mvuŋgay. Jeŋ nu ke ekoole, ɛ bincɛm nu ke enu mondvuum e monciim. Bonciise bò bɛmte nu ke eduŋci ye yî ɛbulɛ le nyaa nfan ɛ̂ bonyii.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvudvu sɛ keeke ekooyi nu ɛ bó nu ke ekooyɛ ben, enyɛwle dvú. Bó nu ke egɛn bô ben, esaw yéw bunle le, eciinse ben yéw ncaw e. Ɛ bó nu ke ebvuu ejo ben egɛn dvú fwe dvu bonfon bô bonyii bò saake woŋ nje diee diem,
ɛ́ sekekiɛ emum enu kefew fô ben e keejeme ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ me.
Seke bó ɛ jo ben nonɛn, ɛ ben lese lo lɛ kɛ ben nu ebuuke lɛ laa ben nu egɛn etaŋe diuw lɛ la lɛ,
njefo ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ke enya njeme diuw wene le, noo bvufee ɛ̂ ben. Kɛ bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e yaa nu ke eleem, ekicɛn ben kɛ.
Bonyii bò nu ke egese ben nu ke enu kɛ bo'icee bonɛn bô bo bwee bonɛn, noo boom bo bwee wene le, noo kfuu dinɛn bô nsáa yene. Ɛ̀ nu ke enya kɛ bó ben ɛ́ bó sɛ yuwyɛ ben bomew.
Bonyii bocii nu ke ebane ben, nje diee diem.
Geenɛn, naa kɛ yvuw yimiaaŋ nu ke ela ɛ̂ ben ɛfa kɛ.
Ben ekuu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém, ɛ́ ben ke emum ekɛŋke nshii.
Seke ben ɛ yɛn ɛ bonyii bo jem e ɛ gem wase kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm ɛ tase, ɛ ben mum no kee lɛ kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè bó nu ke efiwsɛ kí.
Fí ke dioo ɛ kooy nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò nu Judea mum fɛɛ ben yî dikum e, ɛ bò nu ɛlaante jodvu buy. Fo wee wvù nu ŋkpwaante ebvuu etoò keeley jó kɛ.
Ɛdiuw yoya nu yò Nyo' nu ke elaŋ ŋgɛw yî Jɛlusalɛm e nje gee dibole, keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le.
Ŋgɛw wvu baay ɛdiuw yoya le nu ke enu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bô difue, noo bò yamsee boom e. Nyo' nu ke eton'yɛ shém bô bonyii ban, elaŋ ŋgɛw wvu baay yî woŋ wvun e.
Bó nu ke egbwocɛ lo bonyii bomew, ekooyɛ bomew egawcɛ ɛ́ bó egɛn enu bonfaw bitum e. Bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' nu ke eben lo yî Jɛlusalɛm e, egɛn ebuy no kefew kebole nu ke ekocɛn.
Bonciise bò bɛmte nu ke eduŋci ye yî diuu le bô yî kpwee le noo yî jón e. Fí yî nshɛ le nu ɛ bitum nu ke enu yî monlum e, ŋgɛmtene no joo yi baay nu ke ekfune yole.
Nfan nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii egule, ciiŋke nɛn kikikiki. Bó nu ke ekpwaake mwɛɛm mvù bɛmte mvù nu ke ekooy yî nshɛ le, njefo mwɛɛm mvu fowe mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay nu ke eshiike.
Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii emum eyɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee shiile too ɛ̂ kembɛw e kɛŋke mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvu baay.
Seke mwɛɛm mvun ɛ kɛw ɛ no kooyi, ɛ ben leem we, cake bikuu we, njefo kefew kè Nyo' nu eboyse ben nu wase nceencee.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, mum fewsɛn lɛ, “Ben eyɛɛyi fiɛɛ yî keŋgvum bô bite bimew bì ké yɛlɛ le.
Bí ké kɛɛke keecomte, ɛ ben mum kiɛɛ lɛ ɛkfuŋ kumene wase.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben nu ke edioo ɛ yɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvun kooyi, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu ke eka sɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ jo bvudvuu kɛ.
Ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ nu ke eka, geenɛn kɛ diɛw yɛm nu ke eyuu eshiw kɛ.
Ben eyɛnè fo ben eghanè diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu binɛn, wukene jewte, leese bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshii wvu fokuse fɛn e, ɛ́ diuu didvu ke enɛ esɛsɛ ekoo ben kɛ diɛwɛ ketam e.
Fiɛɛ fi yî diuu didvu din e nu ke eto yî bonyii bocii bò nu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le.
Ben emum eleemè tɛmyi, ebunleè Nyo' sekecii, wvu lɛ mvumvun mwɛɛm ke edioo ekooyi, ɛ́ wvú enya ben bô je yì ben elɛw efey jó sɛ leem fwe dvu wee wvù diee nu Waawee.”
Ɛ Jisos mum no shee yɛɛyi bonyii yew ncese le ɛdiuw yoya le ɛcii. Ɛ́ ké dioo nu fokiɛguu, ɛ wvú ben gɛn ce yî Kum Bite bi Olif e.
Ɛ́ bonyii bocii ké buy saa bvutfuu mum gɛn fô yew ncese le no yuuke n'yɛɛyi we.
Ɛ kefew ke Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó, wvù bó teŋe lɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ke no too wase nceencee.
Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, no gomte je yì bó eyu Jisos jó ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le, njefo bó to fane bonyii.
Ɛ Satan ley ɛ̂ fitele fi Judas wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Iskaliot e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ.
Ɛ wvú mum gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay e bô bikuu bi nci le bì to cɛyte yew ncese. Ɛ bô bó mum seyse no wvú nu ke eghan sɛ gese Jisos ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ bó yuw njoŋ mum kaw keelaw wvú bô bigew.
Ɛ wvú bee, mum gɛn kɛw no gomte je yì wvú nu enya Jisos jó can yibole ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le seke bonyii yaa nu kɛ.
Ɛ diuu di Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó dì bó ké no sɛɛle waa keyaw wvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e ke to kocɛn,
ɛ Jisos mum tum Bita bô Jon gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn eseyse mwɛɛm mvù beene nu ke edie Ŋkaw wvun dvú.”
Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eseyse ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyuw, seke ben leyte gɛne ɛlaante, ben nu ke eyɛn wee le ɛ wvú ɛ tuu joo ɛ̂ nshaan e, ɛ́ ben ebi wvú le yew dvù wvú nu egɛn eley e.
Ben dioo ɛ bi, gay ɛ̂ cee yew wvudvu lɛ Wee N'yɛɛyi biite lɛ laa kebuw ke bonyii bo ghane le kè bô boom bowene bo ŋgoo le nu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey dvú nu fɛɛ lɛ?
Wvú nu ke emum eduŋcɛ kebuw ke baay yew yi ɛwe le ɛ bó ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ seyse, ɛ́ ben emum eseyse mwɛɛm mvudien dvú.”
Nonɛn, ɛ bó ke gɛn yɛn mwɛɛm e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Jisos to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ bó mum seyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e dvú.
Ɛ kefew ke to kocɛn, ɛ Jisos to ɛ bô boom bew bo ntum e shii no diekene.
Ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nse ŋkooŋke naa baay keendie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun beene nsɛ n'yɛn ŋgɛw wvù too le.
Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke endie Ŋkaw wvun kɛ eŋgɛn ebuy no fí nu ke ekocɛn seke Nyo' nu ke esaake bvunfon bwew.”
Ɛ wvú jo fiko, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' gay lɛ, “Ben eko ewu ben bocii ekɛnɛn.
Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ kɛw keseen ɛ gɛn lo, nu ɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋ'wu mbvuum mo tweŋ kete kè lane le man kɛ, egɛn ebuy seke bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ke eto.”
Ɛ wvú jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ nya ɛ̂ bó gay lɛ, “Fin nu ye yɛm ɛ me ɛ nya nje ben. Ben egeè fifin keekumyi me.”
Kɛ lɛŋ nonɛn no bó mɛsɛɛ mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ wvú jo fiko jeme lɛ, “Fiko fin nu fi moŋkan mo monfɛm mò Nyo' gbwo bô ɛlɛmɛ kem kí ɛ buy nje ben.
Geenɛn, ben eyekɛ eyuw wee wvù nu egese me diekene fɛn bee wvú.
Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke egɛn kɛ no Nyo' to seysɛɛ. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô wee wvù gese wvú le.”
Ɛ bó mum kɛw no biite ɛ̂ bikuu bibole lɛ laa wee wvù nulo ege nonɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
Ɛ bó ke nɛ kɛw mbew ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa bó sɛ nu nɛn ɛ wee wvu baay ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ?
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonfon bo fokuse fɛn kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo bonyii bobole, ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ gayte lɛ bó eteŋè bowen lɛ bibaw bi bonyii le.
Geenɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn bô ben kɛ. Wee wvu baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ ejoò lɛ wen nu wan wvu caan, ɛ wee wvù nu ɛkolɛ nu diɛwɛ wee wvù lemte fô ben bocii le.
Wee wvu baay nu wvù la, wee wvù yeeme diekene lo, nuu wee wvù dɛɛle lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù yeeme diekene lo le? Geenɛn ɛ me nu ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ diɛwɛ wee wvù lemte fô ben e.
No me nshee n'yɛne boŋgɛw sekecii, ɛ̀ nu kɛ ben ban bò ké no nu beene.
Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Icɛm nu ɛ nya me bô bvunfon lɛ me ensaake, nu ɛ me ɛ nya tɛn mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben keesaake.
Me nya wvu lɛ beene ke ediekene, wukene bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ ɛ̂ ntow wɛm e, ɛ́ ben eshii yî bokawla le, esaake dikfuu di Islael dì yuufe ncow difɛɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos mum ja tee Bita lɛ, “Semon, Semon ɛ̀ keè lɛ Satan nu ɛ fi mvuŋgay keecɛkɛn ben bocii ebvuse bomew kɛ diɛwɛ no wee ké fɛɛtɛn ɛgiŋ bvuse nyiim.
Geenɛn me nu ɛ mbunle fô wo le, lɛ fo fitele fiuw emum ebuy lo yî yɛm e kɛ. Seke wo ɛ kase ɛ tee bvufee bvuw jim, ɛ wo nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ boom bo bwoo le.”
Ɛ Bita gay lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu keegɛn ncaw kɛnɛɛ keekpwe lo, tu me nu kɛ bee wo.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bita, yuw ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo, nyimshie nu ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ ɛbɛn, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase bokaŋ botɛte lɛ kɛ wo kee me kɛ.”
Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kumyi seke me nto ntumɛɛ ben sɛ bigew, sɛ bikele noo sɛ bolaba, no ben to ghane, ben to nu ɛ tan fiɛɛ le?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “'Aay, bese to baa tan fiɛɛ kɛ.”
Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Yî keseen e, ɛ́ wee kɛŋke bigew, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, ɛ́ wvú jo. Ɛ́ wee baa kɛŋke nyo jem, ɛ́ wvú gese kekum kew guy nyo.
Me njemyi fin njefo fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, ‘Bó to nu ɛ taŋ wvú bô bonyii bò befe’, kɛŋke keekooy bô me keseen. Ben ekeè lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ me nu ɛ mvú too wase keekocɛn mvunciim.”
Ɛ bó mum sɛsɛ lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese kɛŋke nyó jem yifiɛɛ.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben elu dvú nonɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buy ɛlaante bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, mum kɛw no bene Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no wvú to ké no gee.
Ɛ bó ke ben buy fô bó to gɛne, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e, eghaw ben.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bencɛ gɛn buy kɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee etfume tɛ ɛ́ dí egɛn ebuy, mum tum ɛnvuw fokuse bunle lɛ,
“Icɛm, ɛ́ fí fɛn nu ɛ kpwɛn wo le, ɛ́ wo cake fiko fi ŋgɛw e fin fo me eŋ'wu. Geenɛn geɛ kɛ no wo kooŋke, fo wo ege no me ŋkooŋke kɛ.” [
No wvú bunle nonɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' shii we to fô wvú le, nya wvú bô mvuŋgay.
Ɛ Jisos nu, ɛ fitele fiew buuke baay. Ɛ wvú bvuu bunle lo shiee le jimtene, ɛ njimtɛn cemceme fokuse kɛ diɛwɛ bitewtew bi ɛlɛmɛ le.]
Ɛ wvú bunle mɛse, tu jim fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, yɛn ɛ yii ɛ ge wase bó ɛ dose ɛ no leete.
Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kaa leete lo le? Ben eja we ebunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e, eghaw ben.”
Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii buynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ kaa nu Judas wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ wvù to saa fwe wvudvu. Ɛ wvú gɛn mbew Jisos e keeŋocɛ wvú.
Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ Judas lɛ, “Wo fɛn gomte keeŋocɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nɛn keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó ekoo le?”
Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bò to nu mbew ye le yɛn fiɛɛ fì to nu keekooy e, bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese egbwocɛ bonyii ban e?”
Ɛ wee mvu bó le dioo gbwoo, mum cun kentuŋtuŋ ke ɛcɛɛy ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le.
Ɛ Jisos kan lɛ, “Fo wee ebvuu emom kɛ,” mum kum kentuŋtuŋ ke wee wvudvu le ɛ kí mum kase tu fó.
Bonyii bò to toɛ keekoo Jisos to nu bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bikuu bi nci le bì to cɛyte yew ncese noo bonyii bò saake woŋ. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben to keekoo me ɛ no too bô nyó noo bibuse kɛ diɛwɛ ben to keekoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu cooŋ e?
Me nse nu beene no diuu nu fô yew ncese le sɛ ben ekum me le nje la? Geenɛn, keseen nu kefew ke mvuŋgay mvu ɛjiwɛ le kè Satan ké no saake, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege fiɛɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum koo Jisos no gɛne bô wvú fô la di ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, ɛ Bita bii ɛjim ntamndwee.
Ɛ bó gɛn fwɛɛ ŋguy fontelɛŋ fo lakfulɛɛŋ shii no yosene. Ɛ Bita mum to shii bô bó.
No ŋguy to bɛɛnci, ɛ wan kpwoon mvu wvù to lemte fô la didvu le ja yɛn Bita le ɛ wvú ɛ shii. Ɛ wvú taa wvú fojise ntay gay lɛ, “Wee wvun bee bô wee wvudvu.”
Ɛ Bita mum kacɛ lo gay lɛ, “Kpwoon wvun, kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee wee wvun kɛ.”
Ɛ kefew dioo bencɛ caan, ɛ wee mvu bvuu yɛn wvú le, bvuu gay lɛ, “Wo tɛn nu mvu ŋgoo yibole.” Geenɛn ɛ Bita gay lɛ, “Diemsɛn, kɛ me nu mvu bó le kɛ.”
Ɛ kefew bvuu gɛn buy kɛ diɛwɛ ntam kefew mwaaŋ e, ɛ wee mvu bvuu taam lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy wee wvun bee bô wee wvudvu, njefo wvú nu tɛn wee wvu Galilee.”
Ɛ Bita bvuu tun gay lɛ, “Diemsɛn wvun, kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi kɛ.” Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
Ɛ Tata baŋke ye ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛye tasɛn bô yo Bita. Ɛ Bita kume njeme wvù Jisos be jeme lɛ, “Nyimshie ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ ɛbɛn, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.”
Ɛ wvú nɛ fó buy ɛkfuŋ, bee kpwe baay.
Ɛ bonyii bò to jici Jisos e mum kɛw no kɛɛŋke bvuu suuŋke wvú,
sûm bvushiw bwew bô ndvu, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ geɛ kewee ntum Nyo' kuw. Kɛ see wee wvù suŋ wo.”
Ɛ bó bvuu no baale wvú bô boncun nteen.
Ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ bocii bô bocee ncese bo baay baay bocii noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le baancɛ ye. No bó baancɛɛ, mum jo Jisos gɛn bô wvú fô bó to ké no saake bonsaw.
No bó gɛnɛɛ bô wvú nonɛn, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wo Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ́ wo see ɛ̂ bese?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebee kɛ.
Ɛ́ me mbife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ben saa etfuse kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' mvuŋgay e.”
Ɛ bó mum sɛsɛ bocii lɛ, “Ɛ̀ fɛn nu wo wvù Waa Nyo'?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Fí nu no ben gayte.”
Ɛ bó mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu egomte wee wvù esee lɛ la? Beene nu ɛ yuw wase fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme bô diuw we.”
No bonyii bò saake bonsaw jemyɛɛ nonɛn, mum ja bocii jo Jisos no gɛne dvú fô Baylɛt e.
No bó gɛnɛɛ buy fó, mum kɛw no cuci mwɛɛm yî ye le, gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun nɛn ghane bvuŋse woŋ wese, tune fo bonyii elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa Nfon wvu Lum, bvuu jemyi lɛ wen nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, fì duŋci lɛ wvú nu nfon mvu.”
Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay.”
Ɛ Baylɛt mum nɛ jeme ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to nu fó lɛ, “Me mbaa n'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wee wvun jay e kɛ.”
Ɛ bó bocii mum no taame kɛ lɛ, “Wee wvun ghane yɛɛyi bonyii bocii, bɛyse lɛ bó etɛmyi bikuu. Wvú to kɛw Galilee, to ghan Judea jocii, ɛ no nu wase ɛ̂ ɛlaante jan keseen.”
No Baylɛt yuw fin nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Wee wvun nu wee wvu Galilee le?”
Ɛ bó bee, ɛ wvú mum ciinse Jisos fô Nfon 'Ɛlod e, njefo ɛ̀ to nu wvú wvù to saake keba ke woŋ e kedvu, ɛ wvú to nu tɛn Jɛlusalɛm kefew kedvu le.
Ɛ bó gɛn bô Jisos, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod yɛn wvú le yuw njoŋ, njefo wvú to shee yuuke wase ɛkumɛ wvú, mum no kɛŋke shiee keeyɛn wvú le, shieele tɛn lɛ sekemew ɛ́ Jisos ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ́ wen eyɛn.
Ɛ wvú she biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Jisos nteen, geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa etfuse fiɛɛ kɛ.
Wvú to biwci ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le leeme fó cuci mwɛɛm mvù tɛmyi yî Jisos e.
Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod bô bonyii bew bo nci le ke ja mum kɛw no kɛɛŋke bvuu sɛwsee wvú, tfume ndvu woŋ yî ye le, tfuse wvú ɛ bó no tuu dvú jim fô Baylɛt e.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Baylɛt bô Nfon 'Ɛlod banene. Ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ bó tu nsán.
No bó tfusɛɛ Jisos jim, ɛ Baylɛt kum bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò to saake woŋ, bvuu kum bonyii bocii.
Ɛ bó tase, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben be to bô wee wvun fɛn lɛ wvú gee ɛ bonyii tɛmyi bikuu, me ɛ ndioo ntasse mwɛɛm mvù ben taame dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛjise, ben eyekɛ eyuw, ɛ ŋfaŋɛ n'yaa n'yɛn lɛ mwɛɛm mvù ben cuci yî ye le nu ɛ wvú ɛ ge fimew kɛ,
ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod be baa yɛn tɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì be ge wvú ɛ kase ɛ tfuse wee wvun jim ɛ̂ beene. Ben eyɛn tɛn lɛ wee wvun baa jay fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu lo wvú kɛ.
Me nu entam kɛ lo wvú, encinɛ wvú le, ɛ́ wvú egɛne.”
[Ɛ̀ to ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e, ɛ Baylɛt no kɛŋke keebvuse wee mwaaŋ yew ncaw e enya ɛ̂ bonyii.]
Ɛ bonyii bocii mum nɛ kɛw no wamte lo gɛne dvú lɛ, “Lɛse lo wee wvun, ebvuse Balabas yew ncaw e enya ɛ̂ bese.”
Balabas wvun to nu yew ncaw e njefo wvú to nu ɛ kɛw mvunlaa ɛlaante bvuu yu wee.
Ɛ Baylɛt yuw nonɛn bvuu jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bocii njefo wvú to gomte keecinɛ Jisos e.
Geenɛn, ɛ bó no wamte kɛ lɛ, “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e, bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.”
Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu jeme ɛ̂ bonyii yî bokaŋ bo botɛte le lɛ, “Bó eta wvú nje la? Fiɛɛ fì befe fì wvú ge nu la? Me mbaa n'yɛn jay wvù wvú ge le wvù bó eyu lo wvú kɛ. Me nu entam lo wvú, encinɛ wvú le.”
Ɛ bó mum mɛy no wamte lo bô mvuŋgay lɛ “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.” Ɛ n'wam wvubo ghaw Baylɛt.
Nonɛn, ɛ Baylɛt sumtɛn nsaw cinɛ wvú le, lɛ bó ege bô wvú no bó kooŋke.
Ɛ wvú mum bvuse wee wɛ yew ncaw e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bó to biite, wvù kɛwɛɛ mvunlaa ɛlaante bvuu yu wee. No wvú bvuse, mum nya Jisos no bó to gomte.
Ɛ bó mum jo Jisos no gɛne dvú. No bó to gɛne, ɛ bô bo wee mvu tasɛn ɛ wvú kfuuyi ŋkpwaante ɛ diee diew nu Semon, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Sɛlin. Ɛ bó koo wvú mum gɛɛ kentam ke Jisos e fô wvú gbwew, ɛ wvú mum tuu no bii Jisos e.
Ɛ bô bó mum no gɛne, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bii wvú le. Ɛ bomew nu bokɛnɛ bò to beele, taaŋke boŋgɛw bew.
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bokɛnɛ bo Jɛlusalɛm, fo ben ebeelè fô me le kɛ. Ben ebeelè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bikuu binɛn e, noo fô boom bonɛn e.
Ben ekeè lɛ kefew too lo kè bó nu ke egayte lɛ, njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bokase bò ke baa boo wase wan, ɛ bó ke baa yamse wase wan kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kedvu le, ɛ́ bonyii efuuŋke ɛ̂ dikum di baay baay lɛ, ‘Ben egbwekɛn yî yese le,’ efuuŋke ɛ̂ dikum di caan caan lɛ, ‘Ben ebaŋyɛ bese’.
Bó nu ke efuuŋke nonɛn njefo ɛ́ bonyii ge kfuu fin fiɛɛ bô kete kè bɛɛ lɛɛ, ɛ́ bó ke ege nɛɛ bô kè nu ɛ yum wase.”
No bó to gɛne bô Jisos nonɛn, bó to kɛŋke bonyii bo ncaw e bofɛɛ bò bó to gɛne keeyu tɛn.
Ɛ bó gɛn buy bvudvuu bvù bó teŋe lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ le, mum ta Jisos fó yî kentam e, mum ta tɛn bonyii bo ncaw e bo bofɛɛ ba yî bintam e, wvù mwaaŋ ɛ̂ ɛbo ke Jisos e ke ɛcɛɛy e, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛŋkoŋko le.
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay lɛ, “Icɛm, lɛɛshɛ kebefɛ ke bonyii ban e, njefo kɛ bó kee fiɛɛ fì bó gee kɛ.” Ɛ bonyii bodvu jo ndvú Jisos tum kaŋ dvú keegaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole.
Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim to kooyi bô Jisos nonɛn, ɛ bonyii leeme fó taale. Ɛ bonyii bò to saake woŋ kaa nɛ fibole no buu lo wvú duu lɛ, “Wvú se fii bonyii bomew, wvú efi lɛ ɛkolɛ kew keseen, ɛ́ wvú fɛn nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, caw.”
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le tɛn no sɛwsee wvú, nya mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi ɛ̂ wvú,
gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Nfon Bojuu, ɛ́ wo fi ɛkolɛ kuw.”
Bó to nu ɛ saŋ ŋwa' ta ɛ̂ we jo ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e lɛ, “Wvun nu Nfon Bojuu.”
Ɛ wee ncaw mvu ba le bò to njɛyte yî bintam e fó, nɛ no nan'yi Jisos, gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wo wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le? Fi ɛkolɛ kuw, efi tɛn bese.”
Ɛ wvumvu wɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme, wamɛn wvú, bife lɛ, “Kɛ wo fane Nyo' le? Wo nu yî ŋgɛw e diɛwɛ wvú le.
Bee wo kpwee cɛɛy cɛɛy fii ɛ ɛ̀ nu nlawma mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù bee wo ge, geenɛn ɛ wee wvun kpwee fiew ɛ wvú baa jay fiɛɛ kɛ.”
Ɛ wee ncaw wvun mum gay lɛ, “Jisos, ke ekumyì me seke wo nu ke esaake bvunfon bwuw.”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ ɛbɛn nu ɛ bee wo nu ke enu bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e bvu Nyo' le.”
Ɛ diuu ke ben wase dioo lewse, ɛ ɛkfuŋ nɛ jiim woŋ tfuu gɛn buy didiuu ditɛte ɛmvunsheeŋ.
Ɛ ndvu yì to gawsene yew ncese ɛnte mum sɛlɛ ɛntelɛŋ buy biba bifɛɛ.
Ɛ Jisos no nu yî kentam e, ke ja wam foweɛwe lɛ, “Icɛm, me n'yaa keyoy kem can yo le.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum yoy n'yoy wvu fokemɛse.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bo nci le wvù to leeme fó, dioo yɛn fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le, nya mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy, wee wvun se nu sɛ jay.”
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ tase fó keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì to kooyi le, mum ja kase no kfuuyi ɛla ɛbole ɛ bó ɛ laŋ wɛm.
Ɛ nsáa Jisos yicii to to fibole leem ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntamndwee no yɛne fiɛɛ fì kooyi le. Ɛ bomew to nu bokɛnɛ bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee no bii wvú le.
Wee mvu to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Yosɛw, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kelaante ke Bojuu le kemew kè bó teŋe lɛ Alimatia. Wvú to nu wee wvù jee bvuu nu wee wvu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, bvuu cɛyte kefew kè Nyo' nu ke eto esaake bvunfon bwew. Wvú to nu tɛn wee ŋgoo bonyii bò to saake bonsaw e. Geenɛn, wvú to baa bee fiew fiɛɛ fì bó to seysɛɛ ege bô Jisos kɛ.
<range>
Ɛ wvú gɛn fô Baylɛt e, lɛkɛ keegɛn ejo gvune di Jisos e.
Ɛ Baylɛt bee, ɛ wvú gɛn shike gvune didvu, baancɛ ɛ̂ ndvu le, gɛn jike ɛ̂ jem e ɛ bó ɛ cow yî kembaan e, ɛ bó ke baa yuu lese wase wee jó kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu Diuu di Nseyse le keeley diuu di mbam e, ɛ ɛ̀ to shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ mbam wvudvu ekɛw.
Ɛ bokɛnɛ ba bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee bi Jisos e, bi Yosɛw e fô jem, gɛn yɛn no wvú jiwsee gvune di Jisos e ɛ̂ jem.
Ɛ bó ke nɛ fó, mum tu jim ɛla ɛbole, gɛn seyse bonfiey bò jee noo bò ké no shfuuŋkene bò bó to ké no yeefe digvune dvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bó she mbam no nci wvubo to gomte.
Ɛ diuu di mbam e ke buy fey, ɛ bvú yuu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le. Ɛ bokɛnɛ bodvu buy saa lo bvutfuu, jo bonfiey bò bó to seysɛɛ mum no gɛne dvú fô jem.
Ɛ bó dioo gɛn buy fó, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ biŋse wase tɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú.
Ɛ bó ley gɛn ɛ̂ jem faŋɛ yaa yɛn gvune di Tata Jisos e kɛ.
Ɛ bó mum leem fó ŋgɛmtɛn lo. Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bolemsɛ bofɛɛ to nu ɛ nɛ to leem mbew bó le, ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí baa lawkene.
Ɛ bokɛnɛ bodvu fan baay, mum tum bikuu fokuse. Ɛ bolemsɛ ba bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben gomte wee wvù bɛɛ dvú ɛnte jo boŋkfu?
Kɛ wvú yaa nu fɛn kɛ, wvú nu ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le. Ben ekume fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ ben seke ben ɛ bó to nu Galilee.
Wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ɛ bó nu ke enya wvú can bonyii bò befe le, ɛ́ bó ke eta wvú yî kentam e, ɛ́ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.’”
Ɛ bó mum kume fiɛɛ fì Jisos to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ bó ke nɛ fô jem, kase tu jim gɛn see mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ noo bonyii bocii bò to bii wvú le.
Bokɛnɛ bò to seŋɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to nu Maalia Magdalen, Joana noo Maalia wvù bwee Jɛm bô bokɛnɛ bomew.
Ɛ bó yuw njeme wvudvu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛ̀ nu kenlamse, faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bita nɛ kɛ we, lewtɛ gɛn buy fô jem, ŋgvuwcɛ taa ɛ̂ jem yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvú yì bó to njimɛɛ Jisos dvú. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no tuu jim fô yew e kɛŋke ŋghaw yî fiɛɛ fì kooyɛɛ le.
Ɛ fí ke nɛ kooy kɛ ɛbvubwɛ lɛ, bonyii bomew bofɛɛ bò to ké no bii Jisos e to nu ɛ nɛ Jɛlusalɛm no gɛne ntɛw wvù Ɛmayus e, wvù to nu diɛwɛ bomay bosooshwiy keegɛn buy jó le.
Ɛ bó no gɛne jemyi ɛbonɛbon ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù to kooyi mvun mvunciim.
No bó to lɛne jemyi ghayte nonɛn, ɛ Jisos kebɛɛ bencɛ to mbew bó le no lɛne bô bó.
Ɛ fiɛɛ fimew ge lɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ wee wvudvu kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos mum ja bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu la fì ben lɛne jemyi ɛkumɛ fí nɛn?” No wvú bife nonɛn, ɛ bó leemɛn bô yii yî monshim mobole.
Ɛ wee mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Kleofas bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wo tolo Jɛlusalɛm wvù yaa kee kɛ mwɛɛm mvù se kooyi jó ɛdiuw ɛyan e?”
Ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Mvù la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù se kooyi bô Jisos wvu Nasalɛt. Wee wvun se nu wee ntum Nyo', ɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú se gee noo mvù wvú se jemyi se nu biŋghaw. Ɛ̀ se nu wee wvù kuuke baay fwe dvu Nyo' bô bonyii bocii.
Bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ wese ɛ se ɛ nya wvú lɛ bó eyu. Bó se ɛ mum ɛ ta wvú yî kentam e.
Bese se leese fisɛse bvufee yî ye le lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ke esum bonyii bo Islael can ŋgɛw e. Geenɛn, ɛ̀ nu wase ɛdiuw ɛta no mwɛɛm mvudvu se kooyɛɛ.
Fimew nu ɛ bokɛnɛ bomew ŋgoo yese le ɛ be ɛ jeme fí ɛ nya lo bese ŋghaw, lɛ bó buy ɛ gɛn fô jem ɛntaŋɛntaŋ,
ɛ faŋɛ yaa yɛn gvune diew e kɛ. Bó ɛ dioo kase tu jim, ɛ see lɛ bó be ɛ yɛn bonceendaa bo Nyo' le kɛ diɛwɛ bó yɛn ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le, bó gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ Jisos nu dvú.
Bonyii bomew ŋgoo yese le ɛ gɛn fô jem fodvu ɛ yɛn yí le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bokɛnɛ bodvu be jemyi, geenɛn, ɛ faŋɛ yaa yɛn Jisos e kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “O oo, biyuŋ bin, mvuntelem mvunɛn lɛɛ baay keebee mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ.
Kɛ ben kee lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to kɛŋke keeyɛn ŋgɛw sɛ ley yî bvukukɛ bwew e le?”
Ɛ Jisos mum kɛw nɛle ɛ̂ bó mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ kɛw yî mvù Muses to saŋɛɛ le, ɛ gɛn ɛ buy tɛn yî mvu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
No bó toɛ wase buy mbew ntɛw wvù bó to gɛne jó le, ɛ Jisos nɛ no gee kɛ diɛwɛ wvú fele lo.
Ɛ bó lɛkɛ wvú shiee le gay lɛ, “Beene egɛn ece. Kefew nu ɛ kí ɛ gɛn wase baay, ɛ ɛkfuŋ ɛ kɛw wase ɛ no jiime.” Ɛ wvú bee keegɛn ce bô bó.
Ɛ bó gɛn, ke dioo diekene, ɛ wvú jo ntuw blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ nya ɛ̂ bó.
Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛbo yuu, ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ wvú. Ɛ wvú sɛsɛ la ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
Ɛ bó shɛɛ no ghayte ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Kɛ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeewo be yvuwse seke wvú be nɛci mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛ̂ bee wo ɛ̂ je le?”
Ɛ bó mum nɛnɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛkiɛguu jodvu no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó dioo gɛn, yɛn ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ ɛ baancɛ ye bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ bô bonyii bomew bò to ké no bii wvú le.
Ɛ bó jemyi lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, Tata wesebeene nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Wvú be ɛ sɛsɛ ɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ Semon ɛjise.”
Ɛ bó mum see tɛn ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì be kooy bô bó ɛ̂ je, bvuu nɛle no bó be kiɛnte wvú seke wvú be guushi blɛɛd.
Kɛ no bó to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Jisos kebɛɛ mum ja nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ mum gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
Ɛ kedvum gbwo bó, ɛ bó no fane, kpwaake lɛ bó yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkfusay e.
Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fane la? Ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben maŋene me?
Ben etaa eyɛn can yɛm bô bikaa biem ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa me. Ben emomcɛ ye yɛm emum ekiɛɛ, njefo kɛ ŋkfusay ké no kɛŋke nyam ye bô bikufɛ no ben yɛne ɛ me ŋkɛŋke kɛ.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum duŋcɛ can ye bô bikaa biew ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ bó taa Jisos, ɛ njoŋ yuwyɛ lo bó, ɛ bó mum ŋgɛmtɛn lo. Ɛ fí ghaw bó keebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú. Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke fiɛɛ fidien fɛn e?”
Ɛ bó jo kencim ke bye le ɛ bó ɛ dɛɛ, nya ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ wvú fi die ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvun mvù ben yɛn ɛbɛn nu mvù me nto njemyi ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ mvú ɛ me mbɛɛ beene. Me nto nduu lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ me ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Muses e, bô ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le noo ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le, kɛŋke keeto ekocɛn.”
Ɛ wvú mum yene bvufee bvubole, ɛ bó kiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le.
Ɛ wvú jeme lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛŋke keeyɛn ŋgɛw ekpwe, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.
Ɛ fí bvuu nu lɛ bó nu ke ekɛw Jɛlusalɛm, efewci ɛ̂ bitum bicii ɛ̂ diee diew e lɛ bonyii bocii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ Nyo' emum elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
Ɛ̀ nu ke efewci ben ban bò nu ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvun e.
Ben eyekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse nya yì Icɛm to kawɛɛ ben dvú. Nonɛn, ben emɛy ɛlaante jan ecɛyte mvuŋgay mvù nu ke eshii fowe eto fô ben e.”
Ɛ wvú jo bó buy bô bó ɛlaante jodvu, ɛ bô bó gɛn buy mbew ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, ɛ wvú cake can ye we, laŋ kembonɛn yî bó le.
Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ laaŋke kembonɛn yî bó le nonɛn, mum ja no bene we, mum ben la.
Ɛ bó nya mbense wvu baay ɛ̂ wvú, mum ja fó tu jim Jɛlusalɛm bô nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole.
Ɛ bó gɛn no shee yew ncese le, bensee Nyo' sekecii.
Ɛ̀ to nu foŋkɛw ɛ Diɛw nu wase. Diɛw yidvu to nu bô Nyo', ɛ Diɛw yidvu to nu Nyo'.
Wvú to nu wase dvú foŋkɛw bô Nyo'.
Nyo' to bom mwɛɛm mvunciim fele can ye le. Kɛ fiɛɛ nu naa lo dvú fimwaaŋ fì Nyo' to bomɛɛ sɛ wvú kɛ.
Wvú kɛŋke nshii yî ye le, ɛ nshii wvudvu nu n'yuu fô bonyii le.
N'yuu wvudvu ɛ no baa ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le, ɛ ɛjiwɛ kedvu yaa nulo ejimse naa lo wvú kɛ.
Wee mvu nu dvú wvù Nyo' to tumɛɛ ɛ diee nu lɛ Jon.
Wvú to to keejeme ɛkumɛ N'yuu, eben jim nsaw we, wvu lɛ wen ege ɛ́ bonyii bocii elese fitele yî N'yuu wvudvu le.
Kɛ wvú wvù Jon to nu N'yuu wvudvu kɛ. Wvú to to kɛ keeben ɛ ɛ̀ nu jim nsaw wvu N'yuu wvudvu.
N'yuu wvu kecɛɛy wvù duŋci n'yuu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii to too yî woŋ wvun e.
Wvú to nu yî woŋ e, ɛ woŋ wvun nu ɛ Nyo' to bom fele can ye le, geenɛn ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e faŋɛ yaa ekiɛɛ wvú kɛ.
Wvú to nu ɛ to woŋ we le, ɛ bonyii bo bew faŋɛ yaa efiisɛn wvú kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to fiisɛnɛɛ wvú, lese fitele yî ye le, nu ɛ wvú to nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó lɛ bó enù wase boom bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ kɛ boom bo Nyo' le ban nu ɛ bó boke bii ɛlɛmɛ ke kfuu le, kɛnɛɛ no wee shieele, kɛnɛɛ mboo wee wvu wum e kɛ. Bó boke bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu mboo wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo' le.
Diɛw yidvu to nu ɛ tu wee wvu wum no cee ɛ̂ bese ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mbuwma noo kecɛɛy. Ɛ bese yɛn bvukukɛ bwew e. Bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Wan wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù nɛ fô Ice le.
Jon to nu ɛ ben jim nsaw ɛkumɛ wvú no fuuŋke gayte lɛ, “Wvun nu wee wvù me nto njemyi ɛkumɛ wvú ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Wee wvù too ɛ̂ me ɛjim kuuke fele me, njefo wvú to nu wase ɛ me nsɛ ŋke no nu dvú.’”
No wvú nu ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mbuwma, wvú ɛ mum ɛ no nyaa beene bocii mbuwma yî mbuwma le.
Beene kee lo lɛ Nyo' to nya bonci fele can Muses e. Geenɛn, mbuwma Nyo' bô kecɛɛy nu ɛ to fele can Jisos Klistu le.
Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ke nu ɛ yuu wase yɛn Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Waa we wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù nu mbew wvú wvù Ice le wvù nu ɛ ge beene ɛ kiɛɛ wvú.
Fin nu fiɛɛ fì Jon to jemyɛɛ seke bikuu bi Bojuu le bi Jɛlusalɛm to tumɛɛ bocee ncese bô bonyii bo Lɛwe le lɛ bó ebife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù yɛɛ lɛ.
Jon to baa tun keetfuse mbife wvubo kɛ. Wvú to nu ɛ jeme lo bô diuw we lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛ.”
Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ? Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Ɛlayja le?” Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ me nu Ɛlayja kɛ.” Ɛ bó bvuu bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ le?” Ɛ wvú tun.
Ɛ bó bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ? Wo gay lɛ la ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kuw? Kɛ see ɛ́ bese ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bese ekase egɛn etfuse ɛ̂ bonyii bò tum bese?”
Ɛ Jon tfuse ɛ̂ bó no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me diɛw yì fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ, ‘Bó enɛle je Tata ɛ́ yí enù teytey.’”
Bonyii ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ to tum Bofalasii bó.
Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu wo wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛnɛɛ Ɛlayja, kɛnɛɛ Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ, wo ɛ no leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo nje la?”
Ɛ Jon tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nleese kɛ fiem bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn wee mvu nu dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛnte ɛ ben yaa kee wvú kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù too ɛ̂ me ɛjim, ɛ me mbaa ncim eŋkpwɛntɛn keenfay laba we kɛ.”
Fiɛɛ fin ficii to kooyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bɛtani Joo Joodan kewvu keki fò Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Jon yɛn ɛ Jisos too, ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu Waa Njee Nyo' wvù cawsee bibefɛ bi yî nshɛ le!
Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù me nse njemyi ɛkumɛ wvú ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Wee mvu too ɛ̂ me ɛjim kuuke fele me, njefo wvú to nu wase, ɛ me nsɛ ŋke no nu.’
Kɛ me kebɛɛ nto ŋkee wvú kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me nto nto no nleese bonyii ɛ̂ joo wvu lɛ bonyii bo Islael ekiɛɛ wvú.”
Jon to nu ɛ bvuu jeme keeben jim nsaw we gay lɛ, “Me nto nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Keyoy shiile too fowe diɛwɛ ɛbembɛ le, to no nu yî ye le.
Kɛ me kebɛɛ nto ŋkee wvú kɛ. Geenɛn, wee wvù to tumɛɛ me lɛ me ento enleesè bonyii ɛ̂ joo to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Wee wvù wo nu ke eyɛn ɛ Keyoy ɛ shii fowe ɛ to ɛ no nu yî ye le, nu wvù nu ke eleese bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.’
Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ me nto nu ɛ n'yɛn, ɛ no nleeme jim nsaw wvudvu ŋgayte lɛ wee wvun nu Waa Nyo'.”
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Jon bvuu no leeme fɛ fò wvú to leeme bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bofɛɛ.
Ɛ wvú nɛ yɛn no Jisos lɛne fele, mum gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu Waa Njee Nyo'.”
Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo bofɛɛ ba dioo yuw no wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛ no bii Jisos e.
Ɛ Jisos baŋke ye yɛn no bó bii, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?” Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wo cee fɛɛ?” (Diee dì Labay din nu lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi wvu Baay.”)
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto eyɛn.” Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn fô wvú to cee. Ɛ bô bó mum no nu ɛ ɛkfuŋ ghan jiim. Kefew kè bó to biɛ wvú le to nu wase kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu dinɛw e fokiɛguu.
Wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo bonyii bo bofɛɛ bò to yuwɛɛ no Jon jemyɛɛ mum bi Jisos e to nu Andulu wvù waa bwee Semon Bita.
Ɛ Andulu wvudvu mum gɛn lo gom waa bwee wvù Semon, see ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn wase Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le” (fì nu lɛ Klistu).
Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum jo Semon gɛn bô wvú fô Jisos e. Ɛ Jisos taa wvú nɛn tuŋŋ, gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Semon wvù waa Jon. Bó nu ke eteŋe wase wo lɛ Sɛfas.” (Diee dì lɛ Sɛfas din nu Bita).
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ Jisos yɛn lɛ wen nu egɛn keba kè Galilee le. Ɛ wvú gɛn yɛn Filew e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
Filew wvun to nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛsayda le. Ɛ kelaante kin nu ke bo Andulu bô Bita le.
Ɛ Filew gɛn gom Natanial gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn wase wee wvù Muses to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le ɛkumɛ wvú bô wvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ tɛn ɛkumɛ wvú. Wee wvun nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wvù waa Yosɛw.”
Ɛ Natanial tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì jee nulo ebuy Nasalɛt e?” Ɛ Filew gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “To eyɛn.”
Ɛ Jisos ke yɛn no Natanial too, jeme ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wee wvun nu naa wee wvu Islael wvu kecɛɛy. Kɛ nce kenlɛɛma nu yî ye le kɛ.”
Ɛ Natanial bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ kiɛɛ me?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ Filew sɛ keeke eto etee wo, nu ɛ me mbe ɛ n'yɛn wase wo le ɛ̂ kenyi ke kete ke fig e kiɛ le.”
Ɛ Natanial tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wo nu Waa Nyo'! Wo nu Nfon wvu Islael!”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo fɛn nu ɛ bee me le keseen kɛ njefo me nu ɛ ŋgay ɛ̂ wo lɛ me mbe ɛ n'yɛn wase wo le ɛ̂ kenyi ke kete kiɛ le? Wo nu ke eyɛn mwɛɛm mvù kuuke fele mvun e.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wo nu ke eyɛn ɛ ɛbulɛ ɛ yene, ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bene, booke yî wee wvù diee nu Waawee le.”
Ɛ ɛdiuw ke buy ɛta, ɛ bó no gee ŋkaw bvujen ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kana wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le, ɛ bwee Jisos nu fó.
Bó to nu ɛ be tɛn Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bô ŋkaw wvudvu.
Ɛ mbvuum ke nɛ ka, ɛ bwee Jisos be wvú dvú gay lɛ, “Kɛ bó bɛɛ kɛŋke mbvuum kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo bee me dvú nje la? Kefew kem baa kocɛn wase kɛ.”
Ɛ bwee gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo gawe le lɛ, “Fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú ɛ gay lɛ ben ege, ɛ ben ge.”
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ nsháan leeme fó yisoocaan ɛ bó kene bô ɛta. Nsháan yin nu yì Bojuu to ké no gɛɛle joo jó yì bó cuke ye dvú keeyuule ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise. Nshaan miaaŋ to joo bibɛɛŋ bi joo le diɛwɛ mbaanfiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ mbaanshɛ le.
Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo gawe le bodvu lɛ, “Ben etukɛ joo eyiŋsɛn nsháan yin dvú.” Ɛ bó mum tukɛ joo gɛɛ ɛ̂ nsháan yidvu le ɛ yí yiŋsɛn.
Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben esɛfe yimi keseen egɛn dvú fô cee gawe le.” Ɛ bó sɛfe gɛn dvú.
Ɛ cee gawe fi, mom joo yidvu, yuw ɛ yí ɛ tu wase mbvuum. Ɛ wvú ma laa man mbvuum nɛ fɛɛ lɛ. (Geenɛn, bonyii bo gawe le bò to sɛfɛɛ joo yidvu to kee fô mó nɛn'yɛɛ.) Ɛ cee gawe mum tee cee bvujen,
bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bonyii ké yaw gaw fibole ɛ ɛ̀ nu mbvuum mò jee fô ŋkaw e, ɛ́ bonyii ké dioo ɛ wu wase ɛ ffuu, ɛ bó sɛ gaw mo yaa jee kɛ. Wo ɛ kaa ɛ gɛɛ fiuw mbvuum mò jee ɛ no too dvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu keseen e?”
