No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew ghay ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu la fì wvú gayte ɛ̂ beene lɛ, ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan beene saa ebvuu eyɛn wen e kɛ, ke dioo ɛ moocɛ caan ebvuu ekase eyɛn wen e, bô lɛ wen gɛne fô Icee wen e?
Fiɛɛ fì wvú sɛ duu lɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan sɛ nu naa lɛ la? Kɛ beene baa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi nonɛn kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos dioo kiɛɛ lɛ bó gomte keebife ɛ̂ wen fiɛɛ fì wen jeme, mum bife lɛ, “Ben ghayte ɛbenɛben ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ben saa ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, ke dioo ɛ moocɛ caan ɛ́ ben ebvuu ekase eyɛn me le’ le?
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ben nu ke ebeele kpwe, fuuŋke ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun laŋlaŋe lo fibole. Ben nu ke enu yî yii le, geenɛn ɛ yii yene yin nu ke enɛ etu nlaŋlaŋ.
Kpwoon ké dioo nu yî lume le, no yuuke nsase, njefo kefew kew keeboo nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Ɛ́ wvú ké dioo ɛ boo wase wan, wvú saa ebvuu ekumyi nsase wvudvu kɛ, njefo wvú yuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ lɛ wee wvu wum nu ɛ to yî woŋ e.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu fô ben e keseen. Ben nu yii yii, geenɛn ɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn ben e, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e, ɛ wvuwɛ nlaŋlaŋ nu ke enu wvù wee yaa nulo ke efi ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le, ben saa ebvuu ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ me kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben bife naa la ɛ̂ Icɛm, ɛ́ wvú enya fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee diem e.
Ɛ kɛw lo ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ ben ke baa bife wase fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ̂ diee diem e kɛ. Ben ebife, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋkɛ, wvu lɛ nlaŋlaŋ wene eyiŋsɛn.
Me njemyi njeme wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ boŋgan e, geenɛn kefew too lo kè me n'yaa mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu enjeme ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ boŋgan e kɛ. Me nu ŋke enjemyi wase ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛndan ɛkumɛ Icɛm.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ́ ben biite fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ̂ diee diem e. Kɛ me ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ me nu ŋke enlɛkɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ben e kɛ.
Icɛm kebɛɛ kooŋke ben, njefo ben nu ɛ koŋ me ɛ bvuu ɛ bee lɛ me nɛ fô wvú wvù Icɛm e.
Me nto nɛ fô Icɛm e nto yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ no nɛn'yi wase yî woŋ wvun e ntuu jim fô Icɛm e.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bɛnse lo gay lɛ, “Aŋghaa! Wo jemyi naa keseen teytey ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu ɛ̂ boŋgan e kɛ!
Keseen nu ɛ bese ɛ yɛn wase lɛ wo kee mwɛɛm mvunciim yaa cɛyte lɛ wee ke ebife kɛ lo fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo kɛ. Fifin nu ɛ ge bese ɛ mum ɛ bee lɛ wo nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fɛn nu ɛ bee keseen e?
Kefew too lo, ɛ kí ɛ to naa wase, kè ben nu ke etawse mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ́ wee egɛne ɛ̂ wvú yew, cinɛ me le me ɛmbeŋ. Geenɛn kɛ me nu me ɛmbeŋ kɛ, njefo Icɛm nu bee wvú.
Me njemyi mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben wvu lɛ no ben nu yî yɛm e, ben emum ekɛŋkè nyɛkeey. Yî woŋ wvun e nu ɛ ben kɛŋke boŋgɛw, geenɛn ben esakenè. Me nu ɛ nso wase woŋ wvun.”
Ɛ Jisos ke jeme njeme wvun mɛse, mum nɛ cake ɛjisɛ taa we bunle lɛ, “Icɛm, kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Duŋcɛ bvukukɛ bvu Waa wo le wvu lɛ Wan tɛn nulo eduŋcɛ bwuw bvukukɛ.
Wvú nulo eduŋcɛ njefo wo nu ɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ we jo wee wvu wum tfuu lɛ wvú enya nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ boba bocii bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo wvun nu fin fì lɛ bó ekeè wo wvù ɛ̀ nu kɛ wo Nyo' wvu kecɛɛy, ebvuu ekee tɛn me wvù Jisos Klistu wvù wo to tumɛɛ le.
Me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ wase bvukukɛ bwuw yî nshɛ le no me nu ɛ mɛse lemme dì wo to nyaɛ lɛ me enlem e.
Yî keseen e Icɛm, kase enya me bvukukɛ mbew yo le bvù me nto nshee ŋkɛŋke fwele ɛ woŋ sɛ ke kɛw e.
Me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ wase wo ɛ̂ bonyii bò wo to baayɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan nya ɛ̂ me le. Bonyii ban to nu buw, ɛ wo mum nya bó ɛ̂ me. Ɛ bó nu ɛ yuw diɛw yo le.
Bó nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase keseen lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke nu ɛ fí nɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô wo le.
Me njemyi nɛn njefo me nu ɛ nya wase diɛw yì wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me ɛ̂ bó, bó ɛ fiisɛn, ɛ mum ɛ kiɛɛ yî kecɛɛy e lɛ me nɛ fô wo le, ɛ bee tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ to tum wo me.
Me mbunlee nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boban e. Kɛ me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boba bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boban bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le, njefo ɛ̀ nu bonyii buw.
Bonyii bocii bò me ŋkɛŋke nu bonyii buw, ɛ bonyii bocii bò wo kɛŋke nu bem. Ɛ̀ nu yî bó le wvù bvukukɛ bwem yen'yi.
Keseen nu ɛ me n'yaa mbɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan kɛ. Geenɛn bó bɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan, ɛ me ŋkaase wase ntoo fô wo le. Icɛm wvù yuule, gɛɛlɛ bó ɛ̂ diee diuw dì wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le, wvu lɛ bó nulo enù yî wee le mwaaŋ kɛ naa no bee wo nu yî wee le mwaaŋ.
Seke me nto nu bee bó, me nto nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bó ɛ̂ diee diuw dì wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le. Me nu ɛ ncɛycɛy bó wee mvu bó le baa la, ɛfey kɛ wvuwɛ wvù to nu wase wee wvù nu ke ela le. Ɛ fifin to nu wvu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le eto ekocɛn.
Keseen nu ɛ me ŋkaase wase ntoo fô wo le, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi mbɛɛ yî woŋ wvun e wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekɛŋke njoŋ wvu wɛm ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn yî bó le.
Me nu ɛ nya wase diɛw yo can yibole, bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ɛ mum ɛ no bane bó njefo kɛ bó nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ, lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ me nu wee wvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
Kɛ me mbunlee nɛn lɛ wo ebvuse lo bó yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wo egemgem bó fo bó eley can wee kebefɛ wɛ le.
Kɛ bó nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ, lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ me nu wee wvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
Seyse bó egɛɛ ɛ́ bó eyuulè ɛnte jo kecɛɛy. Diɛw yo nu kecɛɛy.
No wo to tumɛɛ me yî woŋ wvun e, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me nu ɛ ntum bó yî woŋ wvun e.
Me ɛ mum ɛ nseyse ɛkolɛ kem ɛ ŋgɛɛ nje bó, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ bó eseyse bibole bikuu egɛɛ yî kecɛɛy.
Kɛ me mbunlee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii ban e maaŋ kɛ. Me mbunlee tɛn fô bonyii bocii bò nu ke eyuw diɛw yibole elese fitele yî yɛm e.
Me mbunlee lɛ bó bocii ke enu yî wee le mwaaŋ kɛ naa no wo wvù Icɛm nu yî yɛm e ɛ me nu yî yo le. Me mbunlee lɛ bó tɛn ke enu yî yese bee wo le wvu lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ebee lɛ ɛ̀ to tum wo me.
Bvukukɛ bvù wo to buwɛɛ me dvú nu ɛ me ɛ nya wase ɛ̂ bó wvu lɛ bó nulo enù yî wee le mwaaŋ, kɛ naa no bee wo nu yî wee le mwaaŋ,
ɛ me nu yî bó le, ɛ wo nu yî yɛm e. Lɛ bó elooci nù yî wee le mwaaŋ, nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum wo me, ɛ wo kooŋke bó kɛ naa no wo kooŋke me.
Icɛm, me nshieele lɛ boba bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me ke enu tɛn bee bó fô me nu, wvu lɛ bó ke eyɛn bvukukɛ bvù wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nje keŋkoŋɛn kuw fô me le ɛ woŋ wvun sɛ ke kɛw e.
Ɛɛy Icɛm wvu teytey, kɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e kee wo kɛ, geenɛn ɛ me ŋkee wo, ɛ bonyii bem ban nu ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum wo me.
Me nu ɛ ŋge wase bó ɛ kiɛɛ wo, ɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke eŋgee kɛ ɛ bó kee wo, wvu lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kè wo nu ɛ koŋ me dvú nulo enu yî bó le, ɛ me tɛn nu yî bó le.”
Ɛ Jisos ke bunle mɛse, ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ fó, gɛn lente keloŋɛ kè bó teŋe lɛ Kidlon, buy kewvu keki fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvumew e, mum ley jó.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Judas wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos kee tɛn bvudvuu bvudvu, njefo Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le to ké no gɛne taashi fó ɛfonɛfon.
Nonɛn, ɛ Judas mum gɛn fó bô ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bomew bò to cɛyte yew ncese. Bonyii ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ to tum bocee ncese bo baay baay noo Bofalasii bó. Bó to gɛne kɛŋke bin'yeese bô diŋguci ɛ bó ɛ tfuw noo mwɛɛm mvu jem e.
No Jisos to kee wase fiɛɛ fì to nu keeke ekooy bô wvú, ɛ wvú mum bencɛ to fwe, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?”
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu.” Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Judas wvù to gesɛɛ wvú leeme bô bonyii bodvu.
No Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen wvudvu, ɛ bó kaa tu lo jim jim, gbwekɛn fokuse.
Ɛ wvú bvuu bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt.”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ɛ nsee wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu. Ɛ́ ben fɛn gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu me, ɛ́ ben cinɛ ɛ bonyii ban no gɛne.”
Wvú to gay nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn ɛ̂ diɛw yì wvú to jemyɛɛ wase ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ wen to baa lase wee mwaaŋ fô bò wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wen e kɛ.
Semon Bita to kɛŋke nyo jem. Ɛ wvú mum dvun ɛ̂ ŋku le, cun kentuŋtuŋ ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ke ɛcɛɛy dvú, sum. Diee di nfwa wvudvu le to nu Malkus.
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Kase etfuse nyo yo ɛ̂ ŋku le. Kɛ me nu eŋ'wu fiko fi ŋgɛw e fì Icɛm nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le?”
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bô ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese Bojuu mum gheŋ Jisos kay wvú bô bokfuu.
Ɛ bó yaw jo wvú gɛn dvú fô Annas e, njefo Annas to nu icee kpwɛɛ Kayfas wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kelum kekiɛ le.
Kayfas wvun nu wvù to nyaɛ wase ntefe ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ fí jee lɛ wee mwaaŋ ekpwe fô bonyii le bocii.
No bó to gɛne bô Jisos nonɛn, Semon Bita bô waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu to bii wvú le. No waa ŋgoo Jisos wvun to nu ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kee wvú, ɛ wvú mum bi Jisos e gɛn ley fô lakfulɛɛŋ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le.
Ɛ Bita shɛɛ no leeme ɛkfuŋ mbew diuw ketaaŋ e. Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wvudvu wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le to kee, kase buy to jeme bô wan kpwoon wvù to cɛyte diuw ketaaŋ, jo Bita ley bô wvú.
Ɛ wan kpwoon wvudvu bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu tɛn wee ŋgoo wee wvun?” Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ me nu kɛ.”
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛkfuŋ lɛɛ, ɛ boom bo lemme le bô bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese ɛ fwɛɛ ŋguy ɛ no leemene fó yosene. Ɛ Bita mum fey, gɛn no leeme bô bó yosene tɛn.
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mum no biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Jisos ɛkumɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le noo ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi we.
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me ŋké no njemyi ɛ̂ woŋ tfuu ɛndan. Me ŋké no n'yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle le noo yew ncese le fô Bojuu bocii nu ɛ tase. Kɛ me ŋke mbaa enjemyi wase fiɛɛ ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le kɛ.
Wo biwci mwɛɛm mvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ me nje la? Ɛ̀ biwcì ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò ké no yuuke no me n'yɛɛyi. Bó kee naa fiɛɛ fì me ŋké no njemyi.”
No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese wvù to leeme fó nceencee tum ɛbo ɛ̂ wvú ɛntuŋtuŋ, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yin nu je yì wo tfuuse fiɛɛ jó ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le?”
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me fɛn nu ɛ njeme ɛ njay, ɛ́ wo duŋcɛ jay wvudvu. Ɛ́ me fɛn njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, wo ɛ kaa ɛ suŋ lo me nje la?”
Ɛ Annas mum nɛ ciinse Jisos fô Kayfas wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le. Ɛ Jisos to bɛɛ kɛ ɛ bó ɛ kay bô bokfuu.
No Semon Bita to bɛɛ leeme yosene ŋguy, ɛ bonyii bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu mvu ŋgoo bonyii bew e?” Geenɛn ɛ Bita tun gay lɛ, “Kɛ me nu mvu kɛ.”
Ɛ waa lemme ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mvu bvuu bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Me mbe mbaa n'yɛn wo le ben ɛ wvú ɛ̂ wɛɛ ketaaŋ wɛ le?” Waa lemme wvudvu to nu wee kfuu di wee wɛ wvù Bita to sumɛɛ kentuŋtuŋ kew e.
Ɛ Bita bvuu tun. Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
Ɛ bonyii mum jo Jisos fô yew e fo Kayfas no gɛne dvú ɛ̂ ntow wee wvu Lum wvù to saake jó le. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo ɛntaŋɛntaŋ. Ɛ bó dioo gɛn faŋɛ yaa ley fibole gɛn ɛ̂ ntow wee wvudvu le kɛ, njefo ɛ́ bó to ley lo, emum etuu ŋkfum, saa ebvuu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey kɛ.
Nonɛn ɛ Baylɛt mum buy to yɛn bó le bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì ben yɛn ɛ wee wvun ɛ jay nu la?”
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvun be baa buw fiɛɛ, tu bese baa too bô wvú keenya ɛ̂ wo kɛ.”
Ɛ Baylɛt tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo wvú esaw bii no wene nci gomte.” Ɛ Bojuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese kɛŋke mvuŋgay keeyu wee kɛ.”
Ɛ njeme wvun mum to kocɛn ɛ̂ diɛw yì Jisos to jemyɛɛ wase duŋci kfuu kpwe yì wvú to nu keeke ekpwe le.
Ɛ Baylɛt kase ley gɛn ɛ̂ ntow we le, tee ɛ bó to bô Jisos, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?”
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jemyi fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwo, nuu ɛ̀ jeme wee ɛ̂ wo ɛkumɛ me lɛ?”
Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu wee Juu lɛ? Ɛ̀ nu bonyii buw bo woŋ e bô bocee ncese bo baay baay bò to bô wo ɛ nya ɛ̂ me. Wo jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bvunfon bwem nu diɛwɛ bvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Ɛ́ bvunfon bwem be nu diɛwɛ bvu yî woŋ wvun e, tu bonyii bem bo lemme le be ɛ diu wvu lɛ fo bó enya me can Bojuu le kɛ. Geenɛn kɛ bvunfon bwem nu bvù nɛ yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.”
Ɛ Baylɛt mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ tu wo nu Nfon?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay lɛ me nu Nfon. Bó to boke me, ɛ me nto yî woŋ wvun e nje fin fì lɛ me ento enjeme ɛkumɛ kecɛɛy. Wee tfuu wvù bii kecɛɛy e ké no yuuke diɛw yɛm e.”
Ɛ Baylɛt ghay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy nu la?” No wvú ghay nonɛn mum kase buy gɛn yɛn Bojuu ba le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me mbaa n'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú jay e kɛ.
Geenɛn ben kɛŋke nce wene mvu lɛ ɛ̀ ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ me mbvuse wee ncaw mwaaŋ yew. Ben gomte lɛ me embvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nfon wene Bojuu le?”
Ɛ Bojuu bodvu wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “'Aay, kɛ bese gomte wee wvun kɛ, bvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Balabas!” Balabas wvun to nu ɛkufɛ ke cooŋ e.
Ɛ Baylɛt mum jo Jisos nya ɛ bó njin bô boŋgbwan.
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le lu kefo ke bvunfon e ɛ kí nu bíay bíay bon ɛ̂ wvú ɛfa, jo ndvu bvunfon ɛ yí yɛɛle lo, shfuse yî ye le.
Ɛ bó mum no too fô wvú le bune wvú gayte lɛ, “Biaa kembaan! Nfon Bojuu!” No bó gee nonɛn no njine wvú bô can.
Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu buy ɛkfuŋ gay ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Ben eyɛn, me nu embvuse wee wvun enya ɛ̂ ben, wvu lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ me mbaa en'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú jay e kɛ.”
Ɛ Jisos mum buy no too bô kefo ke bíay e ɛfa noo ndvu bvunfon ye le. Ɛ Baylɛt mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn wee wvudvu wvun!”
Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese dioo yɛn wvú le nonɛn, mum no wamte lo lɛ, “Ta lo wvú yî kentam e, ta lo wvú yî kentam e!” Ɛ Baylɛt gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo wvú bô can yene eta yî kentam e, njefo me mbaa en'yɛn jay we le kɛ.”
Ɛ Bojuu bodvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese kɛŋke nci wese, ɛ nci wvudvu duŋci lɛ wvú kɛŋke keekpwe, njefo wvú nu ɛ ge ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu Waa Nyo'.”
Ɛ Baylɛt dioo yuw njeme wvun bvuu kɛŋkɛ lo nfan baay.
Ɛ bô Jisos bvuu tu jim ɛ̂ kebuw e, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wo nɛ fɛɛ?” Geenɛn ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu ejeme ɛ̂ me le? Kɛ wo kee lɛ me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keencinɛ wo le mbvuu ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keeŋgay ɛ́ bó eta wo yî kentam e le?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo bee ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me we sɛ bó to nya mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo fowe kɛ. Nonɛn nje fifin, wee wvù nya me can yo le nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke kebefɛ ɛ kí kuuke fele kuw.”
Ɛ Baylɛt dioo yuw njeme wvun, mum kɛw no gomte je keecinɛ wvú le. Geenɛn ɛ Bojuu wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo mom lo ɛ cinɛ wee wvun e, tu kɛ wo nu nsaa Kaysa wvù Nfon wvu baay wvu Lum kɛ. Wee tfuu wvù bense ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu nfon nu wee bvuban wvu Kaysa.”
Ɛ Baylɛt dioo bvuu yuw wvun njeme, mum buy bô Jisos, shii yî kentaw ke nsaw e fò bó to teŋe lɛ Bvudvuu bvù bó bom bô Ɛta, teŋe ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ Gabata.
Ɛ̀ to nu wase Diuu di Nseyse wvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ kefew to nu wase diɛwɛ didiuu yuufe ncow difɛɛ le. Ɛ Baylɛt jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn Nfon wene wvun!”
Ɛ Bojuu bodvu no wamte lo lɛ, “Gɛnɛ lo bô wvú, gɛnɛ lo bô wvú, ta lo wvú yî kentam e!” Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me enta Nfon wene yî kentam e le?” Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese kɛŋke Nfon mvu ɛfey Kaysa kɛ.”
Ɛ Baylɛt mum nya Jisos ɛ̂ bó lɛ bó egɛn eta yî kentam e.
Ɛ bó mum jo Jisos, buy bô wvú. Ɛ wvú tuu kentam kew no gɛne fô bó teŋe lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ, teŋe ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ Golgota.
Ɛ bó mum gɛn ta wvú fó yî kentam e, ta tɛn bonyii bomew bofɛɛ yî bintam e, wvumvu ɛcɛɛy, wvumvu ɛŋkoŋko, ɛ Jisos no nu ɛntelɛŋ.
Ɛ Baylɛt tɛn saŋ fiɛɛ fimew ɛ bó ta yî kentam ke Jisos e. Fiɛɛ fì wvú to saŋɛɛ fidvu to nu lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, Nfon Bojuu.”
Bojuu nteen to nu ɛ taŋ fiɛɛ fì wvú to saŋɛɛ fidvu, njefo fò bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e to nu nceencee mbew kelaante le, ɛ wvú to saŋ fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu bô yi Latin noo yi Glek e.
Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bo Bojuu le gɛn gay ɛ̂ Baylɛt lɛ, “Fo wo esaŋ lɛ, ‘Nfon Bojuu’ kɛ. Saŋɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ, ‘Wee wvun duu lɛ wen nu Nfon Bojuu.’”
Ɛ Baylɛt tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì me nsaŋ nu ɛ me ɛ nsaŋ wase.”
No bonyii bo nci le to taɛ wase Jisos yî kentam e, mum jo ndvú ye gaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole mondvuum monɛm no bó to nu. Bó to nu ɛ jo naa noo kekum kew. Geenɛn ɛ kekum kin nu ɛ bó to tum kɛ lo kenlaatɛn e ɛ kɛw yî kendoŋ e ɛ bow ɛ buy yî bikaa le.
Nonɛn ɛ bó mum jeme ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Fo beene esaa kekum kin kɛ. Beene etum kaŋ, eyɛn wee wvù nu ekɛŋkɛ.” Fifin to kooyi keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bó to nu ɛ gaw ndvú yɛm fô bikuu bibole, tum kaŋ bô kekum kem.” Nonɛn bonyii bo nci le bodvu to nu ɛ ge kɛ naa fiɛɛ fidvu fin.
Geenɛn, bokɛnɛ bomew to leeme fó mbew kentam ke Jisos e. Bokɛnɛ ban to nu bwee Jisos bô waa bwee bwee Jisos wvù kpwoon noo Maalia wvù kpwɛɛ Klobas noo Maalia Magdalen.
Ɛ Jisos ke dioo enɛ eyɛn bwee le noo waa we ŋgoo wɛ wvù wvú to kooŋke ɛ bó leeme mbew ye le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bwee lɛ, “Kpwoon, taa eyɛn, wvun nu wase waa wo.”
No wvú gay nonɛn kase gay tɛn ɛ̂ waa we ŋgoo wɛ lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, wvun nu wase bwoo.” Ɛ kɛw sekekiɛ le ɛ waa we ŋgoo wvudvu mum jo bwee Jisos ɛ wvú gɛn no cee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew dvu wvú.
Ɛjim jodvu no Jisos to kee wase lɛ fiɛɛ ficii nu ɛ ka wase, ɛ wvú mum nɛ jeme keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Kendoŋ yumte me.”
Nsɛfe mvu to leeme fó bô mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi jó ɛ mó ɛ yiŋsɛn. Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bodvu mum ffum kusha jó bon yî fite fi isob e nɛke diuw we le.
Ɛ Jisos dioo fi mbvuum modvu mum gay lɛ, “Fí ɛ ka wase.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ŋgvuke ɛkolɛ, ɛ keyoy kew mum buy.
No ɛbvubwɛ to nu wase Diuu di Nseyse le keeley diuu di mbam e, ɛ Bojuu no gomte keege lɛ fo ɛgvun yodvu ke emɛy enu yî bintam e diuu di mbam e kɛ, (tete ɛ mbam wvudvu to nu wvu baay). Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e lɛkɛ lɛ wvú egay ɛ́ bó eŋgocɛ bikaa bi bonyii bò to nu yî bintam e bodvu wvu lɛ bó eyaŋsɛn ekpwekɛn ɛ́ bó eshike, ecake.
Nonɛn ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum to ŋgocɛ bikaa bi wee wvu fwe le, ŋgocɛ tɛn bi wvumvu wɛ wvù bó to taɛ bô wvú le.
Geenɛn, ɛ bó ke dioo to buy fô Jisos e, yɛn lɛ wvú be ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bvuu ŋgocɛ bikaa biew kɛ.
Ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le bon dita di Jisos e bô goo. No wvú bon nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ ɛlɛmɛ bô joo ta buy fó.
Wee wvù to yɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun e nu ɛ wvú ɛ ben jim nsaw wvudvu, ɛ njeme we nu kecɛɛy, ɛ wvú kee lo lɛ wen jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy wvu lɛ ben nulo ebee.
Mwɛɛm mvun to kooyi wvu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le eto ekocɛn no bó saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Kɛ ɛkufɛ kew kemwaaŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eŋgoy kɛ.”
Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bonyii nu ke etaale wee wvudvu wɛ wvù bó nu ɛ bon bô goo.”
Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Yosɛw wvu Alimatia nɛ gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ebee ɛ́ wen ecake gvune di Jisos e. Yosɛw wvun to nu wee ŋgoo Jisos geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛjim ɛjim njefo wvú to fane Bojuu. Ɛ Baylɛt bee, ɛ wvú mum gɛn keecake gvune didvu.
Nikodɛmus wvù to yawɛɛ gɛn yɛn Jisos e ɛntaŋ jomew to nu ɛ to tɛn bô bifuu bimew bì shfuuŋkene ɛ bó taashɛ ɛ kene bô mɛɛl noo alos ɛ bvujitɛ bvudvu nu kɛ diɛwɛ bokilu mbaanshɛ ncow botɛte le.
Ɛ bô wvú mum shike gvune di Jisos e njime bô ndvú ɛ bó ɛ yefe bô nfiey wɛ no ndwey wee to ké no nu ɛ̂ nce woŋ Bojuu le.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wɛɛ kentaaŋ wvumew nu mbew fò bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e. Ɛ wɛɛ wvudvu nu ɛ jem yi fiɛ mi nu dvú ɛ bó ke baa edwey wase wee jó kɛ.
Nonɛn no ɛbvubwɛ to nu wase Diuu di Bojuu le di Nseyse wvu diuu di Mbam e, ɛ jem yidvu nu tɛn nceencee, ɛ bó mum lese Jisos jó.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ Maalia Magdalen buy ja lo kebitele, gɛn fô jem, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ cake wase tɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú.
Nonɛn ɛ wvú mum lewtɛ gɛn yɛn Semon Bita le bô waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke le, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ bvuse wase Tata ɛ̂ jem, ɛ bese yaa kee laa bó gɛke fɛɛ wvú lɛ.”
Ɛ Bita bô waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ mum buy no gɛne fô jem.
Bó to gɛne lewte lo, geenɛn ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ lewtɛ fey Bita yaw fɛse fô jem.
No wvú fɛse, ŋgvuwcɛ taa, yɛn ɛ ndvú yì bó njimɛɛ yî Jisos e jiime jó. Ɛ wvú taa nonɛn faŋɛ yaa ley jó kɛ.
Ɛ Semon Bita bi wvú le fɛse fó, mum ley lo gɛn ɛ̂ jem. No wvú ley, yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvú yɛ le ɛ yí jiime,
noo fincake fi ndvu le fì bó to njimɛɛ ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e dvú, ɛ fí yaa jiime bô yimi ndvú yɛ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bó kɛwe ɛ gɛɛ bwew bvudvuu le ɛfinɛfin.
Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu wɛ wvù to yawɛɛ efɛse fô jem mum ley tɛn gɛn ɛ̂ jem yɛn fiɛɛ fin e mum bee.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bó baa cim kiɛɛ wase kenyi ke fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ Jisos to kɛŋke keeke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ba kase kfulɛ fô yew e.
Geenɛn ɛ Maalia shɛɛ no leeme beele fô jem. No wvú to beele ke nɛ ŋgvuwcɛ taa ɛ̂ jem,
yɛn bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bofɛɛ ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú yì baa ɛ shii fò bó to jikɛɛ gvune di Jisos e, wvumvu fô ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e to jiime, wvumvu fô bikaa biew to jiime.
Ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bodvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo beele la?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Me mbeele njefo bó nu ɛ cake Tata wɛm ɛ nɛ dvú ɛ me n'yaa ŋkee fò bó gɛke wvú kɛ.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, dioo baŋke ye yɛn ɛ Jisos leeme. Geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo beele la? Wo gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ Maalia mum no kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù taale fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvudvu le. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Icɛm, ɛ́ wo fɛn nu ɛ tuu wvú ɛ nɛ dvú, ɛ́ wo see fò wo gɛke wvú ɛ́ me eŋgɛn enjo enɛ dvú.”
Ɛ Jisos nɛ bɛn wvú lɛ, “Maalia.” Ɛ wvú baŋke ye tee wvú ɛ̂ díɛw yibo Ibulu le lɛ, “Laboni,” fì nu lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi.”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo ejicì me le kɛ, njefo me mbaa mben wase fô Icɛm e kɛ. Gɛnɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boom bo bwɛɛm e esee ɛ̂ bó lɛ me mbene wase fô Icɛm wvù ɛ̀ nu tɛn Icen e noo fô Nyo' wɛm wvù ɛ̀ nu tɛn Nyo' wene le.”
Ɛ Maalia Magdalen mum gɛn see ɛ̂ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le lɛ wen nu ɛ yɛn Tata le, bvuu see ɛ̂ bó lɛ wvú nu ɛ jeme mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ wen.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu fokiɛguu ɛbvubwɛ bvù ɛ̀ to nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e nu yew ɛ bó ɛ fen'yɛ bimbuŋ, njefo bó to fane Bojuu. Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buynɛn leem ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
No wvú gay bó le nonɛn, mum duŋcɛ can ye bô dita diew ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le yuw njoŋ baay no bó yɛnɛɛ Tata le.
Ɛ Jisos bvuu kase gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e. No Icɛm to tumɛɛ me, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me ntumte ben keseen.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum yoy yî bó le gay lɛ, “Ben efiisɛn Keyoy ke Yuule.
Ɛ́ ben lɛɛshi bibefɛ bi wee le, tu Nyo' nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase. Ben ɛ́ cinɛ sɛ ben ɛ lɛɛshɛ, tu bí ɛ mɛy wase.”
Ɛ̀ to nu seke Jisos to toɛ fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, kɛ Toma wvù to nu ŋgoo boom bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le wvù bó to teŋe diee diew dimew lɛ Ɛmam to nu bô bó kɛ.
Ɛ kebɛse ke boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ke mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese be ɛ yɛn Tata le.” Geenɛn, ɛ wvú gay fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me nu sɛ me ɛ ŋke ɛ n'yɛn dew bíɛn yɛ le yî can ye le, ɛ nlese kpwan ɛbo ɛ̂ dew bíɛn yidvu le, ɛ nlese tɛn kebo kem yî dita diew e, me nsaa mbee naa lo kɛ.”
Ɛ kemaa kum, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bvuu no nu yew ɛ Toma nu tɛn bô bó, ɛ dew fwese nu ɛ bó ɛ fen'yɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos nɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ Toma lɛ, “Lese kpwan wo ɛbo yî can yɛm e, eyɛn no yí nu, ebvuu elese tɛn ɛbo kuw yî dita diem e. Fo wo ekɛŋkè kemaŋɛn kɛ, bee.”
Ɛ Toma mum tfuse lo lɛ, “Tata wɛm, noo Nyo' wɛm.”
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo fɛn nu ɛ bee keseen njefo wo nu ɛ yɛn me le? Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò baa yɛn me le kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bee le.”
Jisos to nu ɛ ge mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le yɛn, ɛ bó baa saŋ ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvun e kɛ.
Geenɛn ɛ mvun mvù bó nu ɛ saŋ nu keege lɛ ben ebee lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, nu Waa Nyo'. Ɛ́ ben beŋe nonɛn, ɛ́ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nje diee diew.
Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Jisos ke bvuu duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mbew Mamase yì Tibɛlias e. Fí to kooy ɛ̂ yin je le:
Semon Bita bô Toma wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Ɛmam, noo Natanial wvu Kana keba kè Galilee le, noo boom bo Sɛbɛdee le, noo boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bomew bofɛɛ to nu bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ.
Ɛ Semon Bita nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu enlaa byé.” Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Beene nu elaa.” Ɛ bô bó mum buy gɛn ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e. Geenɛn ke ghan ce ɛ̂ joo ɛ bó baa koo lo fiɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke no yuule too, ɛ Jisos to leem ŋgem joo le, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Boom bem, ben nu ɛ koo kɛ byé?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “'Aay.”
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben elaŋ kensaŋ je ɛbo ɛcɛɛy jo kekoŋ ɛ́ ben ekoo fiɛɛ.” Ɛ bó mum laŋ, ɛ kí mum nɛ no ghaake bó keegufe, njefo bó to nu ɛ koo byé jó nteen.
Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke dioo yɛn nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Tata.” No Semon Bita yuw lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata, mum jise ndvú ye njefo wvú to nu ye yɛ. No wvú jise nonɛn mum sele ɛ̂ joo no gɛne fô Jisos e.
Geenɛn ɛ bomew boom bo ŋgoo le ba no bii ɛ̂ kekoŋ e guute kensaŋ kiɛ ɛ kí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô byé. Kɛ bó to bɛɛ ncejole keebuy ɛŋkpwaante kɛ. Bontam to shɛke kɛ wase diɛwɛ ŋkeŋkeŋ mbaanshen e.
Ɛ bó gɛn fɛse ɛŋkpwaante yɛn ŋguy e ɛ wvú keyte lo yî bika le, ɛ byé nu yî dvú le, ɛ blɛɛd nu tɛn fó.
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto bô byé yimi yì ben konte.”
Nonɛn ɛ Semon Bita gɛn ben ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gufe kensaŋ buy dvú ɛŋkpwaante ɛ kí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô byé yì faŋkɛn gbwee kecow mbaanshen ncow shɛ (153). Naa no yí to cim nu nteen nɛn, kensaŋ to baa semkɛn kɛ.
Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto ediekɛn.” Wee mwaaŋ boom bew bo ŋgoo le to baa cim mom naa lo ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù yɛɛ lɛ. Bó to nu ɛ kiɛɛ lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata.
Ɛ Jisos mum gɛn jo blɛɛd wɛ nya ɛ̂ bó noo byé yɛ fó.
Fin to nu wase bokaŋ botɛte no Jisos to duŋcɛɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ kɛw no wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le.
Ɛ bó ke diekɛn mɛse, ɛ Jisos bɛn Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me fele bomew ban e?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyì boom bem bo njée le.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu bɛn wvú yî bokaŋ e bofɛɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ taalè fô njée yɛm e.”
Ɛ Jisos bvuu bɛn wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me?” Ɛ Bita yuw no Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte lɛ laa wvú kooŋke wen ɛ, ɛ fí ffumse lo wvú. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo kee fiɛɛ ficii, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyi njée yɛm.
Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, seke wo to bɛɛ cuwee, ɛ̀ to ké kay wo kecaw kuw no gɛne fô wo kooŋke. Geenɛn seke wo ɛ lun wase nu ɛ wo nu ke ecake can we ɛ́ ekay wee mvu kecaw yî yo le, ejo wo egɛn dvú fô wo yaa kooŋke keegɛn kɛ.”
Jisos to jemyi fin duŋci ɛ ɛ̀ nu kfuu kpwe yì Bita to nu keeke ekpwe eto bô diee dì kuuke dvú fô Nyo' le. No Jisos jeme nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
Ɛ Bita dioo baŋke ye yɛn ɛ waa ŋgoo wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke bii bó le. Waa ŋgoo wvun nu wvù to yeemɛɛ gɛn yî Jisos e seke bô bó to diekene ɛkiɛguu yî kemɛse le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ wvudvu wvù nu ke egese wo?”
No Bita yɛnɛɛ ɛ waa ŋgoo wvudvu bii bó le, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, fi wee wvun e nu lɛ la?”
Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim mbe nshieele lɛ wvú emɛy enu egɛn ebuy no me ŋke eŋkase ento, ɛ́ fifiɛ ekɛŋke la keege bô wo? Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
No Jisos gayɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ njeme ke mum no gɛne ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo mbee le lɛ kɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wvun nu ke ekpwe kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ Jisos to baa gayte lɛ kɛ wvú nu ke ekpwe kɛ. Wvú to gay kɛ lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim mbe nshieele lɛ wvú emɛy enu egɛn ebuy no me ŋke eŋkase ento, ɛ́ fifiɛ ekɛŋke la keege bô wo.”
Waa ŋgoo wvudvu wvun nu wvù jemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ɛ saŋ mwɛɛm mvudvu, ɛ bese kee lo lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ fí nu kecɛɛy.
Mwɛɛm mvumew nu tɛn dvú nteen mvù Jisos to geɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ bó esaŋ mvunciim, ɛ́ me en'yɛne lɛ kɛ ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii nulo ekɛŋke fò bó egɛɛ boŋwa' bodvu kɛ.
Cee la Teofilus, ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvu fwe wvù me nto nsaŋɛɛ fô wo le, me nto nu ɛ nsaŋ jó ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Jisos to gee noo mvù wvú to yɛɛyi bonyii dvú, ɛ kɛw no wvú to kɛwɛɛ lemme diew,
gɛn buy diuu dì Nyo' to joɛ wvú ɛ wvú ben we. Ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ jo wvú ɛ́ wvú eben we, wvú to nu ɛ bɛɛ Keyoy ke Yuule tefe boom bew bo ntum e bò wvú to cawɛɛ.
Seke wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le, wvú to nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bó yî ɛdiuw e mbaanyɛ ɛ̂ jé le nteen nteen yì duŋci lɛ wvú nu dvú. Ɛ wvú bvuu no jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
No bô bó to nu nonɛn, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben ke enɛ Jɛlusalɛm kɛ. Ben ecɛytè nnya yì Icɛm to kawɛɛ ben dvú yì ben to yuwɛɛ ɛ me njemyi ɛkumɛ yí.
Ben ekeè lɛ Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn ɛjim jo ɛdiuw caan nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.”
Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ntum e ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè wo nu ege ɛ́ bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo Islael ekase esaake bvunfon bvubole le?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kefew kè fí nu ke ekooy nu ɛ ɛ̀ seyse Icɛm bô mvuŋgay mwew, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvunɛn keekiɛɛ kɛ.
Fì ben ekeè nu lɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nu ke eto eyiŋsɛn yî yene le, ɛ́ ben emum ekɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay, ekɛw eseŋe ɛkumɛ me Jɛlusalɛm noo biba bì Judea bô Samalia le bicii, egɛn ebuy ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna le.”
Kɛ no wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' jo wvú ɛ wvú no bene we ɛ bó taale no wvú bene, ben ɛ kembɛw baŋ wvú, ɛ wvú la ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
No bó luŋɛɛ ɛjisɛ we etaale no wvú bene, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bolemsɛ bofɛɛ to nu ɛ ja sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí baa, leem mbew bó le,
bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bolemsɛ bo Galilee, ben leeme taale la we? Jisos wvun wvù Nyo' jo ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvú ɛ ben we nu ke ekase eto kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben be yɛn ɛ wvú bene we.”
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum nɛ fô Kum Bite bi Olif e no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kɛ diɛwɛ keŋgawtɛn ke may e keegɛn buy jó.
No bó ley jó, mum ben gɛn ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe fò bó to ké no gɛne bɛɛle. Bonyii ban to nu Bita, Jon, Jɛm noo Andulu, Filew bô Toma, Batolomu bô Matio, Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Semon wvù to nu wee ŋgoo Bosɛlot noo Judas wvù waa Jɛm.
Ɛ́ bô bokɛnɛ bomew noo Maalia wvù bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e ké no taashi yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ keebunlee sekecii.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e taashɛ. Bó to nu fó wee diɛwɛ gbwee kecow mbaanfiɛɛ le (120). Ɛ Bita ja we jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi to kɛŋke kɛ keekooy. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule to geɛ ɛ Dawe jeme ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo ɛkumɛ Judas wvù to joɛ fwe ɛ bó sɛ koo Jisos.
Ben kee lɛ Judas wvun to nu wee mvu ŋgoo yesebeene le, kɛŋke diew lemme ɛ̂ beene ɛnte.”
(Ɛ́ Bita sɛ no jemyi nonɛn nu ɛ Judas to jo wase bigew bì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî fiɛɛ fì wvú to buwɛɛ le, guy bvudvuu dvú. Bvudvuu bvun nu fò wvú to gbweɛ ncine ɛ tee bvuyɛ, ɛ bvulɛw buy bvucii.
Ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bocii yuw, mum no teŋe bvudvuu bvudvu ɛ̂ díɛw yibole lɛ Akɛldema, fì nu lɛ, “Gbwen Ɛlɛmɛ.”)
Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Dawe to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le lɛ, ‘Bó ecinɛ ɛ́ la diew etu binffuy, ɛ́ wee saa ebvuu eceè fó kɛ.’ Fí bvuu nu ɛ wvú ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Wee mvu kɛŋke keejo bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le.’
No fí nu nonɛn, wee mvu kɛŋke keebɛne bese le, ɛ́ bee bó efewcì lɛ Tata Jisos to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Wvuwɛ wee kɛŋke keenu wee wvù to lɛne bee bó sekecii kè Jisos to ghane bee bó ɛ kɛw yî kefew kè Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo le, ɛ gɛn ɛ buy diuu dì Nyo' to joɛ Jisos ɛ̂ bese ɛnte ɛ wvú ben we le.”
<range>
No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó cu bonyii bofɛɛ. Wvumvu to nu Yosɛw wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Basabas bvuu teŋe lɛ Justus, ɛ wvumvu nu Matiaa.
No bó cu nonɛn, mum bunle lɛ, “Tata, wo kee mvuntelem mvu bonyii bocii le. Nonɛn, duŋcɛ ɛ̂ bese wee wvù wo nu ɛ caw ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban,
lɛ wvú enù waa ntum Jisos wvù ejo bvudvuu bvu Judas e bvu lemme le, bvù wvú to cin'yɛɛ gɛn fô wvú nu fó le.”
No bó bunle nonɛn, mum saŋ ɛdiee ɛbo, jɛm, ɛ di Matiaa le buy gbwe. Ɛ bó mum bise wvú ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ e.
Ɛ diuu di Ŋkaw mvu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Bɛntekos e ke to kocɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e ɛ taashɛ bvudvu bvumwaaŋ.
Ɛ bó ke nɛ sɛsɛ yuw ɛ fiɛɛ dvûmte shiile we kɛ diɛwɛ keekee le. Ɛ fí shii, ley yiŋsɛn yew yì bó to nu dvú le.
Ɛ bó dioo taa, yɛn fiɛɛ fimew e ɛ fí nu kɛ diɛwɛ leme di ŋguy e, ɛ fí mum saaŋkɛn gɛn yî bó le wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum yiŋsɛn yî bó le bocii, ge ɛ bó no jemyi díɛw bitum jɛɛy jɛɛy.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Bojuu bò to nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le nu Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bó ja bitum bicii bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le.
No bó yuw nonɛn, mum tase to nteen fô bonyii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e to nu. Ɛ bonyii bò to lesɛɛ fitele yî Jisos e bodvu no jemyi, ɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ yuuke ɛ̂ díɛw yibole. Ɛ fí ffumse bó.
Ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no ghayte, gayte lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò jemyi ban bocii nu bonyii bo Galilee le?
Fí ghan nɛɛ le beene ɛ sɛ no yuuke ɛ bó jemyi ɛ̂ díɛw bitum bisɛɛbeene le?
Beene bomew nɛ Baatia, bomew ɛ nɛ Medes bô Ɛlam, bomew ɛ nɛ Misobotɛmia bô Judea noo Kafadosia, bomew ɛ nɛ Bontus bô Ɛsia.
Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Fligia bô Bamfilia, bomew Ijiw bô biba bi Libia le, bì nu mbew kelaante kè Sɛlin e. Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Lum, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bojuu bô bonyii bò baŋke lo ɛ tu bonyii bo mbee Bojuu le.
Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Klɛt bô Alɛbia. Beene ɛ no yuuke ɛ̂ díɛw bitum bisɛɛbeene le jɛɛy jɛɛy no bonyii ban jemyi biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì Nyo' ge.”
Ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no ghayte ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa fifin fiɛɛ lo sɛ duŋci lɛ la lɛ.
Ɛ bomew bonyii no sɛwsee lo fibole gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu ɛ mbvuum ɛ koo bó.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Bita bô kebɛse ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ mum leem fó. Ɛ Bita mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le foweɛwe lɛ, “Ben Bojuu noo bonyii bocii bò cee Jɛlusalɛm, ben enya bitem ntay ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme ɛ̂ ben.
Mbvuum baa koo bonyii ban no ben kpwaake kɛ. Keseen bɛɛ kɛ lo didiuu bvuukɛ fontaŋɛntaŋ.
Fiɛɛ fì kooyi fin keseen nu fì Juɛl wvù wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ,
‘Nyo' gayte lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu yî ɛdiuw yo fokemɛse le, ɛ́ wen etfuw Keyoy kewene yî bonyii bocii le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ boom bonɛn bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ eyuuke mwɛɛm mvù wen jemyi, seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii, ɛ́ mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bifilɛ le etoo fô cubonyii bonɛn e, ɛ́ bifilɛ elamte ŋgaybonyii bonɛn.
Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ́ wen etfuw Keyoy kewene yî bonyii bo lemme le bowene bocii, bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ, ɛ́ bó eyuuke mwɛɛm mvù wen jemyi, seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii.
Wen nu ke ege mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e we, ebvuu ege mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvuwene yî nshɛ le. Ɛlɛmɛ bô ŋguy noo njiim yì bɛmte nu ke enu.
Diuu nu ke ejiim, ɛ́ kpwee enɛ eyɛɛle diɛwɛ ɛlɛmɛ le, ɛ́ diuu di baay di Tata le di keŋghaw e sɛ keeke eto.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ naa yɛɛ wvù nu ke elɛke Tata, ke eboy.’”
Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben eyekɛ eyuw ntay fiɛɛ fì me njemyi. Jisos wvu Nasalɛt to nu wee ɛ Nyo' to loocɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ tum wen wvú no wvú to geɛ ɛ́ Jisos egee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e noo biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ. Ben kee naa mwɛɛm mvun ntay.
Jisos wvun nu wee wvù bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ɛ̀ to seyse kɛ Nyo' ɛ fí ke no kooyi ɛ wvú to kee wase. Ɛ ben mum yu wvú no ben to nyaɛ wvú can bonyii bò befe le, ɛ bó ta yî kentam e.
Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ wvú boy can kpwe le njefo kɛ ɛ̀ to nulo ɛ́ kpwe emɛy ejici wvú le kɛ.
Dawe to nu ɛ jeme ɛkumɛ Jisos wvun gayte lɛ, ‘Me n'yɛne Tata Nyo' le ɛ wvú nu bee wvú sekecii ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshiw me kɛ.
Nonɛn, fitele fiem ɛ mum ɛ no yuuke njoŋ, ɛ me njemyi bô nlaŋlaŋ. Me nu wee ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkpwe kɛ lo, geenɛn ɛ me ntaale kɛ fwe,
njefo kɛ wo wvù Nyo' nu ke ecinɛ keyoy kem e woŋ boŋkfu le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wo nu ke ecinɛ Waa wo lemme wvù Yuule le ɛ́ wvú efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.
Wo nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase me je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfey jó nsɛ mboy. Me nu ŋke enlaŋlaŋe no me nu ŋke enu ɛ̂ wo fwe.’”
Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme ɛ̂ ben sɛ kemaŋɛn lɛ icee cee wesebeene wvù Nfon Dawe to nu ɛ kpwe, ɛ bó dwey wvú, ɛ jem ye nu fɛn ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e.
Wvú to nu wee ntum Nyo' bvuu kiɛɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvú dvú lew lɛ wen nu ke egɛɛ wan wvu ɛ̂ kfuu diew e yî kawla we le.
Ɛ wvú mum yaŋsɛn yɛn fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to nu keeke ege le, mum jeme lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wvú to baa emɛy woŋ boŋkfu le kɛ, ɛ ye ye to baa efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.’
Jisos wvun nu ɛ Nyo' to bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ bese bocii bò nu bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le.
Nyo' nu ɛ bense wase wvú ɛ shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e, ɛ nya Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ wvú no wvú to kawɛɛ. Fiɛɛ fì ben yɛne bvuu yuuke keseen nu Keyoy kedvu ɛ Jisos ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese.
Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu Dawe wvù to benɛɛ we kɛ. Dawe kebɛɛ to nu ɛ gay fiew lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ, shiilɛ ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e,
egɛn ebuy seke me nu ŋke enshike bonyii buw bo bvuban e ɛ̂ wo ɛjise, ɛ́ wo etome bikaa biuw yî bó le diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biuw e.’
Nonɛn, bonyii bocii bo Islael emum ekeè lo ntay lɛ Jisos wvun wvù ben to taɛ yî kentam e nu wvú wvù Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata bvuu nu Mboyse wvù wvú to kawɛɛ.”
No bonyii bodvu yuwɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ njeme wvudvu koo bó. Ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ Bita bô kebɛse ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e lɛ, “Boom bo bwee wese le, bese nu ege nɛɛ keseen?”
Ɛ Bita tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ekumɛn fitele fiew, ɛ́ bó elese wvú ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le wvu lɛ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ biew ebvuu enya wvú bô nnya ye yì ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
Ŋkawma wvudvu wvun nu fô ben e, noo fô boom bonɛn e, bvuu nu fô bonyii bocii bò nu fonfwan e. Wvú nu fô bonyii bocii bò Tata wvù Nyo' wesebeene teŋe ɛ bó too fô wvú le.”
Ɛ Bita bvuu jeme mwɛɛm nteen, tefe bó, lɛkɛ lɛ bó efi bikuu bibole yî ŋgɛw wvù nu keeke eto yî ɛŋgokɛ kè befe kin e.
Ɛ bonyii yuw njeme Bita wvun, ɛ nteen bee, ɛ bó mum lese bó ɛ̂ joo. Ɛbvubwɛ ɛ bonyii bise ŋgoo bonyii bo Jisos e diɛwɛ bontfuke botɛte (3,000) le.
Ɛ bó mum nya bikuu bibole no yuuke mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to yɛɛyi. Ɛ bô bó no nu yî kentaashɛ le, guutene blɛɛd, bvuu bunlee yî kentaashɛ le.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e no gee mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le, ɛ bonyii yɛne, ɛ fí ghaake lo bó.
Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bocii no nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, kɛŋke fiɛɛ fibole fimwaaŋ.
Ɛ́ bó ké nɛ gese mondvuum mobole bô mwɛɛm mvubole, gaw bigew bidvu ɛbonɛbon no ŋgɛw wee nu.
Ɛ bó no shee taashi yew ncese le ɛdiuw ɛcii, diekene yî kentaashɛ le ɛla le bô nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole, yaa yɛɛle ɛjisɛ kɛ,
bensee Nyo'. Ɛ bonyii no yɛne nonɛn, bɛnsee bó. Ɛ Tata no boysee bonyii ɛdiuw ɛcii, biise ŋgoo yibole.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Bita bô Jon nɛ no bene fô yew ncese le kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le fomvunsheeŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke bunle le.
Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii ɛ tuu wee mvu ɛ no too dvú, to shike diuw ketaaŋ wvù bó to teŋe lɛ wvù Jee le wvù to leyte fô yew ncese le. Wee wvudvu nu ɛ bó to boke wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkɛwlɛ, ɛ́ bonyii ké no tuule wvú ɛdiuw ɛcii too shiwse fó ɛ wvú lɛke bigew ɛ̂ bonyii bò fele leyte yew ncese le.
Ɛ wvú yɛn Bita bô Jon e ɛ bó fele keeley fó, mum no lɛke bigew ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ bó luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le. Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa bese!”
Ɛ wvú mum taa bó, kpwaake lɛ bó nu enya fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wen.
Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke naa lo bigew kɛ, geenɛn fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke nu ɛ me nu enya ɛ̂ wo. Me ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu wvu Nasalɛt e, ja we elɛnè!”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum jicɛ wvú le yî kebo ke ɛcɛɛy e, cake we. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bikaa bô mvuŋkoko mvu wee wvudvu le mum tɛme.
Ɛ wvú sele we leem, mum kɛw no lɛne. Ɛ bô bó gɛn ley fô yew ncese le, ɛ wvú no ghane fó maymayi, bensee Nyo'.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yɛnɛɛ no wvú ghane bensee Nyo',
kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù se shee lɛke ɛlɛkɛɛ diuw ketaaŋ wɛ wvù bó teŋe lɛ wvù Jee le wvù leyte fô yew ncese le. Ɛ ɛjisɛ jiim bó, ɛ bó no kɛŋke ŋghaw yî fiɛɛ fì kooy bô wvú le.
Ɛ wee wvudvu ŋɛɛm lo yî Bita bô Jon e. Ɛ bonyii yɛn ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no lewte gɛne bɛwse bó le fô bvudvuu bvù bó to teŋe lɛ cile Saamun e.
Ɛ Bita yɛn no bonyii tase ɛ to, mum jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù diuw yumte ben ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin ɛ ben taale bese nɛn? Ben kpwaake finɛn lɛ ɛ̀ ge mvuŋgay mvusɛse wee wvun ɛ sɛ no lɛne le? Nuu ben kpwaake tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ ge nce wese wvù yuule lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ.
Fí nu lɛ Nyo' Abla'am bô Aysik noo Yakow, wvù nu Nyo' bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bocii to nu ɛ bense wase Jisos wvù wee we lemme gɛɛ mbew ye le. Jisos wvun nu wvù ben to tunɛɛ jo nya ɛ̂ bonyii bo nsaw e, ɛ Baylɛt no gomte keecinɛ wvú le, ɛ ben faŋ.
Jisos to nu wee wvù yuule, nu teytey, ɛ ben tun wvú, gay lɛ bó ebvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to yuwyɛɛ bonyii, enya ɛ̂ ben.
Ɛ ben ge nonɛn mum yu wee wvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii, geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ bese yɛn wvú le ɛ mum ɛ no seŋe.
Ɛ̀ ge mvuŋgay mvu diee di Jisos wvudvu le ŋkɛwlɛ wvun wvù ben yɛne, kee, ɛ sɛ no lɛne. Fí kooyi nonɛn njefo bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e, fitele fì bese lese yî ye le ɛ mum ɛ ge wee wvun ɛ no tɛmyi ntay nɛn no ben yɛne.
Keseen boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkee lɛ fiɛɛ fì ben ɛ bikuu bi woŋ e to geɛ bô Jisos nu ɛ ben ɛ bó to ge yaa kee kɛ.
Fí to kooyi ɛ̂ yiyin je le keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Nyo' to geɛ wase ɛ bonyii bew bo ntum e jeme ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ Mboyse we wvù wvú to kawɛɛ nu ke eyɛn ŋgɛw.
Nonɛn, ben ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn ekase etu jim fô wvú le, wvu lɛ wvú elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ binɛn,
emum ege ɛ́ shém elɛɛtɛn ben, eciinse Jisos wvù Mboyse wvù wvú to balɛɛ fô ben e.
Jisos wvun kɛŋke keeke emɛy fowe egɛn ebuy kefew kè Nyo' ke eseyse mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ́ mvú ekase etu mvunfɛm, no wvú to jemyɛɛ diuw bonyii bew bo ntum e bò yuule le ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e.
Muses to nu ɛ yuu gay lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' nu ke ebvuse wee we ntum mvu ɛ̂ boom bo bwee wene le ɛnte, eciinse fô ben e kɛ no wvú to bvusɛɛ me, ɛ ben kɛŋke keeke eyuukè fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ ben e.
Wee wvù nu ke enu sɛ wvú yuuke wee ntum wvudvu le, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebvuse wvú ŋgoo bonyii bo Nyo' le, elɛse lo.’
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii ɛ kɛw yî Samwɛl e noo bò to toɛ ɛjim jo wvú to jemyɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù kooyi ɛdiuw ɛyan e.
Mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ dew bonyii bew bo ntum e ban nu mvunɛn, ɛ kelew kè Nyo' to dieɛ bô bo'icee cee bonɛn nu tɛn fô ben e. Ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Abla'am lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke embuw bonyii bocii yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le nfele yî kfuu diuw e.’
Ɛ Nyo' mum caw wee we lemme yaw tum ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ben e lɛ wvú eto elaŋ kembonɛn yî yene le, ege ɛ́ ben ecinɛ jé yene yì befe le.”
Kɛ no Bita bô Jon to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii nonɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bomew bô ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte yew ncese noo Bosadusii bomew sele fó.
Bó to ton'yi shém njefo Bita bô Jon to yɛɛyi bonyii, fewci lɛ no Jisos to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le nu ɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy tɛn yî kpwe le.
Ɛ bó mum koo bó gɛn fen no ɛ̀ to nu wase fokiɛguu, lɛ bvú ke edioo ɛ yuu, ɛ́ bó sɛ no yuuke.
Geenɛn, bonyii nteen bò to yuwɛɛ n'yɛɛyi Bita bô Jon, to nu ɛ bee, ɛ ŋgoo yibo bise, ɛ bolemsɛ no nu wase diɛwɛ bontfuke botin e (5,000).
Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ bocee woŋ bô bonyii bò saake woŋ noo bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, tase bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ Annas wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô Kayfas noo Jon bô Alɛksanda noo bonyii bomew bò to nu tɛn kfuu di ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le nu fó.
Ɛ bó mum leke Bita bô Jon ɛ̂ bó ɛjise, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben se jo fɛɛ mvuŋgay ɛ sɛ fɛ wee wvun? Ben se fɛ ɛ̂ diee di yɛɛ le?”
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Bita le, ge ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bocee woŋ bô bonyii bò saake woŋ,
bese leeme fɛn ɛbɛn keetaŋe diuw ɛkumɛ lemme dì jee dì bese se geɛ fô ŋkɛwlɛ le, wvú ɛ sɛ no lɛne. No ben gomte keekiɛɛ no fí se ghanɛɛ,
ben noo bonyii bocii bo Islael ekeè lɛ wee wvun leeme ɛ̂ ben ɛjise keseen tɛmyi nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mvuŋgay mvu diee di Jisos Klistu wvu Nasalɛt e. Jisos wvudvu wvun nu wvù ben to joɛ ta yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le.
Wvú nu tɛ dì Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi ɛkumɛ dí lɛ, ‘Tɛ dì ben bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ nu ɛ dí nɛ wase ɛ tu tɛ di buu di yew e.’
Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ Jisos maaŋ wvù boysee bonyii. Kɛ diee di wee mvu le bvuu nu dvú fokuse fɛn dì Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ dí eboyse beene kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to saake ba, yuw no Bita bô Jon jemyi yaa fane kɛ, bvuu yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ncɛw, ɛ bó baa kee ŋwa' ntay kɛ, ɛ diuw yum lo bó. Ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ lɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò to ghane bô bo Jisos.
Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bvuu kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ekicɛn Bita bô Jon yî dvú le kɛ, njefo bó to yɛne wee wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ le, ɛ wvú leeme bô bó.
Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bodvu nɛ yaw bvuse bó ɛkfuŋ, mum shɛɛ no cuu bontaŋ ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ,
“Beene nu ege nɛɛ bô bonyii ban? Bonyii bocii bo Jɛlusalɛm nu ɛ bó ɛ kiɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛndan fin fì bó ge, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene etun kɛ.
Geenɛn, keege lɛ fo saaka wvudvu wvun ebvuu esaaŋkenè gɛnè fwe, beene ekan bonyii ban lɛ fo bó ebvuu emom lo ejeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos wvun e kɛ.”
Ɛ bó tee Bita bô Jon ɛ bó kase ley. Ɛ bó mum lew lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke ebvuu emom lo ejeme, kɛnɛɛ eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos e kɛ.
Ɛ Bita bô Jon tfuse fibole lɛ, “Ben kɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ laa fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ fô Nyo' le nu lɛ bese eyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben e, nuu wvú wvù Nyo' le lɛ?
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese elu keejemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù bese nu ɛ yɛn ɛ bvuu ɛ yuw e kɛ.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bodvu bvuu loocɛ lew lo tɛme, mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne. Ɛ bó to tan ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó elese bó dvú yî ŋgɛw e, njefo bonyii bocii to bensee Nyo' yî fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le,
sɛ bvuu ge ɛ wee wvudvu wvù bó to geɛ fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le fin keefɛ wvú to nu ɛ wvú ɛ fey wase bilum mbaanyɛ.
No bó cin'yɛɛ Bita bô Jon e nonɛn, ɛ bó kase tu jim fô bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le, see ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ be jeme.
Ɛ bó yuw, mum baancɛ ye lɛkɛ ɛ̂ Nyo' yî wee le mwaaŋ lɛ, “Tata wvù Cee Ɛkolɛ, ɛ̀ to bom wo ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ bô jóo noo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu mondvuum man e.
Wo to nu ɛ ge ɛ icee bo'icee bosɛse wvù Dawe, wvù to nu waa wo lemme jeme yî mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ffuuke bô fiɛɛ shém e, ɛ bonyii cuu bontaŋ sɛ bó nu ke elem ŋkuuŋ?
Bonfon bo fokuse fɛn seysee jem, ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ taashi keediu Tata bô wee we wvù wvú nu ɛ yefe lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse.’
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ ɛlaante jan. Nfon 'Ɛlod bô Bontus Baylɛt to nu ɛ taashɛ bô bitum noo bonyii bo Islael die mvunaŋ ɛjim jo Jisos wvù Waa wo lemme wvù yuule wvù wo to yefɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse.
Bó to taashi keege ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù wo to nu ɛ seyse wase ncejole bô mvuŋgay mwuw lɛ wo kooŋke lɛ mvú ke ekooy.
Nonɛn, yî keseen e Tata, taa eyɛn je yì bonyii ban bɛmsee bese jó. Nya bese bonyii buw bo lemme le bô mvuntelem mvù tɛmyi keefewci diɛw yo yaa fane naa lo kɛ.
Nya bese bô mvuŋgay mwuw keefɛle bonyii bvuu gee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mwuw bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e dvú ɛ̂ diee di Jisos wvù Waa wo lemme wvù yuule le.”
No bó mɛse ɛ bunle, ɛ nshɛ shiw fò bó to nu. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî bó le, ɛ bó mum no fewci diɛw Nyo' yaa fane kɛ.
Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le no nu fitele fimwaaŋ, nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, ɛ wee yaa teŋe fiɛɛ fimew lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwene wen ɛmbeŋ kɛ. Ɛ fiɛɛ fi wee le nu fi bonyii bocii le.
Ɛ Nyo' nya mvuŋgay mvu baay ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó bvuu no fewci kɛ ɛ̂ bonyii tɛmyi lo lɛ Tata Jisos to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Ɛ bó no nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ buw bó bô nfi we baay.
Kɛ wee yaa to nu dvú wvù fuute ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ kɛ, njefo bonyii bò to kɛŋke ŋɛɛ kɛnɛɛ yéw to ké gese, to bô bigew bidvu,
nya can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó mum gaw ɛ̂ bonyii bocii no ŋgɛw wee to nu.
Wee mvu to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Yosɛw, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ cu diee diew dimew lɛ Banaban, (dì nu lɛ, Wee N'yvuwsɛ Mvuntelem). Wvú to nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le, ɛ bó to boke wvú Sayblus.
Ɛ wvú mum gɛn tɛn gese we wɛɛ, to nya bigew bidvu can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
Ɛ wee mvu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Ananias bô kpwɛse wvù Safilia gese tɛn kecɛw ke wɛɛ le.
Ɛ bô kpwɛse seyse kaa fafe lo bigew bidvu, ɛ wvú mum jo kebɛse gɛn nya can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
No wvú nya nonɛn, ɛ Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ananias, ɛ̀ ge la fì wo cine Satan ɛ ley ɛ̂ fitele fiuw e ɛ ge lɛ wo embiay mbiay ɛ̂ Keyoy ke Yuule, wo ɛ mum ɛ fafe bigew bì wo gese wɛɛ dvú?
Wo dioo gese wɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wo, ɛ bigew nu kɛ biuw, wo ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ ge kfuu fin fiɛɛ? Wo baa mbiay ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii kɛ, wo mbiay ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo'.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ no Ananias yuw njeme wvun nonɛn, mum gbwe kpwe. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò yuwɛɛ saaka wvudvu fan baay.
Ɛ cubonyii ley baancɛ wvú ɛ̂ ndvu le, jo buy dvú gɛn dwey.
Ɛjim jo bontam bo kefew e diɛwɛ botɛte, ɛ kpwɛse ley, yaa kee fiɛɛ fì be kooy bô dweese kɛ.
Ɛ Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ me, bin nu bigew bicii bì ben ɛ dwee wo gese wɛɛ dvú?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ, ɛ̀ nu bí nɛn bicii.”
Ɛ Bita bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben ɛ dwee wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ seyse keemom Keyoy ke Tata le? Yekɛ eyuw, ncin bonyii bò be gɛn ɛ dwey dwee wo nu wase ɛ̂ yew fwese, ɛ bó nu eley etuu tɛn wo ebuy dvú egɛn edwey.”
No Bita jeme nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Safilia mum gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise kpwe. Ɛ cubonyii ba dioo ley yɛn ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ bó mum tuu wvú buy dvú gɛn dwey mbew dweese le.
Ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii noo bonyii bomew bò to yuwɛɛ saaka wvudvu fan baay.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e no gee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e nteen ɛ̂ bonyii ɛnte. Ɛ́ bonyii bo mbee le bocii ké no taashi fô kebuw ke Saamun e yew ncese le.
Kɛ wee wvu ncɛw to ké mum taashɛ lo bô bó kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bonyii to ké no bɛnsee naa bó ntay.
Ɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ nteen bò to leese fitele yî Tata le no biise ŋgoo bó le.
Ɛ mwɛɛm mvù boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to gee, ge ɛ bonyii no tuule bonyii bo bincɛm e jiwse mbew jé le yî bintaw e noo yî dighaam e wvu lɛ Bita ké dioo fele, ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu kenjiŋjiŋ kew ɛ́ kí egbwe yî wee le.
Ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no nɛn'yi bilaante bi mbew Jɛlusalɛm e too bô bonyii bo bincɛm e noo bò kɛŋke biyoy bì yiile yî bó le, ɛ bó fɛle bó bocii.
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô ŋgoo ye yì ɛ̀ to nu Bosadusii ke ja kɛw no ghɛɛke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e,
mum tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn koo bó fen yew ncaw e.
Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ ɛ nceendaa Tata to yene dew fwese yew ncaw bvuse bó. No wvú bvuse bó, mum gay lɛ,
“Ben egɛn yew ncese le, egɛn efewcì fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ nce wvu fwɛ wvun.”
No bó yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke dioo eyuule, ɛ bó ley fô yew ncese le, mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii. Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le, kum bonyii bo Islael bò saake woŋ bocii ɛ bô bó shii, mum tum bonyii bo nci le lɛ bó egɛn yew ncaw e, eto bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
Ɛ bó gɛn buy fó gom bó ŋkuuŋ mum tu jim to see lɛ,
“Bese gɛn ɛ buy yew ncaw e, ɛ yɛn ɛ dew fwese nu ɛ bó ɛ loocɛ ɛ fen, ɛ bonyii bo nci le leeme fó cɛyte. Bese ɛ dioo yene yew ley ɛ faŋɛ yaa eyɛn wee le dvú kɛ.”
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte yew ncese bô bocee ncese bo baay baay, yuw nonɛn, ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó no ghayte laa bó nu ke etu fɛɛ bô fin fiɛɛ lɛ.
Ɛ wee nɛ ley gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyuw, bonyii ba bò ben se fenɛɛ yew ncaw e, boba wase fô yew ncese le yɛɛyi bonyii.”
No bó yuw nonɛn, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bô ŋgoo ye mum buy gɛn jo bó, no too bô bó. Geenɛn, bó to baa joo bó kane lo bó kɛ, njefo bó, bonyii bo nci le bodvu to fane fo bonyii etumyɛ bó bô ɛta.
Ɛ bó to bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ley bô bó leke fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ. Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le no biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó gayte lɛ,
“Bese nu ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ lew lo lɛ fo ben ebvuu emom eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di wee wvun e kɛ. Geenɛn, ben eyɛn fiɛɛ fì ben mom! Ben nu ɛ ge wase n'yɛɛyi wene ɛ saaŋkɛn Jɛlusalɛm jocii. Ɛ ben gomte keege ɛ́ fí eduŋci lɛ bese kee fiɛɛ fô kpwe ye le.”
Ɛ Bita bô ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e tfuse lɛ, “Bese kɛŋke keeyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' le, ɛfey keeyuw wee le.
Ben to nu ɛ ta Jisos yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe. Ɛ Nyo' bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bvuse wvú yî kpwe le,
bense wvú, shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e lɛ wvú enù Cee Ɛkolɛ noo Mboyse, wvu lɛ bonyii bo Islael ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ wvú wvù Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
Bee bo Keyoy ke Yuule kè Nyo' nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bò yuuke wvú le ɛ mum ɛ no fewci mwɛɛm mvun.”
No bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw njeme wvun nonɛn, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keeyuwyɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
Geenɛn, ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò to saake woŋ e wvù diee to nu Gamalia, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee Falasii bvuu nu wee wvù duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, ɛ bonyii bocii wvumte wvú ntay, nɛ we. No wvú nɛ we, gay ɛ bó yaw bvuse boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛkfuŋ.
Ɛ wvú shɛɛ jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bò to saake woŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben ejo wɛɛ bô fiɛɛ fì ben gomte keege bô bonyii ban.
Ben ekume lɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu ja fɛn ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Teodas no duŋci lɛ wen nu wee wvu baay. Ɛ bonyii shfum ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim kɛ diɛwɛ gee nɛ le. Ɛ bó ke yu wvú ɛ ŋgoo ye tawse, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú to too dvú laayɛ ɛcici.
Ɛ wvumvu wee ke bvuu ja kefew kè bó to taaŋke bonyii le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Judas, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Galilee. Ɛ wvú gufe bonyii nteen ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim. Ɛ bó ke yu tɛn wvú, ɛ ŋgoo ye saaŋkɛn.
Yî fin e, me ɛ no nteete ben lɛ fo ben ege fiɛɛ bô bonyii ban kɛ. Ben ecinɛ je yibole. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó too dvú bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii dvú fin kɛw wee wvu wum, tu fí nu ke elaayɛ ɛcici.
Ɛ̀ no nu lɛ fiɛɛ fidvu kɛw Nyo', tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke eso bó kɛ. Ɛ́ ben baa eyɛne, ɛ́ fí ke enɛ ebuy lɛ ben diuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben ɛ bo Nyo'.”
No Gamalia jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw ntefe we, kase tee boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ bó ley. No bó ley nonɛn, ɛ bó tam bó, ciise lo lɛ fo bó ke ebvuu emom lo eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos e kɛ, mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne.
No bó buyɛɛ dvú no gɛne fibole yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ lɛ bowen nu ɛ bó ɛ kocɛn bonyii bò bó eshoose bó nje diee di Jisos e.
Ɛ bó gɛn nonɛn, bvuu no yɛɛyi kɛ bonyii ɛdiuw ɛcii fô yew ncese le noo ɛla le, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, no ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le to kuu gɛne fwe, ɛ Bojuu bò to jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu díɛw Glek nɛ kɛw no wvukene Bojuu bò to jemyi díɛw woŋ lɛ bó gawte mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ɛdiuw ɛcii nyaa mvu bo bowen e caan.
Nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ mum kum ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bocii gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ fí jee lɛ bese ecinɛ keefewci diɛw Nyo' egɛn shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî kecɛyte le kɛ.
Boom bo bwee wese le, fí jee lɛ ben ebaayɛ bonyii bosooshwiy ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, ɛ́ bese enya lemme din can yibole. Ben dioo baayi taa ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kɛŋke nce wvù jee, ɛ bó ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule bvuu kɛŋke bvufee.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ bese emum enya wase bikuu bisɛse ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bunle bô yî lemme di diɛw Nyo' le.”
Ɛ bonyii bocii yuw ntaŋ wvudvu, ɛ wvú joŋ bó le. Ɛ bó mum baa Tɛfan ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ mbee we ɛ loocɛ ɛ yiŋsɛn, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn tɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule. Ɛ bomew no nu Filew bô Blukolus, Nikano bô Timon, Balmɛnas bô Nikolaus wvù to nu wee wvu Antiok ɛ wvú to baŋke lo tu wee mbee Bojuu.
Ɛ bó mum jo bonyii ban leke fwe dvu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó bunle fô bó le, mum gɛɛ can yî bó le.
Ɛ diɛw Nyo' mum no saaŋkene gɛne. Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le yi Jɛlusalɛm no kuu gɛne fwe. Ɛ bocee ncese nteen lese tɛn fitele yî Jisos e.
Ɛ Nyo' buw Tɛfan ntay, ɛ wvú no kɛŋke mvuŋgay, gee mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ̂ bonyii ɛnte.
Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ kɛw mbew bô bo Tɛfan. Bonyii bodvu to nu Bojuu bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Sɛlin bô Alɛksandia noo Silishia bô Ɛsia. Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu bonyii bo yew bunle yì bó to teŋe lɛ yi Bonfaw bò Boy wase le.
No bó to bewci nonɛn, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nya Tɛfan bô bvufee ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa nu dvú wvù eso wvú kɛ.
Ɛ bó mum nɛ bɛyse bonyii bomew ɛjim ɛjim lɛ bó embiaytè lɛ bó nu ɛ yuw ɛ Tɛfan jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ Muses bô Nyo'.
No bó ge nonɛn, mum shiw mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, bô mvu bonyii bò saake woŋ e, noo mvu bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Ɛ bó mum ley yî Tɛfan e, jo wvú gɛn bô wvú fwe dvu bonyii bo woŋ e bò saake bonsaw.
Ɛ bonyii ba bvuu to bô bonyii bomew bò eben jim nsaw mbiay, ɛ bó no teyte mwɛɛm yî Tɛfan e gayte lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvun ké no nu sɛ wvú jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ yew ncese yin bô bonci bo Muses e kɛ.
Bese nu ɛ yuw wase ɛ wvú jemyi lɛ Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wɛ nu ke ebvuw yew ncese yin, ebvuu ekumɛn nce wesebeene woŋ wvù Muses to yɛɛyɛɛ beene dvú.”
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew nsaw e luŋ ɛjisɛ yî Tɛfan e, nɛ yɛn ɛ bvushiw bwew ɛ baŋke wase ye ɛ no fieesene bvu nceendaa Nyo' le.
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bife ɛ̂ Tɛfan lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù bó jemyi mvun nu kecɛɛy e?”
Ɛ Tɛfan tfuse lɛ, “Bo'icɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ eyuw. Nyo' bvukukɛ to nu ɛ buynɛn fô icee wesebeene wvù Abla'am e ɛ wvú bɛɛ cee Misobotɛmia, ɛ wvú sɛ ke nɛ gɛn no cee 'Alan,
gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Cinɛ kfuu diuw e, ebuy woŋ wene le, egɛn woŋ wvù me nu ŋke enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wo le.’
Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum nɛ Kaldia jodvu, gɛn no cee 'Alan. Ɛ ice ke dioo kpwe, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ wvú nɛ to jan jò beene cee keseen.
Ɛ wvú no nu jan ɛ Nyo' faŋɛ yaa ecim enya wvú kɛ naa bô kpweŋ kɛ, geenɛn, kaw lɛ wen nu ke enya woŋ wvun ɛ́ enu we bô ɛŋgokɛ kew. Ɛ Nyo' to kaake nonɛn ɛ Abla'am baa cim kɛŋke wase wan kɛ.
Ɛ Nyo' bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛŋgokɛ kuw nu ke enu botolo woŋ mvu le, ke elemte bvunfaw jó, ɛ bó nvuwse bó yî bilum e gee nɛ (400).
Ɛ me nu ŋke enlaŋ ŋgɛw yî woŋ wvudvu le, ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ kuw ke ebuy jó eto ebunlee me jan.’
Ɛ Nyo' bvuu die kelew bô Abla'am, ɛ nciise kelew kedvu nu lɛ Abla'am nu ke etfuuse boom bew yew. Ɛ Abla'am ke boo Aysik, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw nyaŋ ɛ wvú tfuse wvú yew. Ɛ Aysik ke boo Yakow tfuse tɛn wvú yew. Ɛ Yakow ke tfuse tɛn boom bew bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ yew bò ɛ̀ nu bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene fô kfuu disɛɛbeene to sanɛɛ.
Ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bodvu ke nɛ no bene kendoŋ bô Yosɛw wvù waa bwee bó mum gese wvú, ɛ wvú gɛn no nu nfwa woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' no taale kɛ fô wvú le,
fii wvú yî boŋgɛw bew e bocii. Ɛ Nyo' bvuu nya wvú bô bvufee, ɛ Fɛlo, Nfon wvu Ijiw no kooŋke wvú, mum gɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú no nu wee we kebay bvuu nu wee wvù taale fô kfuu diew e.
Ɛ jeŋ ke nɛ koo Ijiw jocii noo Kanaan, ɛ bonyii yɛn ŋgɛw baay. Ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene faŋɛ yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fidien kɛ.
Ɛ Yakow ke yuw lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien nu Ijiw, mum tum boom bew bò ɛ̀ nu bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene ɛ bó gɛn jó yî kaŋ wvu fwe le.
Ɛ bó ke dioo kase gɛn jó yî bokaŋ bo bofɛɛ le, ɛ Yosɛw mum ge ɛ boom bo bwee le kiɛɛ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum duŋcɛ tɛn bó ɛ̂ Fɛlo.
Ɛ Yosɛw mum ciinse ntum fô Yakow wvù ice le, lɛ wvú bô kfuu dicii eto Ijiw. Kfuu di Yakow e to nu sekedvu wee mbaŋsooshwiy ncow botin (75).
Ɛ Yakow yuw nonɛn, mum jo kfuu diew dicii bow dvú Ijiw. Ɛ wvú bô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene ke kpwekɛn jó bocii.
Ɛ bó ke tuu ɛgvun ɛbo kase to dvú jan, to dwey Shɛkɛm ɛ̂ jem yì Abla'am to guyɛɛ ɛ̂ boom bo Amol e.
Ɛ kefew ke dioo kocine kè Nyo' to nu keeke ege fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ Abla'am dvú, ɛ bonyii bosɛɛbeene duule wase Ijiw baay.
Ɛ bonyii bo jó ke ghaa nfon mvu ɛ wvú yaa kee Yosɛw kɛ.
Ɛ Nfon wvudvu mum no wɛɛntene, sɛne bonyii bosɛɛbeene, kane lɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene elaaŋke mvunlɛy mvu boom e ɛkfuŋ ɛ bó kpwekene.
Ɛ̀ nu kefew kekin e kè bó to bokɛɛ Muses, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wan ɛ wvú jee baay fô Nyo' le. Ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ wvú yew kee tɛ,
mum jo gɛn gɛɛ ɛkfuŋ. Ɛ waa Nfon Fɛlo wvù kpwoon ke gɛn boŋyɛ wvú, lɛy diɛwɛ waa we le.
Ɛ bó mum yɛɛyi Muses bô bvufee bvu bonyii bo Ijiw e bvucii, ɛ wvú no nu wee wvù kee njeme bô keege fiɛɛ ntay.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo nu kɛ diɛwɛ bilum mbaanyɛ le, ke nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ wen nu egɛn eyɛn no boom bo bwee wen e bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo Islael nu.
Ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, yɛn ɛ wee wvu Ijiw nvuwse wee wvu Islael mvu. Ɛ wvú ley fó lɛ wen etfuse ɛnvukɛ, mum yu lo wee wvu Ijiw wvudvu.
Wvú to kpwaake lɛ boom bo bwee wen e nu ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum Nyo' wen lɛ wen eto ebvuse bó yî ŋgɛw e. Geenɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ Muses bvuu no gɛne, buynɛn yî bonyii bo Islael e bofɛɛ ɛ bó nɛ ɛ no diuu. Ɛ wvú ley fó keegawsɛn bvudiuw bvudvu, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben nu wee bô waa bwee, ɛ̀ ge la ben ɛ sɛ no diuu ɛbenɛben?’
Ɛ wee wvù to nvuwse waa bwee kaa domse lo Muses, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ wo lɛ wo esaakè bese, sumtene bonsaw bosɛse?
Wo fɛn bvuu gomte keeyu me no wo se yuɛ wee wvu Ijiw wɛ foguu le?’
Ɛ Muses yuw nonɛn, mum fan nɛ woŋ wvù Ijiw e, fɛɛ gɛn no nu woŋ wvù Midian e, ke boo boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ jó.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum mbaanyɛ, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' buynɛn fô Muses e ɛ̂ ŋguy e, ɛ wvú bɛɛnci yî kete le ŋkpwaante mbew kum wvù Sinay e.
Ɛ Muses yɛn ɛ fí ghaw wvú, ɛ wvú bencɛ nceencee keetaa ntay. No wvú benci, yuw ɛ Tata Nyo' jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Nyo' bo'icee cee wene, Nyo' Abla'am bô wvu Aysik noo wvu Yakow.’ Ɛ Muses yuw nonɛn, no ciiŋke bô nfan, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu emom lo etaa kɛ.
Ɛ Tata Nyo' bvuu jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Baayɛ bolaba buw, njefo fɛn fò wo leeme fó nu bvudvuu bvù yuule.
Me nu ɛ nloocɛ wase ɛ n'yɛn no bó nvuwse bonyii bem Ijiw, ɛ mbvuu ɛ n'yuw no bó cone, ɛ mum ɛ nshii ɛ nto keembvuse bó yî ŋgɛw wvudvu le. Yekɛ eyuw, me nu entum wo Ijiw keseen.’
Muses wvun nu wvù bó to yawɛɛ wase tun, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ wo lɛ wo esaakè bese, sumtene bonsaw bosɛse?’ Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' to tumɛɛ lɛ wvú egɛn enu wee sa' wvubo, ebvuse bó yî ŋgɛw e. Ɛ Nyo' to tum ɛ ɛ̀ nu nceendaa we ɛ wvú to yî kete kè to bɛɛnci kiɛ le tefe ntum wvudvu ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ Muses mum gɛn Ijiw, ge mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e, bvuse bó jó. Ɛ wvú ge mvumew fô Joo yi Baay yì Yɛɛle le, bvuu ge mvumew ŋkpwaante jò bó to lɛnɛɛ yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Muses wvudvu wvù to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke ebvuse wee we ntum mvu ɛ̂ boom bo bwee wene le ɛnte, eciinse fô ben e kɛ no wvú to bvusɛɛ me.’
Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ wvú wvù Muses wvù nceendaa Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî kum wvù Sinay e, kefew kè kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Islael e to nu ŋkpwaante bô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene, ɛ Nyo' nya díɛw yì nyaa nshii lɛ wvú efese ɛ̂ beene.
Geenɛn, ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene kaa faŋ keeyuw Muses e, baŋke jim ɛ̂ wvú le, mum no kooŋke lɛ bowen bee ekase etu jim Ijiw.
Ɛ bó mum gay ɛ̂ Ɛlon lɛ, ‘Bomɛ bonyo' ɛ̂ bese bò nu esaa fwe dvusɛɛbeene, njefo bese baa bvuu kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì kooyi bô Muses wɛ wvù bvusɛɛ beene woŋ wvù Ijiw e kɛ.’
Ɛ bó mum kene fimooso ɛ fí fieesene waa na', sɛɛyɛ nyám ge ncese dvú ɛ̂ fí, mum no laŋlaŋe yî fiɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ kene bó bô can yibo.
No bó ge nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' mum baŋke jim ɛ̂ bó le, ɛ bó mum no bunlee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuu bô kpwee noo jón. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Bonyii bo Islael, ben to sɛɛle nyám ŋkpwaante yî bilum e mbaanyɛ, ceese ɛ ɛ̀ nu me dvú le?
Ben to ghane tuule cun ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Molok, bvuu tuule jon ɛ bó ɛ kene lɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù diee nu Lefan, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvumooso mvù ben to keencɛɛ keebunlee mvú. Nje fifin, me nu ŋke ebvuse ben ɛ́ ben ebuy egɛn efey lo Babilon.’
Bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene to lɛne ŋkpwaante kɛŋke cun yì duŋci lɛ Nyo' nu bô bó, ɛ ɛ̀ to fɛ Muses cun yidvu, bii kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no yì Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú to nu.
Ɛ boom bo bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene le ke fi, ke tuu to dvú jan kefew kè bô bo Yoshua to lole nshɛ ɛ̂ bitum bì to nu jan e, ɛ ɛ̀ to gɛne Nyo' fwe kuuŋke bitum bidvu. Ɛ cun yidvu no nu jan to buy kefew kè Nfon Dawe to saake woŋ wvun e.
Ɛ Nyo' no kooŋke wvú ntay, ɛ wvú mum lɛkɛ lɛ Nyo' ebee ɛ́ wen ebom yew enya ɛ́ wvú wvù Nyo' Yakow eceè dvú.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke kaa ghan Saamun bom yew Nyo' yidvu.
Geenɛn, ɛ Tata Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e yaa ké no cee yéw yì ɛ̀ bom bonyii le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee ntum Nyo' mvu to saŋɛɛ wase ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ,
‘Fowe nu kawla wɛm, ɛ nshɛ yin nu kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biem e. Yew yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebom lɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛm nulo enu nɛɛ? Nuu lɛ bvudvuu nu dvú bvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enshii fó lɛ?
Kɛ ɛ̀ fɛ me mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim e?’”
Ɛ Tɛfan mum nɛ gay lɛ, “Ben tɛmyi bikuu baay, ɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn bô bitem nu naa lo ntffuse. Ben ɛ bo'icee cee bonɛn nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ. Ben tune sekecii keeyuuke Keyoy ke Yuule le.
Wee ntum Nyo' mvu nu dvú wvù bo'icee cee bonɛn to baa ebone bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim e? Bó to nu ɛ yuwyɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ Wee Lemme Nyo' wvu Teytey nu ke eto. Ɛ wvú ke to, ɛ ben gese wvú bvuu yu wvú.
Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ ben bò Nyo' to tumɛɛ bonceendaa bew ɛ bó nya bonci bew ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben tun keebii bó le.”
No bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw fiɛɛ fì Tɛfan jeme, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó, ɛ bó no ŋgeci bigew.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Tɛfan e, ɛ wvú no taale fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu we, nɛ yɛn n'yuu wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo' le, bvuu yɛn Jisos e ɛ wvú leeme ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.
Ɛ Tɛfan nɛ gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, me nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ fowe ɛ yene, ɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee leeme ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.”
Ɛ bó yuw fifiɛ, mum jinɛ bintuŋtuŋ bô can, no wamte foweɛwe, mum sɛn bocii ley yî Tɛfan e,
gufe wvú buy dvú ɛlaante, gɛn no tumte bô ɛta. Ɛ bonyii bò benɛɛ jim nsaw baayɛ bikum bibole, nya ɛ̂ cuwee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Saul, sɛ no tumte.
No bó to tumte Tɛfan bô ɛta nonɛn, ɛ wvú bunle lɛ, “Tata Jisos, fiisɛn keyoy kem.”
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ tum ɛnvuw fokuse, fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Tata, fo wo etaa ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì befe fin fì bonyii ban gee le kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum kpwe.
No bó yu Tɛfan, ɛ Saul tom. Kɛ ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ bó kɛw no nyaa ŋgɛw wvù tɛmyi ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ kí saaŋkɛn kecii buy jó, gɛn biba bi Judea bô Samalia le, ɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛ kɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
Ɛ bolemsɛ bomew bò to nu ɛ loocɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, to jo gvune di Tɛfan e dwey, bee wvú baay.
Ɛ Saul nu fiew looci gɛne lo bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, daŋsene yéw e kooyi bonyii bo mbee le bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ ciinse yew ncaw e.
Ɛ bonyii bò to saaŋkɛnɛɛ ba no gɛne mondvuum e monciim fewci diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ Filew bow fiew gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Samalia le, no fewci saaka jó wvu ɛkumɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
Ɛ bonyii nteen yuw bvuu yɛn mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù wvú to gee, mum nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú ntay.
Biyoy bì yiile to buyte yî bonyii le, wamte foweɛwe, ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu ɛ kpwekɛn keba kemwaaŋ noo bontɛŋɛ bonene tɛn.
Nonɛn, ɛ nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay no nu ɛlaante jodvu.
Wee mvu to nu ɛlaante jodvu ɛ diee nu Semon, ɛ wvú to shee wase duŋci nfim ye ɛ kɛw lo, ɛ bonyii bo Samalia bocii yɛne ɛ diuw yumte bó. Ɛ wvú to bvuu duu lɛ wen nu wee mvu wvu baay.
Ɛ bonyii bocii bo ɛlaante jodvu naa noo bo baay baay nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú no gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun nu mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù bó teŋe lɛ Mvuŋgay mvu Baay.”
Bó to nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú nonɛn, njefo wvú to shee wase duŋci nfim ye ɛ kɛw lo ncejole ɛ bonyii yɛne ɛ diuw yumte bó.
Geenɛn, ɛ Filew ke dioo eto efewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le noo ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos Klistu le, ɛ bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ bee ɛ wvú lese bó ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ Semon wɛ kebɛɛ bee tɛn ɛ bó lese wvú ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ wvú mum mɛy kɛ wase no nu mbew Filew e yɛne biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bi baay baay bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù wvú to gee, ɛ diuw yumte wvú.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ke yuw Jɛlusalɛm lɛ bonyii bo Samalia nu ɛ fiisɛn wase diɛw Nyo', ɛ bó mum tum Bita bô Jon fô bó le.
Ɛ bó gɛn buy jó, bunle fô bonyii bo mbee le bodvu le lɛ bó ekɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule,
njefo Keyoy ke Yuule to baa to wase yî mvu bó le kɛ. Bó to bɛɛ lese kɛ lo bó ɛ̂ joo maaŋ ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos e.
Ɛ Bita bô Jon bunle, gɛɛ can yî bó le, ɛ bó mum kɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule.
Ɛ Semon dioo yɛn lɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e gɛɛle can yî bonyii le ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule too yî bó le, ɛ wvú mum no nyaa bigew ɛ̂ Bita bô Jon,
gayte lɛ, “Ben enya me bô mvuŋgay mvun tɛn, wvu lɛ naa yɛɛ wvù me ɛ ŋgɛɛ can yɛm yî ye le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule.”
Ɛ Bita tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben ɛ bigew biuw bidvu egɛn lo ŋguy e. Wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eguy nnya yì ɛ̀ nu yi Nyo' bô bigew?
Kɛ wo yaa kɛŋke naa lo keleŋ ɛnte jo lemme din kɛ, njefo kɛ fitele fiuw yuule fô Nyo' le kɛ.
Kumɛn fitele fiuw yî fiɛɛ fì befe fì wo gomte keege fin e, ebunlee laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Tata Nyo' elɛɛshɛ boŋkpwawcɛ bò befe ban bò wo kɛŋke fô fitele le lɛ.
Me n'yɛne lɛ wo nu ɛ yiŋsɛn wase bô ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ, ɛ tu nfwa kebefɛ.”
Ɛ Semon lɛkɛ Bita bô Jon lɛ, “Kee, ben ebunle ɛ̂ Tata lɛ fo fiɛɛ fimew ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvù ben jemyi mvun e ekooy bô me kɛ.”
Ɛ Bita bô Jon ke mɛse fewcɛ diɛw Nyo', see mwɛɛm mvù bó kee ɛkumɛ Jisos, mum nɛ no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm. No bó to tuu jim, no fele bontɛw bo Samalia bomew e, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' jó.
Ɛ nceendaa Tata ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ Filew lɛ, “Nɛnɛ ebow je ɛkuɛku, egɛn ɛ̂ je yì nɛn'yi Jɛlusalɛm fele ŋkpwaante gɛne Gasa le.”
Ɛ Filew mum nɛ no booke. Ɛ wee wvu baay mvu wvu Itofia nu ɛ̂ je yidvu le. Wvú to nu wee ɛ bó ɛ bvuushɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to taale fô kpwaw Yaa Kanda wvù to saake woŋ wvù Itofia le. Wee wvudvu to nɛ Jɛlusalɛm jò wvú to gɛnɛɛ keebunle Nyo',
no tuu jim woŋ e ɛ̂ kekoto kemew kè ɛ̀ guute nyám e, ɛ wvú ɛ shii jó, taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wvù Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ le.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ Filew lɛ, “Bencɛ egɛn mbew kekoto keki le.”
Ɛ Filew lewtɛ gɛn mbew yî dvú le, yuw ɛ wee wvudvu taaŋke ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Yɛsaya le. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo taaŋke nɛn yuuke fiɛɛ fì wvú gayte?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me en'yuw nɛɛ le sɛ wee ɛ nɛle ɛ̂ me?” Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ Filew eben ɛ́ bô wvú eshii ɛ̂ kekoto le.
Bvudvuu bvù wvú to taaŋke ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wvudvu le to jemyi lɛ, “Wvú to nu diɛwɛ njee yì bó gɛne keesɛɛ le, bvuu nu diɛwɛ waa njee wvù bó ké dioo mvuu yvúw ye, wvú saa beele kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no wvú to nu diuw tfu.
Bó to nu ɛ shoose wvú, tun keesaw nsaw we lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eyuu ejemyi yɛɛ ɛkumɛ boom bew, ɛ bó ɛ sum wase nshii we fokuse fɛn?”
Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu mum lɛkɛ Filew gay lɛ, “Kee wo, kɛ see ɛ̂ me, wee ntum Nyo' wvun jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ yɛɛ? Wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew nuu ɛkumɛ wee mvu lɛ?”
Ɛ Filew mum kɛw kɛ bô bvudvuu bvu Ŋwa' le bvudvu, no nɛci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ bô wvú no gɛne kɛ ɛ̂ je, ke gɛn buy bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ joo nu fó. Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu gay lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, joo nu fɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ebvuu etun la fo wo elese me ɛ̂ joo?” [
Ɛ Filew tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu ɛ bee Jisos Klistu le bô fitele fiuw ficii, ɛ́ me enlese wo ɛ̂ joo.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Me nu ɛ mbee lɛ Jisos Klistu nu Waa Nyo'.”]
Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu mum gay ɛ bó leke kekoto. Ɛ bô Filew shii, ley gɛn ɛ̂ joo, ɛ Filew lese wvú ɛ̂ joo.
No bó buyɛɛ ɛ̂ joo, ɛ Keyoy ke Tata le cun Filew fó, ɛ wee wvu baay wɛ faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eyɛn wvú le kɛ. Geenɛn, no gɛne kɛ fiew laŋlaŋe.
Ɛ Filew nɛ buynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase Asotus, mum nɛ no gɛne, fele ɛ̂ bilaante bicii le, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo', gɛn buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Saul bɛɛ kɛ ffuuke, bɛmsee bonyii bo ŋgoo le bo Tata le lɛ wen nu eyuwyɛ bó. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn fô ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le,
lɛkɛ lɛ wvú enya boŋwa' ɛ́ wen egɛn dvú yéw bunle yi Damaskus e, bò duŋci lɛ ɛ́ wen yɛn ɛ bonyii nu jó bò bii Je Tata le kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bokɛnɛ, kɛnɛɛ bolemsɛ, ɛ́ wen ekooyɛ bó ekay, eto bô bó Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ wvú nya, ɛ Saul mum nɛ no gɛne Damaskus, ke dioo feŋene kelaante kedvu, ɛ n'yuu mvu nɛ sɛsɛ law fowe, shii to yî ye le.
Ɛ wvú gbwe fokuse, yuw ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Saul, Saul, wo bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nɛn nje la?”
Ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ?” Ɛ diɛw yidvu tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jisos, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù wo bone bikaa ɛjim jodvu.
Yî keseen e, ja we, eley egɛn ɛlaante, ɛ́ bó esee ɛ̂ wo fiɛɛ fì wo kɛŋke keege.”
Ɛ bonyii bò to lɛne bô bo Saul leem fó ŋgɛmtɛn, no bó to yuuke diɛw yidvu yaa yɛne wee le kɛ.
Ɛ Saul ke ja we fokuse, dioo yene ɛjisɛ, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eyɛne mwɛɛm e kɛ. Ɛ bó mum jicɛ wvú yî kebo le, no cɛŋse gɛne bô wvú Damaskus.
Ɛ wvú gɛn no nu yî ɛdiuw e ɛta yaa yɛne mwɛɛm e kɛ. Ɛ wvú nu nonɛn, yaa diee fiɛɛ kɛ, yaa wuu tɛn fiɛɛ kɛ.
Wee mbee mvu to nu Damaskus jodvu ɛ diee diew nu Ananias. Ɛ Tata Jisos nɛ tee wvú ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le lɛ, “Ananias.” Ɛ wvú bee lɛ, “Tata, me wvun fɛn.”
Ɛ Tata gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nɛnɛ, egɛnè ɛ̂ je yì bó teŋe lɛ Teytey e, dioo buy fô yew e fo Judas, bife wee mvu wvu Taasus ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Saul. Yekɛ eyuw, wvú nu fó bunlee,
ɛ wvú be ɛ yɛn wase wee le ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Ananias, ɛ wvú ɛ to ɛ gɛɛ can yî ye le, lɛ wvú ekase eyɛne mwɛɛm e.”
Geenɛn, ɛ Ananias gay lɛ, “Tata, me nu ɛ n'yuw wase ɛ̂ bonyii nteen ɛkumɛ wee wvun no wvú gee mwɛɛm mvù befe fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ wvú too nɛn, ɛ wvú ɛ fi mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay, lɛ wen eto ekooyɛ bonyii bocii jan bò bunle teŋe diee diuw.”
Ɛ Tata tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gɛnɛ kɛ lo. Me nu ɛ ncaw wase wee wvudvu wee wɛm lemme le, lɛ wvú efewcì diee diem ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bô bonfon bobole, noo ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
Me kebɛɛ nu ŋke enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú no wvú kɛŋke keeke eyɛn ŋgɛw nje diee diem.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Ananias mum gɛn, ley yew dvudvu, gɛɛ can ye yî Saul e, tee lɛ, “Saul waa bwɛɛm, ɛ̀ tum Tata Jisos me. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Jisos wvù wo se yɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ je seke wo se too jan. Wvú tum me nɛn, lɛ me ento eŋge ɛ́ wo ekase eyɛnè mwɛɛm e, ɛ́ Keyoy ke Yuule eto eyiŋsɛn yî yo le.”
Kɛ no wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew diɛwɛ ŋgáw e nɛ yî ɛjisɛ Saul e gbwe fokuse, ɛ wvú mum kase no yɛne mwɛɛm e. Ɛ wvú ja we, ɛ bó mum lese wvú ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ wvú ke diekɛn, ɛ mvuŋgay kase tu yî ye le. Ɛ Saul ce Damaskus bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le yî ɛdiuw e caan,
mum kɛw lo kaŋ mwaaŋ no ghane yéw bunle le, fewci lɛ, “Jisos nu Waa Nyo'.”
Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yuuke no ghayte lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wvù se ghane gɛne lo bô bonyii bò bunlee teŋe diee din Jɛlusalɛm e? Ɛ kɛ wvú to jan nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu keekooyɛ bò nu jan ekase egɛn dvú, enya can bocee ncese bo baay baay e le?”
Ɛ Saul no fewci kɛ fiew ɛkumɛ Jisos tɛmyi lo, duŋci lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ. Ɛ Bojuu bò to nu Damaskus ma lo fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó etfuse ɛ̂ wvú.
Ɛ ɛdiuw ke dioo fey nteen, ɛ Bojuu bodvu shii, cu ntaŋ keeyu Saul.
Ɛ bó mum no shee, cɛyte wvú diuw ketaaŋ ke Damaskus e, lɛ wvú ke dioo fele, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛntaŋ kɛnɛɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ, ɛ́ bó eyu wvú. Geenɛn, ɛ Saul kiɛɛ ntaŋ wvubo.
Ɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le ke jo wvú ɛntaŋ, lese ɛ̂ ŋkaa le, bvuse fô ntoo ketaaŋ e, shike wvú fokuse wase ɛkfuŋ.
Ɛ Saul tu jim Jɛlusalɛm, dioo gomte keetaashɛ bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bó no fane lo wvú, njefo kɛ bó to beŋe lɛ wvú looci nu wee wvubo ŋgoo kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ Banaban jo wvú, ɛ bô wvú gɛn fô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e. Ɛ wvú see ɛ̂ bó no Saul to yɛnɛɛ Tata le ɛ̂ je ɛ bô wvú jeme, bvuu see ɛ̂ bó no wvú to fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos Damaskus yaa fane kɛ.
Nonɛn, ɛ Saul mum no nu bô bó ghane mondvuum monciim Jɛlusalɛm, fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos, yaa fane kɛ.
Ɛ wvú ke no jemyi tɛn ɛ̂ Bojuu bò to jemyi díɛw Glek, beeke mbew bô bó, ɛ bó mum nɛ no gomte keeyu wvú.
Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le kiɛɛ lɛ bó gomte keeyu wvú, mum jo wvú bow dvú ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le, ciinse wvú ɛ wvú gɛn Taasus.
Yî kefew kekin e, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le lɛɛtɛn yî ŋgɛw e ɛ̂ biba bi woŋ e bì Judea bô Galilee noo Samalia le. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ kentaashɛ kedvu ciim, bvuu no tomte ŋgoo ɛ yí kuu. Ɛ bó no cee, wvumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata.
Ɛ Bita no ghane, gɛne fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le mondvuum e monciim, ke ghan gɛn buy fô bó Lida le.
No wvú to nu jó, yɛn wee mvu le ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe keba kemwaaŋ, ɛ diee nu Ɛnias ɛ wvú ɛ ŋgɛy wase ɛntaw bilum nyaŋ.
No Bita yɛn wvú le, tee lɛ, “Ɛnias, Jisos Klistu fɛle wase wo. Ja we eseyse kentaw kuw.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Ɛnias mum ja we.
Ɛ bonyii bo Lida noo bo yî bale di Shalon e bocii yɛn no wee wvudvu nu ɛ bonɛn wase, ɛ bó lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jofa le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee mbee, ɛ diee nu Tabita, dì nu ɛ̂ díɛw Glek e lɛ Dokas. Wvú to ké no gee mwɛɛm mvù jee sekecii, fii bonyii bò fuute.
Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu gbwe kencɛm, mum kpwe. Ɛ bó cukɛ gvune diew, ben gɛɛ ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe le.
No Jofa to nu mbew Lida le, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le ke yuw lɛ Bita nu Lida, mum tum bolemsɛ bofɛɛ fô wvú le. Ɛ bó gɛn lɛkɛ wvú, lɛ kee wvú, lɛ wvú eto kɛ ncin e.
Ɛ Bita mum nɛ kɛ nonɛn ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ wvú gɛn buy fó, ɛ bó jo wvú ben bô wvú ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe kiɛ le. Ɛ bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bo jó bocii gem wvú tase no beele, duŋci ndvú yì Dokas to gee seke wvú to bɛɛ dvú.
Ɛ Bita bvuse bó ɛkfuŋ bocii, tum ɛnvuw fokuse bunle, nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ gvune didvu lɛ, “Tabita ja we.” Ɛ wvú mum yene ɛjisɛ, taa Bita, mum ja shii we.
Ɛ Bita jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, ɛ wvú leem we. Ɛ wvú kase tee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bô bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ba, duŋcɛ wvú ɛ̂ bó, ɛ wvú ɛ kase wase ɛ tu dvú.
Ɛ saaka wvudvu saaŋkɛn gɛn Jofa jocii. Ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî Tata le.
Ɛ Bita no nu Jofa yî ɛdiuw e nteen, cee bô wee mvu wvù to seysee jéw ɛ diee nu Semon.
Wee mvu to nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Konɛyu, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum, yì bó to teŋe lɛ yi Itali.
Ɛ wvú to nu wee ɛ bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le. Ɛ wvú wvumte bvuu bunlee Nyo' sekecii, nyaa nnya ntay ɛ̂ Bojuu bò to fuute.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le fomvunsheeŋ, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô wvú le, ɛ wvú loocɛ yɛn nceendaa Nyo' le ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu to ley tee wvú lɛ, “Konɛyu”.
Ɛ Konɛyu fan, luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛ̀ nu la?” Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ yuw wase bunle yo, ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn nnya yì wo nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute, ɛ kume wo.
Yî keseen e, tumɛ bonyii Jofa ɛ́ bó egɛn etee wee mvu wvù diee nu Semon, ɛ dimew nu Bita.
Wvú nu ɛ to ɛ no cee bô Semon mvu wvù ké no seysee jéw wvù la diew nu mbew joo yi baay e.”
No nceendaa Nyo' wvudvu jeme nonɛn mum nɛ. Ɛ Konɛyu shɛɛ tee bonyii bew bo lemme le bofɛɛ, bvuu tee tɛn wee nci mvu wvù to ké no cɛyte wvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú tɛn ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le.
Ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú see fiɛɛ ficii fì be kooy ɛ̂ bó, mum tum bó Jofa.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ bó fɛɛse wase ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ Bita nɛ ben ɛ̂ yew we keebunle.
Ɛ jeŋ ke nɛ no yuu wvú, ɛ wvú no shieele keediekɛn, ɛ bó bɛɛ dɛɛle lo mwɛɛm mvudien. Ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô wvú le.
Ɛ wvú yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ ɛbulɛ ɛ yene, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shiile fowe nu diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke ndvu le, ɛ bó jici yî ɛbuw yo ɛna le.
Ɛ dikfuu di nyám e dicii, yì lɛne, bô yì sone lo, noo mvunyiim mvù bile we, nu ɛ̂ ndvu yidvu le.
Ɛ diɛw nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bita, nɛnɛ we esɛɛyɛ edie.”
Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Tata, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emom kɛ, njefo me ŋke mbaa ndie wase fiɛɛ fi ncɛwncɛw kɛnɛɛ fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo kɛ.”
Ɛ diɛw yidvu bvuu jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo enyɛnsè fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ ge wase fí ɛ no yuule kɛ.”
Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn buy bokaŋ botɛte, ɛ bó mum kase bense fiɛɛ fidvu we.
Ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu fì toɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ffumse Bita ɛ wvú no maa laa fí duŋci lɛ la lɛ. Kɛ sekedvu ɛ bonyii bò Konɛyu to tumɛɛ ba ɛ to wase ɛ biwcɛ fò la di Semon wvù seysee jéw e nu, ɛ no leeme diuw ketaaŋ e,
teŋe, biite lɛ, “Wee ghane mvu nu fɛn ɛ diee nu Semon Bita le?”
No Bita to bɛɛ kpwawci ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu fì toɛ fô wvú le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bonyii botɛte gomte wo.
Nɛnɛ we ebow ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛne ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ. Fo wo ecimcim kɛ, ɛ̀ tum me bó.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Bita mum nɛ bow, gay ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù ben gomte. Ben to lɛ la?”
Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Konɛyu wvù nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum nu ɛ tum bese. Wvú nu wee wvu teytey, fane Nyo', ɛ Bojuu bocii bɛnsee wvú. Nceendaa Nyo' wvù yuule mvu se nu ɛ gay lɛ wvú eciinse ntum ɛ́ wo eto ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ́ wvú eyuw fiɛɛ fì wo nu ejeme ɛ̂ wvú.”
No bó tfuse nonɛn, ɛ Bita mum gay ɛ bó ley ɛ bô bó ce. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú nɛ ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bo Jofa bi wvú le.
Ɛ bó lɛn ce, ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bó fɛse Kaysalia. Ɛ Konɛyu bô bonyii bew bo kfuu le noo nsáa ye shém yì wvú to beɛ to cɛyte wase bó.
No Bita to leyte gɛne yew, ɛ bô Konɛyu tasɛn. Ɛ Konɛyu gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise wvum wvú.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bita cake wvú we gay lɛ, “Nɛnɛ we, me nu kɛ tɛn fiem wee wvu wum diɛwɛ wo le.”
Ɛ wvú no jemyi bô Konɛyu leyte gɛne yew, ke dioo ley, yɛn ɛ bonyii ɛ njim lo yew.
Ɛ wvú jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kee ntay lɛ nci wese baa bee lɛ wee Juu elaa ghane kɛnɛɛ etase nsan bô wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu. Geenɛn, Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ kɛ me ŋkɛŋke keenteŋe wee mvu nduu lɛ wvú nu wee wvu ncɛw kɛnɛɛ lɛ kɛ wvú yuule kɛ.
Nonɛn, ben ɛ dioo ciinse ntum lɛ me ento, me ɛ mum ɛ nto, me mbaa ŋkicine kɛ. Me ɛ mum ɛ no mbiite ɛ̂ ben lɛ laa ben teŋe me lɛ la lɛ?”
Ɛ Konɛyu tfuse lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu wase ɛdiuw ɛna no me nto nu yew dvu me kɛ diɛwɛ kefew ke keseen e didiuu ditɛte fomvunsheeŋ mbunlee. Ɛ wee mvu nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn fwe dvu me ɛ wvú ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí lawkene.
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Konɛyu, Nyo' nu ɛ yuw wase bunle yo ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn nnyá yì wo nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ kume wo.
Nonɛn, tumɛ bonyii Jofa ɛ́ bó egɛn etee wee mvu ɛ diee diew nu Semon, ɛ dimew nu Bita. Wvú nu ɛ to ɛ no cee bô Semon wvù seysee jéw wvù la diew nu mbew joo yi baay e.’
Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ me mum nciinse ntum lɛ wo eto. Wo ɛ to nɛn, fí ɛ joŋ baay. Bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu fɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise keeyuw fiɛɛ fì Tata tum wo lɛ wo eto ejeme ɛ̂ bese.”
Ɛ Bita mum kɛw no jemyi gayte lɛ, “Yî kecɛɛy e, me nu ɛ n'yɛn lɛ kɛ Nyo' duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
Wee tfuu wvù fane wvú bvuu gee fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ nu ɛ wvú fiisene wvú yaa taale laa mwɛtɛn buy fɛɛ lɛ.
Ben kee ntum wvù Nyo' to ciinsɛɛ fô bonyii bo Islael e, fewci saaka wvù jee lɛ Jisos Klistu to to wvu lɛ nyɛkeey nulo enu ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô bonyii. Ɛ Jisos Klistu wvun nu Cee Ɛkolɛ bonyii bocii.
Ben kee fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu, ɛ fí to kɛw Galilee ɛjim jo kefew kè Jon to fewci leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ ben kee tɛn no Nyo' to tfuwɛɛ lo Keyoy ke Yuule yî Jisos wvu Nasalɛt e, bvuu nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wvú, no nu bô wvú. No Nyo' to nu bô wvú, ɛ wvú mum no lɛne mondvuum monciim gee lemme dì jee bvuu fɛle bonyii bò dɛwle nvuwse.
Ɛ̀ nu bese bò to yɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú to gee woŋ Bojuu le tfuu, noo mvù wvú to gee ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm e. Bó to nu ɛ ta wvú yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe.
Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ Nyo' bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ge ɛ bonyii yɛn wvú le.
