Ɛ kɛ ɛ yaa nu bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le kɛ. Ɛ̀ to yɛn kɛ bese bò wvú wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ lɛ bese efewcì ɛkumɛ Jisos. Ɛ bese to nu ɛ diɛkɛn bvuu wukɛn bee bo Jisos seke wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le.
Ɛ wvú gay lɛ bese ke efewcì diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii, bvuu seŋe ɛ̂ bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen wvù Nyo' nu ɛ baa lɛ wen ke esaw bonyii bò bɛɛ dvú noo bò kpwekɛn wase.
Jisos wvun nu wvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii to jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ biew fele yî diee diew e.”
Kɛ no Bita to bɛɛ jemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ shii, to yî wee tfuu wvù to yeke njeme wvudvu le.
Ɛ diuw yum bonyii bo mbee le bò ɛ̀ nu Bojuu bò to biɛ Bita le, no bó yɛnɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ nya tɛn nnya ye yì ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
Ɛ Bojuu ba no yuuke ɛ bó jemyi díɛw yì bó yaa kee kɛ, bensee Nyo'. Ɛ Bita mum bife lɛ,
“No Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ to wase yî bonyii ban e lɛŋlɛŋ no kí to toɛ yî yese beene le, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu etun fo bó elese bó ɛ̂ joo le?”
No Bita bife nonɛn, mum gay lɛ bó elese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le. Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ bonyii bodvu lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ece bô bó yî ɛdiuw e caan sɛ nɛnɛ.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bonyii bo mbee le Judea jocii ke yuw lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ fiisɛn wase tɛn diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ Bita ke dioo kase ben Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew mum no saake wvú. Bonyii ban nu bò to ké no leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke keetfuse wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu yew, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn sɛ no nu wee Nyo'.
Ɛ bó no saake wvú biite lɛ, “Wo se ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ laa ghane ɛ̂ bonyii bò bɛɛ ntffuse le, ɛ bvuu ɛ mɛse ɛ diɛkɛn ben ɛ bó?”
Ɛ Bita mum loocɛ nyɛy fiɛɛ ficii fì to kooyɛɛ, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
“Me nto nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jofa le mbunlee, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô me le. Ɛ me n'yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shiile fowe nu diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke ndvu le, ɛ bó jici yî ɛbuw yo ɛna le. Ɛ fí shii, leem ɛ̂ me ɛjise.
Ɛ me ndioo ntaa jó, n'yɛn nyám e dikfuu le dikfuu le, ɛ yimi nu yi fô yew e, yimi yi ŋkpwaante bô yì sone, noo mvunyiim mvù bile we.
Ɛ me nɛ n'yuw ɛ diɛw gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Bita, nɛnɛ we esɛɛyɛ edie.’
Ɛ me ntfuse lɛ, ‘Tata, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emom kɛ. Kɛ fiɛɛ fi ncɛwncɛw kɛnɛɛ fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo ke nu ɛ ley wase ɛ̂ me ɛmvu kɛ.’
Ɛ diɛw yidvu bvuu jeme we lɛ, ‘Fo wo enyɛnsè fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ ge wase fí ɛ no yuule kɛ.’
Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn buy bokaŋ botɛte ɛ bó mum kase gufe fiɛɛ fidvu ficii ɛ fí ben we.
Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ bonyii botɛte fɛse fô yew e fò me nto ncee, ɛ bó nɛ Kaysalia, ɛ bó tum lɛ bó eto etee me.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ me lɛ fo me enyaw keeŋgɛn bee bonyii bodvu kɛ. Ɛ boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo Jofa bo bosoocaan ban bi me le, ɛ bee bó bocii gɛn ley yew dvu wee wvudvu.
No bese ley, ɛ wvú see ɛ̂ bese no wvú to yɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' le ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ wvú gay lɛ wen etum wee Jofa ɛ́ wvú egɛn etee wee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Semon Bita.
Wee wvudvu nu ke eto bô saaka wvù bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wen yew nu ke eboy yî dvú le.
Ɛ me ŋke ndioo ŋkɛw keenjemyi, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ shii to yî bonyii bodvu le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kí to toɛ yî yese beene le foŋkɛw.
Ɛ me n'yɛn nonɛn, mum ŋkume fiɛɛ fì Tata to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn, Nyo' nu ke elese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.’
No Nyo' to nu ɛ nya bonyii bodvu bô nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ yí yì wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene seke beene to lesɛɛ fitele yî Tata Jisos Klistu le, ɛ́ me enu yɛɛ wvù etunè fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ gee Nyo'?”
Ɛ bonyii bodvu yuw no Bita jeme nonɛn, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu esaake wvú kɛ. Ɛ bó mum nɛ no tumte ɛ ɛ̀ nu moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, kɛ tu Nyo' nu ɛ nya wase tɛn je ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
Bonyii bò to saaŋkɛnɛɛ no ŋgɛw to kɛwɛɛ seke bó to yuɛ Tɛfan to nu ɛ gɛn mondvuum e mondvuum e, gɛn buy Fonishia, ɛ bomew gɛn Sayblus, bomew Antiok. No bó gɛnɛɛ nonɛn, no fewci diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ Bojuu maaŋ.
Geenɛn, ɛ bomew bonyii bo mbee le bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Sayblus noo Sɛlin, gɛn Antiok no fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
Ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Tata Nyo' le, ɛ bó ge ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e, kumɛn tu bô wvú.
Ɛ saaka wvudvu wvun ley bitem bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó mum tum Banaban Antiok jodvu.
Ɛ wvú gɛn buy jó, yɛn no Nyo' nu ɛ buw bó bô mboyma, ɛ wvú yuw njoŋ, mum no teete bó lɛ bó ebiì Tata le bô mvuntelem mvubole mvunciim.
Banaban wvun to nu wee wvù jee, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule bvuu kɛŋke mbee ntay. Nonɛn, ɛ wvú ge ɛ bonyii nteen jó lese fitele yî Tata le.
Ɛ Banaban ke mum nɛ gɛn Taasus keegom Saul.
Ɛ wvú ke gom yɛn wvú le, jo ɛ bô wvú tu jim Antiok. Ɛ bô wvú no nu jó yî kelum e kecile bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, yɛɛyi bonyii nteen. Ɛ̀ nu Antiok jodvu jò bó to kɛwɛɛ keeteŋe ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le lɛ bonyii bo Klistu le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii bomew bò ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, nɛ Jɛlusalɛm bow gɛn Antiok jodvu.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Agabus ke nɛ leem we, tefe lɛ jeŋ yì tɛmyi nu ke ekoo woŋ tfuu. Jeŋ yidvu to nu ɛ ghan koo kefew kè Klawdius to nu Nfon wvu Lum.
Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bo Antiok yuw nonɛn, seyse lɛ wee tfuu esuw bigew no wvú kɛŋke, ɛ́ bó efi boom bo bwee bó le bò nu Judea dvú.
Ɛ bó mum suw, tum Banaban bô Saul dvú lɛ bó egɛn enya ɛ̂ bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod kɛw no nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bonyii bomew bo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó gbwo Jɛm wvù waa bwee Jon ɛ wvú kpwe.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo yɛn lɛ fí nu ɛ joŋ Bojuu le, ɛ wvú mum gɛn fwe gay ɛ bó koo tɛn Bita. Bó to kole wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛdiuw ɛ Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó le kɛ.
No bó koolɛɛ wvú, mum fen yew ncaw e, gɛɛ ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le nyɛ lɛ bó ecɛyte wvú bonɛw bonɛw. Ɛ 'Ɛlod to gɛke Bita nonɛn lɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey ke dioo ɛ fey, ɛ́ wen ebvuse wvú eleke ɛ̂ bonyii fwe ɛ́ bó esaw wvú.
Ɛ Bita mum no nu kɛ yew ncaw e. Geenɛn, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le no bunlee Nyo' fô wvú le shiee le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛntaŋ wvù ɛkfuŋ nu ebuy eyuu ɛ́ 'Ɛlod ebvuse Bita ɛ́ bó esaw wvú, ɛ Bita no leete ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo nci le bofɛɛ ɛ bó ɛ kay wvú bô boncaw bofɛɛ, ɛ no cɛyte. Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bomew cɛyte yew ncaw ɛ̂ fwese.
Ɛ fí kooy lɛ nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn, ɛ n'yuu ba yew ncaw yidvu le. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu kum Bita yî kebɛnɛ le, ɛ wvú kamse. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ja we cekey.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boncaw ba mum fɛykɛn can Bita le gbwekɛn fokuse.
Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Temɛ ndvu yo, elese bolaba buw.” Ɛ Bita ge nonɛn. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu bvuu gay lɛ, “Bulɛ ndvu yo ebiì me le.”
Ɛ Bita bu, mum no bii wvú le ɛkfuŋ. Kɛ wvú to cim kee lɛ fiɛɛ fì nceendaa wvudvu gee nu kecɛɛy kɛ. Wvú to kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ɛ fí too fô wen e.
Ɛ bô wvú lɛn fey bvudvuu bvu fwe fô bonyii bo nci le to cɛyte, bvuu fey bvu ɛjim, mum fɛse diuw ketaaŋ wvù buyte gɛne ɛlaante le, ɛ bó ɛ fɛ bô ketfu. Ɛ diuw ketaaŋ wvudvu yene kɛ ɛwvunɛwvun, ɛ bó buy. No bó buy nonɛn, no lɛne booke kɛ ɛ̂ je, ɛ nceendaa Tata Nyo' wvudvu mum nɛ la ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
Ɛ Bita shɛɛ, ɛ bvufee tu wvú fó, ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Keseen nu ɛ me ɛ ŋkiɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ̀ be tum Tata nceendaa we lɛ wvú eto ebvuse me can 'Ɛlod e, ɛ́ me emboy yî ŋgɛw wvù Bojuu se cɛyte lɛ bó nu ke enya ɛ̂ me le.”
No wvú kiɛnte nonɛn, mum nɛ no gɛne fô yew e fo Maalia wvù bwee Jon Maaku, ɛ bonyii nu ɛ bó ɛ tase fó nteen ɛ no bunlee.
Ɛ wvú gɛn buy fó, kumcɛ diuw ketaaŋ, ɛ wan kpwoon mvu ɛ diee nu Loda wvù to lemte fô yew e fodvu to keeyene.
Ɛ wvú dioo yuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Bita, ɛ njoŋ yu wvú, ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa yene ketaaŋ kɛ, kaa nɛ lewtɛ kase ley gɛn yew, see ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Bita nu diuw ketaaŋ e.”
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jewte lo.” Ɛ wvú no taame kɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Bita. Ɛ bó mum nɛ gay lɛ “Ɛ̀ nulo enu nceendaa Nyo' we.”
No bó to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Bita mɛy kɛ no kumci. Ɛ bó dioo yene, yɛn kecɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú, ɛ diuw yum bó.
Ɛ wvú few bô can ɛ bó lu bô diuw, mum see ɛ̂ bó no Tata be bvuse wvú yew ncaw e, bvuu gay lɛ bó esee ɛ̂ Jɛm noo bonyii bo mbee le bocii. No wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛ gɛn keba kemew e.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bvufee no bvuuŋke lo bonyii bo nci le lɛ laa ɛ̀ sɛ kooy la bô Bita lɛ.
Ɛ 'Ɛlod bvuse bonyii lɛ bó eghan egom wvú. Ɛ bó gom, gom ŋkuuŋ. Ɛ wvú mum tee bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte Bita ba, biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó, mum nɛ gay lɛ bó jo bó gɛn lɛse. Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ 'Ɛlod nɛ ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Judea le, bow gɛn no nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod ton'yi shém bô bonyii bo Taya noo bo Sidon. Ɛ bonyii bodvu ke mum baancɛ ye keegɛn eku can lɛ nyɛkeey enu dvú, njefo woŋ wvubo to kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ we le. Ɛ bó gɛn, yaw koo nsan bô Blastus wvù to nu cee ntow.
Ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod tfume ndvú woŋ, shii yî kawla le, mum no nyaa sa' ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
Ɛ bó nɛ no wvuuyi lo, bensee wvú gayte lɛ, “Wvun njeme nu wvu nyo', kɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu wee wvu wum kɛ.”
Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ nceendaa Tata mum tum kencɛm yî Nfon 'Ɛlod e, njefo wvú to baa efese mbense wvudvu ɛ̂ Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ ŋgeŋse mum die wvú, ɛ wvú kpwe.
Geenɛn, ɛ diɛw Nyo' no leyte ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, saaŋkene gɛne lo fwe fwe.
Ɛ Banaban bô Saul ke mɛse fiɛɛ fì bó to tumɛɛ bó Jɛlusalɛm dvú, mum kase tu jim Antiok. Ɛ bó dioo etuu jim, jo Jon Maaku.
Bonyii bomew to nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Antiok, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii. Bonyii bodvu to nu Banaban bô Semeon wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Wvù Yiile, noo Lushus wvu Sɛlin bô Saul noo Manɛɛn wvù bó to lɛyɛɛ wvú bô 'Ɛlod wvù wee sa'.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛ bó bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee Nyo', ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebaa Banaban bô Saul egɛɛ, ɛ́ bó elemtè lemme dì me nu ɛ ntee bó lɛ bó elemtè.”
Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, bvuu no bamte kɛ mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee, ke nɛ gɛɛ can yî bó le, mum ciinse bó ɛ bó no gɛne.
Ɛ Banaban bô Saul mum no gɛne no Keyoy ke Yuule to tumɛɛ bó. Ɛ bó nɛ bow ɛ̂ kelaante kè Sɛlusia le, ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, no leenci, gɛne woŋ wvù Sayblus e.
No bó lente, buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Salamis e, mum no ghane fewci diɛw Nyo' yéw bunle Bojuu le, ɛ Jon Mak ghane bô bó, fici bó.
Ɛ bó ke lɛn woŋ wvu ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ wvudvu le, daŋsɛn gɛn buy naa ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bafos e. No bó gɛn buynɛn yî wee Juu mvu le jó, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee nfim ɛ diee nu Bal Jisos, ɛ wvú to ké no mbiayte lɛ wen nu wee wvù seŋe mwɛɛm mvù wen yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
Wvú to ké no shee bô Sɛgus Baulus wvù wee sa' wvu woŋ wvudvu le. Wee sa' wvudvu to kɛŋke bvufee baay. Ɛ wvú ke tee Banaban bô Saul njefo wvú to gomte keeyuw diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ bó to, geenɛn ɛ Ɛlimas wvù wee nfim wɛ no diee diew nu ɛ̂ díɛw Glek e, mum no kicine bó, momte keege lɛ fo wee sa' wvudvu elese fitele yî Jisos e kɛ.
Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Saul e, wvù diee diew dimew to nu lɛ Baul, ɛ wvú luŋ ɛjisɛ yî wee nfim wvudvu le,
gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu waa dɛwle, ɛ wo nu wee wvù bane fiɛɛ ficii fì nu lɛŋ. Kenlɛɛma bô mbiay nu ɛ cin fô fitele fiuw e. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo enu nɛn sɛ wo kumene kecɛɛy ke Nyo' le lɛ kí etuù mbiay e?
Yekɛ eyuw, keseen nu ɛ kebo ke Nyo' le nu egbwe yî yo le ɛ́ wo efefe, ɛ́ fí ke ejo kefew ɛ́ wo sɛ ebvuu eyɛn kɛ naa diuu le.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shii kɛ diɛwɛ kembɛw e, baŋ ɛjisɛ Ɛlima. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no ghaale lo mondvuum, gomte wee wvù ecɛŋseè wvú.
Ɛ wee sa' wɛ yɛn nonɛn, mum lese fitele yî Jisos e, no wvú to kɛŋke ŋghaw yî mwɛɛm mvù bó to yɛɛyi ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos e.
Ɛ Baul bô ŋgoo ye ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e Bafos, lente joo yi baay buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlga le woŋ wvù Bamfilia le. No bó buy jó, ɛ Jon Mak cinɛ bó le, tu jim Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ bó nɛ jó, fey gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Antiok wvu Bisidia le. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bó gɛn ley shii yew bunle le.
Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ taŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo ɛ̂ wvu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le mɛse, ɛ bocee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yidvu mum tum ntum fô bo Baul e lɛ, “Boom bo bwee wese le, ɛ́ ben kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetefe bonyii dvú, ɛ́ ben jeme.”
Ɛ Baul mum nɛ we, ci bonyii bô kebo mum kɛw no jemyi lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò wvumte tɛn Nyo', ben eyekɛ eyuw.
Nyo' bonyii bo Islael to nu ɛ caw bo'icee cee bosɛse, ge ɛ kfuu dibole no kuuke seke bó to nu botolo woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Ɛ wvú ke mum bvuse bó jó bô mvuŋgay mwew,
kuu shém bô bó, no taale kɛ fô bó le ŋkpwaante yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
Ɛ wvú ke ge ɛ bó shike bitum bisooshwiy woŋ wvù Kanaan e, mum nya woŋ wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ no nu wvubo.
Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim to nu ɛ jo diɛwɛ bilum gee nɛ kecow mbaanshen e (450). No wvú nyaɛ woŋ wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, mum gɛɛ bonyii bò esaakè bó. Ɛ bó saw gɛn buy yî kefew kè wee ntum we wvù Samwɛl to saake le.
Kɛ yî kefew kekiɛ le ɛ bó ke nɛ lɛkɛ keekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu nfon, ɛ Nyo' mum nya Saul, waa Kish wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Bɛnjamen e. Ɛ wvú saw bvunfon yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
Ɛ Nyo' ke shwaw wvú, gɛɛ Dawe Nfon wvubole. Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛkumɛ Dawe wvun lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Dawe wvù waa Jɛɛse nu fitele fiem. Wvú nu ke egee fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋgomte.’
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe wvun e dì Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Mboyse, nya ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael no wvú to kawɛɛ. Ɛ Mboyse wvun nu Jisos.
Ɛ́ Jisos wvun sɛ keeke ekɛw lemme diew nu ɛ Jon to fewci wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bo Islael lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ɛ́ wen elese bó ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ Jon ke no nu wase keemɛɛse lemme diew, ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, ‘Ben kpwaake lɛ me nu yɛɛ? Kɛ me n'yaa nu wee wvù ben cɛyte kɛ. Wee wvudvu too ɛjim jo me, ɛ me mbaa encim eŋkocɛn keeŋgvuwcɛ mbaayɛ bolaba bew kɛ.’”
Ɛ Baul gɛn fwe jeme lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e bò ɛ̀ nu kfuu di Abla'am e noo ben bonyii bocii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò wvumte tɛn Nyo', Nyo' to ciinse ntum wvun wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii eboy yî dvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ beene.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bô bonyii bobole bò saake woŋ, faŋɛ yaa jo Jisos diɛwɛ Mboyse le kɛ. Ɛ bó bvuu faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kenyi ke mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ mvú mvù bó to shee taaŋke ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii. Ɛ bó ke dioo gay lɛ bó eyu wvú nonɛn, ɛ fifin mum ge ɛ fí to kocɛn no bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to jemyɛɛ.
Naa no bó to baa cim yɛn jay wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu wvú yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ bó gɛn kɛ fwe gay ɛ̂ Baylɛt lɛ bó eyu wvú.
Ɛ bó ke ge fiɛɛ ficii no Ŋwa' Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ Jisos, ɛ bó shike wvú yî kentam e gɛn lese wvú ɛ̂ jem.
Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le.
Ɛ wvú ghan yî ɛdiuw e nteen duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bonyii bò bô bó to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee gɛn Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ̀ nu bó bò fewci ɛkumɛ wvú keseen ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
Nonɛn, bese ɛ no nu tɛn fɛn keseen keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvudvu ɛ̂ ben. Saaka wvudvu nu lɛ, fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ bo'icee cee bonyii bo Islael dvú,
nu ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase fí ɛ to ɛ kocɛn keseen kefew kesɛɛbeene le, beene bò nu boom bobole. Fifin kocine no Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Jisos yî kpwe le. Bó to nu ɛ saŋ wase ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le biba bifɛɛ, ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Wo nu Waa wɛm, ɛ me nu wase Ico ɛbɛn.’
Ɛkumɛ mbvuse wvù Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Jisos yî kpwe le lɛ fo wvú efo kɛ, Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛ̂ yin je le lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke enya ɛ̂ ben kembonɛn kè ɛ̀ nu kem, kè me nto ŋkawɛɛ Dawe dvú, nlew.’
Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ bvuu ɛ saŋ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le ɛ Dawe gayte lɛ, ‘Kɛ wo nu ke ecinɛ Waa wo lemme wvù Yuule le, ɛ́ wvú efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.’
Fi ɛkumɛ Dawe nu ɛ wvú to lem lemme diew dì Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî kefew kew e, ke kpwe ɛ bó dwey wvú mbew bo ice le, ɛ wvú fo.
Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvun wvù Nyo' to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le to baa fo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.
Nonɛn, boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben emum ekeè ntay lɛ saaka wvun wvù bó fewci lɛ Nyo' lɛɛshi bibefɛ bi bonyii le nu ɛ wvú lɛɛshi nje Jisos wvun.
Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele fiew yî Jisos e, nu ɛ wvú ɛ boy wase yî bibefɛ biew e bicii, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo nci Muses saa ege kɛ.
Nonɛn, ben eyɛnè fo fiɛɛ fì bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le ke ekoo ben. Bó jemyi jó lɛ,
‘Ben eyekɛ eyuw ben bò wɛysee Nyo'. Diuw nu ke eyum ben, ɛ́ ben ekpwekɛn. Me nu ŋke emom fiɛɛ yî kefew kenɛn e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì wee be jeme lo ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebee kɛ.’”
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke dioo ebuyte yew bunle yidvu le, ɛ bonyii bodvu no lɛke lɛ bó ke ebvuu eto kɛ bvu mbam wvù too le ejeme mwɛɛm mvun.
Ɛ bonyii ke dioo buy yew bunle le, ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu Bojuu bô bonyii bò to baŋkɛɛ lo tu bo mbee Bojuu le, no bii Baul bô Banaban e. Ɛ bó no jemyi teete bonyii bodvu lɛ bó eyuukè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' le wvù nu ɛ buw bó bô nfi we.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu bvu mbam wvù biɛ wvuwɛ le, ɛ kelaante no gomte keebuy lo kecii keeto eyuw diɛw Nyo'.
Ɛ Bojuu yɛn no kebombom ke bonyii le tase nonɛn, mum no bene kendoŋ, kicine fiɛɛ fì Baul jemyi, nan'yi wvú.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban no jemyi lo yaa fane kɛ, gayte lɛ, “Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ bese bee keeyaw efewcɛ diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben Bojuu. No ben nu ɛ ŋwase lo, ɛ jo bikuu binɛn lɛ ben baa kocɛn keeke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo, tu bese nu ebaŋke fisɛse efewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
Ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ bese, no wvú to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ ntome wo lɛ wo enu ken'yeese ke bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ wo ege ɛ́ bonyii bo ɛbuw ɛ woŋ e ɛcii ke eboy.’”
Ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yuw nonɛn, mum no yuuke njoŋ, bɛnsee diɛw yì yi Tata. Ɛ bonyii nteen bee saaka wvudvu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò Nyo' to nu ɛ baa wase lɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
Ɛ diɛw yì yi Tata mum lɛn woŋ wvudvu le tfuu.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu mum nɛ bɛyse bocee ntɛw bô bokɛ' bo bonyii bo baay baay e, ɛ bokɛnɛ ban nu bò to ké no too yew bunle le, ɛ bó no bane Baul bô Banaban, mum kuŋ bó lɛ bó enɛ jó.
Ɛ bó dioo nɛn'yi nonɛn, kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa bibole lɛ ɛ̀ nu nciise fiɛɛ fì bó mom, mum gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Ikonium e.
Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le shɛɛ no nu fibole yuuke njoŋ baay, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ yiŋsɛn yî bó le.
No Baul bô Banaban gɛnɛɛ Ikonium, bvuu ge kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to geɛ Antiok, keeley yew bunle Bojuu yi jó le, efewci saaka wvù jee dvú. Ɛ bó loocɛ fewcɛ, ɛ Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bee nteen.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bò to faŋɛɛ keebee nɛ bɛyse bonyii bomew bò to yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, befe bô mvuntelem mvubole lɛ bó eton'yì shém bô bonyii bo mbee le.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban mɛy kɛ jó ɛ kefew defɛ, no fewci yaa fane kɛ ɛkumɛ Tata. Ɛ Tata nya bó bô mvuŋgay keegee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e mvù duŋci lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó fewci ɛkumɛ Tata no wvú nu ɛ buw bonyii bô mboyma nu kecɛɛy.
Ɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le gawsɛn. Ɛ bomew tu ɛ̂ keba ke Bojuu bò to faŋɛɛ keebee ba le, ɛ bomew tu ɛ̂ keba ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
Ɛ Bojuu ba bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu noo bikuu bi woŋ e tase, cu ntaŋ keenyɛwle bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, etumyɛ bó bô ɛta ɛ́ bó ekpwekɛn.
Ɛ bó kiɛɛ ntaŋ wvudvu, mum lewtɛ gɛn woŋ wvù Likonia le, no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante bì Lista bô Dɛlbi le noo ɛ̂ bontɛw bò mbew jó le,
fewci saaka wvù jee jó.
Wee mvu to nu Lista, ɛ wvú to ké no shee kɛ fokuse, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú elɛn kɛ, njefo bó to boke wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkɛwlɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew,
ɛ wvú shii no yeke fiɛɛ fì Baul to yɛɛyi. Ɛ Baul luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le, yɛn ɛ wee wvudvu kɛŋke mbee lɛ Nyo' nulo efɛ wen,
mum gay ɛ̂ wvú foweɛwe lɛ, “Ja eleem we.” Ɛ wvú mum sele we, kɛw no lɛne.
Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn fiɛɛ fì Baul ge, mum no sane ɛtalɛ, jemyi ɛ̂ díɛw yi Likonia le lɛ, “Bonyo' nu ɛ tu bonyii ɛ shii ɛ to ɛ̂ beene le.”
Ɛ bó mum no teŋe Banaban lɛ Siyus, mum teŋe Baul lɛ Ɛmis no ɛ̀ to ké no yamte kɛ wvú jemyi.
Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ yew ncese nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Siyus wvun nu mbew kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ cee ncese wvu fó mum jo bona' bò bolemsɛ noo fow no too dvú diuw ketaaŋ e lɛ bô bonyii ege ncese dvú ɛ̂ Banaban bô Baul.
Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ban kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bô bonyii bodvu to gomte keege, saayɛ ndvú ye le, lewtɛ ley ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu ɛnte, no kayte lɛ,
“Bonyii ban, ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu la fin? Bese nu kɛ bonyii lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ ben e, ɛ bese to fɛn keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le lɛ ben ecinɛ bonyo' bo ɛcici ban e, ebiì ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù Nyo' le. Nyo' wvun nu wvù to bomɛɛ ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ noo jóo yi baay baay bô mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu mondvuum man e.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele, ɛ wvú cinɛ bonyii le bitum e bicii, ɛ bó no gee no bó kooŋke.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú no gee kɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii le keeduŋci lɛ wen nu dvú. Ɛ wvú no nyaa bó bô jaŋ, ɛ bó kɛŋke ŋgu ɛ̂ kefew ke lɛŋ e, diee yuuke njoŋ.”
Naa no Banaban bô Baul jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bó nɛn, ke ge lo lɛ ce', ɛ bó sɛ lu keege ncese ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ Bojuu bomew ke nɛ to jó, ɛ bó nɛ Antiok bô Ikonium, bɛyse bonyii nteen ɛ bó tumyɛ Baul bô ɛta. No bó tumyɛɛ, mum gufe buy bô wvú ɛlaante kpwaake lɛ wvú nu ɛ kpwe wase.
Geenɛn, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le ke to tase ɛ̂ wvú we, ɛ wvú kase nɛ we, tu ɛlaante jodvu. Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ bô Banaban mum nɛ jó, no gɛne ɛ̂ kelaante kè Dɛlbi le.
No Baul bô Banaban ley Dɛlbi, fewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛkumɛ Jisos, kɛŋkɛ bonyii bo mbee le jó nteen. Ɛ bó ke nɛ jó kase no tuu jim, fele ɛ̂ bilaante bì Lista bô Ikonium noo Antiok wvu Bisidia le.
Ɛ bó no fele nonɛn, yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le, teete bó lɛ bó emɛy kɛ eleemè ntay yî mbee wvubole, keè lɛ bô bowen kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen sɛ keeke eley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
Ɛ bó bvuu no baayi bocee bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le, gɛɛle ɛ̂ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii. Ɛ́ bó dioo gɛɛle no bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee mum nya bó can Tata Jisos wvù bó beŋe wvú le.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke fey woŋ wvù Bisidia le, daŋsɛn gɛn wvù Bamfilia le,
fewcɛ diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlga le, mum bow gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Atalia le.
No bó bow jó, ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, mum kase no tuu jim Antiok. Ɛ Antiok jan nu jò bó to nyaɛ bó can Nyo' le ɛ wvú buw bó bô nfi we ɛ bó sɛ mum no ghane gee lemme din dì bó to mɛsɛɛ.
No bó fɛse jó, baancɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó no Nyo' se lemɛɛ bô bó, bô no wvú se yen'yɛɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî Jisos e.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ce bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bodvu ɛ kefew defɛ.
Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ Judea, bow to Antiok, mum no yɛɛyi bonyii bo mbee le lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' eboyse wee sɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse mwɛtɛn yew no nci Muses duŋci kɛ.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ma lo n'yɛɛyi wvudvu, ɛ bô bonyii bodvu she bew mbew yî dvú le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ fí ke ghaw, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Antiok baa Baul bô Banaban noo bonyii bo mbee le bomew, tum lɛ bó eben Jɛlusalɛm eyɛn boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke jó le, lɛ bó elese diuw fô fiɛɛ fidvu le.
Nonɛn, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Antiok mum ciinse bó, ɛ bó no gɛne fele biba bì Fonishia bô bì Samalia le seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le bo jó lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ kumɛn wase. Ɛ bonyii bocii no yuuke nonɛn, laŋlaŋe baay.
Ɛ bó ke ben gɛn fɛse Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bocee kentaashɛ ke jó fiisɛn bó. Ɛ bó see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó no Nyo' se lemɛɛ can yibole.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bò to nu tɛn ɛ̂ ŋgoo Bofalasii le, ja we gay lɛ, “Bó kɛŋke kɛ keetfuusè bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yew, gaytè ɛ bó gɛɛle bonci bo Muses e.”
No bó gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ bvuu shii keeley ɛnte jo fiɛɛ fidvu.
Ɛ bó ke she jeme gɛn ncejole, ɛ Bita nɛ leem we gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben kee lɛ ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ Nyo' baa me ɛ̂ ben ɛnte lɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw wɛm e wvù bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ke eyuuke saaka we wvù jee, beŋe wvú le.
Ɛ Nyo' wvù kee mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, duŋcɛ lɛ wen nu ɛ fiisɛn bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, nya bó bô Keyoy ke Yuule lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene.
Wvú to baa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy beene ɛ bonyii bodvu kɛ. Wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ mvuntelem mvubole no yuule njefo bó to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e.
No fí nu nonɛn, ben ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gomte keeshiike fitele fi Nyo' le, joo bvujitɛ gɛɛle yî ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bvujitɛ bvun to ghaw wase beene noo bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene?
Fí baa nu lɛŋ kɛ. Beene nu ɛ bee lɛ Nyo' boysee beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mboyma wvù Tata Jisos nu ɛ buw beene dvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú boysee bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.”
No Bita jeme ɛ mɛse, ɛ bonyii bocii cife, mum no yeke no Banaban bô Baul fɛle no bó se ghane gɛne fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ Nyo' nyaa bó bô mvuŋgay lɛ bó egeè mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e dvú.
Ɛ bó jeme mɛse, ɛ Jɛm mum gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ eyuw.
Semon be ɛ see wase ɛ̂ beene no Nyo' to kɛwɛɛ duŋcɛ tɛn shiee we fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, caw bomew ɛ̂ bó ɛnte lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew bonyii.
Ɛ fiɛɛ fì bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ lɛne kɛ ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ bô fì Nyo' to geɛ. Bó to saŋ lɛ,
‘Kefew too lo kè me nu ŋke eŋkase ento, enseyse yew Dawe yì nu ɛ gbwe wase. Me nu ŋke en'yoo binffuy bidvu, ɛ́ yí ekase eleem we.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ kebɛse ke bonyii le emum egomte Tata, ɛ bonyii ban bocii nu bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò me nu ɛ ncaw lɛ ɛ̀ nu bem bonyii.
Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Nyo', ɛ wvú to ge wase ɛ bonyii kiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e.’
Me ɛ no n'yɛne fiem lɛ fo beene enyaà ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ.
Beene esaŋ kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋwa' fô bó le, egay lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ.
Bó saŋ nonɛn, njefo bonci bo Muses e ban nu ɛ bó to yɛɛyi wase ncejole mondvuum monciim ɛ bonyii yuuke, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bò bó taaŋke ɛbɛn yéw bunle le ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii.”
Nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ noo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii bee fifiɛ, mum yɛn lɛ fí jee lɛ bó ebaa bonyii ɛ̂ bó ɛnte etum ɛ́ bô bo Banaban noo Baul egɛn Antiok. Ɛ bó mum baa Judas wvù diee diew dimew to nu lɛ Basabas, bvuu baa tɛn Silas. Bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban to nu bikuu ɛnte jo bonyii bo mbee le.
Ɛ bó saŋ ŋwa' wvù bó nu etum bó dvú ɛ wvú nu lɛ: “Bese boom bo bwee wene le bò nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ gayte ben e bonyii bo mbee le bocii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, bò nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Antiok e bô bò nu keba kè Silia le noo bò nu ɛ̂ kè Silishia le.
Bese nu ɛ yuw lɛ bonyii bomew nu ɛ buy ɛ̂ bese ɛnte ɛ to ɛ no nyaa ŋgɛw, bvuŋse bvufee bvunɛn bô n'yɛɛyi mvu sɛ ɛ̀ tum bese bó ŋkuuŋ.
Nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ shii bocii ɛ bee lɛ bó ebaa bonyii bomew etum fô ben e, ɛ́ bó etoò bô bo Banaban noo Baul bò nu nsáa yese shém.
Bonyii ban nu ɛ bó ɛ yefe wase kpwe ye le nje lemme di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
Bese ɛ mum ɛ tum Judas bô Silas lɛ bó eto ebvuu ejeme tɛn bô diuw fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvun e.
Bee bo Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ yɛn lɛ fí baa jee keeyikɛ ben bô bvujitɛ bvumew ɛfey bonci bo shiee le ban bò nu lɛ:
Fo ben edieè mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ. Fo ben edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ. Fo ben edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo ben ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ. Ɛ́ ben lewte mwɛɛm mvun, tu ben gee lɛŋ. Bó ɛ shɛɛ wase.”
Ɛ bó saŋ nonɛn mum tum bonyii ba dvú ɛ bó bow dvú Antiok. Ɛ bó gɛn, kum kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke jó kecii, nya ŋwa' wvudvu ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ bó taŋ ŋwa' wvudvu, ɛ saaka wvudvu lɛɛse mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ bó yuw njoŋ baay.
Ɛ Judas bô Silas bò to nu bonyii bò seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, nya bontefe nteen ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le, ge ɛ bó no kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ mvuntelem e.
Ɛ bó bosɛn ce jó ntay. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le ke ciinse bó ɛ bó no kaase bô nyɛkeey tuu jim fô bonyii bò to tumɛɛ bó le.

Ɛ Baul bô Banaban bosɛn ce Antiok ntay, ɛ bô bonyii bomew yɛɛyi bvuu fewci diɛw Tata.
Ɛ kefew ke dioo gɛncɛ, ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ Banaban lɛ, “Bee wo ekase etu jim eghan bilaante bì bee wo se fewci diɛw Tata bí le, eyɛn laa bonyii bo mbee le bo jó gee nɛɛ lɛ.”
Ɛ Banaban mum no gomte keejo Jon Mak lɛ bô bó eghane.
Geenɛn, ɛ Baul faŋɛ yaa ekooŋke lɛ bó ejo wvú kɛ, njefo wvú to nu ɛ cinɛ bó le Bamfilia faŋɛ yaa mɛse lɛne dì bô bó to kɛŋke kɛ.
Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke she kicɛn baay, mum gawsɛn. Ɛ Banaban jo Maaku, ɛ bô wvú ley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo, gɛn Sayblus.
Ɛ Baul caw fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu Silas. Ɛ bô wvú dioo nɛn'yi, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le nya bó can Tata le ɛ wvú buw bó bô nfi we.
Ɛ bó gɛn je biba bì Silia bô bì Silishia le, no ghane yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le.
Ɛ Baul ghan gɛn buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Dɛlbi le, ke nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ ke Lista le. Wee ŋgoo Jisos mvu to nu Lista jodvu ɛ diee nu Timatio, ɛ bwee nu wee Juu, nu tɛn wee mbee, geenɛn ɛ ice to nu wee Glek.
Timatio wvun to nu wee ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bocii bo Lista noo bo Ikonium bɛnsee wvú.
Ɛ Baul no gomte keejo wvú lɛ bô wvú eghanè, mum tfuse wvú yew. Ɛ wvú to tfuse wvú yew nonɛn, njefo Bojuu bocii bò to cee biba bidvu le to kee lo lɛ icee Timatio to nu wee Glek.
Ɛ bó mum no ghane, gɛne ɛ̂ bilaante le, dioo gɛne no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le bonci bò boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bocee kentaashɛ ke Jɛlusalɛm to shilɛɛ bee lɛ bó egɛɛlè.
Nonɛn, ɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bidvu mum no tɛmyi gɛne fwe fwe yî mbee le. Ɛ bonyii no biise bó le ɛdiuw ɛcii.
Ɛ Baul bô ŋgoo ye nɛ lɛ bó egɛn efewcɛ diɛw Nyo' woŋ wvù Ɛsia le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule tun. Ɛ bó mum lɛn wase fey ɛ ɛ̀ nu je keba kè Fligia bô kè Galɛshia le.
Ɛ bó ke dioo gɛn buy mbew woŋ wvù Misia le no gomte keeley gɛn keba kè Bitinia le, ɛ Keyoy ke Jisos e bvuu tun.
Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum fey woŋ wvù Misia le, daŋsɛn gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Towas e.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô Baul e. Ɛ wvú yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le ɛ wee mvu wvu Masedonia leeme lɛke wvú lɛ, “Kee wo, lente kɛ eto Masedonia jan efi bese.”
No fiɛɛ fidvu to fô Baul e nonɛn, ɛ bee bó mum yɛn lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ bese lɛ bese egɛn efewcɛ saaka we wvù jee woŋ wvù Masedonia le. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bese mum seyse keegɛn jó.
Ɛ bese nɛ Towas, lente teytey ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, buysɛn Samotɛs. Ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bese gɛn fwe buy Niabolis.
Ɛ bese ke nɛ fó lɛn gɛn Filibi, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kelaante ke ɛ̂ keba ke fwe le Masedonia. Kelaante kedvu to nu wase ke bala bo Lum e. Ɛ bese ce jó yî ɛdiuw e.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bese buy ɛlaante jodvu, gɛn diuw joo le fô bese to kpwawci lɛ bvudvuu bvu Bojuu le bvu bunle le nu enu. No bese gɛn, ɛ bokɛnɛ bomew to tase wase fó, ɛ bese mum shii no jemyi ɛ̂ bó.
Kpwoon mvu to nu fó yuuke tɛn ɛ diee nu Lidia, ɛ wvú to ké no wvumte Nyo'. Wvú to buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Tayatila le, ɛ wvú to ké no geese kfuu ndvú yimi, ɛ yí nu kɛ yí yɛɛle lo, lumte. Ɛ Tata yene fitele fiew, ɛ wvú bee fiɛɛ fì Baul to jemyi le.
Ɛ bó ke lese wvú bô bonyii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ̂ joo, ɛ wvú mum lɛkɛ bese gay lɛ, “Kee ben, ɛ́ ben fɛn nu ɛ yɛn lɛ me nu ɛ nlese fitele fiem ficii yî Tata le, ɛ́ ben to kɛ gɛn ce ɛ̂ me yew.” Ɛ wvú mɛy kɛ no nyɛɛyi nonɛn, ɛ bese ke ghan bee gɛn.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ bese dioo egɛne fô bvudvuu bvu bunle le, tasɛn bee bo wan kpwoon mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu nfwa. Wvú to kɛŋke keyoy kemew yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ké ge ɛ wee no nu wee diam. Bonyii bò to kɛŋke wan kpwoon wvudvu to kawte bigew yî ye le naa ntay nje wvú to ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù nu ke ekooy.
Ɛ wan kpwoon wvudvu dioo yɛn bee bo Baul e, mum no bii bese le wamte, gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, ɛ bó duŋci je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eghan jó sɛ boy.”
Ɛ wvú ke ge nonɛn buy ɛdiuw nteen, ɛ fí ke nɛ ton'yɛ Baul, ɛ wvú baŋke ye wam keyoy kedvu gay lɛ, “Me ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le, buyɛ yî wan wvun e.” Ɛ kí mum buy yî ye le kɛ sekedvu.
Ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke nfwa wvudvu yɛn lɛ je bowen yi bigew nu ɛ yí ɛ ka wase, ɛ bó mum koo Baul bô Silas gufe gɛn bô bó fwe dvu bocee woŋ ya le fô bó to ké no saake bonsaw.
No bó gɛn bô bó, leke fwe dvu bala bo Lum bò to saake bonsaw gay lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu Bojuu, ɛ bó nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ kelaante kesɛse le.
Bó yɛɛyi bonyii bô nce wvù nci wese baa bee kɛ. Bese nu bonyii bo Lum, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ bese ebiì nce wvudvu le kɛ.”
Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó mum tom bó, fɛnte yî Baul bô Silas e. Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bonsaw ba mum saayɛ ndvú yî Baul bô Silas e, gay lɛ bó etam bó.
Ɛ bó loocɛ tam bó ntay, jo bó gɛn lese yew ncaw e, gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw lɛ wvú ecɛytè bó ntay.
No wvú yuw nonɛn, mum jo bó gɛn fen naa ɛ̂ kebuw ke ɛnte le yew ncaw e, fen bikaa bibole ɛ̂ difwaŋ e.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ Baul bô Silas bunlee yemte bensee Nyo', ɛ bonyii bo ncaw e yeke,
ɛ nshɛ nɛ sɛsɛ shiw bô mvuŋgay, ɛ yew ncaw shiw gɛn buy yî kenffuy e. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ dew fwese yicii yene ye, ɛ boncaw fɛykɛn yî bonyii bo ncaw e bocii.
Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw yidvu kamse, dioo yɛn ɛ dew fwese nu yɛ, ɛ wvú mum no kpwaake lɛ bonyii bo ncaw e nu ɛ bó ɛ lewtɛ wase. Ɛ wvú mum baa nyo ɛ̂ ŋku le lɛ wen eyu ɛkolɛ kew dvú.
Ɛ Baul wam foweɛwe gay lɛ, “Fo wo eyu ɛkolɛ kuw kɛ. Bese nu fɛn bocii.”
Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw wvudvu tee ɛ wee to bô ken'yeese, ɛ wvú lewtɛ ley yew, gɛn tum ɛnvuw fwe dvu Baul bô Silas ciiŋke bô nfan.
Ɛ wvú nɛ jo bó, buy bô bó ɛkfuŋ, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bo'icɛm, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge nɛɛ nsɛ mboy.”
Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e, ɛ́ ben ɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ wo yew ke emum eboy.”
Ɛ bó mum fewcɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata ɛ̂ bô bonyii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew.
Ɛ wvú ke jo bó kɛ ɛntaŋ jodvu, cukɛ bilɛmte bibole. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum lese wvú bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ wvú mum jo bó, ɛ bô bó ben ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ wvú nya mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ bó die. Ɛ bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew mum no laŋlaŋe lɛ bó nu ɛ lese wase fitele yî Nyo' le.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bala bo Lum ba bò to saake bonsaw tum bonyii bo nci le lɛ bó egɛn egay ɛ̂ wee wvù cɛyte yew ncaw wɛ lɛ wvú ebvuse bonyii ba ɛ́ bó egɛnè.
Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw wvudvu mum gɛn yɛn Baul e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bala nu ɛ ciinse ntum lɛ me embvuse ben, ɛ́ ben egɛnè yî nyɛkeey e.”
Geenɛn, ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo nci le ba lɛ, “Bó se nu ɛ tam bese ya le sɛ bó nu ɛ yaw wase ɛ saw nsaw wese ŋkuuŋ, ɛ bese nu kɛ tɛn bonyii bo Lum, ɛ bvuu ɛ fen bese yew, ɛ no duu keseen lɛ bó ebvuse bese ɛjim ɛjim nɛɛ le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí ekooy kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eto kɛ bala bodvu fɛn sɛ bvuse bese.”
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ba kase tu jim see ɛ̂ bala bo Lum ba no Baul jeme. Ɛ bó yuw lɛ Baul bô Silas nu tɛn bonyii bo Lum, mum no fane.
Ɛ bó mum to ku can ɛ̂ bó, bvuse bó yew ncaw e, ciinse bó, lɛkɛ lɛ bó enɛ ɛlaante jodvu.
Ɛ Baul bô Silas buy yew ncaw e, gɛn yew dvu Lidia ɛ bonyii bo mbee le nu dvú, ɛ bó tefe bó mum nɛnɛ jó.
Ɛ Baul bô Silas mum no gɛne, fey ɛ̂ bilaante bì Amfibolis bô Abolonia le, daŋsɛn gɛn buy Tɛsalonika. Ɛ yew bunle Bojuu to nu jó.
Ɛ Baul mum gɛn ley yew bunle le kɛ no nce we to ké no nu, no too jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii dvú yî ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛta, duŋci fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le.
Ɛ wvú no duŋci jó, cɛɛyi lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to kɛŋke keeke eyɛn ŋgɛw, ekase ebuy yî kpwe le. Ɛ Jisos wvun wvù wen fewci ɛkumɛ wvú nu Mboyse wvudvu.
Ɛ bonyii bomew yuw nonɛn, bee bɛne Baul bô Silas e. Ɛ Boglek bomew bò to wvumte Nyo' noo bokɛnɛ bo baay baay bomew bee tɛn nteen.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bomew mum no bene kendoŋ bô Baul noo Silas, kum bonyii bomew bò to gbwayte ɛcici ɛ bô bó taashɛ kebombom e, kɛw diuw ɛlaante. Ɛ bó mum nɛ gɛn ŋgoy yew Jason lɛ bó gomte Baul bô Silas keebvuse enya ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkfuŋ.
Ɛ bó dioo gom ŋkuuŋ, mum gufe Jason bô bonyii bo mbee le bomew gɛn bô bó fwe dvu bocee ntɛw, no wamte gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu bò ghane baŋse woŋ ɛ wvú tuu ncine, ɛ bó ɛ to wase ɛ buy jan,
Jason ɛ fiisɛn bó ɛ gɛɛ yew dvu wvú. Bó bocii ŋgoyte bonci bo Nfon wvu Lum e, duu lɛ Nfon wvumvu nu dvú ɛ diee nu lɛ Jisos.”
Ɛ bocee ntɛw bô bonyii yuw nonɛn, nɛ no wɛwte lo.
Ɛ bó mum kan ɛ Jason bô bonyii bo mbee le nya bigew lɛ ɛ́ fí ke bvuu kooy lo, bó saa etfuse bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bó kɛ. Ɛ bó mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke dioo jiim, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le jo Baul bô Silas ciinse ɛ bó no gɛne ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlia le. No bó ley jó, gɛn yew bunle Bojuu le.
Bojuu bo jó to nu bonyii ɛ bó kee fiɛɛ fele bo Tɛsalonika, njefo bó to nu ɛ loocɛ fiisɛn n'yɛɛyi bô shiee, no taasse Ŋwa' Nyo' ɛdiuw ɛcii keeyɛn laa mwɛɛm mvù Baul yɛɛyi bó dvú nu kecɛɛy ɛ.
Ɛ bó mum bee diɛw Nyo' le nteen. Ɛ bokɛnɛ bo baay baay nteen bò to nu Boglek noo bolemsɛ nteen bò to nu tɛn Boglek bee tɛn.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bo Tɛsalonika ke yuw lɛ Baul nu ɛ gɛn wase ɛ no fewci diɛw Nyo' Bɛlia, ɛ bó mum gɛn tɛn jó, bɛyse kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ bó kɛw mvunlaa.
Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le mum gay lo ɛ̂ Baul kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ wvú gɛn diuw joo yi baay e. Geenɛn, ɛ Silas bô Timatio shɛɛ Bɛlia.
Ɛ bonyii bò to gɛnɛɛ keeciinse Baul, gɛn buy Atɛn mum cinɛ wvú le. Ɛ bó dioo tuu jim, ɛ Baul tum bó lɛ bó egɛn tefe ɛ̂ Silas bô Timatio lɛ bó emom kɛ lɛ ebi wen e cekey.
Ɛ Baul mum no cɛyte Silas bô Timatio Atɛn. Ɛ wvú ke dioo ghane jó, yɛn ɛ kelaante kedvu ɛ yiŋsɛn lo bô mvumooso. Ɛ fí shiw fitele fiew.
Ɛ wvú mum gɛn yew bunle Bojuu le, jeme bô bó noo bonyii bò to yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò to bunlee tɛn Nyo' dvú. Ɛ wvú bvuu no jemyi tɛn ɛdiuw ɛcii ya le bô bonyii bò to ké nɛ to fó.
Ɛ bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le bomew bò bó to teŋe lɛ Ɛbikolian noo bò bó to teŋe lɛ Sitoyik ke nɛ to keebew tɛn mbew bô bo Baul. No Baul to fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos noo mbuy wvu yî kpwe le, ɛ bomew mum no biite lɛ, “Keyuŋ kin sɛ kumte diuw lɛ la le?” Ɛ bomew no duu fibole lɛ, “Fí yen'yi nɛn kɛ diɛwɛ wvú fewci ɛkumɛ bonyo' bo bonyii bomew e.”
Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum jo Baul ɛ bô bó gɛn fô nshii wvù bó teŋe lɛ Aleobagus e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese gomte keebvuu eyuw ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu fwɛ wvun wvù wo too dvú laa wvú nu lɛ la lɛ.
Wo jemyi mwɛɛm mvumew ɛ bese ke baa yuw wase kɛ. Nonɛn, bese ɛ no gomte keekiɛɛ kenyi kedvu.”
(Bonyii bo Atɛn noo botolo bo jó to ké no nu kɛ fibole keeshee yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛm, jemyi ɛkumɛ mvú.)
Ɛ Baul mum leem fwe dvu nshii Aleobagus wvudvu, gay lɛ, “Bonyii bo Atɛn, me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̂ jé le yicii nu ɛ ben wvumte bonyo' baay.
Me njemyi nɛn, njefo me nse ŋghane ɛlaante jonɛn, ɛ ndioo ntaale mondvuum mò ben bunlee bonyo' mó le, ɛ n'yɛn ketaŋ ke ncese le kemew e ɛ bó ɛ saŋ yî dvú le lɛ, ‘Fô nyo' wvù bó baa kee le kɛ.’ Nyo' wvudvu wvù ben bunlee, wvù bó baa kee kɛ, nu wvú wvù me nu enfewcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen.
Nyo' wvudvu wvun nu wvù to bomɛɛ woŋ wvun bô mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu yî dvú le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú Nfon ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ, ɛ kɛ wvú ké no cee yéw ncese yì ɛ̀ bom bonyii le kɛ.
Kɛ wvú tane fiɛɛ fimew fì wvú taale lɛ wee elem fô wvú le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ bonyii bocii yoyte, nu dvú, kɛŋke fiɛɛ ficii fì bó shieele.
Wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ dikfuu di bonyii le dicii buy yî wee mwaaŋ e no nu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le. Ɛ́ wvú sɛ ge nonɛn, nu ɛ wvú to seyse wase kefew kè bó nu ke enu dvú, noo bidwee bi mondvuum mò bó nu ke eceè mó le.
Wvú to ge nonɛn, wvu lɛ bonyii ke eghaale, gomte wvú laa bó nu ke eyuu eyɛn wvú le lɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛ Nyo' yaa cim nu ncejole fô wee mvu beene le kɛ.
Fifin nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee mvu to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ beene sɛ cee, lɛne, bvuu nu no beene nu.’ Ɛ wee wene binfɛ mvu to jeme wase tɛn lɛ, ‘Beene nu naa boom bew’.
No beene nu boom bo Nyo' le nonɛn, fo beene ekpwaakè lɛ Nyo' fieesene fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ seyse wee bô bvufee bwew, ɛ tfuy bô ketwaa ke bigew e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ kene lo bô tɛ kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè bonyii to bɛɛ kenjiwe le, gee mwɛɛm mvù befe mvun, ɛ Nyo' cin'yi dvú. Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ wvú gayte lɛ bonyii bocii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.
Bó ekumɛn njefo wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ diuu dì wvú nu ke esaw woŋ tfuu bii kecɛɛy e. Wvú nu ɛ baa wase wee we wvù nu ke esaake. Fifin nu ɛ wvú duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy no wvú to bvusɛɛ wee wvudvu yî kpwe le.”
No Baul jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó yuw ɛ wvú ɛ bɛn ɛkumɛ mbuy wvu yî kpwe le, ɛ bonyii bomew nɛ no kieele lo wvú. Ɛ bomew gay fibole lɛ, “Bese gomte keeke ebvuu eyuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi fin.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum buy cinɛ bó le.
Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew bee fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyi le, bɛne wvú le. Wee mvu bó le to nu Dionisius wvù to nu wee nshii Aleobagus, ɛ mvu nu kpwoon ɛ diee nu Damalis noo bonyii bomew tɛn.
Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul nɛ Atɛn gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kolɛn e.
No wvú gɛn jó, ɛ bô wee Juu mvu tasɛn ɛ diee nu Akpwila, ɛ bó to boke wvú Bontus. Akpwila bô Blisilia wvù kpwɛse to bɛɛ nɛ kɛ lo Itali, njefo Klawdius wvù Nfon wvu Lum to nu ɛ bvuse sa' lɛ Bojuu bocii ebuy jó. Ɛ Baul ke laa ghane ɛ̂ bó le,
dioo yɛn lɛ bó seysee jéw yì bó saaŋke cún dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kɛ tɛn lemme dì wvú wvù Baul to cee nje dí, ɛ wvú mum no cee fó, ɛ bô bó lemte.
Ɛ́ ké dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii, ɛ wvú no gɛne yew bunle le, jemyi bô Bojuu noo Boglek dvú, momte keege lɛ bó ebee fiɛɛ fì wvú to yɛɛyi le.
Ɛ Silas bô Timatio ke dioo nɛ Masedonia to, ɛ Baul mum jo kefew kew kecii no fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo', duŋci ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu Jisos.
Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bodvu ke nɛ no kicine fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyi, nan'yi wvú. Ɛ wvú mum yɛwse ndvú ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kpwe yene enù can yene le. Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke ɛbo fó kɛ. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, me nu eŋgɛnè wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.”
Ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bó le, buy gɛn no cee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wee Juu kɛ, ɛ wee wvudvu to ké no wvumte Nyo'. Diee diew to nu Titius Justus, ɛ la diew nu mbew yew bunle le.
Ɛ Klisbus wvù cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ke lese fitele yî Tata le. Ɛ bonyii bo Kolɛn nteen no yuuke no Baul fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos, beŋe, ɛ bó mum leese bó ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ jomew, ɛ Tata jeme ɛ̂ Baul ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ, ɛ̀ fewcì kɛ diɛw yɛm gɛne dvú. Fo wo ke elu dvú kɛ,
njefo me nu bee wo, ɛ kɛ wee yaa nu naa dvú wvù nulo ege fiɛɛ bô wo kɛ. Bonyii bem nu ɛ̂ kelaante kin e nteen.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum no nu jó yî kelum e kecile bô keŋgawtɛn, yɛɛyi bonyii bô diɛw Nyo'.
No Baul to nu jó, ɛ Galio ke dioo nu wee sa' wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Akɛya le, ɛ Bojuu baancɛ ye koo wvú gɛn bô wvú yew nsaw e,
jeme ɛ̂ Galio lɛ, “Wee wvun momte keebaŋse bonyii ɛ bó bunlee Nyo' ɛ̂ je mi le jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu no nci gomte.”
Ɛ Baul ke nɛ lɛ wen ejemyi, ɛ Galio nɛ jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu ba lɛ, “Bojuu ben eyuw, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fin be nu fiɛɛ fimew fì befe ɛ wee wvun ɛ ge, kɛnɛɛ nci mvu ɛ wvú ɛ ŋgoy, tu me mbe ɛ ŋkuu shém ɛ n'yekɛ fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi.
Geenɛn, no fiɛɛ fin nu kɛ mbew ɛkumɛ díɛw bô ɛdiee noo bonci bonɛn, ben eseyse ɛbenɛben. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ me ensaw fifin fiɛɛ kɛ.”
No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum kuŋ bó ɛ bó buy yew nsaw e.
Ɛ bó bocii mum nɛ ley yî Sostɛnes wvù to nu cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle le, mum suŋ wvú fwe dvu yew nsaw. Ɛ Galio faŋɛ yaa kpwe lo fiɛɛ fó kɛ.
Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul bvuu ce Kolɛn bô bonyii bo mbee le yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ke mum nɛ cinɛ bó le ɛ bô bo Blisilia noo Akpwila ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le keegɛne Silia. Ɛ́ bó sɛ nɛ Sɛŋklia fò bó to leyɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ Baul mvu ɛkolɛ nje ŋkawma wvù wvú to geɛ fô Nyo' le.
Ɛ bó no gɛne, ke gɛn buy Ɛfɛsus, ɛ Baul cinɛ Blisilia bô Akpwila le jó, yaw gɛn fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew bunle Bojuu le, jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu dvú.
Ɛ bó ke lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ebvuu ece kɛ bô bó ɛdiuw nteen, ɛ wvú tun.
Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo nɛn'yi, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋkase ento ɛ̂ ben e ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn ɛ bee.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e nɛ Ɛfɛsus.
Ɛ ŋguw ke gɛn buy Kaysalia, ɛ Baul buy, ben gɛn gay kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Jɛlusalɛm, mum nɛ bow Antiok.
Ɛ wvú ke ce jó ɛ kefew gɛncɛ, mum kase nɛ no lɛne fele ɛ̂ biba bì Galɛshia bô Fligia le, yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le bo jó.
Ɛ wee Juu mvu ke nɛ to Ɛfɛsus ɛ diee diew nu Abolos, ɛ bó to boke wvú Alɛksandia. Ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú kee njeme, bvuu kee Ŋwa' Nyo' ntay.
Bó to nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase wvú bô Je yì Tata duŋci, ɛ wvú mum no fiee lo bô n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos, yɛɛyi bonyii lɛŋ. Geenɛn, wvú to kee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Jon to fewci leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
No wvú to toɛ Ɛfɛsus, mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle le yaa fane kɛ. Ɛ Blisilia bô Akpwila ke yuw no wvú yɛɛyi nonɛn, mum jo wvú, gɛn bvuu yuuse wvú ntay ɛkumɛ Je yì Nyo' duŋci.
Ɛ Abolos ke nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ wen enu elente egɛn keba kè Akɛya le. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bo Ɛfɛsus mum ficɛ wvú, saŋ ŋwa' ɛ̂ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bo Akɛya, tomte lɛ wvú ke dioo ɛ fɛse ɛ bó fiisɛn wvú. Ɛ wvú ke gɛn jó, fi bonyii bo mbee le ntay, ɛ bonyii ban nu bò Nyo' to nu ɛ buw bó bô mboyma, ɛ bó lese fitele yî Jisos e.
Ɛ wvú no beeke mbew bô Bojuu ya le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ, soo bó, duŋci ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu seke Abolos to nu Kolɛn, ɛ Baul ke jo je yi ɛnte ɛnte ɛ̂ biba bì wvú to lɛne jó le, fɛse Ɛfɛsus. No wvú fɛse jó, yɛn ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bomew e,
bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule to nu ɛ to yî yene le seke ben to lesɛɛ fitele yî Jisos e?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bese ke baa yuw wase lɛ fiɛɛ fimew nu Keyoy ke Yuule kɛ.”
Ɛ Baul bife lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, tu bó to lese ben ɛ̂ joo nje la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bó to lese bese ɛ̂ joo bii no Jon to fewci.”
Ɛ Baul mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ wvú to gayte lɛ bó ebee ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù too ɛ̂ wen ɛjim e, ɛ wee wvù wvú to gayte nu Jisos.”
Ɛ bonyii bodvu yuw no Baul gay nonɛn, ɛ bó mum lese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos e.
Ɛ Baul gɛɛ can yî bó le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum to yî bó le. Ɛ bó mum nɛ no jemyi díɛw yì bó yaa kee kɛ, bvuu seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
Bonyii bodvu to nu wee diɛwɛ yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le.
Ɛ Baul mum no nu kɛ Ɛfɛsus, gɛne yew bunle le yî kee le tɛ, jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii dvú yaa fane kɛ. Ɛ bô bó no beeke mbew, ɛ wvú momte keege lɛ bó ebee fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
Ɛ bonyii bomew tɛme bikuu faŋ keebee, mum no jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise ɛkumɛ Je Tata. Ɛ Baul mum cinɛ bó le, jo ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bô bó gɛn wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew n'yɛɛyi yi Taylanus e, no jemyi ɛ̂ bó dvú ɛdiuw ɛcii.
Ɛ Baul ge nonɛn yî bilum e bifɛɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ Bojuu noo Boglek bocii bo woŋ wvù Ɛsia jodvu le yuw diɛw Tata.
Ɛ Baul no nu, ɛ Nyo' gee, ɛ wvú gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ ɛ̀ nu lo bi diuw wvù yumɛɛn e.
Bó to ké joo kɛ naa fiɛɛ fiew fi ye le diɛwɛ fincake fi ndvu le, kɛnɛɛ ndvu ye lemme, egɛn ekum wee kencɛm e dvú, ɛ wvú mum bonɛn lo, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wvù kɛŋke keyoy kè befe yî ye le, ɛ kí buy.
Ɛ Bojuu bomew bò to ké no ghane bvuuse biyoy bì befe yî bonyii le, ke mum nɛ no momte keeteŋe diee di Tata Jisos e sɛ bvuuse biyoy bidvu. Ɛ́ wee ké nɛ mum gay ɛ̂ keyoy kè befe lɛ, “Me mbvuuse wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos wvù Baul fewci le.”
Bonyii bò to momte fiɛɛ fidvu to nu bosooshwiy, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu boom bo Sikɛfa wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese Bojuu le.
Ɛ keyoy kè befe ke bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me ŋkee Jisos, ŋkee tɛn Baul, ben nu finɛn baa?”
Ɛ wee wvù keyoy kè befe kedvu to nu yî ye le mum fɛnte lo yî bonyii bodvu le, gowsɛ bó kuse, ɛ bó fɛɛ lo buy yew dvu wee wvudvu nu wase binyi bincimte bô bilɛmte ye le.
Ɛ Bojuu bô Boglek bocii bò to cee Ɛfɛsus yuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu, no fane. Ɛ bonyii mum no wvumte diee di Tata Jisos e fesene lo.
Ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu wase bonyii bo mbee le no too seŋe bvuu bwaashi mwɛɛm mvu ɛjiwɛ le mvù bó to gee.
Ɛ bomew nteen bò to gee nfim, baancɛ boŋwa' bobole bo nfim e, to dvú, ton ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise. Ɛ bó taŋ kpwaw boŋwa' bodvu bocii, ɛ wvú buy ɛjisɛ bigew bontfuke mbaanshen (50,000).
Nonɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun ge ɛ diɛw Tata no leyte ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le bô mvungay, saaŋkene gɛne lo fwe fwe.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul yɛn lɛ wen nu egɛn Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ wen nu dioo gɛne, efey je biba bì Masedonia bô Akɛya le. Ɛ wvú bvuu no gayte lɛ, “Me nu ŋke endioo ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ mbuy Jɛlusalɛm, eŋkɛŋke keeŋgɛn tɛn embuy Lum.”
Ɛ wvú mum yaw tum bonyii bofɛɛ, Timatio bô Ɛlastus bò to fici wvú, ɛ bó gɛn fwe Masedonia. Ɛ wvú shɛɛ bvuu ce Ɛsia caan.
Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ mvunlaa nɛ kɛw Ɛfɛsus ɛkumɛ Je Tata ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvu wɛɛ kɛ.
Cee ɛlamɛ mvu to nu jó, ɛ diee nu Dɛmitiyus, ɛ wvú to ké no tfuyte mwɛɛm mvù fieesene yew ncese nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Atɛmis. Lemme didvu din to ké no too bô bigew fô bonyii bò tone ɛlamɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bi wɛɛ kɛ.
Ɛ Dɛmitiyus mum kum bonyii bò to tone ɛlamɛ bocii noo bonyii bò to lemte kfuu didiɛ lemme, ɛ bó tase. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben kee lo lɛ lemme din nu ɛ beene ŋole bigew yî dvú le.
Ben ɛ no yɛne bvuu yuuke fiɛɛ fì fimbwɛ fì Baul fin gee. Wvú ghane gayte lɛ kɛ bonyo' bò bó kene lo bô can yaa nu bonyo' kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ ge wase nonɛn, ɛ baŋke bvufee bvu bonyii le nteen Ɛfɛsus jan, ɛ no baŋse wase tɛn bvu bonyii bo Ɛsia le bocii ɛ bó beŋe wvú le.
Me n'yɛne lɛ lemme disɛɛbeene din nu ekɛŋkɛ diee dì befe. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy nonɛn kɛ, yew ncese nyo' wvu baay wvù kpwoon wvù Atɛmis nu ke etu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici. Ɛ́ fí kooy lo nonɛn, tu bó ɛ shoose wase nyo' wvu baay wvun wvù nu ɛ bó wvumte Ɛsia jocii, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii wvumte tɛn.”
No bonyii bodvu yuw nonɛn, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó. Ɛ bó mum kɛw no wamte, gayte lɛ, “Atɛmis wvu Ɛfɛsus nu nyo' wvu baay.”
Ɛ kelaante kedvu kecii mum bvuŋ. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to tasɛɛ mum ley yî Gayus bô Alistakus e, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu bonyii bo Masedonia bò to lɛne bô bo Baul, gufe gɛn bô bó yew nshii noo bondvum e.
Ɛ Baul no gomte keeley gɛn fwe dvu kebombom kedvu, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le tun.
Ɛ bonyii bomew bo baay baay bo jó bò kɛŋke woŋ bò to nu nsáa ye, bvuu ciinse ntum fô wvú le lɛkɛ lɛ fo wvú emom lo etome ɛkalɛ dvú kɛ.
Ɛ kebombom kè to tasɛɛ kedvu mum nɛ bvuŋ no wamte kɛ lo ncɛw ncɛw. Ɛ bomew wamte fin fiɛɛ, ɛ bomew wamte fifi. Kɛ bonyii nteen to cim kee fiɛɛ fì bó to tasɛɛ fó nje fí kɛ.
Ɛ Bojuu mum jo Ɛlɛksanda fese fwe dvu kebombom ke bonyii le, ɛ bonyii bomew yɛn mum no kpwaake lɛ wvú kee fiɛɛ fó. Ɛ wvú mum no cici bonyii bô kebo keetaŋe diuw we.
Ɛ bonyii bodvu ke dioo kiɛɛ lɛ Ɛlɛksanda nu wee Juu, ɛ bó bvuu mɛse no wamte lo gɛne fwe yî wee le mwaaŋ, gayte lɛ, “Atɛmis wvu Ɛfɛsus nu nyo' wvu baay.” Ɛ bó ke wam nonɛn, gɛn buy bontam bo kefew e bofɛɛ.
Ɛ wee nsaŋ wvu ɛlaante jodvu ke nɛ ci bó, ɛ bó lu bô diuw. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii bo Ɛfɛsus, wee nu dvú wvù maa lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke beene bo Ɛfɛsus jan yew ncese nyo' wvù Atɛmis noo tɛ di nyo' le dì to gbweɛ fowe le?
No wee nu sɛ wvú nu dvú wvù nulo ekicɛn fifin, tu ben bee keelaame, saa eyuŋsene nɛn kɛ.
Ben ɛ to bô bonyii ban fɛn sɛ bó nu ɛ coŋ fiɛɛ yéw bonyo' le, kɛnɛɛ ɛ jeme díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ nyo' wesebeene wvù kpwoon wvun ŋkuuŋ.
Ɛ́ Dɛmitiyus bô bonyii bew fɛn kɛŋke nsaw bô wee, tu ɛdiuw ɛ nsaw nu dvú yò ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó egɛn eyɛn bonyii bò saake bonsaw e, ɛ́ bô bó esaw.
Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fimew fɛn bvuu nu dvú fele fin fì ben gomte, tu bó nu ke etaa ɛnte jodvu fô nshii bocee ntɛw e.
Me njemyi nɛn, njefo me n'yɛne lɛ fiɛɛ fi ɛbɛn fin nu elese beene diuw e lɛ beene nu ɛ kɛw mvunlaa. Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn, beene saa ekɛŋke fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì bó etfuse kɛ.” No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum gay ɛ kebombom kedvu tawse.
Ɛ mvunlaa mvù to nu Ɛfɛsus ke lɛɛtɛn, ɛ Baul tee ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, tefe bó mum gay bó le no gɛne Masedonia.
Ɛ wvú gɛn, ghan biba bi jó le, yvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le ntay, mum daŋsɛn gɛn Glees,
ce jó kee tɛ. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ no nu lɛ wen nu egɛn eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo egɛn Silia, mum yuw lɛ Bojuu nu ɛ gbwe wvú ɛ̂ je. Ɛ wvú mum yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ jee lɛ wen ekase etu jim je Masedonia.
Wvú to lɛne bô bò Sobata wvù waa Bilus wvu Bɛlia, noo Alistakus bô Sɛkundus bo Tɛsalonika, noo Gayus wvu Dɛlbi, noo Timatio, noo Tikikus bô Toofimus bò to nu bonyii bo Ɛsia.
Ɛ bonyii ban mum gɛn fwe no cɛyte bee bo Baul Towas.
Ɛ Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó ke fey, ɛ bese ley ŋguw Filibi, jo ɛdiuw ɛtin bɛne bó le Towas, ɛ bee bó ce jó ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ bee bo kentaashɛ tase fokiɛguu keeguutɛn blɛɛd. No Baul to nu keebuy nɛ fò bvú ɛ yuu, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ bó, ke jeme gɛn buy ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ.
Bee bó to nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe le, ɛ bin'yeese baa dvú nteen.
Ɛ cuwee mvu wvù diee to nu Yutikus ɛ shii yî ntoo yew e. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ kɛw no leete no Baul to jemyi kɛ gɛne lo. Ɛ nyii ke dioo gooke wase lo wvú, ɛ wvú mum nɛ fó gbwe ɛkuse, ɛ fó to nu biŋkente bi yew e bitɛte ɛ kɛw fokuse. Ɛ bó gɛn jo ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase.
Ɛ Baul shii gɛn ŋgvuum ɛ̂ wvú ɛwe, bam wvú gay ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Wvú bɛɛ dvú, fo ben ebuukè kɛ.”
Ɛ Baul ke kase ben ɛ̂ kebuw ke ɛwe kiɛ le, guse blɛɛd die, sɛ bvuu kɛw no jemyi, ke jeme ɛ bvutfuu ghan yuu ɛ wvú mum nɛ.
Ɛ bonyii ke jo cuwee wɛ kfulɛ bô wvú fô yew e ɛ wvú nu wum, ɛ mvuntelem lɛɛtɛn bó baay.
Ɛ bese ke ley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo, gɛn Asos, no Baul to seysɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu jó jò bese nu ke ejo wen. Wvú to gay nonɛn, njefo wvú to gomte keelɛn fokuse.
Ɛ wvú ke koocɛ bese le Asos, ɛ bese mum jo wvú ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bee bó gɛn buy Mitilin.
Ɛ bese ke nɛ fó ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese fɛse mbew Kios e, fey, ɛ bvú bvuu buy yuu, ɛ bese fɛse Samos, bvuu fey, ɛ bvú bvuu buy yuu, ɛ bese ley Miletus.
Bese to lɛne nonɛn, wɛmte lo Ɛfɛsus njefo kɛ Baul to gomte keejewse kefew Ɛsia kɛ. Wvú to gɛne cekey cekey laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen ke enu Jɛlusalɛm diuu di Ŋkaw Bɛntekos e lɛ.
No bese ley Miletus, ɛ Baul ciinse ntum fô bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Ɛfɛsus e lɛ bó eto eyɛn wen e.
Ɛ bó ke to, ɛ wvú jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kee no nce wɛm to nu beene ɛ kɛw yî diuu di fwe dì me nto ntomyɛɛ ɛkalɛ yî nshɛ yi Ɛsia le.
Me nto nu ɛ nshike ɛkolɛ kem, no nlemte fô Nyo' le bô misɛm ɛjise. Ɛ me mbvuu n'yɛn boŋgɛw ɛ̂ jé le nteen no Bojuu to bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim.
Ɛ ben bvuu kee no me nto n'yɛɛyi ben ya le, mbvuu ŋghane n'yɛɛyi yéw e. Me nto mbaa nyilɛ fiɛɛ fimew fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí efi ben kɛ.
Me nto nfewci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ Bojuu noo ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ŋgayte lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, etu bô bo Nyo', elese fitele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
Keseen, ben eyekɛ eyuw, me ŋgɛne Jɛlusalɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ me, ɛ me n'yaa ŋkee lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu egɛn ekooy la bô me jó lɛ.
Fiɛɛ fì me ŋkee nu kɛ lɛ mondvuum monciim mò me nfele mó le, nu ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule seŋe kɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ ncaw bô ŋgɛw cɛyte me fwe.
Geenɛn, kɛ me n'yɛne nshii wɛm e lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ kɛ, ɛfey lɛ me emɛse lemme dì Tata Jisos nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me dì nu lɛ me enfewcì saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ no Nyo' nu ɛ buw bonyii bô mboyma.
Yî keseen e, ben eyekɛ eyuw, me ŋkee lɛ kɛ wee mvu ben e wvù beene ɛ bó se nu, ɛ me nfewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn bvushiw bwem e kɛ.
Me ɛ mum ɛ no nlooci njemyi ɛ̂ ben ɛbɛn lɛ ɛ́ wee mvu ben e la lo keseen, tu kɛ me ŋkɛŋke ɛbo fó kɛ,
njefo me nse mbaa nyilɛ keensee fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ ben fì Nyo' shieele kɛ.
Ben dioo ɛ shɛɛ, no taalè fô bikuu binɛn e noo fô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bò nu diɛwɛ njée le, bò Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ gɛɛ ben ɛ̂ bó we le. Ben enù boncɛy njée bo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le kè wvú to sumɛɛ bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Waa we le.
Me ŋkee lo lɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ mbase ɛkalɛ, ɛ́ bokuula eto eley ŋgoo yene le, saa ecawte wee wvù bó ekoo kɛ.
Bonyii bomew nu ke ebuy kɛ naa ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, elɛɛle ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, guute ɛ bó tuu ɛ̂ ŋgoo yibole.
Nonɛn, ben eyɛnè, kumyì lɛ yî bilum e bitɛte nu ɛ me ɛ n'yɛɛyi ben bocii ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ bô misɛm ɛjisɛ.
Me ɛ mum ɛ no nyaa ben keseen can Nyo' le noo yî diɛw ye yì nu ɛkumɛ nfi wvù Nyo' nu ɛ buw bonyii dvú. Diɛw yin nu yì nulo ege ɛ́ ben ekuu, wvu lɛ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ keleŋ fô bvudvuu bvù Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ ge lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa bew e.
Me nto mbaa njeeŋke bigew bi wee le kɛnɛɛ ndvú wee kɛ.
Ben kee ntay lɛ ɛ̀ nu can yɛm yin yì to lemte fiɛɛ ficii fì bee ŋgoo yɛm to shieele.
Yî mwɛɛm mvunciim e nu ɛ me nto nduŋci ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee kɛŋke keelemtè ntay emum efii bonyii bo ŋgɛw e, kumyì no Tata Jisos to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù nyaa lo, fele wee wvù fii lo le.’”
No Baul mɛse ɛ jeme nonɛn, ɛ bô bó mum tum ɛnvuw fokuse bocii, bunle.
Ɛ bó nɛ kɛse bô kpwe no beele, bamte Baul ŋoci lɛ bó ɛ shɛɛ wase.
Fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ́ bó sɛ no beele baay nɛn, nu diɛw yì Baul to jemyɛɛ lɛ kɛ bó bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn bvushiw bvuwene kɛ. Ɛ bó mum ciinse wvú gɛn buy fô wvú nu eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo.
Ɛ bee bo Baul gay bó le, mum nɛ fó lente ɛ̂ ŋguw e teytey, fɛse Kos. Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese gɛn Lodɛs, ke nɛ fó, gɛn Batala.
No bese buy jó, yɛn wvumvu ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo wvù to gɛne Fonishia le, mum ley jó no gɛne.
Ɛ bese ke yɛn Sayblus e, cinɛ ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko, mum fey gɛn buy Taya, woŋ wvù Silia le fô ŋguw to nu keebvuse mwɛɛm.
Ɛ bese gom bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bee bó ce ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ bó tefe Baul lɛ fo wvú emom egɛn Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.
Ɛ bee bó ke ce, ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn dì bese enɛ, ɛ bese mum jo je. Ɛ bó bocii bô bokɛ' bobole noo boom, ciinse bese buysɛn kelaante kedvu gɛn buy diuw joo yi baay e, ɛ bee bó tum ɛnvuw fokuse, bunle mum gaynɛn.
Ɛ bese ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bó no tuu jim fô yew e.
Ɛ bese mum nɛ Taya, jo je, gɛn buy Tolɛmay. Ɛ bee bo boom bo bwee wese le bo mbee le gaynɛn, ce diuu dimwaaŋ.
Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese nɛ, gɛn fɛse Kaysalia, gɛn yew dvu Filew wvù to ghane fewci diɛw Nyo', ɛ bee bó ce. Filew wvun to nu wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo bonyii bo bosooshwiy bò bó to baayɛɛ ba le.
Wvú to kɛŋke boom bokɛnɛ bonɛw, ɛ bó baa kee wase bolemsɛ kɛ, ɛ bó to ké no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
Ɛ bese no nu jó yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ɛ wee mvu wvù to ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù wvú yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi ke nɛ Judea bow to jó ɛ diee nu Agabus.
Ɛ wvú ke to yɛn bese le, jo kecaw ke Baul e, kay bikaa biew bi wvú wvù Agabus e noo can ye dvú, mum tefe lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule gayte lɛ ɛ̀ nɛɛ no Bojuu bo Jɛlusalɛm nu ke ekay wee wvù kɛŋke kecaw kin nɛn, enya wvú can bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.”
Ɛ bese yuw nonɛn, ɛ bee bo bonyii bocii bò to nu fó no lɛke Baul lɛ fo wvú egɛn Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu la fin nɛn? Ben kee kɛ lɛ ben beele nɛn shiike fitele fiem e? Me nu ɛ nseyse ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ keenley ncaw Jɛlusalɛm maaŋ kɛ. Me nu ɛ nseyse tɛn naa keeŋkpwe lo jó nje diee di Tata Jisos e.”
No je to baa nu dvú keege ɛ́ wvú ekumɛn ŋkpwawcɛ we, ɛ bese mum lu, gay kɛ wase lɛ, “Fí enù kɛ no Tata gomte.”
Ɛ ɛdiuw fey, ɛ bese baancɛ mwɛɛm mvusɛse, mum no bene Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bo Kaysalia ben bee bó, ke jo bese ɛ bee bó gɛn yew dvu Mɛnason dvù bese to nu keeke ecee. Ɛ Mɛnason wvun to nu wee wvu Sayblus, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee mvu ɛnte jo bonyii bò to yawɛɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e.
No bese to fɛsɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bo jó fiisɛn bese ntay.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bee bo Baul laa ghane ɛ̂ Jɛm e, ɛ bocee kentaashɛ to nu tɛn fó bocii.
Ɛ Baul gay bó le, mum nyɛy fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó fì Nyo' to geɛ fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le fele yî lemme dì wvú to lemte le.
Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le. Geenɛn, ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Waa bwee wese, taa eyɛn no Bojuu nu ɛ bó ɛ lese wase fitele yî Jisos e bontfuke le bontfuke le. Geenɛn, bó nu nonɛn bɛɛ kɛ leeme yî bonci bo Muses e tɛmyi,
ɛ bó ɛ see wase ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ wo lɛ wo ghane yɛɛyi Bojuu bò cee bitum bimew e lɛ bó ecinɛ bonci bo Muses e, jemyi lɛ fo bó etfuusè boom yew kɛ, bô lɛ fo bó ebiì nce woŋ e kɛ.
No fí nu ɛ bó nu ke ekiɛɛ kɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ to, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ege nɛɛ keseen?
Bese nu esee fiɛɛ fì wo nu ege. Bese kɛŋke bonyii fɛn bonɛw ɛ bó ɛ ge ŋkawma fô Nyo' le.
Joo bó, ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛn ekfum bikuu binɛn, ɛ́ wo elaw fiɛɛ ficii fì bó kɛŋke keelaw wvu lɛ bó egɛn emvu bikuu bibole. Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum ekiɛɛ lɛ wo gɛɛle tɛn bonci bo Muses e, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó jemyi ɛkumɛ wo yaa nu kecɛɛy kɛ.
Fi ɛkumɛ bonyii bo mbee le bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ bese to jo ntaŋ saŋ ŋwa' ciinse fô bó le lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ.”
Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum jo bonyii bodvu, ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu ɛ bô bó gɛn kfum bikuu bibole. Ɛ Baul mum gɛn yew ncese le, see diuu dì ɛdiuw ɛ ŋkfum nu ke edioo ɛ ka, ɛ́ bó emum ege ncese fô bó le wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ.
Ɛ ɛdiuw yodvu ke dioo ekaa, ɛ yó to nu ɛsooshwiy, ɛ Bojuu bomew bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Ɛsia yɛn Baul e fô yew ncese le, mum bɛyse kebombom ke bonyii le, koo wvú,
no sane ɛtalɛ gayte lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben efi bese. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvun wvù ghane yɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛ̂ bonyii mondvuum monciim ɛkumɛ woŋ wesebeene bô bonci bo Muses e noo ɛkumɛ yew ncese yin. Wvú nu ɛ mɛse ɛ jo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ɛ to bô bó yew ncese le fɛn, ɛ befe bô bvudvuu bvù yuule bvun.”
Bó to jemyi nonɛn, njefo bó to nu ɛ yɛn ɛ Baul ghane ɛlaante bô Toofimus wvù wee wvu Ɛfɛsus. Ɛ bó mum no kpwaake lɛ Baul nu ɛ ley bô wvú fô yew ncese le.
Ɛ ɛtalɛ kedvu ge ɛ̂ kelaante kecii shiw, ɛ bonyii no lewte too fó. Ɛ bó gheŋ Baul, gufe buy bô wvú yew ncese le, kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum faayɛ dew fwese.
Ɛ bó mum no gomte keeyu Baul, ɛ saaka ley bitem bi cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum e lɛ Jɛlusalɛm jocii bvuuŋke lo.
Ɛ wvú mum nɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ, jo bonyii bo nci le bô bikuu bimew bi ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le, ɛ bô bó lewtɛ bow fó. Ɛ bonyii dioo yɛn nci le, ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le nu fó, ɛ bó mum lu keesuuŋke Baul.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ nci wvudvu mum to koo Baul, gay ɛ bó kay wvú bô boncaw bofɛɛ. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wvun nu yɛɛ? Wvú jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?”
Ɛ fó nɛ no yole lo, ɛ ban wamte fin, ɛ boba wamte fifi. Ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa eloocɛ eyuw laa ɛ̀ sɛ be kooy la lɛ. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gay lɛ bó ejo Baul eben bô wvú fô la di bonyii bo nci le.
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum jo wvú, ke dioo bene fô je nu ɛ bó ɛ sɛwyɛ lo, mum nɛ wa tuu lo Baul no kebombom to ffuuke kɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
Ɛ kí to bii nonɛn wamte, gayte lɛ, “Bó elɛse lo wvú.”
Ɛ bó ke dioo leyte wase bô Baul fô la di bonyii bo nci le, ɛ wvú lɛkɛ ɛ̂ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo?” Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn, bife ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ wo kee díɛw Glek e?
Ɛ̀ baa nu wo wee wvu Ijiw wɛ wvù to kɛwɛɛ mvunlaa bô bikuu bi woŋ e kefew kemew e, gufe ŋgoo bonyii bontfuke bonɛw (4,000) bò to yuwyi bonyii, ɛ bô bó gɛn no nu ŋkpwaante le?”
Ɛ Baul tfuse lɛ, “Me nu wee Juu, ɛ bó to boke me Taasus woŋ wvù Silishia le, ɛ kɛ Taasus nu kelaante ke ncɛw kɛ. Kee wo, nya kɛ me bô je ɛ́ me enjeme ɛ̂ bonyii ban.”
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum nya je lɛ wvú ejeme. Ɛ Baul mum leem fô bó to sɛwyɛɛ fɛ, ci bonyii bô kebo. Ɛ bó lu bô diuw, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó ɛ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ,
“Bo'icɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ ɛ́ me entaŋe diuw wɛm fwe dvunɛn.”
Ɛ bó dioo yuw no wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ díɛw yibo Ibulu le, ɛ bó mɛse cife nɛn ndvumm. Ɛ Baul gay lɛ,
“Me nu wee Juu, ɛ bó to boke me Taasus woŋ wvù Silishia le, geenɛn lɛy me Jɛlusalɛm jan, ɛ me n'yɛɛyi ŋwa' can Gamalia le. Ɛ wvú loocɛ yɛɛyi me bô bonci bo bo'icee bosɛɛbeene le, ɛ me mum no nleeme yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le ntɛmyi ntay kɛ diɛwɛ ben bocii bò nu fɛn ɛbɛn e.
Me nto ŋké no mbone bikaa ɛjim jo bonyii bò bii Je Tata le, ŋgee ɛ bó yuwyi bó, ŋkoole bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ nciinse yew ncaw e.
Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô bonyii bò saake woŋ kee baaŋŋ. Ɛ̀ to nya bó boŋwa' lɛ me eŋgɛn dvú fô boom bo bwee wesebeene bò nu Damaskus e. Ɛ me mum no ŋgɛne keeŋkooyɛ bonyii bò bii Je Tata le, eŋkay, ento bô bó Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ bó enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó.
Ɛ me ŋke ndioo nfeŋene Damaskus kɛ diɛwɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ n'yuu mvu wvu baay nɛ sɛsɛ law fowe, shii yî yɛm e.
Ɛ me ŋgbwe fokuse, n'yuw ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Saul, Saul, wo bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nɛn nje la?’
Ɛ me mbife lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ?’ Ɛ diɛw yidvu tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù wo bone bikaa ɛjim jodvu.’
Bonyii bò to nu bee bó to nu ɛ yɛn n'yuu wvudvu le, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa yuw diɛw wee wvù to jemyi bee wvú le kɛ.
Ɛ me mbvuu mbife lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge nɛɛ?’ Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Ja we, eley gɛn Damaskus, ɛ́ bó esee ɛ̂ wo jó lemme dicii dì Nyo' nu ɛ seyse lɛ wo elem.’
Ɛ me ŋke nja fó, ɛ n'yuu wɛ ɛ ge wase me ɛ nfefe, ɛ bonyii bò bee bó to lɛne mum cɛŋse wa lo me, ley gɛn bô me Damaskus.
Wee mvu to nu Damaskus jodvu, ɛ diee nu Ananias, ɛ wvú to looci wvumte Nyo', gɛɛle bonci bosɛɛbeene, ɛ Bojuu bocii bò to nu jó bɛnsee wvú.
Ɛ wvú ke to yɛn me le, leem mbew yɛm e gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Saul waa bwɛɛm, kase eyɛnè mwɛɛm e.’ Kɛ sekedvu nonɛn, ɛ me mum ŋkase no n'yɛne mwɛɛm e, mum n'yɛn tɛn wvú wvù Ananias e.
Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Nyo' bo'icee bosɛɛbeene nu ɛ baa wase wo lɛ wo ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú shieele, bô lɛ wo eyɛn Wee we Lemme wvu Teytey e, eyuw njeme wvù buyte diuw we le.
Wo nu ke enu wee wvù efewcì ɛkumɛ wvú, seŋè ɛ̂ bonyii bocii fiɛɛ fì wo yɛn bô fì wo yuw e.
No fí nu nonɛn keseen, wo bvuu cɛyte la? Nɛnɛ we ɛ́ bó elese wo ɛ̂ joo, ecukɛ bibefɛ biuw, no wo lɛke ɛ̂ Tata.’
Ɛ me ŋke ntu jim Jɛlusalɛm, ŋke ndioo mbunlee yew ncese le, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô me le.
Ɛ me n'yɛn Tata le ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Yaŋsɛn nɛ Jɛlusalɛm jan cekey njefo kɛ bonyii bo jan nu ke ebee fiɛɛ fì wo fewci ɛkumɛ me kɛ.’
Ɛ me ntfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Tata, bó kee naa ntay lɛ me nto ŋké no nleyte yéw bunle le, ŋkooyi bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî yo le, nsuuŋke.
Seke bó to yuu Tɛfan wvù to fewci ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ wo, nu ɛ me nto nu naa fó ntomte. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù bonyii bò to yuu wvú to baayɛɛ ndvú yibo, nya ɛ me no ŋkɛŋke.’
Ɛ Tata bvuu gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ jan, njefo me nu entum wo naa ncejole fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.’”
No Baul to jemyi ɛ bonyii yeke, ɛ wvun njeme ke dioo buy diuw we le, ɛ bó kɛw no wamte lo foweɛwe, gayte lɛ, “Bó elɛse lo kfuu wvun wee yî nshɛ le. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù enu dvú kɛ.”
Ɛ bó no wamte nonɛn, yɛwsee ndvú yibo we, tfumyi kebvu we.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le mum nɛ gay lɛ nci ejo Baul egɛn bô wvú fô la dibole, lɛ bó dioo ɛ gɛn tam wvú, biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ wvú esee fiɛɛ fì ge Bojuu ɛ sɛ no wamte wvú nɛn.
Ɛ bó mum gɛn bô wvú kay, nɛ lɛ bó etamte, ɛ Baul bife ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kemew kè to leeme fó lɛ, “Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ bó etam wee wvu Lum sɛ bó ɛ saw nsaw we le?”
Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kedvu yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn yɛn cee ɛkolɛ wvubole, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte keemom ɛ ɛ̀ nu la? Ɛ̀ keè lɛ wee wvun nu wee wvu Lum.”
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn yɛn Baul e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ me, wo nu wee wvu Lum e?” Ɛ wvú bee.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nto ŋguy bigew nteen, nsɛ no nu wee wvu Lum.” Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu fiem wee wvu Lum bootɛɛn.”
Ɛ bonyii ba bò to nu keebiwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú mum tfuw bikaa. Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvubo no fane tɛn, njefo wvú to nu ɛ gay ɛ bó kay Baul ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Lum.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu no gomte kɛ keeloocɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Bojuu to teyte yî Baul e. Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó fay Baul, tee bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bocii bò saake woŋ, ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú leke Baul ɛ̂ bó fwe.
Ɛ Baul luŋ ɛjisɛ yî bonyii bò saake woŋ e, gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, yî nce wɛm e ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e, nu ɛ me ŋké no ŋgee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù me ŋkee lɛ mvú nu lɛŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ yaa nu dvú fì saake me fô fitele fiem e kɛ.”
Ɛ Ananias wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leeme mbew Baul e lɛ bó ekfun lo diuw we.
Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyo' nu ke ekfun tɛn wo. Wo fieesene kembew kè bó nu ɛ yefe kí ɛ no baa. Wo shile fɛ lɛ wo saake me bii nci le, ɛ bvuu ɛ no ŋgoyte nci wvudvu gayte lɛ bó ekfun me le?”
Ɛ bonyii bò to leeme mbew Baul e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nan'yi ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese Nyo' le le?”
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, kɛ me mbe ŋkee lɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kɛ. Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Fo wee ejeme diɛw yì befe ɛ̂ wee wvù saake bonyii kɛ.’”
Ɛ Baul ke dioo taa yɛn lɛ bonyii bò to nu fó nu ɛ bomew nu Bosadusii ɛ bomew nu Bofalasii, ɛ wvú mum jeme bô diɛw yì tɛmyi ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bò saake woŋ ba lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nu wee Falasii, nu waa Bofalasii. Me nu fɛn yî nsaw e njefo me ntaale fwe, ŋkee lɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.”
No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bosadusii bô Bofalasii mum nɛ kɛw waa, ɛ nshii wvudvu mum bvuŋ.
Bó to waale nonɛn, njefo Bosadusii to ké no duu lɛ kɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ, bvuu duu lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fimew nu dvú diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le kɛnɛɛ biyoy kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ Bofalasii beŋe lɛ mvumvun mvunciim nu lo.
Ɛ waa nɛ tɛme lo fó, ɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bò to nu ŋgoo Bofalasii le, leem fó jeme tɛme lo, gay lɛ, “Bese baa yɛn fiɛɛ fì wee wvun jay e kɛ. Ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ keyoy kemew kɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ wvú.”
Ɛ waa wvudvu ke mum nɛ no gomte wase keetu bvudiuw, ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le no fane lɛ sekemew ɛ́ bó enɛ esaayɛ lo Baul fó biba le. Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ nci ebow fó, eloo Baul can yibole, ekase eben bô wvú fô la di nci le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ, ɛ Tata to leem mbew Baul e, gay ɛ̂ wvù lɛ, “Kuu shém. No wo nu ɛ see wase ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ me Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wo nu ke esee tɛn Lum.”
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Bojuu bomew koo ntfum, die kelew lɛ kɛ bó nu ke edie fiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ ewu fiɛɛ sɛ bó ɛ yu Baul kɛ.
Bonyii bodvu bò to koolɛɛ ntfum, die kelew to fele wee mbaanyɛ.
Ɛ bó mum gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay e, noo bonyii bò saake woŋ, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ die kelew lɛ kɛ bese nu ke elese lo fiɛɛ ɛmvu sɛ bese ɛ yu Baul kɛ.
Yî keseen e, ben ɛ bo bonyii bocii bò saake woŋ eciinse ntum fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le, ebuwse wvú lɛ wvú ebvuu ebowse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto ɛ̂ ben fwe, lɛ ben gomte keebvuu etasse nsaw we ntay. Nonɛn, ɛ́ bese emum egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, ɛ́ bó dioo booke bô wvú, ɛ́ bese emum eyu ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛ̂ je.”
No bó to koolɛɛ ntfum yidvu nonɛn, ɛ waa jɛme Baul wvù diemsɛn yuw, mum gɛn fô la di bonyii bo nci le, see ɛ̂ Baul.
Ɛ wvú mum tee ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kemew gay ɛ̂ kí lɛ, “Joo cuwee wvun egɛn bô wvú fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le, wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keesee ɛ̂ wvú.”
Ɛ wvú mum jo, gɛn bô wvú fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Baul wvù wee ncaw nu ɛ tee me, ɛ gay lɛ me enjo cuwee wvun ento bô wvú fô wo le, lɛ wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keesee ɛ̂ wo.”
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu mum jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, ɛ bô wvú lɛwse ye, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu la fì wo gomte keesee ɛ̂ me?”
Ɛ cuwee wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Bojuu bomew nu ɛ jo ntaŋ lɛ bó nu egay ɛ́ wo ebowse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ ntfuu, lɛ bó gomte keetasse nsaw we ntay, ɛ bó gee nonɛn buwsee lo wo.
Fo wo ke ebee kɛ, njefo bonyii nu dvú fele wee mbaanyɛ bò nu egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, ɛ bó die kelew lɛ kɛ bó nu ke edie fiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ ewu fiɛɛ sɛ bó ɛ yu Baul kɛ. Bó nu keseen ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase ye, ɛ no cɛyte kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wo nu jeme.”
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum gay lɛ cuwee wvudvu egɛnè, ciise ɛ̂ wvú lɛ fo wvú dioo gɛne ge ɛ wee kiɛɛ lɛ wvú nu ɛ see fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ wen kɛ.
Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum tee bikuu bi ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le bifɛɛ gay ɛ̂ bí lɛ, “Ben eseyse bonyii bo nci le gee fɛɛ (200) bô bo nyámbala le mbaŋsooshwiy (70) noo bo ɛgoŋ e gee fɛɛ (200), ɛ́ ke edioo enu didiuu bvuukɛ ɛntaŋ, ɛ́ bó egɛn Kaysalia.
Ben eseyse tɛn nyámbala ɛ̂ Baul, ejo wvú egɛn bô wvú fô Fɛlew wvù wee sa' le ɛ fiɛɛ baa kooy bô wvú ɛ̂ je kɛ.”
No wvú gay nonɛn, mum saŋ ŋwa' ɛ wvú jemyi lɛ,
“Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Klawdius Lisias. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô wo le wee wvu baay wvù Fɛlew wvù wee sa'. Me ŋgayte wo le.
Bojuu se nu ɛ koo wee wvun ɛ no gomte keeyu. Me ɛ n'yuw lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Lum, bee bonyii bem bo nci le ɛ se ɛ mum ɛ ley fó ɛ loo wvú can yibole.
Me ɛ nse ɛ no ŋgomte keen'yuw fiɛɛ fì bó teyte yî ye le, ɛ mum ɛ mbow bô wvú fô bonyii bobole bò saake woŋ e.
Bó ɛ se ɛ dioo tasse, me ɛ n'yɛn lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî ye le nu kɛ mbew wvu ɛkumɛ bonci bobole, ɛ wvú baa ge fiɛɛ fì bó eyu lo wvú kɛnɛɛ elese wvú yew ncaw e kɛ.
Wee ɛ se ɛ dioo see ɛ̂ me lɛ Bojuu bomew nu ɛ koo ntfum keeyu wee wvun, me ɛ mum ɛ nciinse wvú fô wo le kaŋ mwaaŋ. Me nu ɛ ŋgay tɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bò teyte mwɛɛm yî ye le lɛ bó eto eyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wo le, esee fiɛɛ fì bô bó kɛŋke.”
Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ke mum ge kɛ no cee ɛkolɛ wvubo to gayɛɛ, jo Baul ɛntaŋ, ɛ bô bó gɛn buy Antibati.
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bonyii bo nci le bò to lɛne bô bikaa cinɛ Baul e can bò to lɛne yî nyámbala le lɛ bó egɛnè bô wvú fwe, mum kase tu jim fô la dibole.
Ɛ bó ke gɛn fɛse Kaysalia, mum nya ŋwa' wɛ ɛ̂ wee sa' bvuu nya tɛn Baul can ye le.
Ɛ wvú fi ŋwa' wvudvu taŋ, bife laa Baul buy ɛ̂ keba ke la le lɛ. Ɛ wvú dioo yuw lɛ Baul nu wee wvu Silishia,
mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu ŋke en'yekɛ nsaw wo seke bonyii bò ben ɛ bó kɛŋke nsaw ɛ fɛse fɛn.” Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ bó ejo Baul egɛn egɛɛ wvú ɛ̂ ntow 'Ɛlod e, ecɛytè wvú.
Ɛ ɛdiuw ke buy ɛtin, ɛ Ananias wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, bô bonyii bomew bò saake woŋ, noo Tɛtulus wvù to nu ɛ wvú ɛ loocɛ ɛ yɛɛyi nci, bow gɛn Kaysalia. Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Fɛlew wvù wee sa' le, jike nsaw wvubo wvu ɛkumɛ Baul fwe dvu wvú.
Ɛ bó tee Baul, ɛ Tɛtulus mum kɛw keeteyte mwɛɛm yî ye le, gay ɛ̂ Fɛlew lɛ, “Wee wvu baay, nyɛkeey nu ɛ no nu dvú woŋ wvun e ɛ to ɛ buy yî keseen e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje sa' yo yì jee, ɛ boŋkumɛn bò jee nu dvú nteen woŋ wvun e can yo le.
Bonyii bocii yuuke njoŋ baay bvuu fiisene sa' yo mondvuum monciim sekecii.
Kɛ me ŋgomte keenjewsee kefew kuw baay kɛ, me nlɛke lɛ wo eyekɛ kɛ caan, eyuw fiɛɛ fì bese nu ejeme.
Bese nu ɛ yɛn lɛ wee wvun nu wee fiɛɛ. Wvú ghane shiike mvunlaa ɛntelɛŋ jo Bojuu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu wvú cee ɛkolɛ ŋgoo yì bó teŋe lɛ yi Nasalɛt.
Wvú to gomte tɛn keebefe bô yew ncese ɛ bese koo wvú.
<range>
Ɛ́ wo biwci lo mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wee wvun, ɛ́ wo eyuw ɛ̂ wvú mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù bese jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú.”
No Tɛtulus jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bojuu tom, bɛnse lɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu kecɛɛy.
Ɛ wee sa' wɛ few ɛ̂ Baul lɛ wvú ejeme. Ɛ wvú mum jeme lɛ, “Me ŋkee lɛ wo nu ɛ saw wase bonsaw woŋ wvun e yî bilum e nteen. Me ɛ mum ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ keenleem ntaŋe diuw wɛm ɛ̂ wo ɛjise.
Ɛ́ wo nɛ lo ɛ no biwci, ɛ́ wo eyuw lɛ ɛdiuw baa efey wase yuufe ncow ɛfaa no me nto mbenɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm keebunle Nyo' kɛ.
Bojuu to baa eyɛn ɛ me mbeeke mbew bee wee kɛ, ɛ bó to baa eyɛn tɛn ɛ me mbɛysee bonyii yew ncese le kɛnɛɛ yéw bunle le, kɛnɛɛ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛlaante kɛ.
Kɛ bó yaa kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ fì duŋci lɛ me nto nu ɛ ŋge mwɛɛm mvun mvù bó teyte yî yɛm e kɛ.
Me nu ɛ mbee fin fwe dvu wo, lɛ me mbunlee Nyo' bo'icee bosɛse mbii Je le yì bó teŋe lɛ ɛ̀ nu yì befe. Ɛ me mbeŋe ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo mvù nu ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
Me ntaale kɛ fwe yî Nyo' le lɛŋlɛŋ no bó tɛn taale, lɛ bonyii bocii bò jee bô bò befe nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.
Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no momte ntay sekecii keencee nce wvu lɛŋ fwe dvu Nyo' noo bonyii, wvu lɛ fo fiɛɛ enu dvú fì esaakè me fô fitele le kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu wase bilum nteen no me nɛn'yɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ me nse ŋkase ɛ ŋgɛn jó keenya bigew ɛ̂ bonyii bem bo woŋ e, noo keeŋge ncese.
Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fin fì bó se yɛnɛɛ me le yew ncese le ɛ me ŋgee, ɛ me ɛ ŋkfum wase ɛkolɛ kem. Ɛ kɛ bonyii kɛnɛɛ diuw wvu kumɛɛn se nu fó kɛ.
Bojuu bomew bo Ɛsia se nu fó, ɛ bó be kɛŋke keenu fɛn ejeme ɛ̂ wo fiɛɛ fì bó kɛŋke ɛkumɛ me, ɛ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ban bonyii see lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó se yɛnɛɛ lɛ me nu ɛ njay seke me nse nleemɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ,
ɛfey fiɛɛ fì me nse njemyɛɛ bô diɛw yì tɛmyi ɛ̂ bó lɛ, me nu ɛ̂ bó fwe yî kefew kekiɛ le yî nsaw e njefo me nu ɛ mbee lɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.”
No Baul jeme nonɛn, ɛ Fɛlew yekɛ nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú looci kee wase ɛkumɛ Je Tata, mum leke nsaw gay lɛ, “Seke Lisias wvù cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le ɛ bow ɛ to, ɛ me nsɛ nsumtɛn nsaw wene.”
Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le ejo Baul egɛn elese yew, ecɛytè. Geenɛn, lɛ bó enya kɛ naa wvú bô je, ecinɛ ɛ́ nsáa ye etoo fici wvú.
Ɛ ɛdiuw ke dioo gɛncɛ, ɛ Fɛlew bô Dusila wvù kpwɛse wvù to nu wee Juu gɛn tee Baul ɛ wvú to, ɛ bó no yeke fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ keelese fitele yî Klistu Jisos e.
Ɛ wvú ke dioo jemyi ɛkumɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enù wee wvù jee, bô no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekemsenè bô ɛkolɛ kew, noo no Nyo' nu ke esaw bonyii, ɛ Fɛlew yuw nonɛn, ɛ fí bɛmse wvú. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo egɛne keseen, ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ kefew nsɛ mbvuu entee wo.”
Wvú to jeme nonɛn, kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ lɛ sekemew ɛ́ Baul ekew wen. Ɛ wvú ké mum no teŋe Baul ɛfonɛfon ɛ bô wvú fɛle kenfɛ.
Kɛ nonɛn, kɛ nonɛn, ɛ bilum kum bifɛɛ. Ɛ bó dioo gɛɛ Bolsius Fɛstus yî kentaw ke Fɛlew e, ɛ Fɛlew no gomte lɛ wen ege ɛ́ Bojuu ekooŋke wen, mum cinɛ Baul e yew ncaw e.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta no Fɛstus kɛwɛɛ keesaake keba ke woŋ e kè Judea, ɛ wvú nɛ Kaysalia ben Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bikuu bi Bojuu le bi woŋ e mum to yɛn wvú le, jike nsaw wvù bó kɛŋke bô Baul ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, no lɛke wvú lɛ,
wvú efi kɛ lɛ bowen, ege ɛ́ bó eciinse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó to gee nonɛn, ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase lɛ bó nu ke egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, eyu.
Ɛ Fɛstus tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Baul nu yew ncaw e Kaysalia, ɛ me kebɛɛ nu eŋkaase ntuu jó ɛdiuw ɛyan.
Bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le bomew ebi me le Kaysalia, ejeme fiɛɛ fì wvú jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu jó ɛ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú.”
Ɛ Fɛstus ke ce bô bó gɛn buy kɛ diɛwɛ ɛdiuw nyaŋ kenɛɛ yuufe le, mum kase tu jim Kaysalia. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú gɛn shii yew nsaw e, gay lɛ bó eto bô Baul.
No Baul fɛse, ɛ Bojuu bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm bow jó, mum leemɛn gem wvú, no teyte mwɛɛm yî ye le nteen ɛ fì wɛɛ yaa nu kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ yaa nu dvú fì bó nulo esee fì duŋci lɛ wvú nu ɛ ge fimew kɛ.
Ɛ Baul taŋe diuw we gay lɛ, “Me mbaa njay naa lo nci Bojuu, kɛnɛɛ wvu yew ncese, kɛnɛɛ wvu Nfon wvu Lum kɛ.”
Geenɛn, ɛ Fɛstus no gomte lɛ wen ege ɛ́ Bojuu ekooŋke wen, mum bife ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Wo kooŋke keeben Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ me kebɛɛ ensaw nsaw wo jó yî mwɛɛm mvun e?”
Ɛ Baul tfuse lɛ, “Me nleeme wase fɛn ɛ̂ kebɛŋ ke nsaw e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke Nfon wvu Lum e. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛn fò bó bee keesaw nsaw wɛm. Wo kebɛɛ kee naa ntay lɛ me mbaa njay fiɛɛ bee Bojuu kɛ.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ me nu ɛ ŋgoy nci, ɛ njay fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu lo me, me nsaa entune keeŋkpwe kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî yɛm e nu mbiay, tu kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo enya me can Bojuu ban e kɛ. Me nu nlɛkɛ lɛ nsaw wɛm egɛn fwe fô Nfon wvu Lum e.”
Ɛ Fɛstus yuw nonɛn, ɛ bô bonyii bew bò bô bó to saake bonsaw tfumtfum. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “No wo nu ɛ lɛkɛ wase lɛ nsaw wo nu egɛn fô Nfon wvu Lum e, tu wvú nu egɛn fó.”
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Nfon Aglifa bô Bɛnis laa ghane ɛ̂ Fɛstus e Kaysalia keegay wvú le.
Ɛ bó ke dioo nu wase jó yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ɛ Fɛstus nɛ be Nfon bô nsaw Baul gay lɛ, “Wee mvu nu fɛn wvù Fɛlew to cin'yɛɛ yew ncaw e,
ɛ me ŋke ndioo ŋgɛn Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ Bojuu jike nsaw we ɛ̂ me ɛjise lɛ me eŋgay lɛ wvú nu ɛ gbwe nsaw.
Ɛ me ŋgay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, kɛ nce bonyii bo Lum nu ɛ bee lɛ bó esumtɛn lɛ wee nu ɛ gbwe nsaw sɛ bó nu ɛ nya wase je wee wvudvu ɛ leem ɛ̂ kebɛŋ ke nsaw e fwe dvu bonyii bò bô bó kɛŋke nsaw ɛ taŋe diuw we yî mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî ye le kɛ.
Ɛ bó ke dioo to fɛn, ɛ me ŋfaŋɛ n'yaa moocɛ lo kɛ. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ me ŋgɛn nshii yew nsaw e ŋgay ɛ bó to bô wee wvudvu.
Ɛ bonyii bò bô bó to kɛŋke nsaw ke dioo leem we, faŋɛ yaa duŋcɛ jay wvù me nto ŋkpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó esee yî ye le kɛ.
Ɛ bó kaa no jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu mbew e yî ye le ɛkumɛ je yì bó bunlee Nyo' jó, noo ɛkumɛ wee mvu wvú bó teŋe lɛ Jisos ɛ wvú to kpwe wase, geenɛn ɛ Baul leeme kɛ lɛ wvú nu dvú.
No me nto mbaa ŋkiɛɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enley ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ me mum mbife ɛ̂ Baul laa wvú kooŋke keeben Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ bó esaw nsaw we jó ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ.
Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ wen nu emɛy yew ncaw e, ɛ́ ke esumtɛn Nfon wvu Lum nsaw wen. Ɛ me mum ŋgay lɛ bó egɛɛ wvú yew, ecɛytè egɛn ebuy no me ŋke enciinse wvú ɛ̂ Nfon wvu Lum.”
Ɛ Aglifa yekɛ nɛn, gay ɛ̂ Fɛstus lɛ, “Me kebɛɛ ŋkooŋke keen'yuw mwɛɛm mvun diuw wee wvudvu le.” Ɛ Fɛstus tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu ebuy eyuw ntfuu.”
Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Aglifa bô Bɛnis no lɛne too bô bvuwee bvu baay. Ɛ bô bocee bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bo baay baay bo ɛlaante, lɛn to ley ŋgay. Ɛ Fɛstus mum gay ɛ bó to bô Baul.
No bó toɛ bô wvú, ɛ Fɛstus gay lɛ, “Nfon Aglifa bô bonyii bocii bò nu fɛn, ben eyɛn wee wvun. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù Bojuu bocii too nyɛɛyi me jan noo Jɛlusalɛm ɛkumɛ wvú, wamte, gayte lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù enu dvú kɛ.
Ɛ me mbaa n'yɛn lɛ wvú nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó eyu wvú kɛ. No wvú se lɛkɛɛ wase lɛ nsaw we egɛn fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nfon wvu Lum e, me ɛ mum ɛ n'yɛn lɛ me nu enciinse wvú fô wvú le.
Geenɛn, kɛ me n'yaa nlooci ŋkee fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaŋ fô Nfon wvù cee ɛkolɛ wɛm e ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ nleke wvú ɛ̂ ben ɛjise keseen ɛfey mvunciim ɛ̂ wo Nfon Aglifa ɛjise, lɛ ben etasse nsaw we, wvu lɛ me eŋkɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaŋ.
Me n'yɛne lɛ fí baa nu lɛŋ lɛ me enciinse wee ncaw fô Nfon e sɛ me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ fiɛɛ fì bó gayte lɛ wvú nu ɛ jay e kɛ.”
Ɛ Nfon Aglifa mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvuw keseen keejeme bô diuw wo.” Ɛ Baul mum cake kebo we, kɛw keetaŋe diuw we, gay lɛ,
“Nyaa', me n'yɛne lɛ keshi kem nu ɛ joŋ lɛ baay keenleem etaŋe diuw wɛm fwe dvu bó ɛbɛn yî mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Bojuu teytey yî yɛm e.
Me njemyi lɛ nɛn, njefo bó looci lɛ kee nce woŋ Bojuu noo bombew bò bó ké no kɛŋke. Nonɛn, me ɛ no nlɛke lɛ bó eyekɛ kɛ lɛ nyɛkeey eyuw fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme.
Bojuu bocii kee nce wɛm ɛ kɛw naa ɛ me mbɛɛ lo. Bó kee no me nto ncee woŋ wese le noo Jɛlusalɛm.
Ɛ bó kee naa ntay lɛ ɛ kɛw lo ncejole nu ɛ me nu wee ŋgoo Bofalasii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgoo yì looci tɛmyi yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le fele yimi yicii. Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bó kooŋke keejeme, ɛ́ bó ebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy.
Me ɛ no nleeme lɛ fɛn keseen yî nsaw e njefo me ntaale fwe, ŋkee ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ bo'icee bosɛse dvú.
Ŋkawma wvun nu lɛ wvù dikfuu disɛse di yuufe ncow difɛɛ cɛyte no bó bunlee Nyo' shiee le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ. Nyaa', ɛ̀ nu lɛ nje ŋkawma wvudvu wvun wvù Bojuu kɛŋke lɛ nsaw dvú bee bó.
Me ɛ no mbiite ɛ̂ bó noo ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ laa ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben yɛne ɛ fí tɛmyi keebee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ebvuse wee yî kpwe le lɛ?
Me kebɛɛ nto ŋkpwawci naa lɛ me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge fiɛɛ ficii keenfiwsɛ diee di Jisos wvu Nasalɛt e.
