Ɛ́ wee to nu ɛ ge ɛ me n'yuw nsase, tu kɛ nsase wvun to mɛy kɛ fô me le kɛ. Wvú to nu tɛn fô ben e bocii. (Kɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ fì me enjemyì eŋgɛne yî dvú le baay kɛ).
Ŋgɛw wvun wvù wee nteen ben e nu ɛ nya wase ɛ̂ wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ wvú ɛ kocɛn nonɛn.
Keseen nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elɛɛshɛ jay we, ege ɛ́ fitele fiew elɛɛtene, wvu lɛ fo wvú emɛy kɛ wase enu shen shen baay kɛ.
Nonɛn me ɛ no ŋkule can ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben ekase eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú lɛ ben bɛɛ kɛ kooŋke wvú.
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ me nsɛ nsaŋ ŋwa' wɛ fô ben e keemom ben eŋkiɛɛ lɛ laa ben yuuke kɛ me le yî fiɛɛ le ficii lɛ.
Ɛ́ ben lɛɛshi jay wee, tu me tɛn nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ. Ɛ́ me nlɛɛshi fiɛɛ, fɛn ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú keelɛɛshɛ, tu me nlɛɛshi ɛ̂ Klistu ɛjise nje yene.
Beene gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo Satan ke enɛ eley jó ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ beene we. Kɛ beene maa no wvú ké no wɛɛntene kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto ŋgɛnɛɛ mbuy kelaante kè Towas e keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu jó, ɛ Tata yene kembuŋ fô me le keenlem lemme diew jó.
Geenɛn bvufee bwem to baa nu fó kɛ, njefo me nto mbaa n'yɛn waa bwɛɛm wvù Taytus e jó kɛ. Nonɛn ɛ me mum ŋgay bó le lɛ bó ɛ shɛɛ wase, mum nto Masedonia.
Geenɛn, keyoone nu fô Nyo' le wvù ké no saa fwe dvusɛse yî Klistu le nyaa mbɛɛtɛ, ɛ bese bii diɛwɛ bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ gbwen jem e. Ɛ wvú mum fele yî yese le saŋse Klistu mondvuum e monciim ɛ bó kee wvú yuuke nsam we diɛwɛ jiin fò bó ɛ ton e.
Ben ekeè lɛ bese nu diɛwɛ nsam jiin di Klistu le fô Nyo' le ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bò bó boysee bó noo fô bò laa wase le.
Fô bonyii bò laa wase le nu ɛ nsam wvun too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô bó le. Ɛ bonyii bò bó boyse bó nu ɛ nsam wvun too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nshii fô bó le. No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nu ɛ kocɛn keege didin lemme?
Kɛ bese nu diɛwɛ bonyii nteen e bò nu ɛ jo diɛw Nyo' yí ɛ tu fiɛɛ fi way e fì bó ghane geese lo kɛ. Bese nu fisɛse bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le. Ɛ bese fewci diɛw Nyo' bô mvuntelem mvù yuule diɛwɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ tum bó, ɛ bó leeme ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le.
Me nfɛn ŋgayte nɛn ɛ fí nu lɛ bese bvuu kaase duŋci lo bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ ben e? Nuu lɛ bese shieele boŋwa' diɛwɛ no bonyii bomew shieele boban boŋwa' bò nɛ fô bese le kɛnɛɛ fô ben e bò duŋci bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese lɛ?
Ben kebɛɛ nu wase ŋwa' wese wvù bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvusɛse le lɛ wee tfuu nulo ekiɛɛ ebvuu etaaŋke.
Ben yen'yi lɛ ben nu ŋwa' Klistu ɛ bese ɛ seyse. Ŋwa' wvun nu ɛ kɛ bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kete ke ŋwa' le kɛ. Bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô Keyoy ke Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le. Ɛ kɛ bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî biwaŋ bi ɛta yo ɛta le kɛ. Bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî biwaŋ bì ɛ̀ nu mvuntelem mvu bonyii le.
Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ bese jemyi ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise sɛ kemaŋɛn nje Klistu.
Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bese nu ɛ kocɛn bô bikuu bisɛse keege fiɛɛ fimew wvù bese ke nɛ eduu lɛ fiɛɛ fimew nɛ fô bese le kɛ. Ɛ̀ ge Nyo' bese ɛ sɛ kocɛn.
Wvú nu ɛ ge bese ɛ kocɛn keelemte yî saaka moŋkan mo monfɛm e. Kɛ moŋkan man yaa nu mò bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonci bò bó saŋɛɛ lo bô can kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu mo Keyoy ke Yuule le. Bonci to too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe. Geenɛn ɛ Keyoy nyaa ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii ɛ̂ bonyii.
Je yi yvum yì bó to gee mwɛɛm jó nu ɛ bó to cow bonci bodvu yî biwaŋ bi ɛta le. Seke Muses to too bô bonci bodvu nu ɛ kɛ bonyii bo Islael to kee keebvuu etaa bvushiw bwew kɛ, nje n'yuu Nyo' wvù to baa yî bvushiw bwew e. Ɛ́ yiyɛ je yi yvum yì to too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe to too kɛŋke n'yuu Nyo', ɛ n'yuu wvun nu wvù to baa nonɛn jimte wase kaa gɛne lo,
ɛ́ n'yuu je yì bó gee mwɛɛm jó yì ɛ̀ nu yi Keyoy ke Yuule saa efey naa lo wvuwɛ n'yuu le?
Ɛ́ je yì bó to gee mwɛɛm jó yì to too bô fiɛɛ fì leese lo bonyii ŋgɛw e, to too bô n'yuu Nyo', kɛ tu je yì bó gee mwɛɛm jó yì ɛ̀ nu yì Nyo' joo bonyii lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise nulo ekɛŋke n'yuu ɛ wvú fele lo wvuwɛ!
Kecɛɛy kedvu nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì to too kɛŋke n'yuu Nyo' fidvu nu ɛ lase wase n'yuu we njefo n'yuu wvù kuuke fele wvuwɛ nu ɛ to wase.
Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì to kaa wase gɛne lo to too bô n'yuu Nyo', kɛ tu n'yuu fiɛɛ fì too keenu wase kemakaa nu ekuuke fele naa lo wvuwɛ!
No bese kee nonɛn sɛ kemaŋɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no fewci yaa fane kɛ.
Kɛ bese nu diɛwɛ Muses wvù to ké baŋ bvushiw bwew bô ndvu keege lɛ fo bonyii bo Islael etaale no n'yuu wvù to baa yî bvushiw bwew e jimte kaa gɛne kɛ.
Geenɛn bonyii bodvu nu ɛ bvufee bvubole to jiime. Ɛ naa ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn wvun e, nu ɛ bó dioo taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwa' moŋkan mo moyvuum e, ɛ́ bó eyuw, ɛ fiɛɛ no nu ɛ fí ɛ baŋ kɛ bvufee bvubole. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ yî Klistu le wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ecake fiɛɛ fì baaŋke fidvu.
Yî kecɛɛy e, ɛ to ɛ buy naa ɛbɛn wvun e, nu ɛ bó taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Muses e, ɛ fiɛɛ no nu kɛ ɛ fí ɛ baŋ bvufee bvubole.
Geenɛn ɛ́ wee ke etu wase bô Tata, ɛ́ bó mum cake fiɛɛ fì baaŋke fidvu.
Tata wvun nu Keyoy, ɛ naa fɛɛ fô Keyoy kin nu, nu ɛ bonyii ke buy kɛ yî bvunfaw e.
Fí nu lɛ beene bocii bò nu sɛ fiɛɛ bɛɛ baaŋke monshim mosɛɛbeene nu ɛ n'yuu Tata baa yî yese beene le, gee ɛ beene baa mum kumene gɛne fwe fwe fieesene wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú. Ŋkumɛn wvun nu ɛ ɛ̀ gee Tata wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
Nonɛn no bese kɛŋke lemme din ɛ ɛ̀ cam Nyo' shen ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ shem ekpwee bese dvú kɛ.
Bese nu ɛ base jim ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii gee ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le mvù ɛ̀ nu mvu kenshoose le. Bese nu ɛ tun je kenlɛɛma. Kɛ bese leese mbiay ɛ̂ diɛw Nyo' le kɛ. Bese ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy ɛndan ɛndan, duŋci bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ wee tfuu ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekpwawcɛ ekiɛɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvù bese fewci wvun nu ɛ fiɛɛ baŋyi, tu fí baŋyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bò laa lo le.
Fô boba bonyii bò baa bee saaka wvun e nu ɛ Satan wvù ɛ̀ nu nyo' wvu yî woŋ wvun e ɛ sûm bvufee bvubole bvú ɛ no jiime keege lɛ fo bó eyɛnè n'yuu saaka wvù jee wvù nu ɛkumɛ bvukukɛ bvu Klistu wvù nu wunte Nyo' le kɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ bese fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ bikuu bisɛse kɛ. Bese fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos lɛ wvú nu Tata. Ɛ bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse bonyii bò lemte ben e nje Jisos.
Nyo' wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “N'yuu ebuy ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ebaa”, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvudvu wvun wvù nu ɛ ge n'yuu we ɛ no baa fô mvuntelem mvusɛse le keeyuuse bese ɛ bese kee bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le bvù nu yî bvushiw bvu Jisos Klistu le.
Geenɛn, ntfu saaka wvun nu yî yese le, ɛ bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse nsháan mbom. Ɛ bese nu nonɛn wvu lɛ fí eduŋcì lɛ mvuŋgay mvu baay mvun yî yese le nu mvu Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvusɛse kɛ.
Boŋgɛw yike bese biba bicii, geenɛn yaa bvuwci bese kɛ. Bese nɛn'yi ɛ bvufee no bvuuŋke lo bese, geenɛn shem saa ekpwee bese kɛ.
Bó ké no bone bikaa ɛ̂ bese ɛjim, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' yaa daayi ɛ̂ bese le kɛ. Bó ké no kfune bese ɛ bese gbwee fokuse, geenɛn yaa kpwee kɛ.
Bese ké no ghane kpwee kɛ kfuu kpwe Jisos sekecii, wvu lɛ nshii Jisos nulo eyen'yi tɛn yî ye yese le.
No bese cee, nu ɛ bese ké no nu kɛ diuw kpwe le sekecii nje Jisos, wvu lɛ nshii Jisos eyen'yi yî biŋkpwe bisɛse bi ye le.
Nonɛn bese ɛ mum ɛ no kpwee kpwe, geenɛn ɛ kpwe yese yin too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nshii fô ben e.
No bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le diɛwɛ wee mvu wvù to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' le lɛ, “Me nu ɛ mbee ɛ nsɛ no njemyi”, nu ɛ bese tɛn ɛ bee ɛ sɛ no jemyi.
Bese kee lo lɛ wvú wvuwɛ wvù to bvusɛɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos yî kpwe le, nu ke ebvuse tɛn beene bò nu bô bo Jisos yî kpwe le, ejo bese noo ben tɛn egɛn egɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú fwe.
Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim kooyi nje yene, wvu lɛ no mbuwma Nyo' saaŋkene gɛne fô bonyii le nteen nteen, ɛ́ keyoone kè bonyii nyaa ɛ̂ Nyo' ebiisè, ɛ mbense gɛne fô Nyo' le.
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì kɛ shem kpwee bese kɛ. Naa no ye yese yin cim bvuuke gɛne kaa nɛn, nu ɛ mvuntelem mvusɛse kumene tuu kɛ lo mvunfɛm ɛdiuw ɛcii.
Boŋgɛw bo caan ban bò bese yɛne yî kefew kin e, nu ɛ bó seysee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvujoŋkɛ bvu baay bvù mɛy lo fô bese le bvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa efewsɛn kɛ.
Nonɛn, bese baa leke fisɛse bvufee yî mwɛɛm mvù bó yɛne mvú le kɛ. Bese leke ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvù bó yaa yɛne le kɛ, njefo mwɛɛm mvù beene yɛne mvú le nu ɛ mvú fele lo, geenɛn ɛ mvù beene yaa yɛne kɛ, nu mvù mɛy lo.
Beene kee lɛ ɛ́ bó sâw lo cun yin yì ɛ̀ nu ye yesebeene yì beene cee dvú fokuse fɛn, tu beene kɛŋke yew fô Nyo' le ɛ bó yaa bom bô can kɛ. Yiyɛ nu yew yi fowe, ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì mɛy lo.
No beene nu fɛn keseen nu ɛ beene looci naa shomkene, njefo beene beele baay lɛ bó etfume yew yi fowe yɛ yî yese beene le diɛwɛ ndvu le.
Ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bó ɛ tfume wase yiyɛ yî yese beene le, beene saa ebvuu enu ye yɛ kɛ.
No beene bɛɛ cee cun yin e, nu ɛ boŋgɛw bò beene joo gee ɛ beene shomkene baay. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ beene gomte lɛ bó baayɛ ndvú yì ɛ̀ nu ye yesebeene yidvu yî yese beene le kɛ. Beene gomte lɛ bó etfume lo yimi yî yese beene le wvu lɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo emi lo biŋkpwe bi ye le bidvu.
Nyo' nu wvù nu ɛ seyse beene keekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fin. Wvú nu ɛ nya beene sâ' wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
Nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu sekecii kee fifin sɛ kemaŋɛn. Bese kee lɛ no bese cee yî ye yin e yî woŋ wvun e, nu ɛ bese nu ncejole fô Tata le.
Bese gee mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fì bese lese yî Nyo' le, kɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bese yɛne wvú le kɛ.
Bese nu naa sɛ kemaŋɛn yî fifin e, ɛ fí jee naa lo lɛ bese ecinɛ lo ye yin e, egɛn enu wase bee bo Tata fô la diew e.
Fí ɛ no nu lɛ kɛnɛɛ bese nu bee bó fô la diew e, kɛnɛɛ bese bɛɛ fɛn, tu fiɛɛ fì bese taale yî dvú le, nu kɛ keegee ɛ wvú yuuke njoŋ.
Ben ekeè lɛ beene bocii kɛŋke keeke eleem fwe dvu Klistu ɛ́ wvú esaw beene, wvu lɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ekɛŋkɛ nlawma fiɛɛ fì wvú to gee yî ye yin e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee kɛnɛɛ fì befe.
No bese kee fiɛɛ fì nu keefane Tata, bese ɛ mum ɛ no momte keege ɛ́ bonyii ekumɛn. Nyo' looci naa kee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese naa ntay. Ɛ me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben tɛn kee ntay ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese.
No bese jemyi nɛn nu ɛ kɛ bese gomte keebvuu ekase eduŋci lo bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Bese nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu je ɛ̂ ben keesaale ye bô bese, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben etfuse ɛ̂ bonyii bò bensee bibɛɛn bô mwɛɛm mvù bó yɛne yî bonyii le ɛjise, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvu fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bikuu ghane bese, tu bí ghane nje Nyo'. Ɛ̀ no nu lɛ bí leeme fó, tu bí leeme kɛ nje yene.
Fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ bese gɛne fwe bô fiɛɛ fì bese gee nu keŋkoŋɛn kè Klistu kɛŋke fô beene le. Bese gee nonɛn njefo bese nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ bee lɛ wee mwaaŋ to nu ɛ kpwe fô bonyii le bocii, ɛ fí mum nu lɛ bonyii bodvu bocii nu ɛ kpwe wase tɛn.
Wvú to kpwe fô bonyii bocii le wvu lɛ fo boba bò cee, ebvuu ecee fô bikuu bibole kɛ. Geenɛn lɛ bó eceè wase fô wvuwɛ wee wvù to kpweɛ kase buy yî kpwe le nje bó le.
Nonɛn, ɛ kɛw lo nu ɛ kɛ bese bvuu taale wee bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e kɛ. Naa no bese to cim shee taale Klistu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e, nu ɛ bese yaa bvuu taale wvú keseen ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le kɛ.
Fiɛɛ fì nu nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu, tu wvú nu wase wee wvu fwɛ. Mwɛɛm mvu mvuyvuum mvunciim nu ɛ fey wase, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ tu wase mvu mvunfɛm.
Fin ficii nu ɛ ɛ̀ gee Nyo' wvù to kasɛɛ jo beene yî ye le no wvú to mancɛɛ mwɛɛm beene ɛ bó fele yî Klistu le. Ɛ wvú ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese lemme keegee ɛ bonyii manci mwɛɛm bô bo Nyo'.
Fì nu lɛ, ɛ̀ to nu yî Klistu le wvù Nyo' to manci mwɛɛm bô bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e lɛ bó etu bô wvú. Ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eŋgoyte fite fi kebefɛ kebole kɛ, mum nya ntum keman wvun can yese le lɛ bese eteete ɛ̂ bonyii.
Bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu fɛn yî bvudvuu bvu Klistu le, ɛ Nyo' fele yî yese le lɛke bonyii. Nonɛn bese kule can ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee di Klistu le lɛ ben ekase emancɛ mwɛɛm ben ɛ bo Nyo'.
Ɛ̀ nu nje yese beene wvù wvú wvù Nyo' to geɛ ɛ Klistu wvù to baa kee kebefɛ, nɛ tu kebefɛ, wvu lɛ beene etu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje ye.
No bese lemte yî kentaashɛ le bee bo Nyo', bese ɛ mum ɛ no kule tɛn can ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben efiisɛn mbuwma Nyo' wvun ege ɛ́ wvú ela ɛcici kɛ.
Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le lɛ, “Kefew ke lɛŋ to nu ɛ to kocɛn, ɛ me nya bitem ɛ̂ wo. Diuu di mboyma le to nu ɛ kocɛn ɛ me nfi wo.” Ben etaa eyɛn, keseen nu kefew ke lɛŋ, ɛ din nu diuu di mboyma le.
Kɛ bese yaa gee naa lo fiɛɛ fì nulo ebaaŋke je wee mvu kɛ. Bese gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bó ke eyɛn jay mvu le yî lemme disɛse le kɛ.
Geenɛn, bese nu ɛ duŋcɛ fisɛse bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ jé le yicii lɛ bese nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' le. Bese nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ je yì bese kuule fitele naa baay yî boŋgɛw bò bese yɛne le bô seke mwɛɛm tɛmyi noo seke je yaa nu naa dvú kɛ le.
Bonyii ké no suuŋke bese, ké nɛ sekemew lese bese yew ncaw e, ɛ bonyii nɛn'yi no shiike mvunlaa bee bó. Bese ké no kfune ye yî lemme le, ké nɛ ce ɛntaŋ saa lefe kɛ, ké nɛ kefew kemew e no kpwee jeŋ.
Bese duŋci tɛn lɛ bese nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ je nce wese wvù yuule le bô no bese kee fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ Nyo', noo no bese kuule shém, bô no bese kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù jee fô bonyii le. Bese cee bii no Keyoy ke Yuule duŋci, ɛ bese kooŋke bonyii bô ŋkoŋɛn wvu kecɛɛy.
Bese ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu njeme wvu kecɛɛy, gee mwɛɛm ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le. Bese ké no jici nce wvu teytey e diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvu ɛbo ɛcɛɛy bô mvu ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko le.
Bese ké no lemte kɛ lo, kɛnɛɛ bonyii wvumte bese, kɛnɛɛ bó yaa wvumte kɛ, kɛnɛɛ bó jemyi mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛkumɛ bese kɛnɛɛ bó jemyi mvù jee. Bonyii ké no joo bese lɛ bese nu bonyii bo kenlɛɛma le, geenɛn ɛ bese nu bonyii bo kecɛɛy e.
Ɛ́ bonyii ké nɛ no nu nɛn diɛwɛ kɛ bó kee bese kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bonyii kee naa bese ntay. Bó ké nɛn'yi no yɛne lɛ bese nu wase boŋkfusay, geenɛn ben etaa eyɛn, bese nu kɛ dvú. Ɛ́ bonyii ké nɛ no nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bese, geenɛn yaa yuwyi bese kɛ.
Bese ké no nu nɛn diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu yî yii le, geenɛn laŋlaŋe kɛ sekecii, nu diɛwɛ bonyii bò fuute le, geenɛn gee kɛ ɛ bonyii nteen nu bonyii bo kpwaw e. Bese ké no nu nɛn diɛwɛ kɛ bese kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bese kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvunciim.
Bonyii bo Kolɛn, bese nu ɛ jeme wase ɛ̂ ben yaa nyile fiɛɛ kɛ. Bese nu ɛ yene mvuntelem mvusɛse ɛ gɛɛ mvuyɛm ɛ̂ ben.
Kɛ bese baa baŋ mvuntelem mvusɛse fô ben e kɛ. Ɛ̀ baŋ ben mvunɛn fô bese le.
Me ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ ben kɛ diɛwɛ ɛ̂ boom bem e lɛ, ben ege lɛŋlɛŋ no bese nu ɛ ge fô ben e, eyene tɛn mvunɛn mvuntelem fô bese le.
Fo ben elɛnè ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ ben ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu bo mbee le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ fi teytey bô fì befe eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ? N'yuu bô ɛjiwɛ nulo ekɛŋke kentaashɛ?
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Klistu bô Bɛlial enu diuw mwaaŋ e? Fiɛɛ fì taashi wee mbee bô wee wvù baa nu wee mbee nu la?
Yew ncese Nyo' nulo ekɛŋke la keege bô mvunyo' mvu yî woŋ wvun e? Ben ekeè lɛ beene nu yew ncese yì yi Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii. Fifin nu no Nyo' to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Me nu ŋke encee yî bó le, nlɛne ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ. Me nu ŋke enu Nyo' wvubo, ɛ bó nu bonyii bem.”
Nonɛn, Tata Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Ben ebuy ɛ̂ bó ɛnte, enù jɛɛy fô bó le. Fo ben ekum fiɛɛ fi nnyɛn e kɛ, ɛ́ me emum enfiisɛn ben.
Me nu ŋke enu Icen, ɛ ben nu boom bem bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ. Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Tata Nyo' wvù Kɛŋke Mvuŋgay Mvunciim.”
Nsáa yɛm shém, no Nyo' nu ɛ nya boŋkawma ban ɛ̂ beene nɛn, beene emum ecukɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì beete bô ye yesebeene noo keyoy kesɛɛbeene. Beene eyuulè gɛne mɛɛse no beene cee yî nfan wvù wvu Nyo' le.
Ben egɛɛ bvudvuu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e fô bese le. Kɛ bese nu ɛ jay fiɛɛ fô wee le kɛ. Kɛ bese nu ɛ lɛɛ wee kɛ, ɛ kɛ bese nu ɛ fiw wee mvu kɛ.
Kɛ me njemyi nɛn lɛ me nsaake lo ben kɛ. Me nu ɛ ŋgay wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben nu naa lo fitele fisɛse, ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu keekpwe kɛnɛɛ keenu dvú, tu beene nu enu kɛ yî kentaashɛ le.
Me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ fitele fiem yî yene le baay. Me ŋkɛŋke kembense ye ke baay ɛkumɛ ben. Fitele fiem lɛɛtene baay ɛkumɛ ben. Ɛnte jo boŋgɛw bocii bò bese yɛne nu ɛ me n'yuuke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ.
Naa no bese to leyɛɛ woŋ wvù Masedonia le, bese to baa kɛŋke nlɛɛtɛn kɛ. Bese to kɛŋke boŋgɛw biba bicii. Bonyii to gomte diuw bee bó, ɛ bese bvuu kɛŋke nfan ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvusɛse le.
Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' wvù lɛɛsee mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò nu yî yii le ke lɛɛse mvuntelem mvusɛse bô nto wvù Taytus to toɛ.
Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ nto we maaŋ wvù to lɛɛsɛɛ mvuntelem mvusɛse kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu tɛn je yì ben to lɛɛsɛɛ fiew fitele jó. Wvú to nu ɛ see ɛ̂ bese lɛ ben shieele baay keeyɛn me le, bô no ben kɛŋke yii fô bikuu binɛn e, noo no ben kɛŋke shiee fô me le. No me n'yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mbvuu n'yuw naa lo njoŋ baay.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ ŋwa' wvù me nto nsaŋɛɛ fô ben e wɛ to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben no nu yii yii, tu kɛ me ncim ŋkumyi ye kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me nto ŋkume kɛ ye, njefo me n'yɛne lɛ ŋwa' wɛm wvudvu to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben no nu yii yii. Geenɛn, ben to nu yii yii kɛ yî kefew e nɛn caan.
Me ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ keseen, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu njefo ben to nu ɛ no nu yii yii kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu njefo yii yin to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben kumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn. Ben to kɛŋke yii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ je yì Nyo' gomte le. Nonɛn bese to baa ge fiɛɛ fimew fì befe fô ben e kɛ.
Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke yii ɛ̂ je yì Nyo' gomte le, tu fí nu ege ɛ́ wvú ekumɛn fitele fiew. Ɛ́ fifin eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mboyma fô wvú le, saa eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô fiɛɛ fì wvú ekumyi ye yî dvú le kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee kɛŋke yii ɛ̂ je bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e, tu yí nu ke eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe.
Ben eyɛn lɛ fiɛɛ fì yii yì ɛ̀ nu yì Nyo' gomte nu ɛ to dvú fô ben e. Ben eyɛn no ben nu ɛ jo mwɛɛm naa shiee le. Ben eyɛn tɛn no ben nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ ficii keeduŋcɛ lɛ kɛ ben kɛŋke ɛbo fô fiɛɛ fì befe fidvu le kɛ. Ben eyɛn no fiɛɛ fidvu nu ɛ ton'yɛ ben. Ben eyɛn nfan wvù ben nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ. Ben eyɛn shiee wvu baay wvù ben kɛŋke keeyɛn me le. Ben eyɛn shiee wvù ben kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ. Ben eyɛn tɛn kfuu ŋgɛw wvù ben nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee wvudvu wvù geɛ jay. Yî fiɛɛ le ficii nu ɛ ben ɛ duŋcɛ lo lɛ kɛ ben kɛŋke naa lo ɛbo fô fiɛɛ fidvu le kɛ.
Nonɛn, naa no me nto ncim nsaŋɛɛ ŋwa' wɛ fô ben e nu ɛ kɛ me nto nsaŋ nje wee wvù to geɛ jay, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù bó to geɛ jay fô wvú le kɛ. Me nto nsaŋ wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eduŋcɛ fô bikuu binɛn e ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise lɛ ben kɛŋke shiee fô bese le.
Nonɛn fifin nu ɛ ge shém ɛ no lɛɛtene bese. Keebise yî shém yese yì nu ɛ lɛɛtɛn e, nu ɛ bese bvuu yuuke njoŋ baay nje njoŋ wvù Taytus yuuke njefo ben bocii nu ɛ ge fitele fiew ɛ no nu yî nyɛkeey e.
Naa me nto ŋké no nsaale wase ye bô ben ɛ̂ Taytus, ben to baa shoose me kɛ. Kensaa ye kè bese to ké no saale bô ben ɛ̂ Taytus nu ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke kecɛɛy. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ ficii fì bese to ké no jemyi ɛ̂ ben nu tɛn kecɛɛy.
Wvú wvù Taytus ké kumyi no ben bocii to yuwɛɛ wvú le, bô no ben to fiisɛnɛɛ wvú fane, ciiŋke, ɛ wvú bvuu koŋ ben naa fesɛn lo.
Me tɛn n'yuuke njoŋ njefo me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bvufee bwem yî yene le ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ mɛse.
Boom bo bwee wese le, bese gomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì mbuwma Nyo' nu ɛ ge fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi ɛ̂ keba kè Masedonia le.
Boŋgɛw bò tɛmyi nu ɛ mom wase bó baay. Geenɛn ɛ njoŋ wvu baay wvù bó kɛŋke ɛ ge bó ɛ loocɛ ɛ yene can yibo yicii ɛ̂ bonyii bomew naa no bó cim nu ɛ̂ kefufe ke baay ɛnte.
Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensee nu lɛ ɛ̀ to kpwaw kɛ bó lɛ bó enya nnya no mvuŋgay mvubole nu. Ɛ bó dioo nyaa, nya naa fesɛn lo.
Bó to nu ɛ lɛkɛ bese naa shiee le lɛ bese enya kɛ bó je keelese ɛbo fô lemme din e keetom bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le.
Bó to nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ ɛ̂ je yì bese to baa kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege le kɛ. Bó to nu ɛ yaw nya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ Tata, mum nya tɛn ɛ̂ bese no Nyo' gomte.
Nonɛn, ɛ bese mum lɛkɛ Taytus lɛ no wvú to nu ɛ kɛw wase lemme din ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, lɛ wvú emum egɛn dvú fwe eficɛ ben keemɛse lemme dì jee din.
No ben looci kee mwɛɛm mvunciim naa ntay, mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ keba ke mbee le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke njeme le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke bvufee le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke shiee keege fiɛɛ le, noo mvu ɛ̂ keba ke keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn e fô bese le, bese ɛ mum ɛ no gomte lɛ ben eloocɛ ekiɛɛ tɛn keeyene can yene yî lemme dì jee din e ntay.
Kɛ me njemyi nɛn nyaa ɛ ɛ̀ nu nci kɛ. Me momte lo mbii shiee wvù bonyii bomew kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ le keen'yɛn lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn tɛn nu ke kecɛɛy.
Ben kee wase fitele fì jee fì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu to kɛŋke. Naa no wvú to nu wee bvukukɛ nu ɛ wvú to nɛ tu wee kefufe nje yene, wvu lɛ kefufe kew ege ɛ́ ben etu bonyii bo bvukukɛ le.
Yî saaka wvudvu wvun e nu ɛ me ŋgomte keenya wɛm ntefe. Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ ben bò to kɛwɛɛ lumbee keegee fiɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ keege fiɛɛ maaŋ kɛ, ben to nu tɛn bonyii bò to kɛwɛɛ keekɛŋke shiee keege fiɛɛ,
ben emum egɛn dvú fwe emɛse, wvu lɛ ben ke dioo ɛ mɛse bii no mvuŋgay mvunɛn nu, ɛ́ fí elɛn ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ bô shiee wene wvù ben kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee kɛŋke shiee keenya, tu Nyo' nu efiisɛn nnya ye bii fiɛɛ fì mwɛtɛn kɛŋke keenya le, wvú saa ebii fiɛɛ fì wee baa kɛŋke le kɛ.
Kɛ me ŋgayte nɛn lɛ ben nu dioo nyaa keefi bonyii bomew kaa kpwe lo kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ keege ɛ́ biba bicii ekɛŋke lɛŋlɛŋ.
No ben kɛŋke mwɛɛm keseen ɛ mvú ffuyte lo, ɛ bonyii bomew tane, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben efi bó. Ɛ́ bó dioo kɛŋke tɛn ɛ mvú ffuyte lo sekekiɛ, ɛ ben tane, ɛ́ bó efi ben. Nonɛn ɛ́ biba bicii emum ekɛŋke lɛŋlɛŋ.
Ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù to baancɛɛ baay, to baa emum ekɛŋke baay kɛ. Ɛ wee wvù to baancɛɛ kɛ caan, to baa emum ekɛŋke kɛ lo caan kɛ.”
Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù nu ɛ gɛɛ shiee wene fô fitele fi Taytus e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ wvù me ŋkɛŋke fô ben e.
Kɛ wvú to baa emum ebee keeto ɛ̂ ben e nje bese to nu ɛ lɛkɛ wvú kɛ. Wvú too ɛ̂ ben e yî ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwe le no wvú to kɛŋke wase shiee naa baay fô ben e.
Bese tumte wvú bô waa bwee wesebeene wvù bó kee wvú ɛntelɛŋ jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii yî saaka wvù jee wvù wvú ghane fewci le.
Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifiɛ ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Wvú nu tɛn wee wvù bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le nu ɛ baa lɛ wvú eghanè bee bó no bese ghane gee lemme dì jee di ɛkumɛ nnya yin. Lemme din nu keege ɛ́ bonyii enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Tata kebɛɛ, bô keeduŋcɛ lɛ bese kɛŋke shiee keeficɛ bonyii bomew.
Bese gomte lɛ fo fiɛɛ ke enu dvú fì wee mvu ke ebacɛ bese yî dvú le ɛkumɛ nnya yi baay yin yì bese lemte yî dvú le kɛ.
Bese momte naa ntay keege ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ ɛ̂ Tata ɛjise maaŋ kɛ. Bese momte keege fì nu tɛn lɛŋ ɛjise jo bonyii.
Bese tumte tɛn waa bwee wesebeene mvu bô bó wvù bese nu ɛ mom wase wvú bokaŋ nteen yî mwɛɛm e nteen, ɛ yɛn lɛ wvú kɛŋke shiee keegee mwɛɛm. Ɛ wvú nu keseen kɛŋke naa shiee wvu baay fô ben e, njefo wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ fitele yî yene le naa baay.
Wee diɛwɛ Taytus e nu ɛ wvú nu wee wvù bee wvú lɛne yî ɛkalɛ le kemwaaŋ, nu tɛn wee wvù bee wvú lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ fô ben e. Ɛ dioo tu fô boom bo bwee wesebeene le bomew ba, nu ɛ bó nu bonyii bo ntum e bo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó gee ɛ mbense gɛne fô Klistu le.
Nonɛn, ben emum eduŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn fô bó le ɛndan, wvu lɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le eyɛn lɛ ye yì bese ké no saale ɛkumɛ ben nu yi lɛŋ.
Kɛ shiee cim nu dvú wvù me ensaaŋke lo ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ lemme din keetom bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le kɛ.
Me ŋkee lo lɛ ben kɛŋke wase shiee keetom bó. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fidvu fì me nsaale ye dvú ɛ̂ bonyii bo Masedonia ɛkumɛ ben, njemyi lɛ ben bo Akɛya nu ɛ ben to seyse wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lumbee keetom. Shiee wvù ben kɛŋke keenya ɛ mum ɛ ge tɛn mvuntelem mvu bonyii le nteen ɛ̂ bó ɛnte ɛ ja we.
Geenɛn, me ntumte boom bo bwee wesebeene le ban fô ben e wvu lɛ fo ye yì bese saale ɛkumɛ ben yî saaka wvun e ke ebuy lɛ ɛ̀ nu yi ɛcici kɛ. Me ɛ no ntumte bó wvu lɛ ben enù ɛ ben ɛ seyse no me nto ŋgayɛɛ lɛ ben nu ke enu.
Ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, fí ɛ kooy lɛ bee bonyii bo Masedonia bomew ɛ nɛ ɛ to ɛ yɛn ɛ ben nu sɛ ben nu ɛ seyse, ɛ́ kenshoose kedvu enu nɛɛ fô bese le, ɛfey mvunciim fô ben e bò bese se gɛɛle bvufee yî yene le?
Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì geɛ ɛ me ŋkpwawcɛ lɛ fí nu shiee le lɛ me enlɛkɛ boom bo bwee wesebeene le ban lɛ bó esa kɛ fwe eto ɛ̂ ben e eseyse nnya yi baay yin ɛ kefew bɛɛ yì ben to kawɛɛ keenya. Nonɛn ɛ́ nnya yidvu emum enu ɛ ben ɛ seyse wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu nnya ɛ ben nyaa yî ŋkoŋ wvu wene le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu lɛ bó kamte lo ben kɛ.
Ben ekumyì lɛ wee wvù jewyi caan, nu ke egbwele kɛ caan, ɛ wee wvù jewyi nteen, nu ke egbwele tɛn nteen.
Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e kɛŋke keenya no wvú nu ɛ kpwawcɛ fô fitele fiew e, yaa nyaa guute lo ye kɛnɛɛ nyaa diɛwɛ bó kane lo wvú kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' kooŋke wee wvù nyaa bô nlaŋlaŋ.
Nyo' nulo ebuw ben bô mwɛɛm mvunciim ege ɛ́ mvú effuyte lo, wvu lɛ ben ekɛŋke fiɛɛ ficii sekecii ɛ fí kocine ben e bocii, ɛ́ ben emum egeè dilemme dì jee dicii dvú ntay.
Fí nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù nyaa nnya nu ɛ tfuw lo nnya ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, lemme diew dì jee nu ke emɛy nu sekecii.”
Nyo' wvù nyaa ŋgow ɛ̂ wee wɛɛ bô mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ bó diee, nu ke enya tɛn ebvuu ebise ŋgow mwɛɛm mvunɛn, ege ɛ́ nce wene wvù jee eto bô ŋgbwele ɛ wvú duule lo.
Nyo' nu ke enya tɛn ben bô bvukukɛ ɛ̂ jé le yicii keege ɛ́ ben eyen'yi can yene ntay ɛ̂ bonyii bomew, wvu lɛ bonyii enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' seke bó ɛ kɛŋkɛ nnya yin can yese le.
Kɛ lemme dinɛn dì jee din dì ben lemte too kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le shieele maaŋ kɛ, dí too tɛn bô mbense fô Nyo' le jé le nteen.
Lemme dì ben gee din nu eduŋcɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu ben, ɛ́ bonyii emum etumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le yî n'yuw wvù ben yuuke saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu wvù ben tomte le. Bó nu ke etumte tɛn moŋkum mo Nyo' le no ben nu ɛ yene can yene fô bó le noo fô bonyii bomew e bocii.
Bó nu ke ebunlee fô ben e, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole nu yî yene le naa baay nje mbuwma Nyo' wvun wvù nu yî yene le wvù kuuke naa fele lo.
Beene enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' yî nnya ye yi baay yì ɛ̀ nulo wee saa esee no yí nu le kɛ.
Me wvù Baul kebɛɛ, ŋkule lo can ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ je kembonɛn bô nyɛkeey wvù wvu Klistu le. Ɛ̀ nu me wvù bó duu lɛ me ŋké ndioo nu keba kemew no ncewcewe lo bô ben, ŋké nto wase ɛ̂ ben ɛjise, mum mbo.
Me nlɛke lo ben lɛ seke me ɛ ŋke ɛ nto, fo ben ege ɛ́ me enɛ encewcewe beene no me nulo ŋke encewcewe bee bonyii bò kpwaake lɛ bese gee mwɛɛm bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bese cee yî woŋ wvun e, geenɛn kɛ bese yaa tumte jem yese bii no bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e tumte kɛ.
Kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bese tumte jem yese dvú nu mvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Mwɛɛm mvù bese tumte jem yese dvú kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le, keebvuuke mondvuum mò tɛmyi dvú.
Bese ké no joo mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvun bvuuke bombew bò bonyii beeke dvú, shiwse kembense ye kecii kè baaŋke fo bonyii ekee Nyo', soo tɛn boŋkpwawcɛ bo bonyii le dvú, gee ɛ bó yuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu Klistu le.
Seke ben ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ ben yuuke wase Klistu le bô mvuntelem mvunɛn mvunciim, ɛ́ bese emum enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wee tfuu wvù bɛɛ tɛmyi ɛkolɛ bô Klistu.
Ben etaa eyɛn fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ ben ɛjise! Ɛ́ wee kee naa kecɛɛy lɛ wen nu wee Klistu, ɛ́ wvú no kumyì lɛ no wvú nu wee Klistu, nu kɛ tɛn no bese nu.
Ɛ́ me ncim nɛ naa ɛ no nsaale ye nfesene caan nje mvuŋgay mvù bese kɛŋke mvù Tata nyaɛ keeyoo lo ben dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu keesâw lo ben dvú kɛ, ken'wuumɛn saa ekoole me kɛ.
Kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ fí eyen'yi nɛn kɛ diɛwɛ me mbɛmsee lo ben bô boŋwa' bem kɛ.
Me ŋgayte nɛn njefo bonyii bomew nɛn'yi no jemyi ɛkumɛ me gayte lɛ, “Wvú ké no saaŋke boŋwa' ɛ bó tɛmyi bvuu cewcewe, geenɛn seke wvú ɛ to ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise mum tu wɛɛ. Ɛ kɛ njeme we ké no koole fiɛɛ le kɛ.”
Boba bonyii ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi ɛ̂ boŋwa' le seke bese yaa nu fó kɛ, nu ɛ bese nu ke ege fí seke bese ɛ to.
Kɛ bese momte naa keebewsene ye, kɛnɛɛ efewsene bikuu bisɛse bô bonyii bomew ba bò seŋe bô dew yibo fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu bó kɛ. No bó fewsene bikuu bibole ɛbonɛbon, bewsene tɛn ye yibo ɛbonɛbon, nu ɛ fí duŋci lɛ kɛ bó kee fiɛɛ kɛ.
Fisɛse nu ɛ kɛ bese cim saale ye fesene keleŋ kɛ. Bese saale ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî keleŋ kè Nyo' nu ɛ nya can yese le keelem eto ebuy naa ɛ̂ ben e.
Kɛ bese daŋsene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kedwee no bese too buyte ɛ̂ ben e kɛ. Bese to nu bonyii bo fwe keelɛn bô saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu to naa buy ɛ̂ ben e.
Kɛ bese saale ye fesene kɛ, fì nu lɛ kɛ bese saale ye yî lemme dì ɛ̀ ge bonyii bomew kɛ. Geenɛn fiɛɛ fì bese taale fwe kee nu lɛ no mbee wene kuu gɛne fwe, nu no keleŋ ke lemme disɛse le ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu ekuuke tɛn gɛne naa ntay.
Nonɛn ɛ́ bese emum efey lo jo ben efewci saaka wvù jee gɛne biba bimew e, saa nu lɛ bese saale ye bô lemme dì bó nu ɛ lem wase bvudvuu bvu wee mvu le kɛ.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Wee edioo esaale ye, no saale ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ ge Tata le.”
Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù duŋci ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu wee wvu lɛŋ wvù mum nu wee wvu lɛŋ ɛ̂ Tata jise kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù Tata yɛne lɛ wvú nu lɛŋ wvù nu wee wvu lɛŋ ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
Me nlɛke lɛ ben ecinɛ kɛ ɛ́ me enjeme njeme keyuŋsɛɛ nɛn caan. Kee, ben ecinɛ kɛ lo!
Me ŋkɛŋke ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ bô ben kè ɛ̀ nu ke Nyo' le. Ben nu fô me le diɛwɛ ŋgon kpwoon wvù bɛɛ tfu le, wvù me nu ɛ ŋkaw keeŋke enya wvú ɛ̂ diemsɛn mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Klistu.
Geenɛn ɛ me nfane lɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no yo to wɛɛntɛnɛɛ lɛɛ Iff, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebvuŋse tɛn bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ecinɛ je yì nu kecɛɛy bvuu yuule yì ben bii Klistu le jó.
Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben kaantene kɛ lo fiɛɛ ficii. Ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos mvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, kɛnɛɛ keyoy kemew jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ben to fiisɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ Nyo', kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ saaka wvù jee mvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù ben to fiisɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ bese, tu ben nu emum ekaantɛn kɛ lo.
Kɛ me ŋkpwaake lɛ bonyii ba bò ben teŋe lɛ bokow bo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum kuuke lo fele me kɛ.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ kɛ me ŋkee njeme, tu kɛ ɛ̀ mum nu lɛ kɛ me ŋkee fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ Nyo' kɛ. Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ bese ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ jé le yicii noo yî mwɛɛm e mvunciim.
No me nto nfewcɛɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben ɛcici sɛ nlawma, ɛ fɛn ghane lɛ me nto ŋge ɛ ɛ̀ nu kebefɛ keenshike ɛkolɛ kem nonɛn wvu lɛ me embense ben e?
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ me nto nsooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu kensoŋ ɛntelɛŋ jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bimew, no me nto nfii nfi ɛ̂ bó, nlemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ben e.
Seke me nto nu beene, me nto mbaa ŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ bvumew yî wee mvu ben e seke me nto ŋkɛŋke shiee fiɛɛ kɛ. Boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo Masedonia to nyaa fiɛɛ ficii fì me nto nshieele. Nonɛn yî fiɛɛ le ficii nu ɛ me nto ntun keeŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ yî yene le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no me nu ŋke entune nonɛn.
No kecɛɛy ke Klistu le nu yî yɛm e, kɛ wee nu dvú ɛ̂ biba binɛn bì Akɛya le wvù nulo ebaŋ diuw wɛm yî fiɛɛ fì me nsaale ye yî dvú le kɛ.
Me ntune nfi ɛ̂ ben nonɛn nje la? Ɛ̀ nu njefo kɛ me ŋkooŋke ben e? Me ŋkooŋke naa ben ɛ Nyo' kee nonɛn.
Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgee nu ɛ me nu ŋke emɛy kɛ ŋgee, wvu lɛ me embaaŋke je fô bonyii ba bò gomte keeyɛne lɛ bó nu lɛŋlɛŋ bee bó yî fiɛɛ fì bó saale ye yî dvú le.
Kɛ bonyii bodvu ba yaa nu boom bo ntum e bo Klistu le bo kecɛɛy kɛ. Bó nu bonyii bo lemme le bo kenlɛɛma le. Bó tɛɛke lo Klistu fô jise lɛ bowen nu boom bew bo ntum e.
Ɛ kɛ fifin yaa nu fiɛɛ fi ŋghaw e kɛ. Naa Satan bô ɛkolɛ kew ke tɛw kɛ Nyo' fô jise lɛ wen nu nceendaa we wvu n'yuu.
Nonɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi diuw wvù yumɛɛn e seke bonyii bew bo lemme le baŋse tɛn ye yen'yi diɛwɛ bonyii bò yɛɛyi bonyii no nce wvu teytey kɛŋke keenu le kɛ. Kemɛse kebole nu ke enu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no gee dibole nu.
Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no njemyi lɛ fo wee ejo me lɛ me nu keyuŋ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ́ ben jo me lɛ me nu keyuŋ, ɛ́ ben cinɛ lɛ me le ɛ me njeme tɛn njeme kensaa ye caan.
Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ɛkumɛ fí fì me nsaale ye yî dvú le sɛ nfan, nu ɛ kɛ me n'yaa njemyi bô mvuŋgay mvu Tata le kɛ. Me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ keyuŋ e.
No bonyii nteen saale ye ɛ̂ je bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e, tu me nu ensaalè tɛn yɛm ye.
Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben fiisene biyuŋ duu lɛ ben kɛŋke bvufee!
Ben nu ɛ cinɛ lɛ bonyii ejoò ben ɛ ben tuu bonfaw bobole, ɛ bó diekene yî yene le, bene yî yene le, bensee ye, tumyi can ɛ̂ ben jise.
Ken'wuumɛn koole me lɛ bese to kaa nu fisɛse biwɛlɛncoy faŋɛ yaa gee nonɛn kɛ! Geenɛn ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì wee momte keesaale ye dvú, tu me tɛn nu emomte keensaale tɛn ye yî fifiɛ fiɛɛ le. Me mbɛɛ kɛ njemyi fin diɛwɛ keyuŋ e.
Ɛ́ bonyii bodvu nu Bo'ibulu, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu. Bó ɛ́ no nu bonyii bo Islael, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu. Bó ɛ́ no nu bonyii bo ɛ̂ kfuu di Abla'am e, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu.
Ɛ́ bó fɛn nu bonyii bò lemte Klistu le, tu me nfele naa lo bó yî fifiɛ le. (Me njemyi wase fin diɛwɛ wee jewte le.) Me nu ɛ nlem naa wase ɛ nfey lo bó, ɛ ŋgɛn ncaw ɛ nfey bó, ɛ bó suŋ wase me bokaŋ ŋkuuŋ, ɛ kpwe ɛ soy wase me bokaŋ e bokaŋ e.
Me nu ɛ nfi wase boŋgbwan can Bojuu le bokaŋ botin, ɛ bó tamte kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ fuute ŋgbwan mwaaŋ fô mbaanyɛ.
Bó nu ɛ suŋ wase me bokaŋ botɛte bô bimbaŋ, ɛ tumyɛ me bô ɛta kaŋ mwaaŋ. Ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo nu ɛ sawyɛ wase bô me bokaŋ botɛte, ɛ me ɛ nce wase ɛ̂ joo ɛ mbuy ɛ nshe jó.
Me nu ɛ ŋghan wase baay, ɛ mboy fo me enlɛ joo bokaŋ nteen, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe can bocooŋ e, ɛ mboy tɛn fo me eŋkpwe can bonyii bem bo woŋ e, ɛ mbvuu ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe can bitum e, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ɛlaante, ɛ mbvuu ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ŋkpwaante, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛ mboy tɛn fo me eŋkpwe can bonyii bò mbiayte lɛ bó nu boom bo bwɛɛm e yî Klistu le.
Me nu ɛ nlem wase baay ɛ njimtɛn. Me nu ɛ nce wase sɛ nyii bokaŋ nteen. Ɛ me nu ɛ no nu wase jeŋ noo sɛ joo yì me ŋ'wu. Me nu ɛ nce wase bokaŋ nteen sɛ fiɛɛ fidien, ɛ nce kenton e sɛ ndvu.
Ɛ keebvuu bise yî mwɛɛm mvumew e nu ɛ me nu kɛ ɛkuse jo bvujitɛ ɛdiuw ɛcii nje boŋkpwawcɛ bò me ŋkɛŋke fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii.
Ɛ́ wee dioo wɛɛyi, tu me nu en'yuuke tɛn ɛ me ŋ'wɛɛyi. Ɛ́ wee ké ege ɛ́ wee mvu ege kebefɛ, tu fí nu esase me baay.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ensaale ye, ɛ́ me ensaalè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ me n'wɛɛyi lo le.
Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' noo Icee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos wvù mbense nu fô wvú le sekecii sɛ ŋka, kee lo lɛ kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto nu Damaskus, ɛ wee sa' wvù to nu ɛkuse jo Nfon Alɛtas ke gay ɛ bonyii no cɛyte kelaante kedvu wvu lɛ bó ekoo me.
Geenɛn ɛ bonyii ke jo me lese ɛ̂ ŋkaa le, bvuse fô ntoo ketaaŋ e shike ɛkfuŋ, ɛ me nsɛ nlemtɛn can ye le.
Me nu ensaale kɛ ye ŋgɛne dvú fwe naa no sɛw yaa cim nu fó kɛ. Me nu eŋgɛn fwe yî mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bifilɛ le mvù to too fô me le noo mvù Tata to duŋci ɛ̂ me le.
Me ŋkee wee Klistu mvu wvù Nyo' to cunɛɛ ben dvú fey lo ɛbulɛ gɛn ɛ̂ we ɛke. Ɛbɛn nu wase bilum yuufe ncow binɛw no fí to kooyɛɛ. (Kɛnɛɛ wvú to ben fó bô ye, kɛnɛɛ sɛ ye, tu kɛ me ŋkee kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Nyo' maaŋ.)
Me ŋgomte keembvuu mbiinɛn lɛ, me ŋkee wvuwɛ wee, (kɛnɛɛ wvú to ben fó bô ye, kɛnɛɛ sɛ ye, tu kɛ me ŋkee kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Nyo' maaŋ.)
Nyo' to nu ɛ cun wvú ben dvú fô bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e bvu Nyo' le, ɛ wvú yuw mwɛɛm fó ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee esee kɛ. Ɛ mvumwɛ nu mwɛɛm mvù bó baa enya mvuŋgay lɛ wee wvu wum ejeme kɛ.
Ɛ̀ nu wee diɛwɛ wvuwɛ le wvù me nu ensaalè ye bô wvú. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaale ye bô ɛkolɛ kem kɛ, ɛfey kɛ lɛ me ensaalè ye ɛkumɛ kewɛɛyɛ kem.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu lɛ me ŋgomte keensaale ye ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kem, me nsaa nu keyuŋ kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fì me nu enjemyi nu kecɛɛy. Geenɛn me nu ɛ ntun keeŋge fifiɛ, wvu lɛ fo wee mvu ke enɛ ekpwaake jɛɛy ɛkumɛ me fele fiɛɛ fì wvú yɛne yî yɛm e bô fì wvú yuuke ɛ̂ me kɛ.
Geenɛn, keege lɛ fo me ŋke enɛ embense ye baay ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvu keŋghaw e mvun mvù Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ me, wvú to nu ɛ tum kfuu biay mi ɛ yí no bon'yi ye yɛm. Biay yin to nu nceendaa Satan ɛ wvú njiŋsene bô me, wvu lɛ fo me ŋke enɛ embense ye baay kɛ.
Ɛ me ŋke mbunle ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ Tata mbuy bokaŋ botɛte nlɛke lɛ wvú ecake kɛ fiɛɛ fidvu yî yɛm e.
Geenɛn ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ me lɛ, “Mvuŋgay mwem mvù me nu ɛ mbuw wo dvú nu ɛ kocɛn fô wo le keefii wo, njefo mvuŋgay mwem ké no lemte yî wee le gɛne mɛɛse seke wvú wɛɛyi.” Nonɛn me nu en'yuuke njoŋ mbvuu nsaale ye ɛkumɛ kewɛɛyɛ kem nfesene lo wvu lɛ mvuŋgay mvu Klistu le nulo elemtè yî yɛm e.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô kewɛɛyɛ kem noo boncun bò bó nan'yi me dvú noo boŋgɛw bò me n'yɛne noo bikaa bì bonyii bone ɛ̂ me ɛjim bô boŋgɛw bò bii me le nje Klistu. Me n'yuuke njoŋ nonɛn njefo ɛ̀ nu seke me ŋ'wɛɛyi, tu sekekiɛ nu ɛ me nu emum entɛmyi.
Me nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ ntu keyuŋ! Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ge ben me ɛ nsɛ ntu nonɛn. Ɛ̀ nu ben bò be kɛŋke keeduŋci wee wvù ɛ̀ nu me. Naa no me mbaa ncim mbuy fiɛɛ le nu ɛ kɛ fí mum nu lɛ bonyii ba bò teŋe bikuu bibole lɛ bokow bo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum kuuke fele me kɛ.
Mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e noo mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e nu ɛ me nto ŋkuu shém baay no ŋgee ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ. Ɛ mvumvun nu bonciise bò duŋci lɛ wee nu cɛɛy cɛɛy waa ntum Klistu.
Fiɛɛ fì me nto ŋgee fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bimew e nshɛɛte ben ɛfey lɛ me nto mbaa ŋgɛɛle bvujitɛ bvumew yî yene le, nu la? Ben elɛɛshɛ jay wɛm fofɛ!
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ me wvun, ɛ me ɛ nseyse wase keento ɛ̂ ben e yî bokaŋ e botɛte. Ɛ kɛ me nu ŋke ento enu bvujitɛ bvumew fô ben e kɛ, njefo kɛ me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvunɛn kɛ. Me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben. Me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bò kɛŋke keegɛɛle mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bo'icee bobole bô bobwee bobole kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gɛɛle bocee boom bô bobwee boom mwɛɛm ɛ̂ boom bobole.
Me nu ŋke en'yuuke naa njoŋ baay keenjewse fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke fô ben e bô keenya noo ɛkolɛ kem nje ben. Ɛ́ me ŋkooŋke ben baay, ɛ́ ben kaa ekooŋke me caan e?
Ben nu ɛ yɛn kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ me nto mbaa eŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ yî yene le kɛ. Geenɛn bonyii ɛ no duu lɛ me nto nu ɛ n'wɛɛntɛn nlɛɛ ben bô mbiay.
Nuu lɛ wee mvu bonyii bò me nto ntumɛɛ fô ben e to nu ɛ lɛɛ ben ɛ̂ diee diem e lɛ?
Me nto nu ɛ nlɛkɛ Taytus lɛ wvú eto ɛ̂ ben e, mbvuu ntum waa bwee wesebeene wɛ lɛ bô wvú eto. Taytus to nu ɛ lɛɛ ben seke wvú to toɛ le? Bee wvú to baa gee kɛ mwɛɛm yî ŋkpwawcɛ le mwaaŋ bô yî ɛkalɛ le kemwaaŋ e?
Sekemew ɛ ben kpwaake lɛ no bese mɛy ɛ no jemyi nɛn nu ɛ bese gomte keetaŋyi lo diuw wese fwe dvunɛn. Bese jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ bonyii bo Klistu le fwe dvu Nyo'. Nsáa yese shém, fiɛɛ ficii fì bese gee fô ben e nu keege ɛ́ ben ekuu lo.
Ɛ me nfane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me ŋke enɛ ento en'yɛn ɛ ben yaa nu no me nshieele lɛ ben enù kɛ, ɛ́ ben tɛn eyɛn ɛ me n'yaa nu tɛn no ben shieele lɛ me enù kɛ. Me nfane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me ŋke enɛ ento en'yɛn ɛ bonyii waale diwaa, ghɛɛke keŋghɛw, kɛŋke shém yì ton'yɛɛn, beele kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dew yibo, beete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii, kunsene mvuŋkunsɛn, bensee ye yi ɛcici, kɛŋke kembvuŋse.
Me nfane lɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ mbvuu ɛ nto, ɛ́ Nyo' wɛm ege ɛ́ ken'wuumɛn ekoole me, noo lɛ me nu ŋke enu yî yii le nje bonyii bò se gee bibefɛ diɛwɛ nnyɛn e bô nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ noo nsake, ɛ bó nu ɛ bó baa cinɛ wase dvú kɛ.
Fin nu wase bokaŋ bem botɛte bò me nu ento ɛ̂ ben e. Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ bó lese nsaw wee, tu bó nu eshieele bonyii bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte, bò eleem jim nsaw wvudvu.”
Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto ntoɛ ɛ̂ ben e yî nto wɛm wvu bokaŋ bofɛɛ le, me nto nu ɛ ŋgay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to cee nce kebefɛ lɛ, bó eyɛnè. Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ bó noo ɛ̂ bonyii bocii naa no me mbaa nu ɛ̂ ben ɛjise lɛ, ben eyɛnè, njefo kefew kè me nu ŋke embvuu ento nu ɛ me n'yaa nu ŋke encam naa lo shen fô wee le kɛ.
No ben gomte lɛ me ŋge fiɛɛ fì duŋci lɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Klistu ɛ̂ ben fele yî yɛm e, tu me nu eŋge. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wvú wɛɛyi lo keenya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke naa mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ.
Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bó to taa wvú yî kentam e ɛ wvú wɛɛyi. Geenɛn keseen nu ɛ wvú nu dvú ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le. Bese wɛɛyi kɛ tɛn diɛwɛ no wvú to wɛɛyi. Geenɛn yî mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le nu ɛ bese nu ke ecee bee bó lemte ben e.
Ben etaa bikuu binɛn eyɛn lɛ laa ben nu yî mbee le lɛ. Ben emom ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu binɛn. Kɛ ben yɛne lɛ Jisos Klistu nu yî yene le? Wvú nu naa yî yene le, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn baa nu lɛ ben nu ɛ mom bikuu binɛn ɛ yɛn ɛ ben ɛ gbwe.
Me ŋkee naa lɛ ben nu ke eyɛn lɛ bese baa egbwe kɛ.
Bese bunlee Nyo' lɛ fo ben ke enɛ ege fiɛɛ sɛ ɛ̀ nu fi lɛŋ kɛ. Kɛ bese yaa gomte lɛ bonyii eyɛne lɛ bese nu ɛ fey mmom wvudvu kɛ. Geenɛn bese bunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ben egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ naa no bese cim yen'yi kɛ diɛwɛ bese nu ɛ gbwe wase mmom wvudvu.
Kɛ bese yaa nulo egee naa lo fiɛɛ fì kicine kecɛɛy kɛ. Bese nulo egee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì tomte lo kecɛɛy.
Ɛ̀ dioo nu seke bese wɛɛyi ɛ ben tɛmyi, ɛ bese no yuuke njoŋ baay. Bunle yese nu kɛ lɛ ben eku egɛn emɛse.
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me nsaaŋke mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben ɛ me mbɛɛ sɛ me ɛ nto, wvu lɛ seke me ɛ nto, me nsaa eŋkɛŋke keenjo mvuŋgay mvù Tata nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me encewcewe lo dvú yî yene le kɛ. Mvuŋgay mvun nu mvù wvú nya lɛ me en'yoo lo ben dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu lɛ me ensâw lo ben dvú kɛ.
Keemɛɛse boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgayte ben e lɛ beene ɛ shɛɛ wase. Ben eseyse bikuu binɛn, eyuw ntefe wɛm, enù diuw mwaaŋ, eceè yî nyɛkeey e, nonɛn ɛ́ Nyo' keŋkoŋɛn bô nyɛkeey emum enù ben ɛ bó.
Ben egaynɛn bikuu binɛn e, eŋocɛ ɛ̂ ŋŋocɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le.
Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii gayte ben e.
Ŋwa' wvun saŋ me wvù Baul, waa ntum Jisos Klistu. Kɛ me nu waa ntum ɛ ɛ̀ to tum wee wvu wum me kɛnɛɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me kɛ. Ɛ̀ to tum Jisos Klistu bô Nyo' Ice wvù to bvusɛɛ wvú yî kpwe le.
Bee boom bo bwee wene le bo mbee le bocii bò nu fɛn bee bó gayte ben bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi woŋ wvù Galɛshia le.
Nyo' Ice bô Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
Jisos Klistu nu wvù to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew nje bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene wvu lɛ wen ebvuse beene can woŋ kebefɛ wvu keseen wvun e. Fifin nu no Nyo' wvù Icee wesebeene to seysɛɛ.
Bvukukɛ bvucii nu ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
Diuw yumte lo me lɛ kɛ keseen keseen nɛn ben nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no baŋsee jim ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù to teŋɛɛ ben nje fitele fì jee fì Klistu kɛŋke fô ben e, ɛ no bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvumvu le jɛɛy.
Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvumvu bvuu nu lo dvú jɛɛy kɛ. Fí nu kɛ lo lɛ bonyii bomew gomte keebvuŋsee bvufee bvunɛn, beete bô saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu.
Me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim to naa bese kɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' mvu fowe ɛ no fewci saaka wvumvu jɛɛy ɛ̂ ben sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn tuu lon!
No bese to gayɛɛ wase nu ɛ me mbvuu ntuu kɛ fó ŋgayte lɛ, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no fewci saaka Nyo' wvumvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn tuu lɛ lon!
Ben kpwaake lɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ɛ́ ebɛnseè bonyii me nuu lɛ ɛ́ ebɛnseè Nyo' lɛ? Nuu lɛ ben kpwaake lɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgee lɛ bonyii eyuukè njoŋ e? Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgee lɛ bonyii eyuukè njoŋ, me nsaa enu wee lemme wvu Klistu kɛ.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ kɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' wvù me nto nfewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí to buy ɛ̂ wee wvu wum kɛ.
Kɛ me nto n'yuw diuw wee mvu le, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to yɛɛyi wee me dvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ to duŋci Jisos Klistu ɛ̂ me.
Me njemyi nɛn ɛ ben to yuw wase no keŋge kem to shee nu seke me nto mbɛɛ yî nce woŋ wese Bojuu le. Me nto ŋké no mbone bikaa ɛjim jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' le baay ŋgomte keenfiwsɛ naa lo bí.
Me nto njici mbee wese Bojuu le ntɛmyi nfele lo keghan kem ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bosɛse, nlooci nleeme ntɛmyi naa ntay yî nce woŋ bo'icee bosɛse le.
Geenɛn ɛ Nyo' to baa wase me gɛɛ ɛ me mbɛɛ ɛ̂ bwɛɛm ɛshem. Ɛ fitele fiew fì jee ke ge ɛ wvú tee me.
Ɛ wvú ke duŋcɛ Waa we ɛ̂ me no wvú to shieele, wvu lɛ me eŋghanè nfewcì ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu. No wvú to duŋcɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ me nfaŋɛ n'yaa embvuu enu lo keembife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvu wum kɛ.
Kɛ me nto mbaa emben tɛn Jɛlusalɛm keen'yɛn bonyii bò to nu wase boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ̂ me fwe kɛ. Me nto nɛ ŋgɛn fiem ɛ ɛ̀ nu Alɛbia, ŋke nɛ jó ŋkase ntu jim Damaskus.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum bitɛte ɛ me mben Jɛlusalɛm lɛ bee Bita kiɛɛnɛn bikuu. No me mbenɛɛ, ɛ bee wvú ce ɛdiuw yuufe ncow ɛtin.
Me nto mbaa embvuu en'yɛn wee mvu ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛfey Jɛm wvù waa bwee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e kɛ.
Fiɛɛ fì me nsaaŋke fin nu kecɛɛy, ɛ Nyo' kee lɛ kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ me nɛ ŋgɛn ɛ̂ biba bì Silia bô Silishia le.
Sekekiɛ to nu ɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Klistu le bi ɛ̂ keba kè Judea le yaa kee wase me ɛjise kɛ.
Bó to yuuke kɛ lo ɛ bonyii jemyi lɛ, “Wee wɛ wvù se bone bikaa ɛ̂ beene ɛjim ghane wase keseen fewci lɛ bonyii elese fitele yî Klistu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú se shee gomte lɛ wen efiwsɛ lo.”
Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le yî fiɛɛ fì wvú geɛ fô me le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum yuufe ncow binɛw, ɛ me mbvuu mben Jɛlusalɛm bee Banaban. Me nto ndioo mbene, njo Taytus.
Me nto mben kefew kin e ɛ ɛ̀ duŋci Nyo' lɛ me emben. No me mbenɛɛ, n'yɛn bonyii bò bó to kee bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu le, ɛ bee bó lɛwse ye, ɛ me njike saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' wvù me nto nfewci ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ɛ̂ bó ɛjise. Ɛ me nto ŋge nonɛn wvu lɛ fo lemme dì me nu ɛ nlem wase bô dì me mbɛɛ nlemte ke ela ɛcici kɛ.
Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, faŋɛ yaa eleeme lɛ bó etfuse Taytus yew wvù bee wvú to nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa wee Glek kɛ.
Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to baa nu nje bonyii bomew bò to mbiayte lɛ bó nu bonyii bo mbee le, bò to wɛɛntɛnɛɛ ley fô bese to nu, tu kɛ bó to bee ejemyi leyte ɛ̂ fifiɛ fiɛɛ le kɛ. Bó to to diɛwɛ boŋkee le keeyɛn no bese gee wase mwɛɛm wasewase nje bese nu ɛ taashɛ bee bo Klistu Jisos. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keekase tfuse bese bvunfaw e.
Ɛ bese faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo fiɛɛ fì bó to too dvú caan kɛ. Ɛ bese to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ bese gomte keegɛɛ kecɛɛy kè ɛ̀ nu ke saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' le wvun fô ben e.
Ɛ bonyii ba bò bó to kee bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu, (kɛnɛɛ bó to nu la, kɛnɛɛ la, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ fô me le kɛ, njefo kɛ Nyo' duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.) Boba bonyii bò me ŋgayte, bò bó to kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu to baa ebise fiɛɛ yî fì me nto nfewci le kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ bó kaa yɛn lɛ bó nu ɛ nya saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' can yɛm e lɛ me enfewcì ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, lɛŋlɛŋ no bó nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ Bita lɛ wvú efewcì ɛ̂ Bojuu.
(Nyo' wvù to nyaɛ mvuŋgay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ wvú elemtè lemme din fô Bojuu le, nu kɛ wvú wvù to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ me enlemtè fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.)
Ɛ bó dioo yɛn je yì Nyo' nu ɛ buw me jó, ɛ Jɛm bô Bita noo Jon bò bó to kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu dikfuy di bonyii bo mbee le mum nya ɛbo ɛ̂ bee Banaban keeduŋcɛ lɛ bee bó lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ, lɛ bese egɛn lɛ elemtè fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ bó elemtè fô Bojuu le.
Fiɛɛ fì bó to gayɛɛ to nu kɛ lɛ bese ekumyì Bojuu bo kefufe le. Ɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ me nto ŋkooŋke naa baay keeŋgee.
Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ Bita ke nɛ to Antiok, ɛ me nsaw wvú ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise njefo wvú to nu ɛ jay baay.
Fí nu lɛ wvú to yaw to no diekene bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, yaa nyaake kɛ. Ɛ bonyii bomew bò Jɛm to tumɛɛ ke dioo to, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no guute ye jim, ke nɛ gawsɛn, faŋɛ yaa bvuu diekene bô bó kɛ. Ɛ wvú to gawsene nonɛn njefo wvú to fane ŋgoo yì to ké no leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke keetfuse wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu yew ɛ́ mwɛtɛn sɛ no nu wee Klistu.
No wvú ge nonɛn ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bò to nu Bojuu mum beŋɛn gee diew didvu le. Ɛ naa Banaban kebɛɛ mum bi tɛn gee dibole didvu le.
Ɛ me ndioo n'yɛn lɛ kɛ gee dibole bii cɛɛy cɛɛy no saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu duŋci kɛ, ɛ me mum ŋgay ɛ̂ Bita ɛ̂ bó bocii ɛjise lɛ, “Wo nu wee Juu, cee wase diɛwɛ wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu le, ɛ no gomte keekane bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu lɛ bó eceè diɛwɛ Bojuu le nɛɛ le?”
Me nto njemyi ɛ̂ Bita nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bee bó nu boom bo Bojuu le bo woŋ e. Kɛ bese nu bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò bó yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe kɛ.
Geenɛn ɛ bese kee kɛ lɛ kɛ Nyo' joo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey njefo wvú gɛɛle bonci bo Bojuu le kɛ. Wvú joo njefo wvú nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos Klistu le. Ɛ bese kebɛɛ ɛ lese tɛn fitele yî Klistu Jisos e wvu lɛ bese enù teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje fitele fì bese lese yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu nje bese gɛɛle bonci kɛ, njefo kɛ wee gɛɛle bonci ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyuu ejo wvú lɛ wvú nu teytey kɛ.
Ɛ́ bese momte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje bese nu bonyii bo Klistu le, bonyii ɛ bvuu ɛ no yɛne kɛ lɛ bese nu bonyii bò befe njefo kɛ bese gɛɛle bonci bo Bojuu le, tu fí fɛn nu lɛ Klistu tomte kebefɛ? Kɛ fí nu naa lo nonɛn kɛ!
Ɛ́ me nɛ ɛ mbvuu ɛ no n'yoote fiɛɛ ɛ me nto nsâw wase, tu fifiɛ duŋci lɛ me njayte lo.
Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ ɛ̂ keba ke bonci le nu ɛ me nu wase ŋkfusay, ɛ ɛ̀ yu bonci me, me ɛ ŋkpwe wvu lɛ me enceè wase no Nyo' gomte.
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ bó to nu ɛ ta wase me yî kentam e ɛ me ŋkpwe bee Klistu. Kɛ nshii wvù me ŋkɛŋke keseen bvuu nu wɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ cee wase Klistu yî yɛm e. Ɛ nshii wvù me ŋkɛŋke keseen yî yɛm e nu wvù fitele fì me nlese yî Waa Nyo' le wvù to nu ɛ duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn fô me le nya ɛkolɛ kew keekpwe nje yɛm.
Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ntune mbuwma Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wee enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise njefo wvú gɛɛle bonci, kɛ tu kpwe Klistu to nu ɛcici.
O oo bonyii bo Galɛshia, ben nu la biyuŋ nɛn? Wee nu ɛ low ben e? Ɛ̀ nu kɛ ben bò bó nu ɛ nɛle wase baaŋŋ no bó to taɛ Jisos Klistu yî kentam e ben ɛ yɛn lo ɛndan e?
Me ŋgomte keembife fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ ben. Keyoy ke Nyo' le to to yî yene le njefo ben to gee no bonci gayte nuu njefo ben to nu ɛ bee fiɛɛ fì ben to yuwɛɛ, lese fitele yî dvú le lɛ?
Ben yuŋsene la nɛn? Ben kɛw fiɛɛ bô Keyoy ke Nyo' le, ɛ no nu wase keseen lɛ ben nu ke emɛse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvunɛn e?
Ben to yɛn ŋgɛw ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu ɛcici le? Kecɛɛy, kɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvu ɛcici kɛ.
Nyo' wvù nyaa Keyoy kew ɛ̂ ben bvuu gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, gee nonɛn njefo ben gɛɛle bonci nuu njefo ben nu ɛ yuw saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le lɛ?
Ɛ̀ nu no bó saŋ ɛkumɛ Abla'am ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Wvú to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' mum jo wvú lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.”
Ben eyɛn lɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le bò looci nu kfuu di Abla'am e.
Ŋwa' Nyo' to nu ɛ yuu wase duŋcɛ lɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu lɛ bó enù teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise nje fitele fì bó nu ɛ lese yî ye le. Ɛ wvú mum fewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvun ɛ̂ Abla'am ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo gayte lɛ, “Me nu ŋke embuw bitum bicii bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le nje yo.”
Nonɛn, fí ɛ no nu lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ buw tɛn bó no wvú to buwɛɛ Abla'am wvù to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.
Bonyii bocii bò yɛne lɛ bó nulo enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise njefo bó gɛɛle bonci nu ɛ bó tuule lon yî bikuu bibole, njefo bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee tfuu wvù baa ecee no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le gee no bonci bocii gomte, nu ɛ wvú tuule lon yî ɛkolɛ kew e.”
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no duŋci naa ɛndan lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ejo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey nje mwɛtɛn gɛɛle bonci kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ jo lɛ wvú nu teytey nje fitele fì wvú lese yî ye le wvù nu ke ekɛŋke nshii.”
Kɛ bonci kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô nlese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ, njefo “Wee wvù gɛɛle bonci nu ke ecee bii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó le.”
Klistu to nu ɛ sum beene can lon wvù bonci too dvú le. Wvú to nu ɛ tuu bolon bosɛɛbeene yî ɛkolɛ kew e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó saŋ lɛ, “Lon nu yî wee wvù bó nu ɛ njɛyse yî kete le.”
Wvú to ge nonɛn, wvu lɛ mbuwma wvù Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ Abla'am eto tɛn fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le nje Klistu Jisos, ɛ́ beene bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le ekɛŋkɛ tɛn Keyoy ke Nyo' le kè wvú to kawɛɛ.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, beene ejo kenfewsɛn yî mwɛɛm mvù bonyii ké no gee le. Ɛ́ bonyii seyse wase fiɛɛ ɛ die kelew, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu ekose kɛnɛɛ ebise fiɛɛ yî dvú le kɛ.
Ɛkumɛ ŋkawma wvu Nyo', nu ɛ wvú to kaw ɛ̂ Abla'am bô wan wvù nu ke ebuy ɛ̂ kfuu diew e. Bó baa saŋ lɛ, “Wvú nu fô boom bò nu ke ebuy ɛ̂ kfuu diew e kɛ”, fì duŋci lɛ bó nu nteen kɛ. Fí duŋci lɛ fó jemyi ɛkumɛ wan mwaaŋ. Ɛ wan wvun nu Klistu.
Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keeŋgay nu lɛ, Nyo' to nu ɛ ge ŋkawma wvun, ɛ bilum ke fey gee nɛ bô kecow mbaanshɛ (430) ɛ wvú sɛ nya bonci. No fí nu nonɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonci bò to toɛ wase ɛjim ebvuu eto ekose moŋkan mò Nyo' to gbwolɛɛ fwele, ege ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ ela ɛcici kɛ.
Ɛ́ fí fɛn nu lɛ wee nulo ekɛŋkɛ nnya yin ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ seke wvú gɛɛle bonci, kɛ tu kɛ ɛ bvuu bɛɛ lɛ Nyo' to kaw lo bonyii dvú kɛ. Geenɛn, Nyo' to nya nnya yin ɛ̂ Abla'am bii no wvú to kawɛɛ wvú dvú.
Shiee bonci ɛ̀ no nu la? Bó to bise bonci keeduŋci mwɛɛm mvù bonyii jayte ɛ kɛw nonɛn gɛn buy naa seke wan wvun wvù Nyo' to geɛ ŋkawma wvun ɛkumɛ wvú nu ke eto. Ɛ Nyo' mum nya bonci ban ɛ̂ bonceendaa bew mum nya can wee mvu le lɛ wvú efese ɛ̂ bonyii.
Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛ́ bonyii nɛ ɛ no seysee fiɛɛ ɛ wee mvu nu ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, tu wvú nu fô bó le bocii. Geenɛn, Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ nci Nyo' ebvuu ekose fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ́ nci mvu to nu dvú wvù nulo enya nshii, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje wvú gɛɛle bonci cɛɛy cɛɛy.
Geenɛn, Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ wee tfuu nu nfwa ɛkuse jo bibefɛ. Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ fô wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos Klistu le, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke ekɛŋkɛ kɛ wvuwɛ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ Jisos baa to wase wvu lɛ bonyii eleese fitele yî ye le, ɛ bonyii nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse ɛ bó ɛ kay bó diɛwɛ bonyii bo ncaw e ɛ no cɛyte, gɛn buy seke Nyo' ke eduŋcɛ Jisos ɛ́ bó eleese fitele yî ye le.
Bonci to nu diɛwɛ ndɛ wan wvù to shee bô bonyii nɛci gɛn buy seke Klistu to toɛ wvu lɛ bonyii elese fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye le ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ jo bó lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
No Klistu nu ɛ to wase bonyii ɛ no leese fitele yî ye le, tu kɛ beene bɛɛ can ndɛ wan wvun e kɛ.
Ben bò nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos nu wase boom bo Nyo' le nje fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî Klistu le.
Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù bó nu ɛ lese wase ɛ̂ joo ɛ taashɛ wvú bô Klistu nu ɛ wvú ɛ tu wase bô Klistu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ.
Kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu wee Juu kɛnɛɛ wee ketum kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu nfwa kɛnɛɛ waa yew kɛ, ɛ kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu diemsɛn kɛnɛɛ kpwoon kɛ. Ben bocii nu wase fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ yî Klistu Jisos e.
No ben nu wase bonyii bo Klistu le nonɛn, tu ben nu wase boom bo Abla'am e, ɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ Abla'am dvú.
Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee nu keeke edie bvushɛw bvu ice le, geenɛn bɛɛ wan caan, tu kɛ jɛɛy jɛɛy nu dvú bô nfwa ice naa no ɛ̀ cim kɛŋke wvú bvushɛw bvudvu kɛ.
Wvú nu eyaw kɛ enu ɛ̂ bonyii bomew taale fô wvú le ɛ bvushɛw bvudvu nu can bonyii bomew e ɛ bó taale fó, egɛn ebuy kefew kè ice seyse le.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu fô beene le. Ɛ̀ to nu seke beene to nu diɛwɛ boom bo caan e, ɛ beene no nu bonfaw bo mwɛɛm mvù saake yî woŋ wvun e.
Ɛ kefew ke dioo loocɛ kocɛn, ɛ Nyo' tum waa we ɛ wvú to, ɛ kpwoon boo wvú, ɛ wvú no nu tɛn ɛ̂ bonci kuse.
Wvú to to wvu lɛ wen esum bonyii bò nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse ɛ́ Nyo' emum ejo beene diɛwɛ boom bew e.
No Nyo' jo wase beene diɛwɛ boom bew e nonɛn, ɛ mum ɛ ciinse Keyoy ke Waa we le kí ɛ to yî yese beene le, ɛ ge beene ɛ no teŋe wvú lɛ. “Abba, Icee wese!”
Fí nu lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ faŋɛ yaa bvuu nu bonfaw kɛ. Ben nu wase boom bo yew e. No ben nu wase boom, tu fí nu lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú gɛke fô boom bew e.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele seke ben to baa kee wase Nyo' kɛ, ɛ ben no lemte bvunfaw can mwɛɛm mvù ben to joo lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyo' sɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyo' ŋkuuŋ.
Geenɛn, keseen no ben nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase Nyo', kɛnɛɛ lɛ keseen no Nyo' nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase ben no me mbee keeŋgay, ben ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gomte keetuu jim fô bonyo' bo ɛcici ban e bò nu sɛ bó kɛŋke mvuŋgay ŋkuuŋ. Ben gomte keebvuu etuu bonfaw bo bonyo' bodvu ban e nje la?
Ben gɛɛle mbam ɛdiuw yomew lɛ ɛ̀ nu yo baay baay, bamte kee yimi, bamte bifew bimew yî kelum e, bamte bilum nje la?
Ben gee nɛn ɛ me nfane baay lɛ lemme diem dì me nlem ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu ɛ la ɛcici.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkule lo can ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben ekumɛn enù kɛ diɛwɛ no me nu ɛkumɛ bonci, kɛ no me nto ŋkumɛnɛɛ no nu diɛwɛ ben e seke ben to nu sɛ bonci. Ben to ke baa ege wase fiɛɛ fì befe fô me le kɛ.
Ben kee lɛ seke fwele wvù me nto nfewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben nu njefo me nto nu beene ncɛmte.
Ɛ naa no me nto nu yî kencɛm e nɛn, ɛ kí nu diɛwɛ mmom e ɛ yí ɛ to fô ben e, ben to baa elewte, kɛnɛɛ nyɛnsee me kɛ. Ɛ ben kaa fiisɛn lo me naa kɛ diɛwɛ nceendaa Nyo' mvu kɛnɛɛ diɛwɛ Klistu Jisos e kebɛɛ.
Ben to yuuke njoŋ bô me sekekiɛ, ɛ̀ kooyi la keseen? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ ɛ́ bó to gay lo lɛ ben ebaayɛ ɛjisɛ ɛyene enya ɛ̂ me, ɛ́ ben ebaayɛ lo ɛ́ je fɛn nu dvú.
Me nu ɛ ntu wase wee bvuban fô ben e no me nseŋe kecɛɛy ɛ̂ ben e?
Bonyii ba gomte keeduŋci lɛ bó kɛŋke shiee fô ben e baay, geenɛn ɛ bó gomte ben yî fiɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu fì jee kɛ. Bó kooŋke lɛ beene egawsɛn ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke wase shiee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bó le.
Fí jee lɛ wee ekɛŋkè shiee fô wee le yî fiɛɛ fì jee le. Fifin nu lɛŋ sekecii ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ seke me nu beene maaŋ kɛ.
Boom bem bò nu shém yɛm, ɛ̀ nu kɛ diɛwɛ me mbɛɛ embvuu eŋkɛw lo lume dinɛn, en'yɛn ŋgɛw eŋgɛn embuy no nce Klistu nu ke enu yî yene le!
Wee ejo ɛ me mbe nu beene keseen, ɛ́ me nsɛ ŋkiɛɛ je yì me enjeme jó ɛ̂ ben. Fiɛɛ fì ben ge fin nu ɛ bvufee ɛ la lo me.
Ben bò gomte keenu ɛ̂ bonci kuse, ben kɛ see ɛ̂ me, ben yuuke kɛ fiɛɛ fì bonci jemyi?
Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ Abla'am to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ, ɛ wvú to boke mvu bô nfwa, boo wvumvu bô kpwɛse wvù leyɛɛn.
Nfwa wvun to boke wan kɛ no bó ké no boote boom bocii. Geenɛn ɛ kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn boo we bii ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to geɛ le.
Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ejo fiɛɛ fin diɛwɛ kenfewsɛn ke fiɛɛ le. Bokɛnɛ bo bofɛɛ ban duŋci moŋkan monfɛɛm. 'Aga wvù to nu nfwa joo bvudvuu bvu moŋkan mò Nyo' to gbwolɛɛ bô bonyii bo Islael yî kum wvù Sinay e. Bonyii bocii bò nu ɛkuse jo moŋkan modvu nu bonfaw.
No 'Aga joo bvudvuu bvu moŋkan mo yî kum wvù Sinay wvù nu woŋ wvù Alɛbia le, wvú bvuu joo tɛn bvudvuu bvu kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm wvu keseen e, njefo bonyii bo ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le bocii nu bvunfaw e ɛ̂ bonci kuse.
Geenɛn ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm wvù nu wvu fowe le yaa nu bonfaw kɛ. Wvuwɛ Jɛlusalɛm nu bwee wesebeene.
Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Wo wvù kpwoon wvù nu kase yaa boote kɛ, ɛ̀ laŋlaŋè. Wo wvù ke baa lum wase wan, ɛ̀ kpwaakè dikie. Ɛ̀ keè lɛ boom bo kpwoon wvù bó nu ɛ base jim ɛ̂ wvú le nu ke eduule fele bo kpwoon wvù nu bô dweese le.”
Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben nu boom bo Nyo' le bii no Nyo' to kawɛɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Abla'am to bokɛɛ Aysik bii no Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ wan wvù bó to bokɛɛ no bó boote boom bocii no bone bikaa ɛjim jo wvù ɛ̀ to nyaɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le mvuŋgay ɛ bó sɛ boo wvú. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ fiɛɛ fì kooyi keseen.
Bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin lɛ la? Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Kuŋɛ kpwoon wvù nu nfwa bô waa we bocii, njefo kɛ waa nfwa nulo ke egaw bvushɛw bô waa kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn e kɛ.”
No fí nu nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ficii duŋci lɛ kɛ beene nu boom bo kpwoon wvù nu nfwa le kɛ. Beene nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bo kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn e.
Klistu to nu ɛ bvuse wase beene yî bvunfaw e. Wvú to bvuse nɛn, wvu lɛ fo beene ebvuu enù yî bvunfaw e ɛkuse jo bonci kɛ. Nonɛn ben emum eleemè tɛmyi. Fo ben ebvuu ebee eley ɛkuse jo kemmbuŋ ke bvunfaw e kɛ.
Ben eyekɛ eyuw fiɛɛ fì me wvù Baul nu enjeme. Ɛ́ ben beŋe lo lɛ bó etfuse ben yew ɛ́ ben sɛ no nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, tu fiɛɛ fì Klistu to geɛ fô ben e nu ɛcici.
Me mbvuu njemyi nciise lɛ wee wemɛn wvù nu ɛ bee lɛ bó etfuse wvú yew ekeè lɛ wvú kɛŋke keegɛɛlè bonci bo Bojuu le bocii no bó nu.
Ben bocii bò gomte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje ben gɛɛle bonci, ekeè lɛ ben nu ɛ gawsɛn wase bikuu binɛn ben ɛ bo Klistu. Ben nu ɛ laŋ wase mbuwma Nyo'.
Fô beene le nu ɛ fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le nu lɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo beene diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le. Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le kè lemte yî yese beene le fele yî fitele fì beene lese yî Klistu le nu ɛ ge lɛ beene ecɛyte.
Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee nu ɛ wvú ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu Jisos, ɛ wvú nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wvú yew kɛnɛɛ bó baa tfuse wvú yew kɛ, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì nu shiee le nu fitele fì wvú lese yî Klistu le ɛ no duŋci yî keŋkoŋɛn e.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ ben gee naa lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ ge yɛɛ ben ɛ sɛ lu keebii kecɛɛy e?
Kɛ ɛ̀ ge Nyo' wvù to teŋɛɛ ben fifin fiɛɛ kɛ.
Kɛ ben kumyi ŋgan wvù bó ké no maa lɛ, “Kekuu kemwaaŋ ɛ befe bô ntwaw?”
Me ŋgɛɛle bvufee yî yene le nje Tata lɛ kɛ ben nu ebi fiɛɛ fì bonyii bomew gayte le ɛfey fì ɛ̀ gayte me kɛ. Ɛ wee wɛ wvù bvuŋsee bvufee bvunɛn, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elaŋ ŋgɛw yî ye le.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ me mbɛɛ nfewci lɛ bó etfuuse bonyii yew ɛ bó sɛ nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ́ bonyii ebvuu ebone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nje la? Kɛ tu fiɛɛ fì me nfewci lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e fin ɛ bonyii yuuke ɛ fí kaa saase lo bó yaa be bɛɛ dvú kɛ.
Fo bonyii ba bò jewsee ben lɛ bó etfuuse bonyii yew e, nu ɛ me ŋgomte lɛ bó emɛse esoŋ lo bikuu bibole.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, Nyo' to nu ɛ tee wase ben wvu lɛ fo ben ebvuu elemtè bvunfaw ɛ̂ bonci kuse kɛ. Geenɛn, no ben yaa bɛɛ bvunfaw e ɛ̂ bonci kuse nonɛn, fo ben emum ejo lɛ ben nulo egee no nyam ye yene gomte kɛ. Ben elemtè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boom bo bwee wene le yî keŋkoŋɛn e.
Ben egeè nonɛn njefo bonci bocii nu ɛ taashɛ yî wvun wvu mwaaŋ e lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.”
Geenɛn, ɛ́ ben nɛ ɛ no ŋasene ɛbenɛben diɛwɛ bwé le, ɛ wee gomte keedie lo waa bwee, ɛ ben no yɛnè fô ben ke enɛ eyuwyɛ bikuu binɛn.
Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu lɛ, ben eceè biì ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci ɛ̂ ben, nonɛn ben saa ebvuu egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu no nyam ye yene shieele lɛ ben egeè kɛ.
Me njemyi nɛn njefo kɛ fiɛɛ fì nyam ye shieele nu fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le shieele kɛ. Ɛ kɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le shieele nu fì nyam ye shieele kɛ. Kɛ mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛɛm mvun nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè fiɛɛ fì ben gomte kɛ.
Ɛ́ ben cee bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebvuu enù ɛkuse jo bonci kɛ.
Mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye ké no shieele nu ɛ bonyii yaa maa mvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu keejaaŋke kenjaŋ bô keekpwawci mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ noo keecee nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ.
Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keebunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici bô keelaale kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛŋke diam. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keebanene, nyamte kenyam, ghɛɛke keŋghɛw, kɛŋke shém yì ton'yɛɛn bô fô wee le keekpwawci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keegawsene bonyii noo fô wee le keegaw bonyii ekɛŋkɛ ye ŋgoo.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn keebene kendoŋ, wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole bô keewukene yole noo keegee mvumew mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvumvun e. Me ɛ no njemyi nciise lo no me nto njemyɛɛ wase fwele ɛ̂ ben lɛ, kɛ bonyii bò gee mvumvun mwɛɛm yaa nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.
Geenɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu mvun, keŋkoŋɛn, nlaŋlaŋ, nyɛkeey, shém yì kuulɛɛn, fitele fì jee, keŋge kè jee, keeleeme yî kecɛɛy e,
keebonene keŋge, noo keekemsene bô ɛkolɛ. Kɛ nci mvu nu dvú wvù kicine mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.
Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Klistu Jisos e nu ɛ ta wase nyam ye yibo bô mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele yî kentam ke Jisos e.
No beene cee keseen yî mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Nyo' le, beene emum egeè mwɛɛm bii kɛ no Keyoy kedvu duŋci.
Fo beene ebenseè ye yi ɛcici kɛ. Fo beene egeè ɛ mvuntelem beete bonyii bomew kɛ. Fo beene ebenè kendoŋ bô bonyii bomew kɛ.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ ben nɛ ɛ yɛn ɛ wee mvù ben e ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ ben bò cee nce no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci mom keetefe wvú ɛ́ wvú ebuy ɛ̂ kebefɛ kedvu ɛnte. Geenɛn, wee dioo teete no teete wɛɛ eyɛnè fo wvú tɛn eley mmom e egbwe.
Ben eficì boom bo bwee wene le bô boŋgɛw bobole. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn tu ben gɛɛle nci Klistu.
Ɛ́ wee joo ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu fiɛɛ, sɛ wvú nu fimwɛtɛn ŋkuuŋ, tu wvú lɛɛle kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew.
Wee tfuu etaa mwɛɛm mvù wvú gee, eyɛn laa wen gee lɛŋ ɛ. Ɛ́ wvú fɛn gee lɛŋ, ɛ́ wvú sɛ no saale ye fô ɛkolɛ kew e. Geenɛn fo wvú esaalè ye fewsene ɛkolɛ kew bô wee mvu kɛ.
Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu kɛŋke keetuule bwew bvujitɛ.
Ɛ́ wee yɛɛyi wee bô diɛw Nyo', ɛ́ wee wvù bó yɛɛyi wvú gaw mwɛɛm mwew mvù Nyo' nya wvú dvú nya wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú wvudvu dvú.
Fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn joo lɛ Nyo' nu keyuŋ kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì wee jewyi nu kɛ fí fì wvú nu ke egbwele.
Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye nyaa fì ɛ̀ nu kpwe. Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù Keyoy ke Nyo' le nyaa.
Fo beene ke ewɛle keegee mwɛɛm mvù jee kɛ, njefo kefew nu ke eto ekocɛn ɛ́ beene ekɛŋkɛ sɛw wvudvu fɛn ɛ́ beene baa edose kɛ.
Nonɛn yî kefew e kecii kè beene kɛŋke je, ɛ beene no geè kɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bocii le ɛfey mvunciim fô boba bò nu ɛ̂ kfuu di bonyii bo mbee le.
Ben nu ɛ yɛn no ɛjisɛ ŋwa' yo fɛn nu ɛ faŋkɛn e? Ɛ̀ saŋ me bô kebo kem.
Bonyii ba bò kane lɛ bó etfuuse ben yew nu bò gomte keesaale ye yî mwɛɛm mvu yî nyam ye le, ɛ bó gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bonyii ke ebone bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim nje bó fewci lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e.
Naa kɛ bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse wase bó yew yaa cim gɛɛle bonci bocii kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bó gomte kɛ lɛ bó dioo ɛ tfuse ben yew emum ekfune gvuw lɛ ben nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó shieele yî yene le.
Geenɛn fô me le, kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ me ŋke en'yuu eŋkfune gvuw yî fiɛɛ fimew e ɛfey yî saaka wvù lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le nu ɛ kpwe wase fô me le, me ɛ ŋkpwe tɛn fô mvú le.
Ɛ́ wee nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wvú yew kɛnɛɛ bó baa etfuse, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì kuuke nu lɛ Nyo' eseyse wee ɛ́ wvú enù wee wvu fwɛ.
Kembonɛn ke Nyo' le bô shen ye eto fô bonyii bocii bò bii je yin e, bò nu wase bonyii bo Islael bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ kɛw keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, fo wee ebvuu eshiike me kɛ, njefo bolulɛ bò nu yî yɛm e duŋci lɛ me nu wee Jisos.
Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me mbunlee lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bocii bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí efici biyoy binɛn. Fí enù nonɛn.
Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, waa ntum Klistu Jisos yî ŋkoŋ wvù wvu Nyo' le. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bo Ɛfɛsus bò leeme yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ yî Klistu Jisos e.
Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben, ebvuu enya ben bô nyɛkeey.
Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, bvuu nu Ice le. Wvú nu ɛ buw beene bô mbuwma tfuu wvu woŋ wvu we le wvù fici biyoy bisɛɛbeene njefo beene nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le.
Ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ keenu keebom woŋ nu ɛ wvú to caw wase beene lɛ beene etaashɛ beene bo Klistu, eyuule, nu sɛ nlom ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Yî keŋkoŋɛn kew e,
nu ɛ wvú to seyse wase keeke ejo beene lɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bew fele yî Jisos Klistu le. Wvú to ge nonɛn, bii fiɛɛ fì wvú to gomte lɛ fí enù le.
Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvu lɛ mbense egɛnè ɛ̂ wvú yî mbuwma we wvu baay wvù wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ beene ɛcici fele yî Waa we wvù nu fitele fiew e.
Wvú to sum beene can ŋgɛw e ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Waa we wvun e. Fì nu lɛ, wvú nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene, bii mbuwma we wvù kuuke naa baay e,
wvù wvú tfuwɛɛ lo yî yese beene le. Wvú to ge nonɛn bô bvufee bvucii noo ŋkpwawcɛ we tfuu.
Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase beene ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú gomte fì to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le. Wvú ge bii fiɛɛ fì jee wvú le no wvú to seysɛɛ keeke ege fele yî Klistu le.
Wvú to seyse lɛ kefew nu ke edioo ɛ to wase ɛ kocɛn ɛ́ wen ebaancɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu fowe, kɛnɛɛ mvu fokuse, egɛɛ ɛ̂ Jisos ɛkuse.
Ɛ̀ nu tɛn nje Klistu wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ bese keenu bonyii bew. Wvú to caw no wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bii ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwe le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú ké no gee mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim bii ntaŋ wvuwe bô ŋkoŋ wvuwe le.
Fí to nu nonɛn, wvu lɛ bese bò to nu bonyii bo fwe keegɛɛ bvufee yî Klistu le ke eceè nce wvù egeè ɛ bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le yen'yi, ɛ mbense gɛne ɛ̂ wvú.
Ben tɛn to nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le seke ben to yuwɛɛ diɛw yi kecɛɛy yì ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvù to toɛ bô mboyma fô ben e. No ben yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mum lese fitele yî Klistu le, ɛ Nyo' ge nciise we yî yene le wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule kè wvú to kawɛɛ bonyii dvú.
Keyoy ke Yuule kin nu ketfuŋ ke bvushɛw bvù beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le. Ɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋke seke Nyo' ɛ mɛse ɛ sum bonyii bò ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú yî ŋgɛw kebefɛ le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ bvukukɛ bwew eyen'yi ɛ mbense gɛne ɛ̂ wvú.
Me nu ɛ n'yuw wase ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî Tata Jisos e, noo keŋkoŋɛn kè ben kɛŋke fô bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ge,
ɛ́ me ŋké ndioo mbunlee no ŋkumyi ben ɛ̂ bunle yɛm e. Me ŋke mbaa enlu wase keenyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛkumɛ ben kɛ.
Me mbunlee lɛ Nyo' wvù nu wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, Nyo' wvù nu Icee bvukukɛ, enya ben bô keyoy ke bvufee le, eyene ɛjisɛ ɛyene ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ wvú ntay.
Me mbvuu mbunlee lɛ wvú eyuuse bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le, fì ɛ̀ nu fì bó to teŋɛɛ ben nje fí, ebvuu ekiɛɛ bvukukɛ bvu baay bvu bvushɛw bvu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ me mbvuu mbunlee lɛ Nyo' eyene bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mvuŋgay mwew mvù fele mvuŋgay mvunciim. Ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvun mvù wvú lemte dvú fô beene bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvu baay.
Ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvudvu mvun mvù wvú to lemɛɛ dvú bvuse Klistu yî kpwe le, bense wvú shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e woŋ wvu we le.
Klistu kuuke fele naa lo mwɛɛm mvù saake fowe mvunciim noo bvunfon noo mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvucii. Wvú bvuu kɛŋke diee dì kuuke fele naa lo ɛdiee ɛcii yò bó teŋe bonyii dvú. Kɛ wvú nu nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ yî kefew kin e maaŋ kɛ. Wvú nu ke enu kɛ nonɛn kefew kè too le.
Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse, ɛ bvuu ɛ gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú enù ɛkolɛ ke fiɛɛ ficii fi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
Kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kin nu ye Klistu. Klistu ɛ mum ɛ yiŋsɛn yî kentaashɛ kin e kí ɛ kocɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim yiŋsene kocine ɛ̂ jé le yicii.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele, ɛ ben nu bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwe wase ɛ̂ keyoy e nje bojay bonɛn bô bibefɛ,
bì ben to cee gee le. Ben to cee bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu je yì bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e cee, bvuu bii nfon mvuŋgay mvu yî fwefwe le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú keyoy kekiɛ kè lemte keseen yî bonyii bò tɛmyi bikuu bô bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no beene bocii to shee cee. Beene to cee gee mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele, bii mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye bô boŋkpwawcɛ bosɛɛbeene gomte lɛ beene egeè. Beene diɛwɛ bonyii bo boyuum to nu wase lo bonyii bò shém effuuke Nyo' bô bó, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ no wee wvu wum tfuu nu.
Geenɛn Nyo' wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn bô shen fô beene le to nu ɛ koŋ beene baay,
taashɛ beene bo Klistu bvuse yî kpwe le no beene to nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase nje bojay bosɛɛbeene. Nyo' to boyse ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fiew fì jee.
No wvú to taashɛɛ beene ɛ bo Klistu Jisos bvuse yî kpwe le nonɛn, mum bense beene shike beene ɛ bó woŋ wvu we le.
Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ ɛ́ ke edioo enu yî kefew kè too le, ɛ́ wvú eduŋcɛ mbuwma we wvu baay wvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa efewsɛn kɛ. Mbuwma wvun nu ɛ wvú ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ beene nje fitele fiew fì jee fele yî Klistu Jisos e.
Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' to boyse ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fiew fì jee fele yî fitele fì ben to lesɛɛ yî Klistu le. Kɛ fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ to ge ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu nnya Nyo'.
Kɛ ɛ̀ to nu nje lemme dimew dì wee to lemɛɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ wvu lɛ wee mvu ke enɛ esaale ye kɛ.
Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ beene nu no bó nu nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ lem Nyo' bô ɛbo kew. Wvú nu ɛ taashɛ beene bo Klistu Jisos ɛ ge beene ɛ no nu bonyii bo bofɛ, wvu lɛ beene elemtè dilemme dì jee dì wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu dì beene nu ke ecee lemte le.
Ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ kfuu di Bojuu le, ben ekumyì fiɛɛ fì ben to shee nu fwele. Bojuu bò teŋe bikuu bibole lɛ bowen nu bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse yew, to teŋe ben lɛ ben nu bonyii bò nu ntffuse. Ɛ ntfuse wvu yew wvun nu fiɛɛ ɛ bó gee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye wee le bô can.
Ben ekumyì lɛ ɛ̀ to nu sekekiɛ, ɛ ben yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô Klistu kɛ. Kɛ ben to nu ɛnte jo ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le bò ɛ̀ nu bo Islael kɛ. Kɛ ben to kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô moŋkan mo ŋkawma le mò Nyo' to gbwole bô bó kɛ. Ben to nu kɛ lo finɛn yî nshɛ le fɛn yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fimew fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le kɛ, yaa kee tɛn Nyo' kɛ.
Geenɛn, yî keseen e no ben nu ɛ taashɛ wase ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos, ben bò to shee nu ncejole fô Nyo' le, nu ɛ wvú ɛ jo wase ben ɛ to dvú nceencee fô wvú le fele yî ɛlɛmɛ ke Klistu le.
Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Klistu kebɛɛ wvù nu ɛ to bô nyɛkeey fô beene le. Wvú nu ɛ ge wase Bojuu bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ɛ tu wee mwaaŋ. Wvú nu ɛ bvusse kembew ke keŋgawsɛn e kè ɛ̀ nu kembanɛn kè se shee nu ɛ̂ beene ɛntelɛŋ.
Wvú nu ɛ nya ye ye ɛ kpwe keefiwsɛ nci bô mwɛɛm mvù nci duu lɛ bó egeè keenu bonyii bo Nyo' le. Wvú ge nonɛn wvu lɛ wen etaashɛ wee tfuu yî ye le ɛ́ bó etu wase wee mwaaŋ wvu fwɛ yî bvudvuu bvu bonyii bo bofɛɛ le. No wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ mum ɛ to bô nyɛkeey.
Kpwe ye yî kentam e nu ɛ taashɛ dikfuu di difɛɛ ɛ to dvú fô Nyo' le yî ye le yimiaaŋ, ɛ mum ɛ yu kembanɛn kebole yî kentam e kí ɛ ka.
Wvú to nu ɛ to fewcɛ saaka wvù too bô nyɛkeey ɛ̂ ben bò to nu ncejole, fewcɛ tɛn saaka wvudvu wvun ɛ̂ bonyii bò to nu nceencee.
Ɛ̀ ge wvú beene bocii ɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ je keeto fô Nyo' Ice le fele yî Keyoy e kemwaaŋ.
Nonɛn, kɛ ben bɛɛ botolo kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò bɛke lo kɛ. Ben nu wase boom bo woŋ e ben ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, nu tɛn bonyii bo yew e bo Nyo' le.
Ɛ yew yin nu ɛ bó bom yî kenffuy kè ɛ̀ nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, ɛ Klistu Jisos kebɛɛ nu tɛ di buu di yew yidvu le.
Ɛ̀ nu yî ye le wvù yew yidvu nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no kuu keeke eto enu yew yì yuule fô Tata le.
Ben tɛn nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ yoo yî Klistu le, ɛ no nu bvudvuu bvù Nyo' cee fó ɛ̂ Keyoy kew e.
No Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase mwɛɛm mvun fô ben e nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no mbunlee fô ben e. Me wvù Baul nu yî ncaw e nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos. Ɛ me nlemte ncaw wvun nje yene ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
Me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw wase no Nyo' to nu ɛ caw me nya lemme lɛ me ensee ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ mbuwma we fô ben e.
Fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu fì to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ɛ Nyo' ɛ yene wase ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm me ɛ n'yɛn. Me nu ɛ nsaŋ wase caan ɛkumɛ fí fô ben e.
Ɛ́ ben taŋ lo, ɛ́ ben eyɛn fiɛɛ fì me ŋkee ɛkumɛ kenyilɛ kin kè to nu ɛkumɛ Klistu le.
Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa ege ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii le ke sekekiɛ ekiɛɛ kenyilɛ kedvu kɛ. Keseen nu ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bò wvú to balɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew noo ɛ̂ bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, bó ɛ kiɛɛ.
Fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nulo ebee saaka wvù jee le, ɛ́ Nyo' enya tɛn bó bô bvushɛw bvù wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bew. Bó nu wase ye yimiaaŋ bô bó, ɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to geɛ fô Bojuu le nu wase tɛn fô bó le no bó nu ɛ taashɛ bô bo Klistu Jisos.
Nyo' to nu ɛ baa me lɛ me enfewcì saaka we wvù jee wvun. Wvú to bale nje fitele fiew fì jee fì wvú kɛŋke fô me le. Wvú to nu ɛ jo mvuŋgay mwew lem dvú yî yɛm e mum nya lemme din lɛ me enlemtè.
Me mbaa ncim mbuy naa lo wee wvu caan ŋgoo bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le kɛ. Geenɛn Nyo' to nu ɛ nya kɛ mbuwma wvun ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgɛn enfewcɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ bvukukɛ bvu Klistu le bvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ kenfewsɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
Wvú to nya tɛn mbuwma wvun lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ bonyii bocii ekiɛɛ ntaŋ kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ le kè Nyo' wvù bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim to shee nyile yî ye le bilum e bilum e.
Ntaŋ wvun to nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew ke keseen e, ɛ́ Nyo' ege fele yî kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ́ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bô biyoy bì kɛŋke mvuŋgay saake mondvuum mo fowe le, eyɛn bvufee bvu Nyo' le bvù nu lo jé le jé le.
Wvú to ge fiɛɛ fin bii no wvú to seysɛɛ wase foŋkɛw. Ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase fiɛɛ fidvu fele yî Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene le.
Ɛ̀ nu nje ye wvù beene nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ je keetoo mbew Nyo' le yaa kɛŋke kɛ nfan kɛnɛɛ kemaŋɛn nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le.
No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋkule lo can lɛ fo shem kpwe ben nje ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne fô ben e kɛ. Ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvujoŋkɛ bvudvu.
Ɛ̀ nu nje mwɛɛm mvun wvù me ntumte ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Icee wesebeene fwe,
wvù ɛdiee ɛ dikfuu dicii di fowe noo di fokuse nɛn'yi fô wvú le.
Me ntumte ɛnvuw nlɛke lɛ, bii bvukukɛ bwew bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu baay e, lɛ wvú enya ben bô mvuŋgay fele yî Keyoy kew e, ɛ́ mvú ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn etɛmyi.
Nonɛn, ɛ́ Klistu emum ecee ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e no ben leese fitele yî ye le. Me mbunlee tɛn lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn etɛmyì diɛwɛ kete kè cime gɛŋ e noo diɛwɛ yew yì bó bom yî kenffuy kè tɛmyi le,
wvu lɛ ben ɛ bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ekɛŋke bvufee bvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn ke Klistu le kè nu fô beene le. Keŋkoŋɛn kew fô beene le nu ɛ kí kɛŋke mbvuw baay, kɛŋke bvundee bô bvudefɛ baay, ɛ kí ɛ ley tɛn fokuse baay.
Me mbunlee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn kew kedvu kè ghaake bonyii keekiɛɛ le, wvu lɛ ben nulo enu ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn bô fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu fí ficii.
Beene emum ebenseè Nyo'. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nulo ege fiɛɛ ficii bô mvuŋgay mvù lemte yî yese beene le. Ɛ wvú nulo ege naa efey lo no beene biite kɛnɛɛ no beene nulo ekpwawcɛ.
Mbense enù fô wvú le nje kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le noo nje Klistu Jisos yî kefew e kecii noo sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
Nonɛn, me wvù Baul wvù nu wee ncaw nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos, me nlɛke lo ben lɛ ben eceè nce wvù nu ɛ kocɛn wvù Nyo' teŋɛɛ ben lɛ ben eceè yî dvú le.
Ben eshiwsè bikuu binɛn, nù wɛɛ, kuulè shém. Ben enù yî keŋkoŋɛn e, yaa kɛŋke fitele fì sɛsene kɛ.
Ben emomtè naa ntay keenu kɛ yî kentaashɛ kè Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ to dvú fô ben e no ben cee yî nyɛkeey wvù taashi bonyii le.
Ye Klistu nu yimiaaŋ, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nu kemwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to teŋɛɛ beene lɛ beene etaalè fwe yî dvú le nu tɛn fimwaaŋ.
Tata nu kɛ mwaaŋ, ɛ mbee nu kɛ mwaaŋ, ɛ nlese wvù bó leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ wvù nu Icee wesebeene bocii. Wvú nu ɛ̂ we jo mwɛɛm mvunciim, lemte yî beene le bocii, nu tɛn ɛnte jo beene bocii.
Fí nu tɛn lɛ Klistu nu ɛ buw kɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ beene le ɛ nya wvú bô ye nnya bii nfew we le ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.
Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Seke wvú to benɛɛ gɛn we, wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ bonyii bò wvú to kooyɛɛ no bii wvú le. Wvú to nu ɛ nya nnya ɛ̂ bonyii.”
Keegay lɛ, “Wvú to nu ɛ ben gɛn we” nu lɛ la? Fí duŋci lɛ wvú to nu ɛ yaw shii gɛn ɛkuse jo nshɛ.
Nonɛn, wvú wvudvu wvù to shiilɛɛ to fokuse nu kɛ tɛn wvú wvù to benɛɛ fey naa lo ɛbulɛ kecii gɛn ɛ̂ we, wvu lɛ wen eyiŋsɛn mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ́ mvú eyiŋsɛn ekocɛn.
Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wvú wvù to nyaɛ nnyá ɛ̂ bonyii. Wvú to nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ bomew lɛ bó enù boom bew bo ntum e, nya ɛ̂ bomew bò eseŋè mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, bomew bò eghanè fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo', bomew bò etaalè fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii.
Wvú to nya nnyá yidvu yin keeseyse bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le dvú ɛ́ bó ekpwɛntɛn bò elemte lemme diew, yoote ye Klistu yì ɛ̀ nu kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le,
ke egɛn ebuy kefew kè beene bocii ke enu wase wee mwaaŋ yî mbee wesebeene le bô yî fiɛɛ fì beene kee ɛkumɛ Waa Nyo' le. Ɛ́ beene cee nonɛn, ɛ́ fí ege ɛ́ beene enu ɛ bó ɛ taw ɛ kocɛn ɛ mɛse ɛ no nu wase no Klistu nu kebɛɛ.
Nonɛn, beene saa ebvuu enu kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo caan e, bò kfuu n'yɛɛyi wvù la dioo fele no njiŋsene bô bó ɛ bó gɛne fwe tuu jim kɛ diɛwɛ fiɛɛ fò fwefwe kale le kɛ. Beene saa ebvuu enu tɛn diɛwɛ bonyii bò bonyii bò ghane wɛɛntene lo elɛɛle bó bô mbiay yì bó seyse le kɛ.
Beene kɛŋke keeseŋe fisɛɛbeene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy yî keŋkoŋɛn e, emum ekuu ɛ̂ jé le yicii keeto enu diɛwɛ Klistu le wvù nu ɛkolɛ kesɛɛbeene.
Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ biba bi ye ye le bicii bì nu ɛ shfuwyɛ ɛ taashɛ yî ye le sɛ kuu, yoote ye ye yî keŋkoŋɛn e no keba lemte diew lemme ɛ keba lemte diew ntay.
Yî keseen e, ɛ̂ diee di Tata le nu ɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgay embvuu enciise lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben ebvuu eceè kɛ diɛwɛ bonyii bò maa Nyo' le kɛ. Boŋkpwawcɛ bobole ké no nu kɛ bo ɛcici.
Bvufee bvubole nu bvu binjiwe le. Bó nu ncejole fô nce wvù Nyo' duŋci le, njefo bó nu ɛ ma lo Nyo', ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bó tɛmyi bikuu.
Bó nu ɛ yum bikuu baay. Bó nu ɛ lese bikuu bibole ɛnte jo nnyɛn kenjaŋ, ɛ ye yibo yvuwse kɛ keegee dikfuu di nnyɛn e dicii.
Kɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ fì bó to yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú ɛkumɛ Klistu kɛ.
Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ wvú, ɛ bó ɛ yɛɛyi wase ben bò nu ɛ taashɛ bô wvú bô kecɛɛy ke ɛkumɛ Jisos.
Ben emum ebaa ye yi yvum yì ben to cee nce wvu yvum dvú yì nu ɛ befe wase nje mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e mvù ben to shee gee.
Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ Nyo' eseyse boŋkpwawcɛ bonɛn ɛ́ bó enu boŋkpwawcɛ bo bofɛ,
emum etfume ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye yi fiɛ yî yene le yì Nyo' nu ɛ ge yí ɛ no fieesene wvú. Yiyin nu ye nce wvù looci nu kecɛɛy wvu teytey bô wvù yuule.
Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben ecinɛ mbiay e, ɛ́ wee ejemyì ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy ɛ̂ waa bwee njefo beene bocii nu biba bi ye yimiaaŋ e.
Ɛ́ wee ton'yi shém, ɛ́ wvú no yɛne fo wvú enɛ ege kebefɛ. Fo wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ diuu esele ɛ wvú bɛɛ ton'yi shém kɛ.
Fo wvú enya je ɛ́ dɛwle eley jó kɛ.
Ɛ́ wee se cooŋke bvucoŋ, ɛ́ wvú cinɛ dvú no lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme dì jee bô can ye, wvu lɛ wvú nulo ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú efi tɛn bonyii bò fuute dvú.
Ben eyɛnè fo njeme wvù samte ebuyte dew yene le. Wee ejemyì fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee fì nulo eyoo lo bonyii naa fɛɛ fò bó nu, wvu lɛ njeme we etoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nfi fô bonyii bò yuuke le.
Fo ben egeè fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule ke Nyo' le eyuuke ŋkuuŋ kɛ. Keyoy ke Yuule kin nu nciise Nyo' yî yene le keeduŋcɛ lɛ diuu nu ke edioo ɛ to ɛ kocɛn ɛ́ wen emɛse esum ben can ŋgɛw e.
Ben elaŋ naa lo mvuntelem mvù cɛwkene bô shém yì ffuuke noo shém yì ton'yɛɛn noo waa noo keebeete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii noo mvuntelem mvù befe.
Ben ekɛŋkè ɛ ɛ̀ nu keŋge kè jee bô mvuntelem mvù jee fô wee noo wee le. Wee ɛ́ ge kebefɛ bô wee, ɛ́ wvú lɛɛshɛ enya ɛ̂ wvú kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' to feyɛɛ yî Klistu le lɛɛshɛ binɛn bibefɛ.
No ben nu boom bo Nyo' le bò wvú kooŋke naa ntay, ben emum ebeŋenè wvú.
Ben eceè yî keŋkoŋɛn e lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu to koŋɛɛ beene nya ɛkolɛ kew fô beene le. Nnya ye yin to nu ncese ɛ wvú samte shfuuŋkene fô Nyo' le.
Mwɛɛm kɛ diɛwɛ kenjaŋ bô nce nnyɛn tfuu noo ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ yaa nu mvù bó eyuuke ɛkumɛ mvú ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ, njefo kɛ mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù enù ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ɛnte kɛ.
Kɛ fí baa ekocɛn naa lo lɛ njeme wvù nyɛne bô njeme keyuŋ, noo yɛle di ɛcici ebuytè dew yene le kɛ. Ben enyaà kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
Ben ekeè lo kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wee wvù jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù gee nnyɛn, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù yɛɛle ɛjisɛ, kɛŋke keleŋ ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Klistu le noo bvu Nyo' le kɛ. Wee ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ké no joo mwɛɛm diɛwɛ nyo' we le.
Fo ben ebee ɛ́ wee elɛɛ ben bô njeme wvu ɛcici ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun mvù ké ge ɛ shém Nyo' no ffuuke bô bonyii bò yaa yuuke wvú le kɛ.
Nonɛn fo ben etaashì ŋgoo ben ɛ boba bonyii kɛ.
Ɛ̀ to shee nu fwele ɛ ben nu bonyii bo ɛjiwe le. Geenɛn keseen no ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Tata, nu ɛ ben nu wase bonyii bo n'yuu le. Ben emum eceè diɛwɛ bonyii bo n'yuu le.
